kyi rang bzhin can/ /kha dog ljang ser drag chen mo/ /lhag ma lA ma dang ni mtshungs/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su bsgom byas nas/ /dur khrod gnas dang gnyis med pa/ /kun spyod rtsa rnams thams cad kyi/ /rgyas pa'i dga'

ba'i spyod yul lo/ /'di ni 'tsho ba'i ting 'dzin dang / /'od gsal rnam pa'i chos nyid do/ /bskrad pa'i las dang rnal 'byor ma/ /'jig rten gyi ni 'dren pa mo/ /rang bstan chos las gsungs pa yi/ /sna tshogs las kyang bya ba'o/ /

kun gyi rnal 'byor yongs rdzogs nas/ /rgyud 'di yi ni spyod yul lo/ /'on kyang rnal 'byor de kun kyang / /mdor bsdus tshul ni tshig 'di yin/ /so sor bsdud dang de bzhin du/ /bsam gtan srog rtsol 'dzin pa dang / /rjes

su dran dang ting 'dzin te/ /sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid rnam drug go/ /so sor sdud pa khwa gdong ma/ /'ug gdong ma ni bsam gtan 'dod/ /srog rtsol du ni gnas pa khyi/ /'dzin pa la ni phag mo'o/ /rjes dran gnas pa pho nya mo/ /ting

nge 'dzin ni brtan mar 'dod/ /mche ba ma ni rgyas bstan thob/ /'joms ma 'bras bu kun bdag skyes/ /'khor ba las ni grol gyur pa/ /rang gi sku ni sgyu ma mnyam/ /bdag byin brlabs 'di phra mo dang / /rdo rje bzlas rang

mtshan nyid do/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems kyi gter/ /de las lhag ma zung 'jug go/ /mya ngan 'das zhes bya ba'ang 'di/ /lam thams cad kyis mya ngan 'das/ /theg chen kun la rab 'jug pa/ /sngags kyi theg pa ru ni

byed/ /bya ba bstan bcos dge sna tshogs/ /snying rje mnyes gshin pa yis byed/ /gang 'dra'i dngos dang dngos po la/ /ye shes rnam pa'i rang byung gis/ /de 'dra ba yi sems rgyun las/ /bdag nyid rnal 'byor rnams kyis mthong / /

lus kyi mtshan nyid yang dag pa/ /rtsa yi gur ni bshad par bya/ /spyi gtsug nas ni nor bu'i mthar/ /mtshams dang mgrin pa rnam gnyis 'dod/ /rkang pa'i mthe bo mtshams mtha' dang / /smin dbus de bzhin sgro ba ste/ /mtshan ma'i rtsa ba

dpral ba dag /mig dang rkang pa'i sor mo gnyis/ /ming med pas ni pus mor shes/ /byin pa rna ba gnyis dag dang / /rkang pa'i mthil dang snying ga dag /lte ba dang ni rgyab gzhung dang / /bshang lam dang ni rkan shes bya/ /

rkang pa'i tshigs dang mchu dag dang / /mkhur ba mkhur tshos dag dang ni/ /'doms dang mchan khung gnyis dang ni/ /lag pa'i tshigs dang rkang pa dag /dpung pa'i tshigs dang nu ma gnyis/ /'jing ba thal gong 'dir mtshams so/ /

mjug ma nor bu gnyis dag dang / /rked pa'i tshigs dang mgrin pa dang / /dbral ba dang ni tshigs gnyis dag /rna bug dag dang rtsa ba dang / /brang dag gnyis kyi mtshams su 'dod/ /stan dag dang ni smin khugs dang / /lce dang mi yi

sna gang dag /de bzhin du ni rkan dang lce/ /bol+la kak+ko la gnyis dag /de la sogs pa du ma ni/ /rtsa dang tshigs kyi gnad du 'gyur/ /rang rang spyod pa btsir bya ste/ /byang sems bdag nyid che rnams kyi/ /btsan thabs sbyor ba'i cho ga ru/ /

shes bya bla ma'i gsung gis so/ /zla ba zla ba'i tshes gang du/ /tshes grangs de la rtsa ba'i rtsa/ /dkar po'i tshes gcig la sogs nas/ /ji srid nag po'i mthar thug par/ /shes bya byang chub 'bab pa'i rtsa/ /'ug mo spyod mo/ /

sgo la spyod pa mo/ /gang dang 'dra ba'i gdong de yi/ /de 'dra'i sor mo'i phyag rgya ni/ /dbugs ni de dang 'dra bar bya/ /phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid 'dod/ /yang na rtsa rnams thams cad ni/ /btsir bya bcu gnyis kyis lhag pa'i/ /brgya yi

tshigs rnams thams cad ni/ /ji ltar gdong gis rim pas so/ /de dang der ni A li 'bar/ /drag po'i sgyu ma dus kun du/ /de phyir a zhes bya'i sgo/ /tshig tu rtog pas brtags pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbugs dbyung

bar/ /rdo rje 'chang ltar brtag pa'o/ /gang dang gang gis 'ching 'gyur ba/ /rtsa ni gti mug chen por 'gyur/ /de'i de yi rang bzhin gyur/ /sna tshogs gzugs kyi rin chen bzhin/ /rmongs dang mkhas rnams kyi ngag la/ /mnga' bdag thar

pa chen po bzhugs/ /byed pa 'byung po thams cad kyi/ /dbang phyug skye bo sna tshogs rnams/ /de phyir rtag tu las nyams pa/ /sngon byas sdig pa'i las kyis te/ /nyams 'gyur bstan pa 'di la ni/ /bgrod bya

sangs rgyas nyid 'thob 'gyur/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro

rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las 'ug gdong ma'i nges pa'i tshul dang yang dag pa'i cho ga las bskyed pa dang srog la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid ste le'u brgyad pa'o// // de nas gzhan ni don che ba/ /khyi gdong

rgyu yi dbye bshad bya/ /gang zhig rnam par shes tsam gyis/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyis mchog 'grub 'gyur/ /swA khyi ni rnal 'byor ma dbugs 'byin/ /rang gis 'jug dang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dus kun tu ni gnyid log dang / /sad pa

bde ba yon tan che/ /sna tshogs gnas su song nas ni/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bde reg 'gyur/ /brgya la nyi shus lhag pa ni/ /nges tshig bstan bya'i mtshan nyid do/ /de ltar khyi'i ming du ni/ /bde ba sbyin pa por shes bya/ /pad ma'i

skye gnas de rnams su/ /As+ye pad ma'i kha ni rab rgyas pa/ /gtong dang longs spyod gar chen po/ /glu dang rol mo gnyid log dang / /reg dang gos dang rgyan dag dang / /me tog la sogs bsung can 'dod/ /mthun par lte ba'i ma la sogs/ /mdzes ma rnams

kyi ngag can te/ /sangs rgyas mchod sogs thams cad du/ /su ra'i btung la 'thung 'gyur dang / /skyed mos tshal dang rdzing bu'i 'gram/ /bsti gnas 'gro ba la sogs kyis/ /tshim dang ston mo 'dod pa ltar/ /bla ma'i gsung ni bde chen

po/ /mi dang mi mo'i sgeg pa dang / /dgod dang sgeg pa'i bya ba gang / /mkhas pa rnams kyi yid dam pa/ /skye bo dbang phyug nyid du'o/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /mchod dang phyag byed la sogs pas/ /bla ma gus las bde ba ste/ /

yon 'bul ba dang bud med do/ /spyod lam la sogs chos rnams la/ /las thams cad la mi 'jug go/ /rgol ba rnams ni gzhom pa dang / /sangs rgyas chos rnams gzhag pa dang / /rnal 'byor ma dang bza' btung dang / /

sgom dang dga' ba bskyed pa dang / /dbang po gnyis kyi bdag nyid skyes/ /sbyin sogs pha rol phyin rnams kyi/ /las kyis skyid pa bcal bya dang / /byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang / /kun gyi tha mar btang snyoms dang / /ye shes

shes rnam shes smra ba dang / /dbu ma'i tshul ni gzhag pa las/ /kun la dbugs dbyung sbyin pa dang / /skur pa 'debs pa dgag pa dang / /dge ba bcu'i las dang ni/ /klog dang kha ton byed mchog las/ /byang chub lam la gnas

pa yi/ /dpa' bo gnyis med lta ba'i phyir/ /lus la ltos pa med pa yis/ /grong dang grong du gnas rnams kyi/ /de ltar gnas skabs gcig pa'o/ /gnyis pa slar yang bshad par bya/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi rgyud
la dga'/ /don dam rnams la gsal ba yis/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi gnas su/ /dngos grub gtam rnams brjod pa dang / /chos ni don chen 'du shes la/ /dus su 'du shes sgom pa po/ /'gro grub

spong ba'i 'du shes ni/ /de nyid rtogs pa'i ming can no/ /dngos rnams sgyu ma'i 'du shes dang / /zhi sogs las kyis bde ba dang / /pha dang bu las gcig min dang / /gnas sogs 'gro bar spro ba can/ /nyon

mongs phung po yongs gtong dang / /ye shes phung po bskyed pa dang / /slar yang 'khor bar mi 'ong dang / /'khor lo sdom pa'i rnal 'byor ldan/ /rtog pa po yi tshig bzung nas/ /rtogs ldan min pa'i tshig spang bya/ /

dbang po rnams kyi mi mthun min/ /rang bzhin gyis ni mdzes pa yi/ /lhan cig skyes dang longs spyod rdzogs/ /sprul pa dang ni chos sku yang / /'du shes sad pa la sogs su/ /gang phyir srid mtshor kun spang bya/ /

lhag ma dga' ba bzhi po ni/ /smon lam rdzogs ldan la sogs la/ /rdzogs ldan dus su rang bzhin skye/ /dga' ba sangs rgyas rdzogs ldan gang / /sems can gsum ldan la phra skyes/ /rig pa de la sbom po skyes/ /gnyis

ldan la ni bde ba med/ /rtsod dus cha yi rags pa'o/ /thams cad sangs rgyas yon tan thob/ /smon lam gyis ni rang gi 'bras/ /de ltar bde skabs rnams kyis ni/ /sum bcu rtsa gnyis rmad byung che/ /gnas skabs gsum pa'i

bde ba la/ /dga' ba bcu drug rtag brtags pas/ /khams bcu drug tu shes par bya/ /rang bzhin skyes par gyur pa gsal/ /sman dang 'dra bar shes par bya/ /bdud rtsi zos pas pha rol 'gro/ /pad can dung dang sna tshogs can/ /

glang po ma dang bung ba'i ming / /'khor lo rdo rje skya snar ma/ /ngu ba mo dang bu skye tshe/ /nyang rtsi spras dang ngo tsha dang / /glog dang tsan dan nyi ma skyes/ /dmar po de bzhin sbrul gyi mig /sman mchog tu ni shes par bya/ /bde bas dga'

ba'i dus su ni/ /khab sogs byed pa'i skad cig las/ /bya ba de dag zhar la dran/ /sgom pa'i skad cig mthar 'gro ba'o/ /gnas skabs bzhi la bshad pa ni/ /yid can rnams kyi grangs brgyad de/ /'gro dang 'pho 'gyur de bzhin du/ /

skyug 'gyur gnyid yur 'gyur de bzhin/ /ltung 'gyur 'dzag 'gyur dang ni 'dir/ /g.yo 'gyur 'gyel bar 'gyur ba nyid/ /rnal 'byor ma brgyad dkar mo sogs/ /bde ba'i rgyu yis gnas skabs so/ /de ltar gnas skabs rnam

bzhi la/ /khyi gdong ming gis 'du shes gyur/ /yang dag dran pa'i go 'phang 'dir/ /gang dang su yir gnas par 'gyur/ /yang dag rtsol ba la gnas nas/ /khyi ni gzhan gyi grong du'o/ /sngags bden sbyor ba'i bdag nyid de/ /dkyil

'khor dbus su sgom pa'o/ /oM ba dza dzra TA shwA ma na ta A ku s+yA Ta ya o ke ta hU~M kA hU~M TA pha ya Ta hU~M pha hU~M Ta pha swA Ta hA pha oM Ta swA hA/ sum bcu rtsa bdun bdag nyid sngags/ /shes rab thabs te dngos grub ster/ /kha dog dmar po

drag chen mo/ /lhag ma dum skyes ma dang mtshungs/ /chu stong kar ka Ta yugs sa/ /rang gi bdag po rab gnas ma/ /nye ba'i gling du gnas ma ste/ /sems can rang rang bzhin du skyes/ /dbang gi las la lha mo ste/ /lha dang lha min

sogs sngags rig /bdud rtsi lnga dang sgron ma che/ /mchod pa las rnams thams cad la'o/ /snying ga'i pad mar yongs bkug nas/ /bdud rtsi tshig kun las skyes pa/ /rdo rje sbu gu'i rab sbyor bas/ /sbar dang bsro ba

la sogs pas/ /sku rdo rje sogs sngags kyis ni/ /byin gyis brlab par byas pa la'o/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor phas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag

pos 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las khyi gdong ma'i mtshan nyid dang bde ba la sogs pa'i gnas skabs kyi cho ga ste le'u dgu pa'o// // de nas

phag gdong ma yi ni/ /nyung ba rgya cher bshad par bya/ /dngos po kun la rab 'jug dang / /dngos po de las ldog pa'o/ /phag mo rengs pa'i las rnams la/ /mi shes ri bo 'joms ma'o/ /khab ni rdo rje'i gdong de yang / /skud pa bzhin

du kun 'gro ma/ /byang chub sems kyi dga' chen po/ /keng rus bdud rtsi 'byin pa'o/ /de'i rang bzhin 'dod chags sogs/ /bzhi pa las 'das mi 'gyur ma/ /de nas lha mo chen mo brgyad/ /mngal sogs bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid de/ /

thog mar bya rog bzhin sa bon/ /ma yi pad ma la ltung ba'o/ /nub gcig gis ni phye ba yis/ /phyi nas 'ug par gnas dang 'dra/ /zla ba gcig tu gnas nas ni/ /khyi yi dbugs ni 'phel ba las/ /phag tu'ang yan lag bdag nyid can/ /

brtan mas skye gnas dral ba las/ /pho nya byis pa dang 'chi phyis/ /mche ba mo ni las bcom pas/ /'joms ma byang chub yan lag dgyes/ /dngos grub kun gyi 'bras 'byung ma/ /yang dag pa yi rtsol ba 'di/ /gzhan gyi lta ba nya
sogs kyis/ /'jug pa thams cad bden pa ste/ /'jug med de dngos spyod yul lo/ /rkang gnyis rkang bzhi la sogs pa'i/ /rtsol ba'i yan lag la 'joms ma'o/ /mthong ba dang ni reg pas kyang / /'jug med de

nyid rtag tu'o/ /kha dog ser mo drag chen mo/ /lhag ma gzugs can ma dang mtshungs/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin can/ /seng ge gro bzhin chu srin la/ /nye ba'i gling du gnas pa mo/ /sngags

las bzhings pa'i lha mo rnams/ /rang rang zhing dang nying zhing ma'o/ /oM ba da~M dzra Sh+TA sU ka ka rA lo s+yA gra yai mu hU~M hU~M kha b+hi pha Sha Ta NA pha ya Ta hU~M swA hU~M hA pha oM Ta phaT swA hA/ sum bcu rtsa bdun bdag nyid kyi/ /gtso mo mchog gi rnal 'byor ma/ /dkyil

'khor thig gdab la sogs ni/ /bsgoms pa'i sbyor ba'i ma yi ste/ /thig chen gnyis ni btab nas su/ /shar dang so sor 'dod thig dang / /zur gyi thig gnyis btab byas nas/ /phur bu gdab par bya ba ste/ /tshangs pa'i thig gi logs nas

ni/ /sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa gnyis gdab/ /sgo ni 'khor lo'i brgyad cha ste/ /lte ba'i pad ma de dang mnyam/ /snying po'i 'dab ma'i ngos nas ni/ /cha gsum du yang de shes bya/ /de yi cha gcig 'khor lo gsum/ /lhag ma tshon gyi sa

bzhi'o/ /de yi sum cha phreng ba ste/ /rdo rje pad ma dang 'khor lo/ /rtsibs rnams 'khor lo dbus ma las/ /dman te gnyis gcig sdom pas sbom/ /ka ba rnams ni kun du sbyin/ /brgyad gsum 'khor lo gsum du'o/ /sgo las

sum 'gyur rta babs te/ /sgo khyud sgo yi cha can no/ /stegs bu rnams ni de'i phye ste/ /'gram dang logs ni de bzhin no/ /gzungs kyi snam bu dang ni 'dir/ /rin chen phreng phyed snam bu'o/ /mgo bo'i phreng ba de yi phyed/ /mun pa'i

snam bu de bzhin no/ /ka ba'i rtse las 'thon rtse mo/ /sna tshogs rdo rje 'od chen po'o/ /dril chung dra ba gos rnams dang / /ba dan dril bu sgra sgrogs pa'o/ /de'i phyi chu skyes thams cad du/ /snying po la sogs yang dag bri/ /sna

tshogs rdo rje'i phreng dang 'dir/ /lhag mar 'bar ba'i phreng ba'o/ /de yi phyi rol khor yug ni/ /sa gzhi'i rim pas bri bar bya/ /gri gug phreng ba sbyin bya zhing / /mgo dang lag pa dag de bzhin/ /snying po'i pad ma'i phyi rol du/ /rin chen phreng

ba yang dag bri/ /dur khrod brgyad po bri bya ste/ /kun nas gtum drag la sogs so/ /sa bon rnam par dgod par bya/ /thams cad gri gug las byung ba'o/ /yang na sku sogs rnams kyi ni/ /yi ge rnams kyis dkyil 'khor kun/ /

de bzhin skad cig rnam pas kyang / /sa bon rnams kyis dkyil 'khor dbyung / /mtshams kyi pad ma'i 'dab ma la/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi thod pa ni/ /bum pa'i steng du sbyin bya ste/ /sum bcu rtsa bdun gzhan bya'o/ /gnag dang rtsa ba

spangs pa ste/ /mchu ni 'phyang zhing mgrin pa mtho/ /mgrin pa rnams su gos zung ste/ /rin chen lnga dang 'bru dang sman/ /dri yi chu dang 'dab ma'i rtse/ /bdud rtsi lnga rnams kyis dgang bya/ /gtor ma las rnams kun la ste/ /kun

nas sgom pa la sogs pa'o/ /rdo rje lha mo rnams dang ni/ /zhing skyong dang ni khro rnams la/ /bdud rtsi lnga sogs rdzas rnams 'bul/ /tshim bya phyi la sogs rnams kyis/ /bgegs med yang dag 'phel bar 'gyur/ /phyi nas las

ni yang dag brtsam/ /du ma'i dud 'gro'i zhal lha mo/ /sum bcu rtsa bdun gzugs can rnams/ /las kyi rdo rje 'jom byas nas/ /ting 'dzin gsum gyi rnam 'byor ldan/ /bdun bcu gnyis phyag drag mo ste/ /zhabs bcwa brgyad

ni rnams kyis ldan/ /rtsa ba'i zhal ni phag zhal te/ /ngos gnyis dag tu dgu dgu'o/ /de yi steng du bdun bdun te/ /phyi nas gsum ni bzhag par bya/ /g.yas su khyi dang lce spyang dang / /byi la stag dang seng ge dang / /'jigs byed

mche can rta bong bu/ /de ltar ji ltar rim pas so/ /g.yon du ba lang ma he spyang / /rus sbal chu srin ri bong dang / /bse dang g.yag dang mun dza dang / /ji lta'i rim pas mtshon par bya/ /sbrul dang sre mo rtsangs pa dang / /sram dang byi ba dang ni dom/ /

mkha' lding bya rgod bya rog dang / /'ug pa bya gar khra dang ni/ /srin bya dang ni ngur pa dang / /rma bya zangs kyi gtsug pud can/ /phug ron 'di rnams thams cad la/ /rang bzhin mdog tu 'dod par bya/ /dkyil 'khor

gyi bya nges par ni/ /rang bzhin gang gi khams la'o/ /yon tan sum bcu gsum bdag ni/ /rang bzhin gyis ni 'dzin par 'gyur/ /de yi gzugs brnyan gyi ni zhal/ /'gro la byang chub byed bdag nyid/ /zhabs rnams kyis

ni 'byung po'i tshogs/ /me yi dbus su son pa gnon/ /g.yas pas khyab 'jug drag po dang / /tshangs pa nyi ma me dang ni/ /dbang po rlung dang bden bral dang / /nor sbyin ji lta'i rim pa'o/ /g.yon pas gshin rje 'dod pa dang / /zla

ba chu lha nor rgyas dang / /sa dang tshogs kyi bdag po dang / /smin drug bu dang 'khor sgyur te/ /de ltar bcwa brgyad dbyibs rnams ni/ /'dus pa rmad byung bsngags pa'o/ /'dzin 'gyur rang gi sems kyis ni/ /lha mo'i zhabs ni

rdo rje 'dzin/ /g.yas par mtshon cha'i tshogs kyang ni/ /rdo rje ral gri mdung dbal can/ /dgra sta gri gug mda' dang ni/ /gsal shing phug dang tho ba dang / /'khor lo Dam ru chu gri dang / /dbyug pa dang ni mtshon rtse gcig /dung

dang zangs dang dbyug gu dang / /rma bya'i 'jug ma de bzhin te/ /bya rog sgro dang pir dang ni/ /me yi thab dang ri bo dang / /dbyug pa me long pi wang dang / /rkang mgo lag pa glo ba dang / /rgyu ma sgra gcan lcags sgrog dang / /gdos dang sgrogs dang

nya rgya dang / /mgo gcad 'bar ba mar nag dang / /'jigs byed gzugs te rim pas so/ /g.yon par dril bu phub rings mche/ /tho ba zhags pa thod pa dang / /gzhu dang kha T+wA~M ga po ti/ /phub chung yu can sdigs 'dzub dang / /g.yer

ka'i phreng dang lcags sgrog dang / /brag dang dur khrod rdul dang ni/ /b+ho ka~M Da ka pags rlon dang / /skra yi thag pa 'phyang ba dang / /skul byed ro yi shing bu dang / /brag dang phub dang mgo bo dang / /keng rus zor ba de bzhin te/ /mig dang mkhal

ma gnye ma dang / /spen pa dang ni phur pa dang / /sa bon gang dang sog le dang / /khab dang lus kyi lpags pa dang / /sprin char 'bab dang shing ral gri/ /de ltar rim pas shes byas pas/ /bdun bcu rtsa gnyis rgyud kyi rtsa'o/ /gnyis pa lhag pa

yi phyag gnyis kyis/ /glang po'i lpags pa steng bgos pa'o/ /khams gsum glang po la bzhugs pa/ /dral ba bgegs ni bcom pa yi'o/ /kun gyi kha dog rang bzhin te/ /yang na gtso mo'i kha dog bzhin/ /mgo bo'i phreng

sogs thams cad dang / /gos dang rgyan rnams lus skyes pa'o/ /de ltar yang dag pa'i rtsol ba'i/ /gzugs brnyan can mar shes par bya/ /yang dag dran pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /dngos dbye rkang gnyis bdag nyid do/ /ting 'dzin

dra bas kun bkang nas/ /'od gsal ba la kun thim byos/ /rtogs nas sangs rgyas nyid 'thob 'gyur/ /sna tshogs dud 'gro sogs skye'o/ /rang rang skad kyis chos kyang ni/ /rang rigs skyes la ston par 'gyur/ /sU yi yi

ges 'gro kun rgyas btab ste/ /lhan skyes rang bzhin de nyid dran par bya/ /slar yang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mi 'ong ngo / /phyugs gang yin pa'i skye bo rnams sangs rgyas/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor bas/ /rdo rje sems

dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las phag gdong ma bskyed pa dang dkyil 'khor
la 'jug pa la sogs pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas brtan ma'i sbyor ba 'dir/ /bshad kyis sgom pa po rnams nyon/ /kun nas dus ni bzhi rnams su/ /zla ba gsum gsum pa ni bzhi/ /bgrod dang mnyam

pas bcings pa yi/ /mtshams de rnams ni rab bshad bya/ /byang du bgrod pa la sogs pa/ /brtan ma la sogs mtshams gnas ma/ /nye ba'i gling du gnas pa mo/ /mgo yi zla ba dang ni gzhu/ /mo hi ta ni rtag tu de'i/ /las

gnyis dag tu shes bya ste/ /sgom po rnams kyi dus min pa'i/ /'chi ba mchi bas gcod ma gang / /de yis gshin rje'i mcher shes bya/ /thog mar yi ge gnyis can no/ /bcom ldan dus min 'chi ba ni/ /mi rnams la

ni ji ltar 'byung / /gang gi drin gyis bdag rig 'gyur/ /su zhig bdag la sprul par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /brtan ma dus min 'chi ba ni/ /sems can rang rang las kyis so/ /skye ba kun la

'tshe ba yi/ /sdig gang bdag nyid kyis byas pa/ /de yis de ni dus min 'chi/ /khams dang dbugs ni 'chad par 'gyur/ /gzhan rnams kyis ni gcad pa yis/ /bza' btung phyin ci log tu 'gyur/ /sbyin pa rnyed pa dang

bcas sbyin/ /dus min gyis ni nyams mi 'gyur/ /sbyin pa rnam pa gnyis su bshad/ /las dang bsam pa las kyang ngo / /g.yon gyi sna yi sgo ru ni/ /zla ba rgyu ba'i rim pa yis/ /bgrod pa'i srog ni nyi ma'i ste/ /a ba d+hU tI'i

rlung rim pas/ /de yis ya yi yi ge bshad/ /ma yi yi ge dbus 'bab ma'o/ /da yig g.yas su song nas ni/ /re shig dbus ma rgyu bar 'gyur/ /a yi yi ges gnas pa 'thob/ /slu ba nam mkhar 'gro ba mo/ /rtsa ni bde kun

bdag nyid rnams/ /d+hi yi yi ge'i ming du shes/ /mdor bsdus pa yi yi ge ni/ /dkyil 'khor lnga rnams su ni brjod/ /de rnams dngos las khyod bskyod de/ /dus min slu bar rig par bya/ /de ltar bsod nams gcig nyid po/ /

gnas gnas bgrod pa'i lus can no/ /'chi ba zhes 'di rnam rtog ste/ /mkha' spyod go 'phang 'khrid par 'gyur/ /'dir ni kha dog gnyis su 'gyur/ /lus bsgom pa ni de bzhin no/ /ji ltar mkha' 'gro ma'i rim pas/ /

mtshon ma mtshon cha sogs 'gyur ro/ /spong ba'i chos shes bya bar gsungs/ /dkyil 'khor dbus kyi gtso mo'o/ /rnal 'byor sum bcu bdun bdag nyid/ /sngags las byung ba'i bdag nyid kyis/ /oM AHsa hU~M ha ba sra dza

b+hu ya dza ma b+hA dA su DA rA kI ya ye hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT phaT/ swA swA hA hA oM/ 'di ni shes rab thabs bdag nyid/ /rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo'i gtso/ /gshin rje mche ba'i rab sbyor bas/ /skye ba mthar byed bza' bar bya/ /

dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po

las gshin rje brtan ma'i rnam par gzhag pa dang bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba ste/ le'u bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas gshin rje pho nya 'chad/ /gang gis 'chi ba dbang 'gyur ba'o/ /bri sh+tsi ka ru yang dag byung / /smin

drug can dang bzang por ldan/ /dpyid kyis mnyam pa'i dus kyis ni/ /pho nya ma bskyed mtshan nyid do/ /gshin rje gsod ma de yi ni/ /'chi ba slu ba'i 'khor lo la/ /rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i 'khor lo cher/ /lan gsum du ni bskor bar

bya/ /lnga rnams nyi shu rtsa lngar ni/ /bcu gsum bar du bri bar bya/ /slar yang sum bcu gnyis rnams su/ /gsum gnyis gcig ni lo yin no/ /dus tshod me dang gnyis zla ba/ /zla ba'o tshes phyogs de bzhin mda'/ /gsum gnyis

gcig gi skabs su ni/ /rim pas phyi nas nyi phyed sogs/ /nyi ma gcig dang zhag dang gnyis/ /gsum bzhi sa dang nyi ma phyogs/ /nor ro chu phyogs rim pas te/ /sum bcu bdun bdag nyid gsal ba'o/ /srog gi nus par shes

bya ba/ /bcu dgu yi ni bdag nyid do/ /bcu dgu slar yang 'di ru ni/ /'joms pa'i bdag nyid nus can no/ /nyi mar bdun po mnyam son par/ /skye ba'i skar ma dang zla ba/ /gcig tu spyod par rtag rgyu las/ /rgyas pa'i dus ni yang dag

'thob/ /bar gyi nyi ma rnams nyid ni/ /bcu drug grangs su shes byas la/ /bdun bcu rtsa gnyis rim pa yis/ /lo yi rim pas yang dag sbyar/ /de phyir pho nya'i lha mo yang / /dkyil 'khor bdag nyid can bsgom bya/ /gang du rtsa ni
srog spangs pa/ /der ni 'di de 'bab par bya/ /steng du yal 'dab steng rtsa ba/ /gsang ba yis ni dbugs bya ba'o/ /de ni mnyam pa mtshams kun te/ /mnyam pa ya yig gis 'gugs ma'o/ /de nas gnad bcings

pas nyams pa/ /ma yi yi ges thams cad bshad/ /'og dang steng du bskyod byas nas/ /rnon po'i me ni rab 'bar bya/ /nad rnams dang ni sdig mang rnams/ /las kyis rang nyad nyams par 'gyur/ /der ni sbyin pa sbyin bya ste/ /

ba lang ma he zhon sogs so/ /byang chub sems kyi lam du ni/ /mdzes ma rnams kyi de tshe btung / /der yang rang gi yan lag las/ /byung ba'i sna sman btang bar bya/ /'o ma dang mnyam bza' bya ste/ /glo ba la sogs mtshos

pa'o/ /g.yul ngor rang nyid 'gyel ba yi/ /gal te rnyed na khrag chen po/ /the tshom spangs nas btung bya zhing / /de yi sha yang bza' bar bya/ /yang na gang gi sa gnas su/ /'chi ltas zad nas song bar du/ /bza' ba 'o mas byas

na bde/ /yang na sha rnams thams cad do/ /gos 'jam rnams kyis yongs g.yogs nas/ /bdag nyid la ni dus kun du/ /der ni gnas sa sro bya zhing / /me dang lhan cig nges gnas bya/ /der ni chu dron kyang btang zhing / /

bza' ba chung ngu nyung ngu'o/ /gshin rje'i pho nya bsgom bya ste/ /sum bcu rtsa bdun bdag nyid rang / /gsang sngags kha sbyor bdag nyid can/ /ser dmar gnyis kyi kha dog can/ /ser pos 'chi ba rengs par byed/ /dmar pos dbang

du 'gugs par byed/ /lhan skyes rdzogs byang chub dngos kyis/ /lte 'og mgrin pa rkan 'gro rnams/ /zab pas srog ni gzhan 'gro ba/ /phan tshun phug rnams su 'du 'gyur/ /de phyir kha T+wA~M ga bsgom ste/ /yan lag kha T+wA~M

sbyor bas so/ /snying ga'i pad dbus su sems kyis/ /dkyil 'khor sngon cha'i cha can no/ /lha mo'i mdog ni sngon can te/ /dbyibs sogs gzugs can ma dang mtshungs/ /oM ba pa dzra ra ya shu ma pA dU sho tI d+yA ye ta hU~M sU hU~M la phaT kha phaT

T+wA~M swA ga hA d+hA ri Ni hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA oM hU~M/ shes rab thabs bdag nyid du skyes/ /sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rang bzhin can/ /rnal 'byor ma ni 'di rnams kun/ /bdud rtsi'i gzugs su bsgom par bya/ /de rnams snying gar dkar

bar ni/ /'khor lo thams cad rnam bsgom bya/ /de rnams nang du rang ming yang / /kha dog dkar po 'od bcas pa/ /rtsa yi bu ga so so yi/ /nang du'ang rnam par bsgom par bya/ /rlon dang btsos pa'i ra'i 'o ma/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang rang 'byung

ni/ /rdo rje'i rtse mos 'thungs pas kyang / /dus su 'chi ba nyams par 'gyur/ /zag med de nyid thob pas na/ /de la dus min 'chi ming ci/ /de phyir yang dag rab spong ba'i/ /chos nyid gshin rje'i pho nyar shes/ /rdo rjes btung byas rab

bshad pa/ /las kyis rnam pa gnyis su 'dod/ /gcig ni phyi rol gyir bshad de/ /gnyis po nang gi bdag nyid 'dod/ /rdo rje rtse gsum bsgom bya ba/ /rtsa drug dus ni rgyu ba mo/ /ngang pa'i rgyu bar 'dzin pa'i srog /'og gi chu ni 'thung ba

yi/ /bdud rtsi lnga sogs gang cung zad/ /de yi dbus su rab tu zhugs/ /'thungs pas rgas dang 'chi ba 'bras/ /rdo rje 'chang gi gdams ngag go/ /gshin rje'i pho nya ma yi rnal 'byor ma khyod bzhugs/ /de yis glar yang rgas dang

'chi ba med pa 'thob/ /'chi ba slong bar byed pa'i rnal 'byor ma bla med/ /rnal 'byor ma la sdig dang bsod nams mi ldan no/ /de ni mnyam pa'o mnyam srog las/ /g.yon dang g.yas dang dbu ma yi/ /rtsol ba g.yo med dngos po

las/ /slar yang ya ma'i yi ge 'dod/ /pho nya phyogs gnyis kyi ngang pa/ /dbu mar zad pa'i go 'phang ngo / /de ltar rnam pa mang po ni/ /brtan pa'i blo ldan gyis mtshon bya/ /'dir mang bshad pas ci bya ste/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin

sogs pa/ /dge ba'i las kyang bsnyen bya ste/ /lus gcig lus mang po can no/ /rnal 'byor ma la mchod bya zhing / /dpa' bo rnams la brjed par bya/ /gang zhig gang slong la yang dag /de phyir de rnams la nges sbyin/ /dpa' bo
thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud
kyi rgyal po chen po las gshin rje pho nya mo bskyed pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang 'chi ba bslu ba'i 'khor lo bsgom pa'i man ngag mdor bsdus pa ste le'u bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas gshin rje mche

gtsigs ma/ /bshad kyis da ni mnyan par gyis/ /sems can rnams kyi bag chags kyi/ /skyon gyis gur la 'bigs dang bsreg /gang zhig gang la las byas pas/ /de yi dus su 'bigs par 'dod/ /brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi'i

gnad rnams ni/ /gang dang der ni gnas rnams kyang / /'di rnams dbus su bya ba ste/ /dge dang dman pa mtshon par bya/ /mi dge ba ni 'chir dogs pas/ /gnad du na bas mtshon par bya/ /gal te dus ni gcig la ni/ /rkan gsum

du ni gzer ba na/ /de tshe zhag gsum na 'chi bar/ /rig bya 'di la the tshom med/ /rkang pa'i brang bar gzer ba dang / /gal te lte bar gzer ba na/ /lha mo zhag gnyis na 'chi bar/ /skye bo rnams ni 'gyur ba'o/ /rkang pa gnyis kyi brang 'thil

dang / /gal te mig tu gzer ba na/ /de tshe zla ba gsum du yang / /'chi byed kyi ni dbang du 'gro/ /rkang pa'i mthil ni gzer ba dang / /gal te sna ni gzer ba na/ /zhag gsum na ni 'chi 'gyur bar/ /'di la yang ni the tshom med/ /

bshang dang gci ba'i dus su ni/ /gal te sbrid pa byung ba na/ /de yi de ltar dus tshod kyi/ /lo na nges par 'chi ba'o/ /snga dro yi ni nyin lnga dang / /dbus ma'i gung la bcu de bzhin/ /gzhan gyi gung la zla phyed gcig /nam phyed la yang

zla ba ste/ /'di tshe'i de ltar dus su ni/ /gal te sbrid byung sngon bzhin te/ /dus kyi nges par 'chi 'gyur bas/ /'di la the tshom med pa'o/ /ltag pa yi ni bsdud khung du/ /gzer na lo ni lnga rnams na/ /de ni 'chi bar 'gyur bar ni/ /

shes bya 'di la the tshom med/ /lha mo lce rtse ma mthong na/ /de phyir zhag ni gsum na 'chi/ /nyan pa yi ni rtse mor gzer/ /'chi ba zla ba bzhi na'o/ /mig g.yon pa yi 'bras bu ni/ /me long la ni ma mthong na/ /de tshe zhag bdun na

'chi bar/ /sngon gyi skye bar bshad pa'o/ /dkar po yi ni tshes gcig la/ /gal te khu ba dkar min 'gyur/ /zla ba drug na de 'chi ste/ /dmar pos nang du nges par 'gyur/ /b+ha ga ling ga yongs sbyar ba'i/ /mtha' ru gal te sbrid

pa ni/ /byung na zla ba lnga na ni/ /de tshe ltung bar 'gyur ba'o/ /sbyor ba'i dus su dril bu'i sgra/ /rna dag la byung 'chi gsal bar/ /gal te brgya byin mnyam gyur pa/ /zla ba lnga na the tshom med/ /de bzhin dus ni gcig gi tshe/ /gal

te zla ba nyi ma dag /gang gi sems can la gzer ba/ /zla ba gcig tu 'tsho bcas pa'o/ /rkang lag dag gi tshigs bzhi dang / /mthe'u chung gi ni sor mo la/ /gang gi dus gcig la gzer ba/ /nges par zla ba gcig na 'chi/ /

bsnun pa gsum gyis gzer ba na/ /gal te nus stobs bdag mnyam pa/ /rkang pa'i mthe bong dag las dpa'/ /sa gsum du ni skye bo rnams/ /mdud pa'i rgyal po lta bu'i tshul/ /dpe des rtag tu bshad pa'o/ /de tshe zla drug na 'chi bar/ /

gal te drag po mnyam kyang 'gyur/ /snying ga'i dbus dang de bzhin sngon/ /'dir yang mgrin pa'i spyod yul te/ /zla phyed gsum na 'chi bar ni/ /rnam dpyad spyod yul 'di la med/ /slar yang mgo bo'i rtse mor gzer/ /

grong khyer gsum gyi rgya mtsho bsreg /'phral du 'chi bar shes bya bar/ /lus kyi gur du bshad pa'o/ /rna ba'i rtsa bar de bzhin gzer/ /'phral du 'chi bar nges par bshad/ /smin ma'i dbus su de bzhin gzer/ /

de yi skad cig la 'chi 'gyur/ /sna yi rtse mor rlung grang mor/ /gyur na yongs rdzogs dus yin no/ /de ltar 'chi ba thams cad ni/ /mche gtsigs go 'phang gis bslu'o/ /gang gi dus su 'di 'gyur ba/ /gzer ni de tshe'i dus 'dir

'gyur/ /gzer ba'i gnas ni gsal mtshon nas/ /rtsa ba bcu yis mnye bar bya/ /khyab 'jug ces bya'i mar khu ni/ /mgo bor rtag tu gzung bar bya/ /sna nas rnam snang mar khu dang / /mar dang khrag tu yongs ldan pa'o/ /

nyi ma'i 'od kyis mi gdung ste/ /skye bo dang bral khyim gron por/ /sbyor ba'i rgya mtsho che gzung bas/ /rnal 'byor ma de yang bsgom bya/ /yaH gang gi dkyil 'khor chen por ni/ /ma/ dbu ma'i mtha' yi mtshan nyid las/ /g.yas

su bgrod pa'i dus su ni/ /da~M yig tshigs mtshams kun du'o/ /bu ga gzer byed phug nas ni/ /de'i skad cig la dbyug gu dbyug /Ta hril hril por ni 'gyur bzhin pa/ /sha snying ga'i rdzing bu la sogs pa/ /shes bya mtshams kun du yang ste/ /gzer ba'i 'chi ba slu ba la/ /

i/ dbang po yis ni thams cad la'ang / /yid ni de bzhin nges par gnas/ /Sh+TI yi yi ge zhes bya ba/ /de ltar tshigs bcad gnyis kyis gsungs/ /der ni ting 'dzin zhes bya ba/ /dbang po sbyangs pas thob par gyis/ /pad snal skud

pas nor bu dang / /spyi gtsug kyang ni gcig tu bya/ /rnam shes brgyad po der gnas par/ /bsgom bya myos byed 'bab pa mo/ /kun du skud pa de btang bas/ /gshin rje'i mche ba 'joms pa mo/ /de yis nA yi yig bshad do/ /gzer ba

thams cad rnam 'joms ma'o/ /kha dog dmar dang sngo ba ste/ /'chi ba 'joms ma byang chub 'gro/ /de yi mtshon char 'gyur ba ni/ /dum skyes rnal 'byor ma yi'o/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /sum bcu rtsa bdun bdag nyid

mchog /oM ba byA dzra g+ha ya dzi ma na da~M a Sh+T+rA m+ba NI ra ya d+ha ke rA ya ya hA~M hU~M hA~M pha hU~M Ta pha phaT Ta phaT swA swA hA hA oM/ shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin du'ang / /skud pa'i dbus su bsgom par bya/ /tha skar zla ba de bzhin du/ /srang dang khyu mchog rA si'i'o/ /

'dis ni byed bzhin pa yis ni/ /'chi ba slu ba dge ba'o/ /gzhan ni de la de ltar bya/ /pho nya ma ni gsal bar brjod/ /gzhan gyi 'chi ba blu ba yang / /brgya phrag 'bum rnams shes par bya/ /'on kyang kun stong gnas byas nas/ /bla mchog mnyes

par byas pas so/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i

rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las gshin rje mche ba ma'i rab tu sbyor ba la 'jug pa 'chi ba bslu ba la sogs pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas 'joms ma'i 'jug pa ni/ /gang gis pha rol 'gro bshad bya/ /rnal 'byor ma

rnams 'dus byas nas/ /gzhi las 'dri bar byed pa ste/ /'jug pa zhes bya ci ru bshad/ /khyab bdag pha rol ming ni ci/ /shin du ngo mtshar ston pas gsungs/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa bka' drin mdzod/ /nyon cig sgyu ma'i 'jug pa yang / /mi

bden pa ni bden btags te/ /lha mo dbang po'i dra ba ltar/ /'joms ma yi yang 'jug pa ste/ /mthong ba na yang de la med/ /chu yi zla ba lta bu mchog /rang gi rang bzhin la 'jug 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor de nyid 'dzin rnams kyi'o/ /dus kyi

'chi ba'i dngos po yang / /las kyis su ni bslu ba ste/ /'khor ba las ni pha rol 'gro/ /'chi med blu ba yang ni med/ /ston gyi nam nyin mnyam dus su/ /sna yi nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rlung ni rnam par 'dzin bzhin pas/ /'chi ba'i

dus ni blu ba'o/ /brgya phrag drug dang nyi shu gcig /stong phrag rnams kyi srog rnams ni/ /a ba d+hU tIr rab zhugs pa/ /de ni 'joms mar mngon brjod pa'o/ /byis pa'i mkhas pa rmongs pa yis/ /bslu ba bshad pa de ma yin/ /de min

bslu ba rab bshad pa/ /'di ni bdag gi rang mtshan nyid/ /slar yang lha mo des gsungs pa/ /ya sogs de ltar don bstan pas/ /gang gang ting 'dzin dmigs nas ni/ /nam mkha' mnyam sogs 'dus pa'i mtha'/ /rgyud ni de

bzhin srog chen po/ /rdo rje lta bur yang ni bshad/ /dal gyis dal gyis 'gro bdag nyid/ /tshigs rnams kun du thim pa'o/ /zhi gnas lhag mthong dag gis ni/ /byang chub 'chi ba'i spyod yul min/ /rdo rje'i sar ni 'khrid par grags/ /go 'phang chen

po 'dzin mchog go/ /de ltar yon tan khyad 'phags pas/ /mi rnams kyi ni mi dge 'dzad/ /nor chen go 'phang thob pa ni/ /yang dag spong ba'i mtshan nyid do/ /srog ni yang dag rgyu byas nas/ /dus kun du ni nye bar bya/ /rtag tu

'chi bltas 'chi ba slu/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis lhan cig /rnal 'byor ma rnams dang mjal ba/ /bsod nams dbang gis brgya lam 'thob/ /de rnams dang byas dga' chen po/ /myangs pas 'chi ba bslu ba yin/ /de phyir rnal 'byor ma

rnams kyi/ /mchod pa rnal 'byor pa yis bya/ /rdo rje 'chang chen go 'phang ni/ /de rnams mnyes pas thob par 'gyur/ /rmongs pa gang zhig smod byed pa/ /de yi dngos grub mchog med do/ /de rnams la ni smad pa las/ /mnar med dmyal ba chen

por 'gyur/ /de yi bsod nams byas pa ci/ /smyung bar gnas pa'am dka' thub ci/ /rnal 'byor ma la rtag gus pa/ /skad cig yud tsam sogs kyis so/ /lha mo kha dog gnyis ma ste/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das gzugs can/ /dkyil

'khor pa rnams dbus su ni/ /bsgom bya mtshan ma lA ma bzhin/ /sngags kyi yi ge'i sbyor ba yis/ /sum bcu rtsa bdun rnal 'byor mas/ /bskyed bya thabs dang bcas pa ste/ /lhan skyes sbyor bas rdo rje 'dzin/ /oM ba ma dzra hA ya d+hu ma

mrA man+d+ha tha kA nI ra ye ba hU~M pu hU~M shA pha ya Ta hU~M pha hU~M Ta pha swA Ta hA pha oM Ti swA hA/ de ltar yungs kar tsam gyi ni/ /thig le'i dbus ma bsgom par bya/ /snying ga la sogs 'khor lo ru/ /gang du yid ni yongs sbyor gyis/ /bu mo rus sbal zla ba

yang / /khrums can nye ba'i gling ma'o/ /sems can don byed de nyid du/ /thim dang longs spyod sogs byed ma/ /phag mo'i sprul pa'i bdag nyid du/ /skyes pa srid pa 'joms byed ma'o/ /bcom ldan rdo rje'i rnal 'byor ches/ /lha rnams thams

cad gzhugs pa dang / /'khor lo sgyur chen ngo bo las/ /thams cad kun ni sprul pa dang / /sangs rgyas nyid bdag 'du shes kyis/ /de'i bdag nyid du sdud par 'gyur/ /bsdud de de ltar yod min pa/ /'byin pa ru ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /'di kun

sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste/ /sgyu ma med cing stong nyid med/ /ngo bo kun du sbyor ba tsam/ /sangs rgyas nyid sogs 'du bcas pa'o/ /rdzogs ldan gsum ldan sogs dngos nyid/ /rang gi rang bzhin mtshan nyid do/ /rnam gzhag tsam du gsungs pa ni/ /dngos

po ma 'khrul ngo bo nyid/ /rnam par rtog pas brtag par bya/ /rtog pa med par gyur pa na/ /brtag pa nyid du mi bya'o/ /rtog dang rtog med las grol 'gyur/ /thams cad gzigs pa rnams kyis bstan/ /gang zhig gang dngos skad cig

mthong / /de mthong ri bong rwa bzhin no/ /'di yis 'gog pa med par ni/ /skye ba la sogs yongs rtogs bya/ /sna tshogs lung dang rgyud rnams la'ang / /rigs pa can 'dir rnam par dpyod/ /rnam dpyad gyur pas rigs pa ni/ /de rigs

bdag gi che ba'o/ /sems ni de yi gzhi rtogs par/ /rna ba'i drung du brjod pa'o/ /slob ma'i phyir dang bla ma la/ /gus phyir 'di ni gzung bar gyis/ /deng sang skye bo tshe thung la/ /rigs pa gzhan bdag la yod min/ /g.yo can rtsod ba'i

dus su ni/ /blo chung bsod nams shin tu chung / /de phyir bsod nams ldan rnams kyi/ /ye shes sangs rgyas spyod yul min/ /yun ring dus nas snying rje ni/ /bsten 'gyur rtog pa ma byed cig /bsod nams grangs med ma byas par/ /

slar yang ye shes smra ba ci/ /byang chub sems ci sangs rgyas ci/ /'di la khyad par yod mi 'gyur/ /dngos po rtogs phyir sangs rgyas dang / /de dngos byang chub sems dpa' rang / /dbang po rnams ni byang chub sems dpar bskyed/ /yul

rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas nyid du gyis/ /phung po dang ni sangs rgyas lhan cig zung / /khams rnams rdo rje 'dzin par gzung bar byos/ /srid par slar yang ldog par 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /thams cad 'chi ba med pa'i ngo bor zung / /

snying rje yi ni sbyor bas khyod bzhugs shig /gang dang gang gis gzhan gyi dgos pa gyis/ /brjod med kun la'ang nan tan byos/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs 'joms mtha' yi/ /'joms ma 'dus pa thams cad dang / /bgegs

sogs 'byung po 'dus pa ma/ /'jig rten sdang ba thams cad dang / /yi dgas sogs dang dmyal ba'ang rung / /gshin rje la sogs khro ba 'dir/ /sngon gyi bag chags 'joms ma'o/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor bas/ /

rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las gshin rje 'joms

ma 'jug pa bskyed pa dang dus su 'chi ba bslu ba'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid dang sangs rgyas kyi gnas skabs kyi rang bzhin te le'u bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas 'di las gsang chen bshad/ /yang dag ting 'dzin mtshan

nyid do/ /dpal he ru kar gnas gang gis/ /gus bcas las gzhan la yod min/ /'jigs pa la sogs chags pa'i mthar/ /bstan pa sprul pa'i sku gsal ba'o/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sogs 'dir/ /thams cad bsdus

pa byas par 'gyur/ /thog mar gnas ni kun bsgrub bya/ /skye bo med dang ri sogs dang / /dur khrod du bya de ru ni/ /gtor ma zhing skyong rnams la'o/ /rnal 'byor kha yi gtsang sbra sogs/ /sngon song mchod yon la sogs 'bul/ /bcom ldan

'das kyi skur dmigs nas/ /ras bris sogs bsgom bshad ldan par/ /yi dgas gdan can drag chen po/ /bsgom pa 'gro ba'i don dang ldan/ /kun nas kun du skad cig gis/ /ting nge 'dzin ni dmigs par bya/ /shrI yig 'byung

ba kun gyi don/ /phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid 'dod/ /'di dag kun rdzob gzugs dang ni/ /'jug med bde ba'i mtha' can gang / /e ba~M la sogs gnyis med pa'ang / /shrI zhes bya ba'i yig nges brjod/ /he yig snying ga nas kun du/ /

he ru ka sogs rang 'khor 'gro/ /bsgom pa kun gyi 'byung gnas las/ /'dzin pa la sogs rnam bskyed 'gyur/ /de ni rgyu stong bdag nyid de/ /rgyu'i bdag nyid du mi rtog pa'o/ /rang bzhin chos bdag med pa nyid/ /de ni stong pa'i

rnal 'byor gnas/ /bkod pa gang zag bdag med pa/ /rtog pa'i dra ba chen po ni/ /ru yig rkyen gyi bdag nyid can/ /de ni bdag gi bkod bral ba'o/ /slar brjod ka ni ma lus pa'i/ /bdag gis gnyis byar med shes gang / /gang phyir ci la

'ang mi gnas pa/ /de phyir ka zhes bya bar brjod/ /dngos po mngon sum stong pa min/ /dngos po tsam gyi rang bzhin can/ /dpal he ru ka gnas lha mo/ /snga nas bsgom pa kun 'gro ba'o/ /snying la pad ma nyi dbus su/ /ye shes

sa bon rang byung las/ /'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pa/ /nam mkha' gang bar spro bar bya/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro ma yi gzugs/ /lha yi tshogs ni spyan drangs nas/ /nam mkha'i khongs kyi dbus su ni/ /'gro ba'i bdag po gzhag

byas la/ /zla nyi shar bdag nyid skyes pa'i/ /bdud rtsi sogs kyis mchod byas nas/ /sdig pa bshags sogs byas nas ni/ /snying rje la sogs rjes dran bya/ /stong nyid rang bzhin bdag nyid kyi/ /rnal 'byor dag pa rnam

bsgom bya/ /sa bon lnga yi rang bzhin las/ /khang pa brtsegs pa rnam sprul bya/ /rgyu yi rdo rje 'chang ba phyis/ /ri rab pad ma'i steng du gsal/ /sku mdog dkar po zhal bzhi pa/ /spyan gsum phyag ni bcu gnyis pa/ /shes

rab kha sbyor sbyor bdag nyid/ /byis pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o/ /dkar dang ljang gu dmar ba dang / /ser po g.yon nas bskor bas so/ /zhal gyi ral pa'i cod pan la/ /sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed 'dzin/ /'phrog byed dkar mo

mnyam par mnan/ /g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis yang dag bzhugs/ /rdo rje dril bu glang chen gyi/ /lpags pa cang te'u gri gug dang / /dgra sta rtse gsum de bzhin du/ /kha T+wA~M ga snod zhags pa dang / /mgo ste g.yon dang g.yas

par ro/ /'dam skyes kha dog sna tshogs pa/ /'dab ma bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad dang / /'khor lo'ang bcu gnyis bdag nyid can/ /sgo ni bcu drug bdag nyid dang / /nyams dga' dur khrod so gnyis na'o/ /gri gug rin chen rdo rje dang / /pad

ma 'khor lo ral gri dang / /sna tshogs rdo rje thod pa dang / /mgo bo keng rus 'di rnams dang / /zhags pa'am lcags kyur shes bya ste/ /'khor lo 'khor lor phreng ba'o/ /re rer rtsibs ni sum bcu drug /rdo rje pad ma

nyi ma can/ /rgyu yi rdo rje yongs gyur pa/ /lnga brgya bzhi yis lhag pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rdzogs pa'o/ /rtag tu glu ma'i sgra yis so/ /mnga' bdag nyi ma re rer 'gro ba mgron 'bod na/ /khyod ni ci yi phyir na stong pa nyid

du zhugs/ /bzhengs shig bzhengs shig bdag ni snying rje'i rang bzhin te/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa bde chen bdag la 'dod pa mdzod/ /gson cig gson cig gzhan gyi dgos pa nub/ /'jig rten phyugs gang shi ba bzhin du 'gyur/ /
bdag gi pad ma rgyas pa la 'dod mdzod/ /de ltar 'jig rten kun bder 'gyur bar byos/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas bdag la rol cig rol/ /lhan skyes rang bzhin brjod du med pa 'thob/ /sems can 'jig rten gzhan ni

rmongs gyur pas/ /ji ltar khyod kyi stong pa don med 'gyur/ /khyod ni chos rnams kun gyi byed pa ste/ /ci phyir lhan skyes rang bzhin 'gro med bzhugs/ /bdag la mchog gi don gyis 'dod pa mdzod/ /de ltar khyod ni 'jig

rten rnams mthun bzhud/ /glu 'dis rjes su bskul ba yis/ /rang nyid he ru ka rab sad/ /oM AHkA ya bA ga tsita ta badzra hU~M phaT ho/ gsang sngags 'di ni 'don pa na/ /skad cig rnam pa'i rnal 'byor ldan/ /skad cig sngags

las byung bdag nyid/ /dpa' bo kun dang rnal 'byor ma'o/ /'jigs byed mtshan mo nag mo dang / /lte ba nyi ma me mchog la/ /gar du mdzad pa yi ni sku/ /gnag dang ljang gu phyed phyed do/ /bdun bcu rtsa drug phyag dang ni/ /zhal bcu bdun la spyan gsum

pa/ /dpa' bo ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin/ /sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed can/ /mche ba chen po gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa rtag tu ni/ /ser ba dang ni ljang gu grags/ /nub ni dmar po de bzhin te/ /lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs/ /mche ba

gtsigs pa 'jigs par byed/ /rim pa ji lta'i mtshon cha'i tshogs/ /g.yas dang g.yon par shes par bya/ /glang chen lpags pa phyag gnyis kyis/ /skye gnas phyag rgya de bzhin gzhan/ /rdo rje ral gri mdung rings dang / /rtse gsum ji lta'i rim pas

g.yas/ /dgra sta gri gug mda' dang ni/ /gsal shing phug dang tho ba dang / /'khor lo cang te'u chu gri dang / /dbyug to dang ni mtshon rtse gcig /dung dang zangs dung dbyi gu dang / /rma bya'i 'jug ma de bzhin du/ /bya rog sgro dang pir dang ni/ /me yi

thab dang ri bo dang / /dbyug pa me long pi wang dang / /rkang mgo lag pa glo ba dang / /rgyu ma sgra gcan lcags sgrog dang / /gdos dang du b+hu sa nya rgya/ /mgo med 'bar ba'i mar nag dang / /'jigs byed gzugs te rim pas so/ /g.yon pa

dril bu phub rings mche/ /gtun shing zhags pa thod pa dang / /gzhu dang kha T+wA~M ga po ti/ /phub chung yu can sdigs mdzub dang / /g.yer ka'i phreng dang lcags sgrog dang / /brag dang dur khrod rdul dang ni/ /b+ho ka~M rnga dang lpags rlon dang / /skra yi

thag pa 'phyang ba dang / /ro sreg skul pa'i shing bu dang / /'phongs dang phub rings mgo bo dang / /keng rus zor ba de bzhin du/ /mig dang mkhal ma gnye ma dang / /span pa yi ni phur bu dang / /sa bon gang ba sog le dang / /khab dang rlid

bshus lpags pa dang / /sprin char 'bab dang shing lcags kyu/ /phyag gi mtshon cha bdun bcu gnyis/ /de lta'i rim pas shes par bya/ /mgo bo lnga yis rgyan du byas/ /phyag rgya drug dang ldan pas klubs/ /de bzhin mgo rgya'i phreng ba

dang / /dpung rgyan zhabs gdub sgra sgrogs dang / /sku la ba spu'i phreng bar ldan/ /de yi mdun du lha mo che/ /rdo rje phag mo sngar dang mtshungs/ /shes rab thabs kyi bde bas brlan/ /sku yi tshigs skabs kun la'o/ /sna tshogs he ru ka 'bar

bas/ /rnam par 'phro bcas rnam bsgom bya/ /dbu rnams kun la dar dpyangs kyi/ /phreng ba brtul zhugs can gyis bya/ /pad ma'i 'dab mar shar sogs kyi/ /bar bar du ni rnal 'byor ma/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i grangs nyid ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma

sogs drug drug go/ /shar la sogs nas byang gi mthar/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs drug de bzhin/ /dang po byang nas nub kyi mthar/ /slar yang lA ma la sogs drug /nub la sogs nas lho yi mthar/ /dum skyes ma la sogs

pa'i rigs/ /dang po lho nas shar gyi mthar/ /de nas gzugs can ma sogs drug /mkha' 'gro ma dang gzugs can nyid/ /'o byed ma dang gzhan sgyur ma/ /byis bcas ma dang rjes 'jug ma/ /phyed nag phyed sngon can rnams so/ /

lA ma rnal 'byor dbang phyug dang / /bzang mo thod pa can nag mo/ /rgyal po skor ma phyed ljang gu/ /gang phyir phyed dmar rim pas so/ /dum skyes ma dang dur khrod ma/ /rnam par zhu ma ku ru ku la ma/ /ngu ma gar mar grags ma rnams/ /phyed

dmar ba la phyed ser mo/ /gzugs can 'jigs byed gtsug pud ma/ /thor tshugs ral pa can drag mo/ /lha mo phyed ser phyed nag ma'o/ /phyag mtshan la sogs phag mo bzhin/ /mtshams kyi 'dab ma rnams la ni/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi snod

rnams so/ /g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis de bzhin du/ /thod pa'i phreng ba sogs 'dzin ma/ /g.yon skor du ni shes bya ste/ /ri rab steng gi char skyes ma'o/ /de'i brgya rdo rje'i 'khor lo ni/ /sngo nag pa yi dbus su ni/ /mkha' 'gro de bzhin lA

ma dang / /dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma/ /rab gtum mo dang gtum mig ma/ /'od ldan ma dang sna chen mo/ /dpa' blo mo dang mi'u thung ma/ /lang ka'i bdag mo shing grib ma/ /sru srungs ma dang de bzhin 'dir/ /'jigs byed chen mo ru

ni dran/ /rlung shugs ma dang chang za mo/ /sngo bzangs lha mo rab bzang ma/ /rta rna ma dang bya gdong ma/ /'khor lo'i shugs ma dum skyes ma/ /chang 'tshong 'khor lo'i go cha ma/ /shin du dpa' mo stobs chen ma/ /'khor lo bsgyur ma brtson chen

mo/ /gshin rje ma skyes gshin rje ma/ /de bzhin g.yo bye skrag byed ma/ /gtum mo dang ni dbyangs can ma/ /'dod 'grub ma dang 'bar chen mo/ /kha dog 'khor lo ji lta ba'o/ /phyag bzhi ma la zhal gcig ma/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M 'dzin/ /cang

te'u gri gu de bzhin no/ /skra grol phyogs kyi gos can ma/ /sku la phyag rgya lnga sogs te/ /rdo rje'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /yi dgas gdan can drag chen mo/ /'khor lo kun gyi rnal 'byor ma/ /sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan pa dang / /de bzhin

shes rab thabs ldan pa'o/ /de ltar gzugs med khams dang ni/ /de yang gnas su nges par brjod/ /rab tu dga' ba'i sar grags pa'o/ /slar yang gnas dang nye gnas sogs/ /de ltar sa yi dbus su yang / /sa bcu

gnyis su 'dod pa yin/ /de ltar thams cad du shes bya/ /khams gcig 'dir ni thams cad do/ /sum bcu rtsa drug bshad pa rnams/ /gtso bo yon tan kun rang bzhin/ /de ltar khams ni dpa' bo dang / /rnal 'byor ma rnams rang

bzhin can/ /khor yug tu ni sems can rnams/ /rdzus skyes rigs kyi rim pas so/ /de yang sum bcu rtsa drug gi/ /yul dang yul rim pas phye'o/ /zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i 'khor lo'i/ /de nas de yi phyi rol 'chad/ /slar yang snying po'i

'khor lo 'di/ /dmar ser kha dog la de bzhin/ /'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi dbus su ni/ /rdo rje 'chang ma mi bskyod ma/ /rnam snang rin chen dbang mo dang / /pad ma gar ma don yod ma/ /spyan ma dang ni mA ma kI/ /gos dkar sgrol ma gzugs

rdo rje/ /sgra dang de bzhin dri dang ro/ /reg dang chos dbyings rdo rje ma/ /sa snying ma dang mkha' snying mo/ /phyag ma 'jig rten mgon po ma/ /sgrib kun sel ma kun bzang mo/ /rin chen sgron me bdag med ma/ /khro gnyer ri khrod lo ma can/ /

gshin mthar byed ma shas mtha' ma/ /pad mtha' ma bgegs mthar byed ma/ /mi yog ma dang dbyug sngon ma/ /'dod rgyal ma dang stobs chen mo/ /gtsug tor ma dang gnod mdzes ma/ /kha dog 'khor lo ji bzhin te/ /zhal la sogs

pa'i mtshan nyid kun/ /lhag ma rdo rje'i 'khor lo bzhin/ /nye ba'i gnas su lha mo rnams/ /rang 'dra'i thabs dang bsam par bya/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis kyang / /gzugs kyi khams dang dri med dang / /gling dang po ru 'dod pa yin/ /

'dren bar rnam par shes bya dang / /chung ngu'i he ru kar 'dod dang / /gsum par pad ma'i he ru ka /bzhi pa nam mkha' bar 'dod dang / /lnga par 'thor rlung he ru ka /drug par sa yi he ru ka /bdun par 'bar ba'i he ru

ka /brgyad par gsher ba'i he ru ka /dgu par ye shes he ru ka /bcu par thugs kyi he ru ka /bcu gcig gsung gi he ru ka /bcu gnyis par ni sku yir 'dod/ /bcu gnyis de rnams rdo rje che/ /he ru ka ste rgyud gzhan med/ /'khor lo

gsum sdom he ru ka /de rnams dbyibs ni ci 'dra ba/ /sku mdog rang rang 'khor lo las/ /blo ldan rnams kyis mtshon par bya/ /zhes bya ba ni snying po'i 'khor lo ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas de brgya yon tan kun/ /

zhes bya'i 'khor lo dkar dmar ba/ /rdo rje'i rtsibs kyi dbus sbyin pa/ /pho nya ma mchog sum bcu drug /bram ze rgyal rigs rje rigs mo/ /dmangs mo gtum mo khyi 'tshong ma/ /g.yung mo gar ma thod pa can/ /nya ba mo dang

smyig dkar ma/ /dung mkhan mo dang tha ga mo/ /khur ba mkhan mo shing bzo ma/ /phreng ma kha ma tshos ma dang / /srin bal byed ma pho nya mo/ /bshang 'phyag ma dang rtsi mkhan ma/ /chang 'tshong ldum ra'i gnyer ba mo/ /rgyal pos bkrabs

ma shan pa mo/ /so rtsi 'tshong bar byed ma dang / /gser mgar mo dang lcags mgar mo/ /nor bu brgyud ma nags pa mo/ /kla klo o Di tshong pa mo/ /rdo bzo ma dang zhing las ma/ /ko lpags mo ste rnal 'byor ma/ /'di rnams

'khor lo'i kha dog go/ /lhag ma thams cad snying po yi/ /'khor lo ji bzhin shes par bya/ /'dir ni zhing du shes bya ste/ /'dod khams rigs kun bdag nyid dang / /gnyis pa'i gling zhes bya bar bshad/ /rang gi shes rab thabs

bdag nyid/ /'od byed pa yi sa de bzhin/ /bla ma rang nyid mchod par bya/ /rang ming brjod pa'i sngags la ni/ /thog mar phyag 'tshal rab tu grags/ /hU~M hU~M phaT kyi yi ge mthar/ /de ltar 'khor lo kun la bya/ /de yi phyi rol

zlum por sbyin/ /ri mo gnyis ni gnag dang sngo/ /sgo dang rta babs kha khyer dang / /dra ba dra ba phyed pas mdzes/ /shar gyi sgo yi dbus su yang / /mkha' 'gro ma 'dra'i khwa gdong ma/ /byang du 'ug pa'i gdong can ma/ /nub du

khyi gdong can ma dang / /lho ru phag gi gdong can te/ /kha dog lA ma sogs 'dra mchog /me dang bden bral rlung dang ni/ /dbang ldan mtshams na gnas pa mo/ /gshin rje brtan ma pho nya mo/ /mche gtsigs 'joms

ma rim ji bzhin/ /kha dog gnyis gnyis mnyam par bya/ /zhal ni rjes su mthun rim pas/ /shar dang byang dang nub dang ni/ /lho yi sa gzhi rtag pa ru/ /gnag dang sngo dang ljang dang dmar/ /ser po yi ni mdog tu bya/ /

lhan skyes dkyil 'khor de bzhin du/ /gang phyir 'khor lo rim pa bzhi/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa/ /mjug tu bya'o rim ji bzhin/ /'khor lo gnyis par ri mo gsum/ /gsum pa la ni ri mo bzhi/ /bzhi pa

ri mo lnga'i bdag nyid/ /dur khrod kun nas rim pas te/ /phyi rol la sogs sa gzhi ni/ /zlum po'i dbyibs su bya bar 'dod/ /'khor lo ri mo lnga'i bdag nyid/ /grwa bzhi pa la kun du 'bar/ /de la lhan skyes 'khor lo yi/ /

dur khrod rnams ni bshad bya ste/ /gtum drag tshang tshing de bzhin du/ /'bar bas 'khrigs pa'i keng rus can/ /'jigs sde shar la sogs pa yi/ /phyogs su g.yon skor yongs su gnas/ /aT Ta Ta Ta rgod dbang

ldan du/ /dpal gyi nags ni bsreg zer te/ /mun pa drag po bden bral du/ /rlung du ki li ki li sgrogs/ /dur khrod drag po'i gzugs rnams ni/ /ro langs 'byung po lce spyang sgra/ /rim pa 'di yis gnas pa ste/ /dur

khrod brgyad po rnams su yang / /shing dang phyogs skyong klu dbang ste/ /shi shing khyab nas ka~M ke li/ /tsu ta'i shing dang n+ya gro d+ha/ /de bzhin ka ranya dza ka nyid/ /la ta par ka Ti dang pa thi ba/ /dbang po nor sbyin de bzhin du/ /klu dbang dang ni

gshin rje'i bdag /dbang ldan de nas bsreg za dang / /srin po'i dbang po rlung bdag po/ /nor rgyas 'jog po de bzhin du/ /stobs kyi rgyu dang pad ma nyid/ /pad chen hu lu hu lu dang / /rigs ldan dang ni dung skyong

ngo / /sgrogs pa dang ni 'ur sgrogs dang / /drag po 'khyil ba mthug de bzhin/ /gang ba char 'bebs gtum po ste/ /'di rnams sprin gyi bdag po'o/ /'dir ni dur khrod thams cad la/ /rdo rje phreng ba rnam par sbyin/ /thams cad

kyang 'dir de bzhin bya/ /phyi dang nang du 'dod pa yin/ /zhes bya ba ni gsum pa yon tan gyi 'khor lo'o// // de nas phyi rol nam mkha' yi/ /'khor lo 'dam skyes sngon po mtshungs/ /sum bcu drug rtsibs dbus

su yang / /mkha' spyod rnal 'byor ma 'di rnams/ /mi 'am ci mo dri za mo/ /hu Ta ka ma bA Ta ba ma de bzhin du/ /pi wang gling bu mu kun da ma dang / /rdza rnga ma dang nges par gag ga ri/ /cha lang ma dang shA+e len dri ki ma/ /glu ma ka ra

Da dang ta ma DA mchog dang / /gar ma sgeg mo Taka ka ma dang ni/ /tA li sha ra Na mo rnga chen ma/ /mau dri rgyud can ma dang ma ru ma/ /na la ba mo de bzhin D+ham ba ki/ /Dam ru ma dang Dun DU ki de bzhin/ /zangs dung ma dang ra dung ma de bzhin/ /

b+hu ki ma dang dril bu ma dang dril chung ma/ /g.yer kha ma dang de bzhin Da ko lika ma dang / /dung ma dang ni dbyangs ldan ma de bzhin/ /'khor ma mchog gi dbang phyug mo/ /kha dog sna tshogs bkra ba 'am/ /yang na 'khor lo'i kha

dog go/ /nye ba'i zhing na gnas pa mo/ /gling ni gsum pa mo mchog go/ /mkha' la spyod ma'i rigs su byon/ /gling 'di la ni yang dag gnas/ /sa ni 'od 'phro can de dang / /rang rang gnas sogs zhing ma'o/ /yang na Dam ru kha T+wA~M ga /

'dir ni slar yang spangs nas su/ /rang rang mtshan ma so so'i tshul/ /ji ltar 'dod par bya ba'o/ /'khor lo kun gyi cod pan la/ /rang gi bdag pos bya ba'o/ /'dir ni shes rab thabs bdag nyid/ /rigs ldan bdag nyid rigs can ma'o/ /

ji ltar rgyan la sogs mang po/ /lhag ma sngon bzhin bya ba'o/ /'khor lo kun du spyan gsum dang / /phyogs kyi gos 'chang rjes 'gro ma'o/ /zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i 'khor lo ste dang po'o// // de nas phyi rol rlung 'khor lo/ /

sngon po sna tshogs pa yi mdog /rdo rje'i rtsibs dbus sbyin bya ba/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams rim ji bzhin/ /nam mkha'i snying po las gzhan ming / /blo dang ldan pas shes par bya/ /mkha' lding ngang mo bkra ba mo/ /bya rog bya gar

sreg pa mo/ /rma bya zangs kyi gtsug pud ma/ /gu da bu li 'jam pa mo/ /phug ron bya rog chen mo dang / /ga Di mi dang gong ma sreg /ne tso sngags ma bzhad mo dang / /bya rgod 'ug ma mchil pa mo/ /shing bye'u mo dang ngur pa ma/ /bri k+ShA ra ni

kak+ka pa'i/ /so bya mo dang byi la mo/ /lcug ma'i mgrin dang sA ri mo/ /khra mo gur gum lce can ma/ /bA Ti rI kA ka~M dza~M g+ha mo/ /hor mo ka~M ka mo de bzhin/ /daT+da ri mo ri dgas dgra/ /de ltar rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo/ /'khor lo'i

sa gzhi gang 'dra'i mdog /yang na rang rang las shes bya/ /phyag sogs de bzhin sngon dang mtshungs/ /thams cad shes rab thabs bdag nyid/ /'dun sa la ni gnas ma mchog /sbyang dka'i sar ni shes bya ste/ /gling ni

bzhi pa mar 'dod do/ /'khor lo 'di ni sgong skyes dang / /yon tan gsum gyi dbye ba can/ /gsum gyi bdag nyid gsum pa yi/ /'khor lo drod gsher skyes gzugs can/ /bzhi pa mngal skyes zhes bya ba/ /'khor lo gsum

gyi bdag nyid 'dod/ /zhes bya ba ni rlung gi 'khor lo ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas phyi rol gyi bshad bya/ /'khor lo sa yi ming can mchog /kha dog ser po'i rang bzhin la/ /sum bcu drug rtsibs rnams kyis spras/ /rnal

'byor ma ni sum bcu drug /sa spyod ma rnams rim ji bzhin/ /seng mo stag mo b+him+b+ha ri bong ma/ /glang chen ri dwags byi la mo/ /ba dang ma he mo rta mo/ /lce spyang mo dang bsre mo 'bri/ /byi ba bong mo b+hi Di ma/ /ra mo lug mo rim pa bzhin/ /

khyi mo phag mo dom mo dang / /Dan Da ri mo mau dz+nyA ka /dred mo dang ni sgeg mo dang / /nags ma dang ni khyi chen mo/ /bya rog chen mo kha sgo ma/ /sbrul mo bkra mo rnga mo dang / /sre mo rtsangs mo phug pa mo/ /grong na gnas pa ma

mchog go/ /de ltar 'khor lo'i mdog bzhin ma/ /yang na rang rang kha dog go/ /lha mo shes rab thabs bdag nyid/ /nye ba'i 'dun sar gnas pa mo/ /mngon du gyur pa'i sa nyid dang / /de ni shes rab pha rol phyin/ /lnga pa'i gling

du gnas pa mo/ /mtshon cha la sogs sngon bzhin no/ /lus ni bud med rnam pa'i gzugs/ /gdong pa rang gi dngos por 'dod/ /shar dang byang dang nub dang ni/ /lho yi sgo ru shes bya ba/ /tshangs ma dbang phyug chen po ma/ /

gzhon nu khyab 'jug ma de bzhin/ /phag mo dbang mo gtum mo dang / /dpal chen mo ni grwa rnams su/ /sgo ru gzugs dang mtshan ma ni/ /mkha' 'gro ma sogs bzhin du grags/ /grwa ru brtan ma la sogs bzhir/ /shes bya

'dir ni ri mo gsum/ /sku gsung thugs kyi chos rnams so/ /chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu mdzes/ /dur khrod rnams ni brjod bya ste/ /me yi 'khor lo'i dbus su ni/ /gsod dang kun du skrag byed dang / /'jigs pa che dang 'jigs byed dang / /

drag po'i dur khrod de bzhin du/ /g.yon skor du ni rnam par dgod/ /skrod byed dang ni sdang byed dang / /lkugs byed dang ni rengs byed slar/ /dbang ldan la sogs grwa la'o/ /shing ni rim pas sbyin bya ste/ /go yu star ga nA li ra/ /se

'bru bil ba'i shing de nas/ /skyu ru bi dz+nya rag sha'i shing / /rim pa ji bzhin rnam par dgod/ /dbang po gshin rje ma chu mo/ /gnod sbyin 'byung mo drung srong ma/ /srin mo rlung gi chung ma ste/ /'jig rten skyong ma sbyin par bya/ /klu mo

srin mo thams cad ni/ /'dir ni rnam pa kun du sbyin/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor 'khor bshad la/ /phun sum tshogs pa thams cad sbyin/ /las kyi rjes mthun sku mdog can/ /der ni gtso bo bsgom par bya/ /zhes bya ba ni
'khor lo gsum pa sa'i dkyil 'khor la rim pa gnyis dang bcas pa'o// ! // de nas phyi rol slar yang 'dir/ /me yi 'khor lo bdag gis bshad/ /kha dog dmar po 'bar chen mo/ /sum bcu drug rtsibs

rnams mchog la/ /rnal 'byor ma slar dgod bya ba/ /lha sogs rigs las byung ma ste/ /lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin mo/ /'byung mo ngo bo tsam po'o/ /de kun gsungs pa 'di ni ci/ /lha yi rigs byung bshad par bya/ /ma dang

chung ma sring mo dang / /bu mo sring mo'i bu mo dang / /pha yi sring mo de dang ni/ /zhang po yi ni chung ma dang / /chung ma'i spun zla ma dang ni/ /de nyid kyi ni pha yi ma/ /chung ma yi ni phyi mo dang / /ma yi ma dang gnyen mo dang / /ma yi spun zla'i bu mo dang / /

rang gi phyi mo'i spun zla dang / /spun zla'i bu mo de'i bu mo/ /pha yi ma dang phyi mo dang / /khu bo yi ni chung ma dang / /bu mo'i bu yi chung ma dang / /slar yang chung ma'i spun zla dang / /rang pha'i sring mo'i bu mo dang / /de nyid kyi ni rang rigs skyes/ /

spun zla'i chung ma bu mo dang / /bu nyid kyi ni chung ma dang / /bu mo'i khyo yi ma yi ni/ /bu nyid kyi ni sgyug mo dang / /bu mo'i bu mor yang dag bshad/ /pho nya sum bcu drug rnams so/ /kha dog dmar por yang dag grags/ /mtshon cha la sogs

sngar dang mtshungs/ /sa ni ring du song nyid dang / /drug pa'i gling du gnas pa mo/ /'du bar rtag tu shes bya ste/ /shes rab thabs bdag ngo bo can/ /nus pa'i 'khor lor 'di rtag tu/ /shes bya rang 'dra'i mdzes ma'o/ /gun du rdo rje'i
phreng la sogs/ /lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa yis/ /g.yon dang g.yas pa'i lag pa yis/ /'dir ni mchod pa byed pa yin/ /phyugs rnams kyi ni sha thams cad/ /kun du son par dbul bar bya/ /btung ba

rnam pa sna tshogs dbul/ /bldag bya sna tshogs nyid de bzhin/ /rang rang stan las langs nas ni/ /bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa mchod/ /slar yang 'ongs nas 'khor lo yi/ /mchod pa bcu gnyis rnams la'o/ /zhes bya ba ni longs

spyod rdzogs pa'i 'phar ma'i me'i 'khor lo dang po'o// // de nas de yi phyi rol bshad/ /chu yi 'khor lo rdzu 'phrul che/ /mdog dkar sum bcu drug rtsibs la/ /rnal 'byor ma ni rim pas bsgom/ /ma ka ra mo rus sbal nya/ /

sbal mo rus sbal chu sram mo/ /sdig nag gag+gar ma shrI li ma/ /chu yi phug ma srin bu'i gdong ma dang / /cha ga ba mo ka ka ru mo su ya mo/ /chu byi mo dang grog mo'i gdong ma dang / /chu'i mi mo dang ni rgod ma dang / /glang chen mo dang stag mo lce spyang mo/ /

chu sbrul mo dang dung mo mgron bu ma/ /nya phyis ma dang nor bu dzing gu ra ma dang / /li sa mo dang du ba du ra ma kar+N+Na TA/ /pha Ta ka mo dA ba ka ma kri ma mo/ /dzu Shi dzu ShI ma dang sha sbrang ma ka lA ma/ /lha yi gtso mo mchog rnams so/ /de ltar kha dog rang

bzhin ni/ /dkar mo'am rang rang rigs skyes pa mo/ /gdong ni rang rang gzugs kyis te/ /rnal 'byor ma'i rim ji bzhin no/ /nye ba'i 'du ba nyid dang ni/ /sa ni mi g.yo ba mchog go/ /bdun pa'i gling du gnas par ni/ /shes bya mtshon

cha sngon bzhin no/ /yang na gang ba'i ri sogs kyi/ /mi rnams sum bcu drug lha'o/ /gnas sogs rim pas de rnams su/ /mi mo dngos su yang dag bya/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'di de yis ni/ /dum bu bcu gnyis kyis brgyan pa'o/ /

ba tsha zhes bya'i rgya mtshor ni/ /de ru gtogs pa'i skye bo rnams/ /drod gsher skyes dang 'du 'phrod las/ /skyes pa'am mngal nas skyes par bsam/ /'khor lo 'di ni drod gsher skyes/ /me yi 'khor lo mngal skyes so/ /
mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'i/ /shes rab thabs bdag nyid rang ngo / /zhes bya ba ni chu'i 'khor lo ste gnyis pa'o// ! // de nas de yi phyi rol 'chad/ /kun nas ye shes 'khor lo'o/ /sum bcu
drug rtsibs sna tshogs mdog /lha min mo yi rigs rim pas/ /til mchog ma dang phul du bde/ /lha yi bu mo dga' chen ma/ /dga' dang dgar grags pad ma can/ /dung can sna tshogs glang chen ma/ /gzugs chen

ma dang gzugs mdzes ma/ /'od chags rnam sgeg bde ba mo/ /me tog 'dod ma ut+pal dgar/ /ud pal sngo dang mdzes ma dang / /'dod chags ma dang 'dod chags che/ /rol grags ma dang rol chen ma/ /myos ma dang ni myos dga'

ma/ /'dod pa mo dang 'dod chen ma/ /bde las byung dang bde ldan ma/ /mthun mchog ma dang byams pa mo/ /skal bzang ldan ma skal bzang mo/ /dma' ba mo dang zhum pa mo/ /skye gzugs mar ni grags pa ste/ /rnal 'byor ma

yi gtso mo mchog /thams cad shes rab thabs bdag nyid/ /rnam pa sna tshogs mdog de bzhin/ /phyag dang mtshon cha sngon bzhin shes/ /legs pa'i blo gros sa de bzhin/ /dur khrod rin po cher snang ba/ /rang 'byung bde ba

byed pa po/ /de phyir longs spyod rdzogs sku dang / /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo gsum pa la/ /dga' ba bzhi ni dag pa yis/ /kun nas ri mo bzhi can no/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgo bzhi ru/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams rim ji bzhin/ /

dkar mo chom rkun ro langs ma/ /za phod ma yang rnam par dgod/ /grwa la gnas pa'i lha mo bzhi/ /sbos mo ri khrod ma de bzhin/ /gtum mo dang ni g.yung mo ste/ /rim pas sngon bzhin rtag shes bya/ /phyi rol dur khrod 'khor

lo ni/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ste/ /byis pa 'chi dang lhag ma za/ /g.yul drag mo dang mche ba kun/ /shar la sogs par g.yon skor du/ /de ltar brtse ba chen pos bsam/ /du ba mun nag dang ni me/ /hA hA'i sgra dang sgra

chen no/ /shing ni tsan dan ga pur dang / /dzA ti pha la dang e la/ /nA ga ge sar tsam pa dang / /kun du ru dang lha'i shing ngo / /phyogs skyong rnams ni mtshon bya ba/ /nyi ma bsil ba sa yi bu/ /ri bong can skyes bla ma nyid/ /ngan spong nyi ma'i

bu de bzhin/ /lha min mgo bor shes bya ste/ /drag po'i gdong rnams su bya'o/ /'bar ba ral gri chu gri dang / /mdung rings spu gri brag de bzhin/ /klog dang sna tshogs mtshon 'bebs par/ /dur khrod kyi ni dbus su bya/ /ral gri

mig sman ri lu dang / /rkang pa byug dang bcud len dang / /mchil lham dngul chu sa 'og gi/ /dngos grub sgrub pa mkhas pas bya/ /zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi 'khor lo ste longs spyod rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo

gsum gyi bdag nyid do// // de nas de yi phyi rol 'chad/ /thugs kyi 'khor 'di gsal ba'o/ /mdog nag sum cu rtsa drug rtsibs/ /thams cad rang bzhin skyes pa mchog /klu mo gnod sbyin mo 'byung mo/ /yi dgas

dmyal mo mnar med ma/ /ltung ba mo dang bar med ma/ /bum mo gshin rje mo de bzhin/ /thig nag ma dang me mdag mo/ /tsha ba mo dang rab tsha ma/ /ngu 'bod ma dang ngu 'bod che/ /mar nag tu 'tshed ri gnyis 'tshir/ /sdang ma rmongs ma

phrag dog ma/ /chags myos ser sna skud pa ma/ /grangs ma ral gri'i nags ma nyid/ /du ma dang ni mu ge ma/ /nad dgon ma dang mtshon gyi dang / /chu yi dgon pa ma dang ni/ /ral gri sen mo rab med ma/ /spu gri'i so ma 'khor lo ma/ /

grul bum mo ste lha mo che/ /mdog ni 'khor lo ci 'dra ba'o/ /phyag dang mtshon cha sngon bzhin du/ /shes bya rang gi gzugs can no/ /de la nye ba'i dur khrod dang / /de nas sa ni chos kyi sprin/ /sems kyi rang bzhin dag pa nyid/ /

kun 'gro 'khor lo can du 'dod/ /rang bzhin spangs pa bdag med pa/ /'khor lo can sar bzhugs pa'o/ /'khor lo rnams ni rim ji bzhin/ /thams cad de ltar shes par bya/ /sgo skyong ma ni thams cad kyi/ /gnas

bzhi rnams ni bcu gnyis so/ /de ltar bcu drug shes bya ba/ /stong pa nyid ni mkhas pa yi/ /ye shes rnam shes ngo bo'i phyir/ /dur khrod bcom ldan 'das rang nyid/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'di la ni/ /gsum gyi bdag nyid ming gis
so/ /phyi nas gzhan 'di thams cad ni/ /'khor lo gnyis su bshad par bya/ /zhes bya ba ni thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dang po'o// // de nas phyi rol du gzhan pa/ /gsung gi 'khor lo de bshad bya/ /dmar po
btsod kyi kha dog ste/ /sum cu drug rtsibs bdag nyid gtso/ /mchod ma za ma gnyid ma dang / /le lo ma chos sems sgom mo/ /khyim sems bud med sems ma dang / /don sems ma dang sbyor bral ma/ /bu sems

rnams dang mya ngan ma/ /bsam gtan ma dang sngags zlos ma/ /ngo tsha nga rgyal gdung ba mo/ /sems can don byed brtson ma dang / /rgyal po sems ma gzhan gnod ma/ /ye shes thob ma dka' thub ma/ /rgas ma 'chi ba'i

bsam can ma/ /bde ma sdug ma mi dge ma/ /yod dang med ma nyid dang ni/ /bla ma sems ma 'gro ba mo/ /bzod ma mi bzod ma ngal ma/ /ngal sos ma dang bkres ma mchog /las ni thams cad byed lha mo/ /rang bzhin

'khor lo 'di che'o/ /kha dog rang gi 'khor lor grags/ /lhag ma 'di ni sngon bzhin no/ /shes rab thabs bdag nyid lha mo/ /rang bzhin gyi ni dkyil 'khor 'di/ /gdan bzhi pa'i rgyud stong phrag ni/ /bcu gnyis pa la

bshad pa ste/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro ma sogs kyi/ /mchod sogs lha mor 'dod pa yin/ /grong mtha'i gnas ni 'di lta bu/ /kun du 'od kyi sa yin no/ /de ltar ye shes sogs sku'i mtha'/ /chu me rlung dang nam mkha' yi/ /
bskor ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya bar/ /rdo rje mchog ma shes par bya/ /zhes bya ba ni gsung gi 'khor lo'i gnyis pa sprul pa'i 'khor lo'o// // de nas sku yi 'khor lo bshad/ /sku gsung thugs kyi kha dog

can/ /sum cu rtsa drug rtsibs dbus su/ /rnal 'byor ma yi 'khor sgyur ma'o/ /rgyal chen bzhi yi ris ma dang / /sum cu rtsa gsum 'khor sgyur ma/ /'thab bral dga' ldan 'khor sgyur ma/ /'phrul dga' ma dang

de bzhin du/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ma dang ni/ /tshangs ris ma yi 'khor lo ma/ /tshangs pa mdun 'don ma de bzhin/ /tshangs pa chen po'i 'khor sgyur ma/ /'od chung tshad med 'od ma dang / /'od gsal ma dang dge chung ma/ /

tshad med dge ba'i 'khor sgyur ma/ /dge rgyas ma dang sprin med ma/ /bsod nams skyes ma'i 'khor lo dang / /'bras bu che ba'i 'khor sgyur ma/ /mi che mi gdung 'khor lo ma/ /shin du mthong snang bzang snang ma/ /
'og min ma yi 'khor sgyur ma/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched ma/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched ma/ /ci yang med pa'i skye mched ma/ /'du shes med dang 'du shes ni/ /med min dmyal mo yi dgas ma/ /

dud 'gro mi mo lha min mo/ /gzhal med khang spyod ma de bzhin/ /zla ba nyi ma gshin rje mo/ /dbang mo 'khor sgyur mar shes bya/ /rang gi 'khor lo'i mdog bzhin bya/ /phyag dang mtshon cha sngar bzhin no/ /shes rab thabs

kyi rang bzhin te/ /nye ba'i grong mthar yang dag gnas/ /sa ni mos pa spyod pa ste/ /'di rnams 'khor lo bcu gnyis so/ /'khor lo 'di ni gru bzhi ste/ /sprul pa'i skur ni 'du shes so/ /ri mo lnga ni me long

sogs/ /thams cad mtshan nyid kyis mtshan pa'o/ /brgyad gnyis lha mos byas pa yi/ /mchod pa dkyil 'khor bzhi la'o/ /phyi rol dur khrod brgyad rnams te/ /sgo skyong ma ni rim ji bzhin/ /shar du chu skyes

dkar mo bsgom/ /byang du gan d+ha ri ma'o/ /nub du rdo rje gar ma ste/ /lho ru rta rgod ma yi kha/ /grwa yi char ni lha mo bzhi/ /dbang ldan la sogs rim ji bzhin/ /lha mo rdo rje 'bar zhal dang / /rdo rje khro gnyer ma'i zhal

dang / /rdo rje 'thub ma gtum mo ste/ /kha dog la sogs sngon bzhin no/ /drag mo chen mo gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas rnam mdzes ma'o/ /dpa' bo rnams kyi mdog dang gzugs/ /rnal 'byor ma kun ji

lta ba'o/ /kun la mgo bo'i phreng bas brgyan/ /dpa' bo rnams la dar phreng can/ /ral pa'i cod pan dpa' de rnams/ /yan lag kun la thal bas bskus/ /rnal 'byor ma yi mtho zhing 'phreng / /lag gdub spyi gtsug

brgyan pa dang / /mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /phag mo'i rigs las byung ba'o/ /dpa' bo kun gyi ming rnams ni/ /thog ma'i 'khor lo la sogs mtshog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin du/ /sna tshogs pad ma mkha'

'gro dang / /rin chen thod pa'i dum bu dang / /keng rus chen po'i keng rus dang / /mche ba rnam gtsigs lha dgra dang / /'od dpag med dang rdo rje 'od/ /rdo rje sku dang myu gu can/ /rdo rje ral pa can de bzhin/ /dpa' chen rdo rje hU~M mdzad dang / /

shin du bzang dang rdo rje bzang / /'jigs byed chen po mig mi bzang / /stobs chen rin chen rdo rje dang / /rta mgrin nam mkha'i snying po dang / /he ru ka dang pad gar can/ /rnam snang mdzad dang rdo rje sems/ /stobs chen ye

shes mkha' 'gro dang / /blo brtan thar dang ye shes dang / /thabs dang thugs kyi rdo rje'o/ /lhag ma'i ming ni lha mo bzhin/ /skyes bu'i rtags rnams su bya'o/ /'khor lo bcu gcig rnams kyi ni/ /sgo la sogs pa'i de

bzhin no/ /snying po'i pad ma'i lha mo rnams/ /gtso bos bdag po bzhin du bya/ /'on kyang bdag po sogs 'khor lor/ /ji ltar bskal bzang rgyal ba ni/ /bzhi yis dman pa'i stong phrag gcig /de rnams thams cad rnam

bsgom bya/ /mtshan ni yon tan dbye bas phye/ /sprul pa'i sku can bdag nyid do/ /gang zhig gang gi 'khor lo yi/ /rnal 'byor ma ni thog mar byung / /de yis bcu gnyis shes par bya/ /kun spyod gnas dang nye gnas ma'o/ /

lhag ma sa ni bcu gsum pa/ /sgo dang grwa la sogs gnas ma'o/ /mchod dang bstod sogs dus su ni/ /thog mar rdo rje'i ming shes bya/ /dpa' bo rnams la'ang de bzhin no/ /phyi rol dur khrod bshad bya ba/ /dang por tshig par

shes bya ste/ /gnyis par yang ni ma tshig pa/ /gsum pa dum bur gyur pa nyid/ /bzhi pa yang ni ma gtugs pa/ /lnga pa 'jigs su rung bar bshad/ /drug pa yang ni 'jigs byed pa/ /bdun pa gsal shing phug pa ste/ /steng nas

btags pa brgyad pa'o/ /dur khrod brgyad po rtag tu ni/ /dmyal bsrung chen po brgyad rnams so/ /shal ma li shing mya ngan med/ /yongs 'du u dum bar de bzhin/ /Dom bi ra dang gam b+ha ri/ /rgya shug dang ni

ba ru ra'o/ /sna tshogs ro langs tshogs dang ni/ /rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo'i tshogs/ /mkha' spyod ma dang sa spyod gzhan/ /gang yin de yang rdzu 'phrul che/ /mgo med rgyug dang gzhan yang ni/ /mgo bo med pa gar byed

dang / /nyal ba dang ni rkang med dang / /mgo dang lus sogs gtubs pa ste/ /ting 'dzin chen po'i rgyu yis ni/ /de rnams dga' bcas gar byed pa'o/ /de ltar de bzhin dbus su ni/ /rgyu skar sna tshogs bya ba yin/ /kha

dog sna tshogs shes bya ste/ /bzhon pa gang gi yin pa'o/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyu'i bdag nyid/ /yongs rdzogs dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /rgyu yi rdo rje ci 'dra ba/ /yang ni de 'dra spro bar bya/ /dud 'gro'i zhal can
lha mo ni/ /las thams cad mas khyer nas 'ongs/ /khro bo'i tshogs kyis mnyam bkug nas/ /sngon du bgegs ni bsal bar bya/ /sum b+has bka' bsgo rdo rje can/ /brtul zhugs can gyis phur gdab bya/ /

oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha kA yi kA~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na bA tsi kA~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya tsa trA si kA~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM a na ya hoH/ b+ha ga wAn badzra rA dz+nyA ni kA~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ /shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su gzhag /

rdo rje gur gyi dbus su ni/ /'og tu rdo rje'i sa gzhir 'gyur/ /steng du mda' yi dra ba can/ /rdo rje ra ba bla bre'o/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas nang du yang / /de yang gsum bzhi lnga dang ni/ /gru drug pa ru bsgom par bya/ /'phar ma

bzhi yi rim ji bzhin/ /rem pas thams cad 'dir dgod bya/ /oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya sarba duSh+ka na phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya sarba pA pa~M phaT/ hU~M hU~M hU~M badzra kI la ya badzra d+ha ro A dz+nyA pa ya ti sarba big+h+nan kA ya bAka

tsita ta badzra kI lA ya hU~M phaT/ phur bu gdab pa'i sngags so/ /oM badzra mung ga ra badzra kI lA ko Ta ya hU~M phaT/ brdung ba'i sngags so/ /de ltar 'khor lo kun dpa' bo/ /bcom ldan rdo rje'i rigs byung ba'o/ /sprul pa'i sku ni

ma lus pa/ /rnal 'byor ma ni byang chub snod/ /'di ni sku'i 'khor lo sku gsum gyi bdag nyid dang sprul pa dang lhan cig pa ste gsum pa'o// //de nas gnas dang nye gnas sogs/ /ji lta'i rim pa rnams gsungs pa/ /

gnas ni gang ba'i ri nyid dang / /dra ba 'dzin dang o D+yan dang / /ar bu dang yang de bzhin gnas/ /go da ba ri nye gnas te/ /dga' ba'i dbang phyug lha mo'i mkhar/ /gyad yul yang ni nye gnas so/ /'dod gzugs de bzhin o

Di dang / /tri sha ku na ko sal zhing / /ka ling ka dang lam pa ka /kAnya tsi kha ba'i gnas nye zhing / /yi dgas grong dang khyim lha mo/ /sau raSh+Ta dang gser gling ni/ /'dun sa'o nye ba'i 'dun sa ni/ /grong khyer sin d+hu ma ru dang / /ku lu

ta yang nye 'dun sa/ /'du ba chu klung 'gram dang ni/ /skyed tshal rgya mtshor rab bshad dang / /lam gyi bzhi mdo'o nye 'du ba/ /ri yi spyi bo grong dbus dang / /tshogs can gzhon nu'i ri dang ni/ /rigs kyi zhing yang nye 'du ba'o/ /

dur khrod mu mu mi ya nas/ /spyod dang ha ri ke la dang / /sgyu ma'i grong khyer dur khrod do/ /nye ba'i dur khrod ri mtha' dang / /sngags kyi zhing dang lha yi grong / /kar+N+Na Ta dang pa Ta yang / /de bzhin grong mthar bshad pa'o/ /grong mtha' kong

ka na nyid dang / /khyab bdag las kyi yul ljongs dang / /rnal 'byor ma ni stug po'i grong / /de bzhin 'dir ni nye grong mtha'o/ /pha yi nags dang khyim gyi logs/ /lteng ka dang ni rdzing bu ste/ /gnas 'di rnams su bu mo gang / /
lhan skyes rang gi skye gnas skyes/ /yul dang yul du shes bya ba/ /ye shes ldan dang gnyis med gnas/ /'khor lo bcu gnyis rnams kyis ni/ /mda' yi dbye bas gnas skyes rnams/ /bcu gnyis gnas sogs

rab bshad pa/ /sum bcu drug khams rgyu yis so/ /re re yi ni khams rnams la'ang / /mig la sogs pa'i skye mched rnams/ /bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis su/ /shes bya lhan skyes rnal 'byor ma'o/ /sngon gyi tshigs bcad

'di yis ni/ /dbang bskur ba ni nod par bya/ /ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams khrus gsol 'gyur/ /de bzhin bdag la khrus byed 'gyur/ /lha yi chu yis dag par bya/ /rdo rje dang ni mkha' bar du/ /

sangs rgyas thams cad son 'di ni/ /ye shes 'od zer byung de rnams/ /rang byung bdud rtsi rgyun gyis ni/ /dbang bskur rdo rje mgon po yi/ /lhan skyes chus ni dgang phyir ro/ /oM sarba ta thA ga tA b+hi sa ma ya shrI ye hU~M/

dbang bskur ba'i sngags so/ /'khor lo gang dang gang gi ni/ /de dang de yi rgyas gdab la/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams bdag po ste/ /khyab bdag gzhan gyis rgyas mi gdab/ /ye shes ting 'dzin sems dpa' yang / /'khor lo

kun la bsgom par bya/ /de las byung ba'i 'od tshogs kyis/ /ye shes 'khor lo dgug par bya/ /dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH'i yig rnams kyis/ /bla ma'i man ngag las shes bya/ /sna tshogs dpa' bo rnal 'byor mas/ /gtso bo la

ni mchod byed gzhug /thig le dang ni phra mo che'i/ /rnal 'byor gnyis ni yongs dmigs bya/ /'khor lo bcu gnyis thig le yang / /rdo rje'i rnam pa rnams su mtshon/ /lte ba'i 'og steng rtse rnams ni/ /stong phrag gcig ni

thig le can/ /rtse mo bcu yi thig le rnams/ /ji lta'i rim pa rnams su mtshon/ /du ba la sogs brgya phrag gcig /thig le'i gnas su 'bab par bya/ /de phyir phra mo gang ci'ang rung / /sangs rgyas spyod yul min de bsgom/ /

rdo rje'i srog rnams la bltas pas/ /phyag rgya che de sangs rgyas de/ /gsang sngags bzlas pa bya ba ni/ /rkang pa brgyad lhag rtsa ba ni/ /bzhi bcu la sogs 'di rnams kyis/ /mtshan nyid thams cad rdzogs pa dang / /bde chen
sogs dang bzang po dang / /gnyis kun rnam par spangs pa dang / /mchod pa khams gsum bdag nyid ni/ /dngos po kun 'byung rnams kyis so/ /dkar mo sogs dang 'gro drug 'khor sgyur ma/ /gzugs dang gzugs

med gnyis kyi lha mo ste/ /rang gis thams cad rang bzhin dag gis ni/ /ma lus pa yi 'khor lo mchod par 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor bde ba chen po bsgom par gyis/ /rnal 'byor bcu gnyis bsod nams sdig mad pa'o/ /thams

cad zag med rang bzhin mos par gyis/ /dkyil 'khor ngan pa de ni bde bar shes par byos/ /dbang po 'khrul pa bde ba chen po mos par gyis/ /skad cig de la rang dang gzhan gyi ngo bo med/ /gang gi rnam pa sna tshogs

gzugs chen gyis/ /sa gsum du ni dkyil 'khor 'khor lo spro bar byos/ /sngags dang phyag rgya sogs brgyan pas/ /rnal 'byor chen pos gtor ma sbyin/ /'bum bzlas pa yi rjes las ni/ /bye ba bzlas pas dngos grub che/ /

ji ltar mngon par brjod pa bzhin/ /sna tshogs dam tshig nyer spyad tshe/ /rnal 'byor dngos grub gyur de nas/ /gang rung der ni gnas par bya/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /

rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par gzhag

pa dang man ngag sna tshogs bstan pa ste le'u bcwa lnga pa'o// // de nas rtsa ba'i sngags kyi ni/ /btu ba bshad bya mnyan par gyis/ /chos 'byung gi ni dbus su ni/ /de nas 'khor lo 'di bri'o/ /dbus su dum bu lnga'i

bdag nyid/ /de yi phyi rol bcu gnyis bri/ /zlum po sbyin bya slar yang dar/ /sgo dang gru ni bzhi pa'o/ /rtsibs brgyad pa dang zur bzhi pa'i/ /le'u tsher dbyangs dang sde tshan no/ /der gnas mgon po btu bar bya/ /'dod pa kun dang

bde 'bab pa'o/ /sde tshan lnga sogs yi ge ni/ /dbus su'o de nas dbyangs bcu gnyis/ /ma ning sgo ni bzhi ru ste/ /gru gnyis bar de gnyis gnyis can/ /khyab bdag sngags pas me la ni/ /sogs par shes par bya

ba'o/ /ka dbus tsa shar Ta lho ta nub tu/ /ba byang rim pa ji ltas so/ /nub kyi mtha' ma gzung bar bya/ /byang gi mtha' ma de bzhin no/ /me yi gnyis pa'i yi ge ni/ /gzung bya dbang ldan chu'i sa bon/ /shar gyi gsum pa'i yi ge

dang / /lho yi gsum pa'i de bzhin no/ /dbus ma'i dang po gzung bar bya/ /byang gi mtha' ma'i sa bon no/ /dbang ldan gnyis pa'i gzung bya ste/ /de ni de ltar thog ma star/ /bden bral me yi sa bon dang / /dbang ldan gyi ni chu de

bzhin/ /srin po'i ra~M yig blang bar bya/ /me yi gnyis pa'i yi ge'o/ /'dre yi me yi sa bon gzung / /me yi rlung ni de bzhin no/ /sngags kyi tshig ni dang po ste/ /'di yi dbyangs ni brjod par bya/ /tsheg drag dang ni yongs ldan pa/ /

gnyis pa'i yi ge la spras pa'o/ /dum bu bzhi pas mnan pa ste/ /gsum par me yi spras pa'o/ /yi ge lnga par ra yig gis/ /'og gi char ni brgyan pa'o/ /dum bu gnyis pas brgyan pa ste/ /mkhas pas drug pa'i yi ge la'o/ /

dgu par de nyid kyis mnan pa'o/ /bcu pa la yang bzhi pas so/ /bcu gnyis de nyid kyis mnan pa'o/ /bcu gsum pa yang de nyid kyis/ /bcu bzhi pa la chu yis ni/ /'og gi cha ru rnam brtag bya/ /dum bu gnyis pas mnan pa ni/ /

yi ge bcwa lnga pa mchog la'o/ /de ltar sngags pa ches shes nas/ /rkang pa kun la byed pa'o/ /nub kyi thog ma bzung bar bya/ /byang phyogs kyi ni bzhi pa'o/ /dbang ldan gyi ni chu bzung bya/ /slar yang lho yi tha ma'o/ /dbus ma'i thog ma'i sa

bon dang / /byang gi mtha' ma de bzhin no/ /dbus ma'i thog ma gzung bar bya/ /byang gi mtha' ma'i sa bon dang / /dbang ldan gyi ni chu gzung bya/ /lho yi tha ma'i sa bon dang / /me yi rlung gi yi ge ste/ /gnyis pa yi ni rkang par bshad/ /

dum bu gsum pas mnan pa ste/ /thog ma me yis 'og gsal byas/ /dum bu lnga pas gnyis pa yi/ /yi ge yi ni 'og tu brgyan/ /byang phyogs kyi ni thog ma yis/ /drug pa'i 'og tu gsal byas pa'o/ /yi ge brgyad pa'ang de

dang mtshungs/ /dum bu gnyis pas phye ba'o/ /bcu pa de nyid kyis mnan pa'o/ /don med thams cad rnam 'joms byed/ /chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang / /dngos grub rnyog pa med kun no/ /nub kyi gsum pa gzung bar bya/ /

'dre'i gnyis pa'i sa bon dang / /nub kyi thog ma'i sa bon dang / /slar yang lho yi dang po dang / /byang phyogs kyi ni bzhi pa dang / /'dre gnyis pa yi yi ge dang / /lho yi tha ma gzung bar bya/ /byang phyogs kyi ni bzhi pa dang / /'dre yi

me yi ge gzung / /dbang ldan gyi ni chu de bzhin/ /me yi rlung gi sa bon ste/ /sngags kyi rkang pa gsum pa'i/ /mkhas pas thog ma'i yi ge la/ /dum bu bcu gcig pa yis mnan/ /dum bu dgu pa yis kyang ni/ /gnyis pa'i yi

ge'i mgor brgyan cing / /lho yi thog ma nyid la ni/ /me yis 'og tu brgyan pa'o/ /dbus ma gsum par sbyin bya ba/ /'og gi cha ru brtag par bya'o/ /dum bu bzhi pas mnan pa ni/ /mkhas pas yi ge lnga pa la'o/ /dum bu brgyad

pa sbyin bya ba/ /yi ge yi ni brgyad pa la'o/ /bcu pa gnyis pas mnan pa ste/ /sdang ba rnams kyi tshar gcod mchog /lha dang lha min mi rnams kyi/ /gnas dang gnas min rnams tshar bcod/ /me yi gnyis pa'i sa bon dang / /

nub kyi thog ma'i yi ge dang / /rlung gi gnyis pa'i sa bon dang / /dbang ldan gyi ni gzhan de bzhin/ /rlung gi gnyis pa'i yi ge dang / /nub kyi tha ma'i yi ge dang / /slar yang nub kyi thog ma dang / /me yi rlung ni blang bar bya/ /rkang

pa bzhi pa zhes bshad de/ /dngos po thams cad rab ston pa'o/ /yi ge lnga pa'i 'og gi char/ /ra yi yi ge brtag par bya/ /drug par bdun pa'i dum bu dang / /slar yang bdun par me yis ni/ /'og tu brgyan par gnyis pa sbyin/ /

kun mkhyen go 'phang mi zad pa'o/ /dbang ldan gyi ni chu gzung bya/ /slar yang d+yu yig rang byung ngo / /nub kyi thog ma'i sa bon dang / /shar phyogs kyi yang gsum pa dang / /dbang ldan gyi ni gzhan gzung bya/ /slar

yang me yi rlung dang ni/ /rkang pa lnga pa drug po ste/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams sad byed pa'o/ /dbus ma'i thog ma'i sa bon dang / /yang ni yi ge de nyid dang / /rlung gi dbang chen gzung bar bya/ /slar yang byang gi tha ma dang / /rlung gi

sa yi sa bon dang / /byang phyogs kyi ni bzhi pa dang / /srin po'i me yi sa bon dang / /slar yang lho yi tha ma dang / /dbus ma'i gsum pa gzung bar bya/ /me yi rlung ni de bzhin no/ /lnga pa sogs la dbyangs sbyin bya/ /'byin cing sdud par

byed pa'o/ /thog ma'i yi ge kun 'gro la/ /dum bu gsum pas mnan par bya/ /sa bon bzhi pa'ang de nyid kyis/ /mnan pa mdzes pa yi ni mchog /lnga par dum bu gnyis pas mnan/ /chu yi stan du byas par 'dod/ /rkang pa lnga pa

de la ni/ /dgos pa thams cad sbyar ba yin/ /dang po'i yi ge bcu gcig pas/ /mnan par gyur pas mdzes pa yin/ /dum bu gnyis pas mnan pa ni/ /yi ge gnyis par brjod par bya/ /bzhi pa lnga pa'i yi ge dag /de nyid
