rA sbyin bya/ /bdun par gri yi yi ge ste/ /brgyad par ga yi yi ge'o/ /dgu par m+b+ha yi yig sbyin bya/ /bcu par h+na yig slar dgod do/ /gri yig bcu gcig pa ru ste/ /hU~M yig bcu gnyis dgod par bya/ /
bcu gsum pa ru gri yig ste/ /bcu bzhi pa la dza yig go/ /bcwa lnga pa la b+ha yig ste/ /pa ya gnyis dgod bcu drug par/ /bcu bdun pa la su yig ste/ /pha yig bcwa brgyad par dgod bya/ /gcig nyung nyi

shur hU~M sbyin no/ /nyi shu pa la Ta'i yi ge/ /nyi shu gcig par yi ge hU~M/ /nyi shu gnyis par hU~M 'gyur ro/ /nyi shu gsum par gri yig ste/ /hU~M yig nyi shu bzhi par ro/ /nyi shu drug par Ta yig sbyin/ /nyi shu
bdun par pha'i yi ge/ /hU~M yig nyi shu brgyad par te/ /hoHyig nyi shu rtsa dgu par/ /sum bcu pa la h+nA yig sbyin/ /sum bcu gcig par h+na dgod bya/ /hU~M yig sum bcu gnyis par sbyin/ /sum bcu gsum
'dir m+b+ha yig go/ /sum bcu bzhi par hU~M yig ste/ /de nyid sum bcu lnga par ro/ /sum bcu drug par yi yig sbyin/ /h+na yig sum bcu bdun par te/ /sum bcu brgyad par pa ya gnyis/ /gcig dman

bzhi bcu pa la hU~M/ /bzhi bcu pa la hU~M sbyin bya/ /bzhi bcu gcig par ni b+ha yi ge'o/ /hU~M yig bzhi bcu gnyis par sbyin/ /bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa la oM/ /ya na'i yig gnyis sbyin bya ba/ /dum bu bzhi bcu bzhi

par ro/ /bzhi bcu lnga par A na ste/ /bzhi bcu drug par phaT de bzhin/ /bzhi bcu bdun pa la ni oM/ /bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa la phaT/ /bzhi bcu dgu par su sbyin bya/ /thams cad ji lta'i rim pas so/ /dum bu
dbus mar bsgrub bya'i ming / /ka ra ka ra sogs nang bcug /thams cad bsdus nas shes byas nas/ /lkugs par bcing bar bya ba ni/ /byi ba steng du 'gro ba'i sgor/ /'khrul 'khor glang rmig bcas par sba/ /
a ba d+hU tIr yid byas nas/ /de yi dbus su rab tu gzhug /phyogs thams cad du srin po ni/ /byas nas 'khrul 'khor bsgrub pa'o/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /

rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /'di ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las 'khor lo'i go cha ma'i lkugs par bya ba'i rab tu
sbyor ba'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid dang 'khor lo bsgom pa dang dpa' bo dang gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor srin po'i rnam pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba ste le'u bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// //

de nas shin du dpa' mo'i las/ /zhi bar byed pa gsal bshad bya/ /rab sbyor de rnams kyis bya ste/ /na ga rar ni yang dag bzhugs/ /btang snyoms byang chub yan lag ste/ /lha yi 'khor lo rdzu 'phrul cher/ /dbral
ba'i gnas su lha mo ni/ /skye 'gro bdag mo bsgom par bya/ /dbang gnyis yang dag 'dus pa las/ /rtsa chen po ni bde bas gang / /bcu gnyis mtha' ru bskyod pa las/ /'dir ni sa bon g.yo ba med/ /dbang po
la sogs thams cad ni/ /'dod chags bral ba nyid thob 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor chen po mnyam pa'i bde/ /slar yang bde ba'i rang bzhin med/ /'dod chags zhe sdang mun dri ma/ /rnam bral pha rol son
pa che/ /'thob bo dga' ba de yis ni/ /skyes bu dang ni gnyis med rtse/ /theg pa gsum las gzhan med de/ /de rnams kyis ni blta dus kun/ /'gro dang nyal dang za ba ni/ /rnal 'byor bsgrub pas
spangs pa yin/ /dga' rol rtsed mo rtse ba dang / /glu len pa yis gos pa med/ /de phyir btang snyoms byang yan lag /gnas skabs kun rjes spangs pas so/ /de ltar zhi don du byas pas/ /don yod
mthong bas 'grub par 'gyur/ /gang dang gang gi sems can ni/ /nad pa la sogs la bltas pas/ /de dang de yi sems can gyi/ /zhi ba'i las can du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas

nyid kyang myur du na/ /phra mo'i las ni smos ci dgos/ /rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs dbus su/ /shin du dpa' mo bsgom par bya/ /lha mo rtag tu mdog dkar mo/ /lhag ma sngon ma lta bu mchog /gsang sngags phreng ba'i

rab sbyor bas/ /shes rab dang ni thabs byung ba'o/ /gtor ma sbyin sreg cho ga yis/ /blo ldan zhi rdzas rnams kyis te/ /zho mar 'o ma zas rnams kyi/ /'dir ni dgang blugs dbul bar bya/ /ga bur tsan dan la sogs

pas/ /'khrul 'khor sngon gyi bri bar bya/ /oM pa mu ra N+DA kri ba ta lI ya la n+t+ra ga ma na n+t+ra sha nA rI sha rA nA ya ya hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT phaT swA swA hA hA oM su bI rA ye hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ zhes bya sngags yig sa bon te/ /skye ba

dang ni gnas pa'i rgyu/ /ye shes sa bon thams cad rnams/ /sngags pas dpral ba sogs par ro/ /rnal 'byor pha rnams rtse dus las/ /bskyed par 'gyur zhing 'gag par 'gyur/ /dum bu bzhi bcu rtsa dgu ru/ /sngags

kyi phreng ba 'di dgod bya/ /dum dbus phyi rol brgyad rnams su/ /phyogs mtshams ji lta'i rim pa yis/ /rnam par snang mdzad sa bon bzhi/ /hU~M gi yi ge bzhi rnams so/ /de phyi dum bu bcu drug tu/ /phyogs mtshams

rim pa ji bzhin pas/ /hU~M yig brgyad ni dgod bya zhing / /de nas gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na'i tshig /sum+b+ha ni su'o dum lhag ma/ /de yi phyi rol nyi shu bzhir/ /m+b+ha gr-i h+nA pa ya gr-i h+nA pa ya/ /'dir ni bri bar bya ba ste/ /A na ya A na la

hoHba'i tshig /b+ha ka bA na bid+yA rA dza dang / /phaT yig de nas bri bar bya/ /dbus ma'i dum bur bsgrub bya ni/ /gnod mdzes sngags kyi nang bcug pa'o/ /lha yi gzugs kyi khar bri bya/ /de ltar lha'i 'khrul 'khor ni/ /

ling ga'i gnas su gzhag par bya/ /kun tu spyod kun shes par bya/ /gzhan gyi dus su mi 'grub bo/ /thig le sgra yi dus su ni/ /rlung gi dbyibs ni brtan pa yis/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyi/ /zhi ba mya ngan

'das 'gro na/ /slar yang sa gzhi'i 'jig rten pa'i/ /zhi ba'i dgos byed smos ci dgos/ /de byed rnal 'byor dbang phyug ni/ /lha dang lha min rnams kyis mchod/ /de yang sangs rgyas nyid 'thob na/ /de zhabs 'bring
byed smos ci dgos/ /'jig rten sangs rgyas sogs chen pos/ /de ni phyag 'os mchod 'os so/ /bsam gtan sngags kyi bzlas pa dang / /sbyin sreg ya ga sogs mchog tu/ /zhi dang byang chub kyi ni sems/ /

'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /rtsa ba'i sngags ni bzlas pa yis/ /las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /rkang pa bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pas/ /kun mkhyen skye ba li la'o/ /dpal he ru ka gnyis med pa'i/ /

rdo rje phag mo mthong bar 'gyur/ /de yis mchog ni ster byed de/ /rang gi 'khor los sgyur thim pa'o/ /de rnams phyag rgya'i grub byed par/ /mchog tu rmad du byung bar 'gro/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang gnas pa/ /gnas

dang gnas rnams su 'thob bo/ /he ru ka sngags 'khrul 'khor dang / /las thams cad ni ma shes na/ /de ni don med yongs ngal te/ /'gro ba drug tu 'khyam 'gyur zhing / /skye ba bye ba brgya phrag tu/ /'jig rten 'gro kun

grol ba min/ /dpal he ru ka'i go 'phang gnas/ /sngags kyi nus pas grol ba'o/ /brtse ba chen pos phag mo sogs/ /rnal 'byor ma bsnyen shes par bya/ /gnyis sbyor bde ba'i rnam pa ni/ /bud med skyes pa ma ning
min/ /dngos po tsam du sems can la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bstan/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /

bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /'di ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las shin du dpa' mo'i zhi ba'i las kyi rab tu sbyor ba'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid kyi 'khrul 'khor
'khor lo bsgom pa dang gnod mdzes kyi sngags kyi las kyi tshogs shes bya ba ste le'u bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas lha mos mchod byas nas/ /'di skad kyi ni tshig dris so/ /thams cad bsrung

ba'i las chen po/ /khyab bdag bdag gis ma 'tshal lo/ /phag mo lha rdzas pad can gyi/ /lha mo nyon cig rab bshad bya/ /stobs chen ma yis rab sbyor bas/ /sin d+hu yi ni gnas bsgrubs te/ /yang dag lta ba'i

rang bzhin du/ /mchog gi ma mo shes par bya/ /de ltar de nyid nges par byed/ /mchog gi bsgom par 'jug par bya/ /ma mo'i 'khor lo'i grong nyams dgar/ /dpa' bo'i gtso mo bsgom par bya/ /lhan skyes byang chub

rigs pa yis/ /de'i bdag nyid du gang mtshon bya/ /sngon du hA steng bgrod pa bzhin/ /drag shul sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid do/ /rnal 'byor thams cad yongs dmigs nas/ /phung po'i rtsa ba las gzhon can/ /spyi bo

yi ni thod par bzung / /o D+yan bu gar son pa ste/ /lte ba yi ni gnas thob nas/ /byang chub sa bon rnams kyis 'dzin/ /mtshan ba yis ni gzung bar ni/ /khams thams cad kyis gang bar byas/ /la la nA yi lam son

nas/ /sngon gyi gnas su yang dag rig /me yis bzhu ba'i khams kyis ni/ /rtsa sbubs thams cad dgang bar bya/ /'jig rten khams ni thams cad du/ /skad cig la ni lta zhing mthong / /zla ba 'gro ba'i dbus su ni/ /sgor

'phyang ba ni blta bar bya/ /sbyor mchog shes byas bsgrub byas la/ /de yi rang bzhin can bsam bya/ /mdzod spur son pa'i bu ga ru/ /rlung gi lce ni gzhug par bya/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyi bsgom rim pas/ /yang dag lta bar

shes par bya/ /sum bcu rtsa bdun bdag nyid mchog /shes rab rnal 'byor ma bsgom bya/ /sngags kyi yi ge las byung ba/ /shes rab thabs bdag nyid mchog go/ /oM du ma Sha hA TA ra nA~M k+Sha bi ka dA rA la ya ne hU~M hU~M hU~M

hU~M pha pha Ta Ta pha pha Ta Ta swA swA hA hA dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHoM ma hA ba le hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ zhes bya'i sngags las lha mo che/ /ye shes sku ni yang dag byung / /gru bzhi zlum po dang bcas pa'i/ /byang chub 'khrul 'khor rtag

bri ste/ /dum bu bzhi bcu rtsa dgu la/ /gsang sngags bzhi po yang dag par/ /dum bu re rer bri bar bya/ /dum bu lnga ru sgrub por bya/ /g+ha g+ha la sogs nang bcu pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i phyag tu ni/ /'gi wang 'am

ni yang na ni/ /'gi wang chen pos bri bya ba/ /gro gar 'khrul 'khor thams cad ni/ /las kyi khyad par gyis bri ste/ /g.yul ngo chen po'i ras la ni/ /las thams cad pa bya ba yin/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam
sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /'di ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi

rgyal po chen po las stobs chen ma'i sbyor bas bsrung ba chen po phur bu'i sngags kyi las byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul 'khor bsgom pa'i man ngag gi cho ga'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba ste le'u bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// //
de nas las mchog thams cad ni/ /sems can kun la 'byung bshad bya/ /'khor los sgyur ma'i rab sbyor bar/ /ma ru'i gnas su bsgrub par bya/ /yang dag rtog pa byang chub kyi/ /phyogs su gnas bzhin par
bya'o/ /rgyas pa bsgrub bya phyi nas ni/ /mkhas pas las ni bya ba yin/ /gtum mo lte bar sbar ba yis/ /tshigs thams cad ni sreg pa ste/ /mig la sogs pa bsregs nas ni/ /bsregs pas rkan
las thig le 'dzag /'gro bo de ni mtshams kun du/ /pad snal skud pa'i dra ba'o/ /'bigs shing 'gro bas ro myang ste/ /stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis la'o/ /'thom dang rmugs pa'i ye
shes ni/ /'gro ba med kyang 'ong bar 'gyur/ /phyag rgya 'di yi rnal 'byor pa/ /lo yi sbyor bas de 'grub 'gyur/ /de dang 'di yis yang dag ldan/ /las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /
dga' ba 'jig rten thams cad du/ /zhes bya 'gro 'gyur de'i bdag nyid/ /rnam par rtog pa de mkhyen te/ /gom pa gcig ni 'gro mi 'gyur/ /tshigs kun ngo bor gyur nas ni/ /bdag gi gdan
ni de mthong 'gyur/ /'chi bas mi 'jigs 'di yi phyir/ /gzhan gyi gdan du yang dag gnas/ /gang gang las la bltas rnams kyis/ /de de thams cad du byed do/ /'chi ba'i dus las shes byas pa/ /
de ni rnal 'byor gdan du 'dod/ /kun mkhyen thams cad las can ni/ /gang phyir gsang ba'i gdan mchog yin/ /yang dag rtog pa'i sbyor bdag nyid/ /byang chub phyogs su 'gro bar 'gyur/ /

ba lang rta dang mi dang khyi/ /glang po ma he bong bu dang / /rnga mo byi chung byi la dang / /phag pa dang ni spre'u rnams kyi/ /sha ni skyur po la btags pa/ /dngos grub 'dod pas sbyin sreg bya/ /rang bzhin dngos
grub thob 'gyur na/ /dngos grub brgyad po slar cis min/ /ral gri mig sman rkang byug dang / /ri lu dngul chu mchil lham dang / /bcud len dang ni sa 'og dang / /dgug pa yang ni 'grub pa'o/ /ro langs

bslang ba'i dngos grub ni/ /khyi nag mo yi 'o ma dang / /ma Sha nag po'i thug pa yis/ /yi dgas bcu bzhi'i mtshan mo 'am/ /sngags pas tshes brgyad la ro yi/ /kha ru sbyin sreg bya de bzhin/ /dur khrod kyi ni

yungs kar mar/ /mar khu 'bad pas gzung nas ni/ /de kyang dpa' bo byug bya ste/ /de tshe'i nub mor rnam par brjod/ /yi dgas chen po de langs nas/ /dbang chen mthil la phye mar byed/ /des rtag 'jigs par mi bya ste/ /

rang rkyen sbyor bas bskyed pa yin/ /til lam til mar gzhan yang ni/ /gang rung ci rung gzung byas nas/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyis sems can rgyur/ /byin pas thams cad tu 'gro'o/ /sgrol ma tsun dA 'od zer can/ /khro

gnyer ri khrod lo ma dang / /gshin mthar bcas sogs khro bo che/ /bsgom dang sngags kyi bzlas pa ni/ /'bum phrag gcig gis sdig 'joms te/ /dbye bas 'jal ba 'thob par byed/ /dngos grub ci 'dra ba 'dod pa/ /stsal nas

rgyun tu zhugs pa yin/ /yang na snyan dngags rig pa ste/ /lung gi don ni 'chad pa'i'o/ /kun shes gang thams cad kyi skad/ /ma mthong ba rnams shes par 'gyur/ /tshar gcad rjes gzung thams cad ni/ /chos bya chos can
thams cad byed/ /sgrol sogs rnal 'byor ma mchog rnams/ /rang bdag gzugs gzhan shes bya nyid/ /'di rnams kun bsdus gzugs nyid pas/ /'khor lo sgyur ma bsgom par gyis/ /sna tshogs pa yi gzugs 'dzin

te/ /de rnams kyis ni 'khor sgyur ma'o/ /oM tA re tud tA re tu re swA hA/ oM tsun dai swA hA/ oM ma ri ts+yai swA hA/ oM b+h+ri ku TI swA hA/ oM par+N+Na sha ba rI swA hA/ de ltar kun gyi 'khrul 'khor kyang / /sngags kyi yi ge rnams kyis bya/ /

bskyed pa dang ni gnas pa'i rgyur/ /ji lta'i rigs pas bsgrub par bya/ /'od zer phreng bas kun 'khrigs pa/ /snying ga'i 'khor lor gzung bar bya/ /'di yis 'chi ba'i 'jigs 'joms te/ /rgas dang 'chi ba med 'thob byed/ /

'khor lo sgyur ma'i lha mo ni/ /shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid mchog /mdog dang dbyibs ni rang gi ste/ /sngags yig rnams las yang dag byung / /oM kro d+ha d+harmo s+phA dA rA ya s+phA ka ra rA NA yA ya hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M pha pha Ta Ta pha pha Ta Ta swA swA hA hA/

oM tsakra bar+t+ti nI ye hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ de ltar sngags las yang dag byung / /mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo sgyur/ /lha min 'khrul 'khor bri bya ste/ /gcig dman lnga bcu'i dum bu la/ /ji ltar lha rnams kyi ni sngags/ /

bsgrub bya'i ming nang bcug pa yi/ /phag mo yi ni snying po yang / /dum bu so so la bri'o/ /phyi rol du ni sngags kun gyis/ /'dir ni rtag tu bskor bar bya/ /g.yul ngo ya ni ras la ni/ /rdzas kun gyis ni yongs bris nas/ /

'khrul 'khor las ni thams cad pa/ /lha ma yin gyi khar sbyin bya/ /lo yi nyin zhag sbyor ba can/ /thun mtshams so sor bsgom par bya/ /gshin dgra'i 'khrul 'khor bri bya ste/ /dum bu bcu bdun pa la ni/ /phyi rol bcu

drug sbyin bya ba/ /hrIH Sh+T+rI sngags 'di dgod par bya/ /ya ma me da k+She rA dza sa do/ /ru Na yo ni rA yats+tsha ni/ /de ltar sngags chen bris nas ni/ /las thams cad ni bsgrub par bya/ /yi ge re re'i gtso bo yis/ /las rnams kyang

ni bcu bdun no/ /bsgrub bya'i ming ni nang bcug nas/ /gshin rje'i snying po'i sngags rnams ni/ /lugs bzlog yi ge phyi rol du/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis bri bar bya/ /'jigs dang rgyal po'i rigs dang ni/ /dgra
thams cad ni rnam par 'joms/ /gzhan yang rdza rnga bcing ba yi/ /khyab bdag rang gi sngags btu pa/ /sa gzhi cha mnyam nyams dga' bar/ /tsan dan la sogs byugs pa ru/ /bsgrub pa po yis yang bya
ste/ /ri mo dgu pa legs zlum por/ /gcig dman lnga bcu'i dum bu la/ /gcig gnyis gsum dang bzhi yi khar/ /lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa yis/ /sngags kyi yi ge rnams gzhag bya/ /gnod mdzes
rgyal po yi ni sngags/ /sngags pas de nas yang dag btu/ /de ni tshigs kun de shes bya/ /rgyud gzhan du ni ma bshad do/ /de yi yi ge rtsa rnams su/ /re re yi ni tshigs mtshams ni/ /gcig dman lnga bcu
yi ni mtshams/ /mkha' dus me yi tshogs can no/ /gang gang chos su yongs bshad pa/ /mnyam par gzhag pas de de'i tshigs/ /gang du yi ge gcig blangs nas/ /der ni yi ge thams cad de/ /rtsis kyi rim
rnams kyis btu bar/ /bde mchog 'bum par gsungs pa yin/ /phyi dang nang bdag nyid 'khrul 'khor/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyis kun sgrub pa'o/ /gsang sngags bde bas bsgrub par bya/ /khyad par du yang 'khrul
'khor ro/ /de yis dngos grub thob 'gyur bar/ /'dir ni som nyid srid ma yin/ /rten dang brten pa'i gzugs can te/ /ji lta'i rim par ming dang gnas/ /gnas ni rten gyi gzugs su ste/ /rten pa'i
ming ni rnal 'byor ma/ /'di dag mnyam par snyoms 'jug pa/ /las thams cad par mngon par brjod/ /de yis rnal 'byor ma rgyud ni/ /rten pa thabs kyi spyod yul lo/ /gang phyir sa gzhi rten yin pas/ /
de'i phyir thabs ni rnal 'byor ma/ /yang na thams cad thabs yin la/ /yang na thams cad shes rab bo/ /shes rab thabs bral de rnams kyis/ /sangs rgyas sku ni mya ngan 'das/ /theg pa mchog 'di
shes rab dang / /bral bas thams cad srid par 'gro/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das gang chos/ /de rnams spangs pas chos med do/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i
mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /'di ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las 'khor los sgyur ma'i rab tu sbyor
ba la sogs pa las sna tshogs bsgrub pa'i 'khrul 'khor 'khor lo bsgom pa'i lam dang / rdza rnga'i sngags mdor bstan pa'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba ste le'u bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //
de nas gzhan pa mchog gtso bo/ /'khor lo sgyur sogs rgyas pa ni/ /phan pa thams cad ster ba'i las/ /mdor bsdus pa yis bshad par bya/ /brtson chen ma yi rab sbyor bas/ /ku lu tar ni yongs su

bzhugs/ /byang chub phyogs ni yang dag ngag /'khrul 'khor mi yi gzugs can no/ /'phyang ba la ni yongs brten nas/ /bsam med byang chub 'thob par byed/ /de ni las kun gtso bo ste/ /rang byung phyag rgya chen

po'o/ /khams thams cad las yang dag byung / /de ni 'phyang bar mngon par brjod/ /dpa' bo nyi shu bzhi rnams la/ /re re la ni rnam pa brgyad/ /khams thams cad la'ang shes bya ba/ /mig dang bu ga zla ba'o/ /
dpa' bo thams cad so so yi/ /re re'i ming du'ang brjod par 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor sum bcu rtsa bdun du/ /dpa' bo re re bsgom par bya/ /khams brgyad po ni thams cad du/ /rnam pa gsum du'ang
mtshon par bya/ /thod pa'i dum bu la sogs kyi/ /rab sbyor ming mdor bstan pa ste/ /phag mo sogs su yongs gnas pa'i/ /brtson chen ming nang shes par bya/ /dal gyis khams la bsnun pa yis/ /
gnyid log pa las sad par bya/ /dpa' bo'i ral gri gang 'dra bas/ /stobs po che la 'bigs par 'gyur/ /de 'dra'i 'phyang ba'i ral gri ni/ /khams thams cad la 'bigs par 'gyur/ /
hA yi mdor bstan shes byas nas/ /tshigs mtshams kun du gnas par gyis/ /de las bskyed pa'i dpa' bo rnams/ /bye ba 'bum tsho stong phrag go/ /byang chub sa bon rang bzhin can/ /rnal
'byor ma ni de'i rigs grags/ /khams thams cad du rgyas 'debs pa/ /nges 'byung dus su yang dag byung / /'phyang bzhin par ni de shes bya/ /rang gzhan yang dag rig pa spangs/ /rigs ni
khams rnams thams cad de/ /rnal 'byor ma ni rigs can yin/ /gnyis po yang dag sbyor ba ru/ /'phyang ba lto bar rab zhugs bya/ /khams thams cad kyi ro'i bar du/ /de ni chad pa nyid du 'gyur/ /
bcud kyis len ni bsgrubs pa yis/ /skye bo kun la rgyas pa yin/ /de rnams kun tu gnas pa med/ /mkha' spyod nyid du nye bar 'gro/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams ni/ /dbus su zag pa med
par bzhugs/ /de ltar yon tan gter thams cad/ /yang dag ngag gi go 'phang gnas/ /brjod min pa yi sngags chen po/ /bsnam zhing skye bo kun la sgrogs/ /gzhom du med par de shes bya/ /
sa ni rdo rje 'dzin ma rang / /khams rnams kyi dngos ma lus pa/ /ming gis dpa' bor yang dag gnas/ /thod pa'i dum bu yi ni khams/ /rang nyid so sor bshad par bya/ /sen mo dang ni so 'bab pa/ /
re re'i brgyad du phye ba can/ /sa la sogs pa'i khams bzhi dang / /de bzhin dngos po bzhi dag go/ /de ltar gnas ni gsum gsum du/ /dpa' bo thams cad sbyar bar bya/ /skra dang ba spu 'bab
pa dang / /lpags pa dang ni dri ma 'bab/ /sha dang sha red 'bab pa dang / /chu rgyus dang ni rtsa 'bab dang / /rus pa dang ni lpags 'bab dang / /mkhal ma dang ni stobs 'bab dang / /snying dang
dra ba 'bab pa dang / /mig dang chu ser 'bab pa dang / /mkhris pa dang ni rlung 'bab dang / /glo ba dang ni rtsa 'bab dang / /der 'bab pa yi dngos po ni/ /gnye ma dang ni mchin pa 'bab/ /lto ba

dang ni dbugs 'bab dang / /bshang dang gci ba 'bab pa dang / /mtshams kyi mtha' dang dri ma 'bab/ /rgyu shun dang ni mchil ma 'bab/ /rnag dang chu ser 'bab pa dang / /khrag dang me tog 'bab pa dang / /
rdul dang rlangs pa 'bab pa dang / /tshil dang lto tshil 'bab pa dang / /mchi ma dang ni khu ba 'bab/ /lud pa dang ni rims med 'bab/ /snabs dang rkang mar 'bab pa ste/ /dpa' rnams
khams kyi mtshan nyid do/ /de ltar dum bu dum bu nyid/ /khams ni gzhan du 'jug par 'gyur/ /re re yi yang rang bzhin kyang / /zad pa'i rlung gis thod pa can/ /bde ba bun gyi nang thim par/ /
keng rus chen po 'gro ba yin/ /sems dang bsam pa de yi phyir/ /keng rus kun tu stong pa nyid/ /mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa yis/ /thams cad gnyis med lhan skyes gsal/ /lha yi dgra ni
chen po'i gzugs/ /rnam shes lha dang lha can no/ /'od dpag med ni tshig med pa/ /rdo rje'i 'od zer rang bzhin can/ /rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi ni sku/ /rdo rje'i sku ni der shes bya/ /myu gu can ni
dngos po kun/ /mthong ba tsam gyis dga' byed pa'o/ /rnam shes bems por 'ching bar ni/ /rdo rje ral pa can 'gro'o/ /sa gsum zas kyi mchog tu ni/ /dpa' bo chen po'i bgrod pas
byas/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang bcas sdod par/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad 'gro ba'o/ /shin du bzang po thob med pa/ /'jig rten 'jig rten pa spangs pa'o/ /skye 'gro kun du rang byung ba/ /rdo rje bzang po de
grags pa'o/ /'jigs byed chen po'i go 'phang gis/ /las kyi bag chags thal bas bsgos/ /mig mi bzang gis ma bltas kyang / /thams cad mtshan nyid mthong bar 'gyur/ /
stobs po che ni sngags thams cad/ /rnam pa gsum gyi bdag nyid do/ /rin chen rdo rje smra bcad che/ /zag med khams ni thams cad du'o/ /rta mgrin sa gzhi chen po la/ /srog son kun la
sbyar bar bya/ /srog kun dgang bar bya ba ste/ /de yis nam mkha'i snying por bshad/ /dpal he ru ka rtag tu stong / /sku bzhi yi ni rang bzhin can/ /pad ma gar dbang phyug dang gzugs/ /gzugs med
rnal 'byor du 'gro bo/ /bde ba chen pos snang byed pas/ /rnam snang mdzad du mngon par brjod/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bsgyings byas pa/ /mchog tu bde bar brjod pa yin/ /dpa' bo thams cad
mnyam sbyor ba/ /khams thams cad kyi nang du'o/ /skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu/ /ro myang mtshan nyid shes par bya/ /khams 'di rnams ni thams cad kyi/ /zad nyid mchog tu ngo mtshar che/ /
rang bzhin khams kyi grangs rnams ni/ /dus tshod dang ni klu dang mda'/ /de rnams rnal 'byor mar yongs grags/ /brgyud pa'i rim pa las 'ongs pa'o/ /khams kyang rnam par dpyad bzhin pas/ /
thams cad bdag nyid kyis 'byung min/ /rnam shes ma yin ye shes min/ /thams cad stong pa'o yod pa min/ /gser 'gyur rtsi ni ma rig pas/ /mchog tu bde ba rig pa min/ /rang gis
dgos ba byed pa ni/ /spar sha'i rigs lha'i mtshan nyid do/ /brtson 'grus chen por mngon brjod pa'i/ /de phyir rnal 'byor ma bsgom bya/ /khams thams cad du rgyas 'debs pa/ /rnal 'byor
gdan du yang dag byung / /gang zhig kun nas kun du ni/ /de ni de bzhin gshegs par mthong / /mkha' 'gro dang ni sdom rgyud dang / /nges par brjod pa phyi ma dang / /kun spyod 'byung ba'i rgyud
rnams su/ /dngos po las ni rab tu bstan/ /de yis rgyud ni chen po 'di/ /thub pa skyes bu mchog gis gsungs/ /dum bu dum bur yongs gnas pa'i/ /las chen po ni der drang bya/ /phra
mo'i bya ba mngon brjod pa/ /khams rnams kyi ni gnas la'o/ /ji lta'i rim pas khams blang ste/ /yongs bsdus spyod yul bar du'o/ /tshigs bcad thog ma sogs pas kyang / /
ji srid rdzogs pa'i spyod yul du/ /rgyud 'di rnal 'byor gtso bo ste/ /las rnams rgya che ba min no/ /yang na rnal 'byor thams cad ni/ /las kyi tshogs su 'dod par bya/ /bdag gi de nyid rtag tu las/ /
byas pa'am gal te ma byas pa'o/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyi sbyor mtshan nyid/ /rang bzhin las su yang dag bshad/ /de ltar rgyud rnams thams cad du/ /sngags pas mchog tu shes par bya/ /
yang na gang dang 'dra'i rnal 'byor/ /de dang 'dra bar khams gnas te/ /bcud kyis len gyi rdzas rnams ni/ /sman chen nyi shu rtsa bzhi por/ /sbyar byas dpa' bo nyid rnams kyis/ /grol bar bgrod
pa gsungs pa yin/ /gsang ba mchog tu dgyes pa na/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /bcu drug de rnams rdzas chen te/ /brgyad gnyis tshigs bcad phyed kyis so/ /sgra dang gzugs
su yang dag byung / /'jig rten gsum du rnyed pa dka'/ /bsrub dang bsrub pa'i kun sbyor ba'i/ /dbus ma bla na med pa'i gzugs/ /ri lu rtag tu mchod bya ste/ /pho nya lhan cig skyes bdag nyid/ /
yid ni nang du son pa yis/ /rang khu'i sangs rgyas thig le can/ /sbrang rtsi khrag dang ga bur bcas/ /tshogs kyi dbus su rab tu zhugs/ /ming med mthe bo dag gis khar/ /zla ba'i btung ba myang bar
gyis/ /bdud rtsi lngar gyur 'di rnams kyis/ /mchod pa bzhi ni de bzhin bya/ /lha dang mi rnams bde ba pas/ /bcu drug cha shes rin che'o/ /de ltar tshigs bcad 'di kun gyis/ /khams lnga
rab tu bshad par 'gyur/ /ra yi yi ges khrag gi khams/ /hA yig ri skyes su 'dod de/ /s+ye yig dri yi lo ma ste/ /pa yig lpags pa ru ni 'dod/ /ra yig b+han d+ha kar rab bshad/ /me yig me tog

tu dran bya/ /ra yig rA bi Na de bzhin/ /slar yang me'i yi ge sha /sa yig kun tu ru las skyes/ /wa yi yi ge rtsar 'dod do/ /t+ma yi yi ge sbugs skyes bshad/ /ni yig dri yi mar khu'o/ /sa yi yi ge so yi rdul/ /dA yi

yi ge rgya mtsho skyes/ /s+thi yig ba mo de bzhin du/ /ta yig snying po'i ga pur ro/ /sgra dang gzugs su yongs byung ba/ /khrag khu nor bu'i bar dag tu'o/ /'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba/ /rang rig pad mar son pa'o/ /bsrub dang bsrub pa'i

sbyor rnams kyis/ /rang 'byung gis ni rnam bsres pa'o/ /dbus ma'i mchog gi dbugs kyang ni/ /skad cig dbu mar bzung ba'o/ /ri lu rtag tu mchod pa ni/ /bdud rtsi gsang ba'i chu yin no/ /pho nya lhan skyes

bdag nyid ni/ /dbang gnyis sbyor las rtse ba'o/ /yid ni nang du song ba ni/ /khams rnams kyang ni zhu ba'o/ /rang khu thig le sangs rgyas rnams/ /zhu gang sbyor ba las byung ba'o/ /sbrang rtsi khrag dang ga bur bcas/ /
bcu drug 'dod ma las byung ba'o/ /tshogs dbus rab tu bzhugs rnams kyis/ /'di kun lhan skyes la sbyar ba'o/ /ming med mthe bos khar gzhug pa/ /snyoms par 'jug las khrag byung ba'o/ /zhi ba'i btung
ba myang ba ni/ /'pho ba'i dus las ma lus gang / /'di rnams bdud rtsi lngar 'gyur ba/ /'phos las byung ba'i mi'i mar khu/ /mchod bzhi de bzhin bya ba ni/ /bzhi mnyam ka bur bcas pa'o/ /lha dang mi
rnams bde ba ni/ /dga' ba kun las gang byung ba'o/ /bcu drug cha shas rin che ba/ /thams cad bde ba'i rang bzhin can/ /de ltar dpa' bo thams cad ni/ /khams kyi rdzas rnams su sbyar bya/ /bcud
len de las byung ba ste/ /gtso bo ye shes me rlung gis/ /'dzad pa dang ni gsad byas nas/ /'pho ba dang ni gzag de bzhin/ /'dzad pa byang chub 'dzag pa ste/ /bsad pa yis kyang 'pho
med 'gyur/ /'pho ba rtsa rnams kun du ste/ /gzag pa lte ba'i pad mar ro/ /de rnams bcing ba byas pa yis/ /khams thams cad du gzag par bya/ /bsad pa dngos po gzhom pa ste/ /rgyas pa 'jig

rten khams rnams su/ /sbyin sreg cho ga der shes nas/ /'khor lo sgyur nyid 'thob par gyis/ /thab tu bdud rtsi bsreg bya ste/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje mngon sum du/ /rnal 'byor ldan pas mthob par 'gyur/ /sa thams cad la
'khyer bar byed/ /srog ni gang gi chos can che/ /chos ni kun tu 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de yi rang bzhin brtson chen ma/ /sum bcu bdun bdag nyid mchog tu/ /dkyil 'khor sngags las des rdzogs pa/ /shes
rab thabs kyi bdag nyid mchog /lha mo chen mo kha dog dkar/ /kun mkhyen ye shes las byung ma/ /sems can thams cad dbang 'gyur dang / /'khor los sgyur ba 'thob par 'gyur/ /oM ga i ren+d+ra sa

dzA ta la bA sa da rba pra sa bA twA da t+ma ma ne hA hU~M ma hU~M te phaT hU~M phaT hU~M swA phaT hA phaT swA hA oM ma hA bIr+yA ye hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ de ltar sngags kyi de nyid bdag /lha thams cad kyi sa bon no/ /'khrul 'khor 'khor lo

de tshe ni/ /re'u mig gcig dman lnga bcu ste/ /kha ches yang dag bri byas nas/ /gsang sngags phreng ba 'di dgod bya/ /lugs las bzlog pas gnod mdzes sngags/ /ji lta'i rim pas dgod par bya/ /de tshe mi yi

gzugs byas nas/ /slar yang zlum po sbyin par bya/ /de la rtsa ba'i sngags bris nas/ /bsgrub bya'i ming ni nang bcug pa'o/ /dbus kyi dum bu bsgrub bya ni/ /de yi sngags kyi nang bcug pa'o/ /gro ga sogs su sngags

pas bri/ /phyi dang gsang bar mtshon par bya/ /de lta'i 'khrul 'khor rab sbyar bas/ /sa gsum po la bsgom par bya/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro

de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /'di ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las brtson 'grus chen mo'i rab tu sbyor ba'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid gsang
ba'i bcud len la sogs pa dang rgyas pa'i las dpal yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin he ru ka'i rtsa ba'i sngags kyi cho ga ces bya ba ste le'u bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// // de nas dpa' bo phyag rdor sogs/ /
sngags pa thams cad bzhengs rnams kyis/ /bstod dang mchod dang phyag bcas pas/ /phag mo rab tu sad par byed/ /bdag gi ma yi lha mo kye/ /lha mo kun gyis rab mchod ma/ /khyod ni 'di rnams kun
gyi ma/ /ye shes snying mo phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /sems can kun la snying rje yi/ /gzugs su rang gis sprul pa mo/ /bdag la kun du thugs rje yi/ /bka' drin chen po mdzad par rigs/ /bde ba chen po yongs
bzhugs pa'i/ /bcom ldan bdag po la 'dri'o/ /rgyud thams cad kyi las tshogs kyi/ /sgrub pa'i thabs ni mi 'tshal to/ /gal te ji srid rgyud rgyud du/ /las thams cad ni bstan pa ni/ /rnam dag
ye shes thobs rnams kyi/ /de tshe der 'di ci phyir gsungs/ /rgyud 'di nyid du 'jug 'gyur bar/ /skye bo thams cad mi rigs so/ /slar yang bshad pa skyon dang bcas/ /bdag gis ma shes the tshom mchis/ /
phag mo ci yang mi gsung bas/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal zhugs nas/ /de yi ye shes su 'gyur te/ /de yis len ni gsung bar mdzad/ /bcom ldan chos kun bdag nyid kyi/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi yid du ni/ /
byas nas gsung ni rjod byed pa/ /phag mo'i ris thams cad kyis so/ /kye kye dpa' bo thams cad rnams/ /ye shes shes bya gnyis 'dris pa'i/ /khyed kyis ye shes gang mthong ba/ /de ni de dang
de ru thim/ /'on kyang so sor 'jug byed pa/ /sems can sna tshogs bsam pas so/ /dbye ba med nyid rgyud chen por/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro sdom pa dang / /gzhan yang rnal 'byor rgyud rnams ni/ /'dus pa
la sogs don chen po/ /de rnams kyis ni rgyud 'di yi/ /sna tshogs don ni mngon brjod pa/ /de thams cad kyis las kyi tshogs/ /ldan pas rab tu gsal bar byed/ /rgyud du brjod bya rjod pa por/ /de yis
phra mor 'jug par byed/ /re re'i mtshan nyid bdag nyid can/ /thod pa'i dum bu la sogs ldan/ /de la rnam par shes pa'i chos/ /thod pa yi ni dum bur bshad/ /sems can kun gyi las dang ni/ /nyon
mongs bde bar shes par bya/ /gzhan du kun mkhyen rgyud la ni/ /yi ge skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lo gcig gi ni bar gyi ni/ /zla ba bcu gnyis de shes bya/ /dus tshod drug gi 'khor lo sgyur/ /sems can
rmi lam lta bu mchog /mi shes dri mas bsgos pa yis/ /de rnams kyis ni bde mi rig /hA ra do la'i rim pa yis/ /rnam par shes pa shes bzhin par/ /khri phrag gnyis la stong dang ni/ /
drug brgya yis ni lhag pa'o/ /dbugs kyi chu tshod drug bcu la/ /zhag gcig tu ni rab tu grags/ /hA ra do la'i dbugs rnams kyis/ /bsgyur bas do la la mtshan pa'o/ /gnyis kyi dbugs ni
blo ldan gyis/ /phyir 'byung nang 'jug thim par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor pa yis dgongs 'gyur te/ /kun mkhyen nyid du nyer 'ong min/ /phra zhing phra ba'i rnal 'byor du/ /gnas nas thams cad rnam
par spyad/ /de yi ang ka phyi rol du/ /sa la bcu gnyis gzhag par bya/ /ji ltar nyi ma'i dbye bshad pa/ /yan lag bcu gnyis kyang de bzhin/ /rgyu skar dang ni gza' rnams kyi/ /'char ba dus thams cad
du'o/ /re re yi ni khams kyi ni/ /rang gi dus su'ang 'char bar 'gyur/ /dus su 'chi dang de bzhin gzhan/ /rim pa 'di yis 'chad par 'gyur/ /dA la sogs sbyor shes pas/ /'di ni sbyor ba phyi mo
la'o/ /nyi ma byang du bgrod pa yi/ /rgyal gyi zla ba sogs brtsams mas/ /zla ba bcu gnyis de ltar du/ /rim pa rim pas gzhag par bya/ /shar la sogs pa'i phyogs brtsams nas/ /snga dro nas brtsi
blo ldan gyis/ /gsum pa bcu gsum de bzhin te/ /bzhi pa yang ni bcu bzhi pa/ /lnga pa bcwa lnga pa ru ni/ /bshad par bya yis da lta nyon/ /'di rnams mnyam zhing mnyam ldan par/ /sgrub pos mthun

par bya ba yin/ /de la ma rig 'du byed dang / /rnam par shes dang ming dang gzugs/ /skye mched drug dang reg pa dang / /tshor ba dang ni sred de bzhin/ /nye bar len dang srid pa dang / /skye ba dang ni rga shi'o/ /de bzhin ro hi Ta sogs kyis/ /chu srin la

sogs rA si rnams/ /bcu gnyis nyid du 'dod par bya/ /thog mar ma yig chu srin dang / /ro ha ti'o de bzhin gzhan/ /gnyis par mo ha ti bum pa/ /'du byed du ni gsal bar 'gro/ /gsum par bzang po dang ni nya/ /rnam par shes par de rig bya/ /bzhi par

khyu mchog dang ni lug /ming dang gzugs su 'dod par bya/ /lnga pa ru ni rus sbal te/ /bre Sha skye mched drug chog go/ /drug par chu srin dang 'khrul ba/ /rtag tu reg pa ru ni 'gro/ /bdun par raN Ta k+kar Ta/ /de bzhin du ni tshor ba mchog /brgyad par mi ki ra seng ge/ /mchog

tu mthun ma srad pa'o/ /dgu par bish+ti dri dang bu mo/ /nye bar len pa ru ni 'dod/ /bcu ba sems g.yengs pa dang srang / /srid pa ru ni rab tu brjod/ /bcu gcig pa ru rmi lam dang / /bri Sh+tsi ka dang skye de bzhin/ /bcu gnyis pa ru sa'i dbang phyug /gzhu dang rgas shing shi ba'o/ /de ltar sa'i
dbang phyug sogs dang / /rmi lam la sogs de bzhin gzhan/ /g.yeng sogs b+hi dri ka la sogs/ /de bzhin mi ki ra sogs dang / /raN Da sogs dang chu srin sogs/ /rus sbal sogs dang khyu mchog

sogs/ /bzang po sogs dang rmongs pa sogs/ /de phyir zla ba rnams bcu gnyis/ /'di rnams nyi mar gang skyes pa/ /de yi mtshan nyid du ni 'dod/ /skad cig thang cig yud tsam du/ /tshad pa'i shing du mtshon par bya/ /mig
phye btsums par son pas kyang / /shin tu phra ba'i dus las so/ /gal te sems ni ting 'dzin gnas/ /rim gyis sa bcu gnyis par ro/ /yang na ting 'dzin mi gnas pa/ /bar ma yi ni 'gro bar 'dod/ /dman pas
dmyal ba la sogs pa'i/ /skye bo thams cad 'gro ba'o/ /'dren ma rnams kyi bde sdug bsngal/ /las kyis kun du longs spyod do/ /gnyis su med pa'i dus can gyis/ /thams cad rang bzhin sa la skye/ /de lta
yin kyang der skyes pa'i/ /rang gi las kyis 'bras bu za/ /de ltar rnam par gzung tsam gyis/ /thod pa'i dum bu'i rnal 'byor ldan/ /sngon du bshad pa'i rigs pa yis/ /khams kyi dbus su 'bab pa'o/ /

rlung gi kun spyod dus su ni/ /rnal 'byor pa ni skye bar 'gyur/ /nyi ma dgu dang zla ba dang / /lo na mkhas pas 'chi shes bya/ /de la rgyal srid rtsom par 'gyur/ /de lta nyid du the tshom med/ /ro ha ti yi nyi ma skyes/ /sa

yi dbang phyug la 'chi 'gyur/ /sa yi kun spyong dus skyes pa/ /nyi ma brgyad dang zla ba dang / /lo gcig na ni ma shi na/ /byang chub sems dpar the tshom med/ /rmi lam kun spyod dus su ni/ /dpa' zhing rtul phod pha rol

gnon/ /bsod nams dang ni sdig nyid 'dres/ /lnga bcu rtsa bzhi na 'chi'o/ /sems g.yeng ba la dgra yis gsod/ /de yi nyi mar skyes pa po/ /drug bcu rtsa bzhi'o zla bcu na/ /gal te shi bar ma gyur na/ /de ni 'byor chung

phyi nas ni/ /phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba ste/ /b+hi tri'i nyin mo 'chi ba yin/ /de'i tshe'i nyi ma la skyes pa/ /lnga pa gnyis dang gsum gcig gi/ /lo na shi bar ma gyur na/ /de la 'dod don kun dman zhing / /pha dang ma ni

gsod pa ste/ /dka' thub dang ni 'dres pa yis/ /mi ki ra la rang khyim 'chi/ /gang zhig de nyin 'dir skyes pa/ /gnyis lnga gsum dgu'i lo na ni/ /de ltar gal te ma shi na/ /de ni thams cad mkhyen pa mnyam/ /

yugs sa mo la chur 'chi'o/ /gang zhig de'i tshe nyi mar skyes/ /gnyis dang gsum gyi lo na ni/ /ma shi na ni blo ldan te/ /sdig pa byed po nad dang ldan/ /mi dang mi mo rnams skal bzang / /chu srin la 'chi de

nyid la/ /skyes pa bcu lnga gsum lnga yi/ /nyi ma zla ba lo rnams la/ /ma shi na ni mdor na yang / /yon tan thams cad yongs rdzogs te/ /mtha' skyong ba yi rgyal por 'gro/ /ru sbal dang ni 'khrig par 'chi/ /

de'i tshe nyi ma la skyes pa/ /gnyis brgyad dgu yi lo na 'chi/ /de ni shi bar ma gyur na/ /tha mal sems can du shes bya/ /dman dang gtso bor 'gro ba'o/ /khyu mchog la ni rang khyim 'chi/ /de yi nyi ma la skyes pa/ /

gnyis dang brgyad dang dgu yi ni/ /lo na mkhas pas ma shi na/ /dbang phyug thams cad phun tshogs shing / /khro sogs dang ni lta ba ngan/ /bzang po la ni bsad nas 'chi/ /de nyid nyi ma la skyes pa/ /lnga dang dgu dang bcu

na ni/ /skye bo 'dir ni ma shi na/ /phongs shing chos ni phun sum tshogs/ /thams cad kyis ni brgyan pa ste/ /gti mug la ni chur 'pho'o/ /de yi nyi ma la skyes pa/ /gnyis dgu'i zla ba dang po la/ /gal te de tshe

ma shi na/ /thams cad dman zhing dmyal bar te/ /bsam ngan sdig pa'i bdag nyid can/ /rkun mo la sogs pas bsad nas/ /ro hi ta yi nyi mar 'chi/ /de ltar mdor bsdus shes bya ste/ /gal te ting 'dzin ma thob na'o/ /skye rnams

mngon sum byed pa yi/ /las rnams gzhan du 'thob pa yin/ /de nyid nye bar gang zhig na/ /de ni legs par bsrung bya ste/ /bshad pa'i rim pa'i nyi ma la/ /'grol bar 'di la the tshom med/ /thod pa'i dum bu rang

nyid ni/ /'di rnams shis byed bsgom par bya/ /mkha' 'gror bgrod pa'i gang zhig rtsa/ /de'i dbus bdag nyid spyod par byed/ /de ni sgo nga'i rigs shes bya/ /gtor ba bskyod pas bsrung bar bya/ /rnal 'byor pa lus 'dzin par

'gyur/ /'dir ni mthe'u chung bskyod par bya/ /rkang mthil dang ni spyi bo'i sgo/ /mtshams rnams kun du bsrung bar bya/ /A li kA li mnyam byas nas/ /khams rnams la ni thim par bya/ /rnam par shes pa mi g.yo ste/ /

thams cad de'i rang bzhin du bya/ /mgo bo'i dbus las nges par yang / /'og tu kha bltas 'bab 'gyur 'gro/ /de'i dbus phyogs su phun tshogs pa/ /rnal 'byor pa de srid mthar 'gro/ /a ba d+hU tI dus grangs su/ /ji ltar gsal

bar bshad par 'gyur/ /zla phyed lo gsum shes bya ba/ /skye bo'i dus su 'chi ba yin/ /lo brgya rnams kyi gang zhig tshad/ /de rnams dbus su brtag par bya/ /ro ma rkyang ma gnyis dag gi'ang / /skye ba'i zla ba nyid mtshon bya/ /zla ba zla bar

'joms 'gyur ba/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i cha can no/ /dbugs ni gcig gi grangs kyang ni/ /de phyir lo gnyis las gnyis 'gyur/ /sum 'gyur sogs pas thams cad rnams/ /de nas nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i 'gyur/ /mkha' bug mig tu shes par

bya/ /phyi nas chu tshod rnams su 'gro/ /lo ni bcu gnyis bar du ni/ /lnga lnga yi yang chu tshod do/ /drug bcu'i lo nas nyi ma 'phel/ /sum bcu rtsa bdun zla phyed gsum/ /lnga lnga ru ni 'phel ba rnams/ /nyin mo'i chu tshod ang ka bya/ /skye

bo kun gyi 'chi ba ni/ /zla phyed gsum dang lo na shes/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i lo rnams kyis/ /gang phyir mi rnams dpyod ldan 'gro/ /sa yi khyim du zhugs nas ni/ /yid kyis 'chi ba blu ba ste/ /dpal he ru ka gnas zhugs pa'i/ /thod pa'i

dum bu bsam par byed/ /bgrang ba'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /nyin zhag chu tshod mtshon par bya/ /ji lta'i dus su mtshan pa yis/ /rim gyis rim gyis bya ba yin/ /byang du bgrod pa'i dus tshod du/ /lha mo rgyal sogs rim pa'o/ /

bcu la gnyis kyis bsgyur dang bzhi/ /mkhas pas nyi ma'i chu tshod do/ /mnyam pa'i dus su shes bya ba/ /rang gi dus sbyor du 'chad 'gyur/ /bcu po gsum dang drug po ste/ /mtshan mo'i chu tshod rtsom par byed/ /brgya la dus kyi

bye brag gis/ /de yi dbus las shes par bya/ /bcu la gnyis kyis bsgyur dang drug /nyin rnams chu tshod ang ka bya/ /bcu la gsum gyis bsgyur dang bzhi/ /mtshan mo'i chu tshod du ni brtag /bcu la gnyis kyis bsgyur dang
brgyad/ /nyi ma rnams kyi chu tshod bzhin/ /bcu la gsum bsgyur gnyis gcig pu/ /mtshan mo'i chu tshod du ni brtag /mnyam dus dbus su gnyis sbyar nas/ /sum bcu gcig bur rab tu brtags/ /sum bcu rnam pa

gnyis rnams kyis/ /nyin re dag gi chu tshod 'byed/ /bcu po rnam gsum gnyis gcig pu/ /nyin mo rnams kyi nyi mar brtags/ /bcu po gnyis rnams dang ni brgyad/ /mtshan mo yi ni ang ka bya/ /bcu po rnam gsum ang ka la/ /

bzhi dang yang dag ldan pa'o/ /bcu la gnyis kyis bsgyur dang drug /mtshan mo'i chu tshod ang ka bya/ /bcu la gsum gyis bsgyur dang drug /nyin dag ye shes can rnams kyi 'ang nyin/ /bcu la gnyis kyis bsgyur

dang bzhi/ /rdul can rnams kyi chu tshod grags/ /lho ru bgrod par rab bshad de/ /nam zla'i dus kyis shes par 'gyur/ /bcu la gsum gyis bsgyur dang bzhi/ /nyin phyed chu tshod yongs su bshad/ /bcu la gny-is

kyis bsgyur dang drug /mtshan mo'i de bzhin mtshon par bya/ /bcu la gsum bsgyur gnyis gcig pu/ /nyin rnams chu tshod de bzhin no/ /bcu la gnyis kyis bsgyur dang drug /mtshan mo'i chu tshod du ni grags/ /
bcu la gsum bsgyur pas mtshon pa/ /mnyam sogs chu tshod de bzhin te/ /bcu la gsum bsgyur mtshan rnams kyi/ /bi shu'i dbus su gnyis de bzhin/ /bcu la gnyis kyis bsgyur dang brgyad/ /
nyin rnams kyi ni nyin mor sam/ /bcu po sum 'gyur gnyis gcig pu/ /rdul can chu tshod du brtags so/ /bcu po gnyis 'gyur dang ni drug /nyin rnams chu tshod rim pas so/ /bcu po sum 'gyur dang ni bzhi/ /

rdul can chu tshod rnams de bzhin/ /sum brgya de bzhin drug bcu ni/ /chu tshod rnams kyi dbugs bkang ngo / /chu tshod grangs ni drug bcu ni/ /zhag gcig tu ni rnam par brjod/ /zla rnams rim pa ji lta bas/ /
de bzhin rim rnams kyis mtshan no/ /chu tshod dbugs sogs yongs rdzogs pa/ /rim pas 'phel dang 'chad pa ste/ /las dang las min khyad par gyis/ /dbugs ni rim pas yongs su bzung / /

de ltar mkha' mkha' ro de bzhin/ /zla mig chu tshod de bzhin du/ /lo gcig gar ni shes par bya/ /zhag rnams chu tshod mtshon pas so/ /de ltar byas pas rnal 'byor pa/ /dus kyi 'chi ba blu bar 'gyur/ /lte ba'i
dbus su pad ma che/ /ji ltar rdo rje phag mo'o/ /mtshams kun son pa'i pad ma la/ /ba mo dang 'dra 'dzag par bya/ /lte ba'i dbus mtha' bcu gnyis su/ /'gro ba 'ong ba byed pa nyid/ /srog gi thig
le de bgrod pa'ang / /mtshams kun du ni 'bab pa can/ /blo ldan lo gcig sbyor ba yis/ /de nyid du ni thim par bya/ /til mar me ni 'bar ba yi/ /gzugs can kha ni 'og tu bltas/ /chu shing me
tog dang 'dra ba/ /mkhas pa yis ni 'phyang bzhin pa'o/ /lte bar a yi rnam pa'i gzugs/ /thung ngu ring po 'phar ma'i bdag /phyag rgya lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs/ /dbyangs dang phyi mo gnyis med gnas/ /

bsgom dang sgrub pa mo bshad pa/ /rtul po bar ma rnon po dang / /lhag par rno dang shin lhag rno/ /thams cad de rnams su brtags so/ /gang phyir rang bdag nyid kyis bsgrub/ /de phyir gzhan gyis kyang bsgrub bya/ /
nus mthu 'jig rten 'di nyid la/ /skye bo kun la yid ches byed/ /phyi nas gdul byar 'gro ba yin/ /rang gzhan don gyis sems brlan pas/ /dbyangs bcu gnyis ni thob byas nas/ /dge dang mi dge bshad
par bya/ /'khor lo bcu gnyis rnams su ni/ /dbyangs kyi bdag po mtshon par bya/ /a yig gis ni ye shes dang / /mkhas pa chos don thams cad 'thob/ /a yi yi ges 'tshir ba dang / /rgas dang 'chi bar rnam
ngas bshad/ /srid pa'i 'jigs pa ma lus pa/ /mthong 'gyur lam las nyams par 'gyur/ /i yi yi ge yongs thob pas/ /sa yi dbang phyug tu ni 'gro/ /I yi yi ge yang dag 'thob/ /myur ba

nyid du 'chi bar 'gyur/ /U yi yi ge thob pa yis/ /skye ba dran par 'gyur 'gro ba'o/ /U yi yi ge gal te 'thob/ /yul la zhen pa can du 'gro/ /i yi yi ge yang dag 'thob/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyid du 'gro/ /
I yi yi ge sems rmongs zhing / /'gro ba drug sogs 'jigs par 'gyur/ /o yig pha rol phyin pa yi/ /der ni sa 'thob rnam nges ston/ /au yi ang ka thob pa yis/ /dam tshig nyams par 'gro ba yin/ /
a~M yig byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /mthong bas skad cig la grol 'gyur/ /a yig yang dag thob pa yis/ /phung po khams la the tshom za/ /de la sogs pa ma lus pa/ /ma gsungs kyang ni bsgrub par bya/ /

bla ma bstan bcos rang nyid de/ /rnam gsum chos kyis yid ches bya/ /zhes bya ba ni thod pa'i dum bu can gyi rnal 'byor gyi mtshan nyid kyi bsgrub pa'i thabs dang dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs kyi ming can te

thog ma'i tshig go/ /rab tu byed pa dang po'o// // de nas keng rus chen po yi/ /mtshan nyid bdag gis bshad bya ste/ /bong 'dra'i rnal 'byor bdag nyid kyis/ /yid kyi shugs ni 'jug med bya/ /khams mnyam
pa yi ri bo ni/ /spyi bo'i gnas su bsgoms pa nyid/ /pad snal skud pa kha 'og bltas/ /glog ni kun du 'gro ba mo/ /de yi dbus su dpa' mo che/ /bong bu'i dbyibs can bsgom par bya/ /dkyil 'khor
thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /mchod pa chen po bsam par bya/ /de yi dbus su dpa' chen po/ /keng rus chen po'i sbyor bas so/ /skud pa rnams kyis lte dbus su/ /bsrub dang bsrub pa'i sbyor bdag nyid/ /
ha yig rnam pa yi ni gzugs/ /mgo las skud pa gcig po ste/ /me long rnam pa'i sems kyis ni/ /thod pa'i dbus su ngal gso bya/ /bum pa'i bdud rtsi'i rgyun rnams kyis/ /khung bu'i dbus su'ang 'dzag
par 'gyur/ /thim dang longs spyod sogs dngos pos/ /sems kyi bgrod pa bstan par bya/ /khung der bong bu'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /skye ba bdun yang mthong bar 'gyur/ /ma las byung ba'i dbyibs gsum dang / /
pha las byung ba gsum de bzhin/ /khams thams cad dang bdun po de/ /rnal 'byor bsgom pas mthong bar 'gyur/ /bde ba'i rang bzhin khams kun gyis/ /keng rus chen po yang dag byung / /lA ma la sogs
bsgoms pa yis/ /de la gnas pa'i gzugs mthong 'gyur/ /bong bu'i rnam pa'i rnal 'byor mu/ /khrag gi zhal can rtse gsum can/ /tshe son pa yang rnam par shes/ /tshe ring ba yang mthong bar 'gyur/ /

snga mar glang po che sogs pa/ /dpa' rang bdag nyid kyis de mthong / /chen po'i rtsa rnams thams cad du/ /keng rus srog ni yongs 'gro bya/ /de bskyod bong bu shes bya ste/ /sna tshogs rang bzhin de mthong 'gyur/ /
sA lu la sogs bza' ba'i dngos/ /de dang 'dra bar dngos po kun/ /mthong ste de na yod pa min/ /khams thams cad kyang 'khrul pa'o/ /ji ltar skyes bur dus rnams kyis/ /glang chen khams kyis shes
par bya/ /de bzhin keng rus che rnams kyis/ /sA li la sogs khams rkyen gyis/ /rang bzhin 'jig rten pa dmigs pas/ /rang bdag nyid kyi gzugs de mthong / /rnam pa sna tshogs rigs de rnams/ /
rnal 'byor 'dzin rnams kyis shes bya/ /ma rig sogs nyin so so la/ /de rnams kyis ni nad du grags/ /rims la sogs pa'i nad tsam gyis/ /nad chen rnam par mtshon par bya/ /de la ma
rig nyi ma'i nad/ /legs pa rnams kyis de bsrung bya/ /'pho ba bcwa lnga pa la ni/ /'chi 'am las ni dge mi dge/ /ye shes ma yi bdag nyid ches/ /nub lnga rnams na grol bar 'gyur/ /rga shi yi
ni dus su ni/ /'pho ba gsum na 'chi ba ste/ /yang na dge dang mi dge ba'i/ /las kyi bag chags mthong bar 'gyur/ /rang rig bde ba gzung ba yis/ /nub bdun na ni grol bar 'gyur/ /skye ba'i
nyi ma'i 'chi ba ni/ /'pho ba gsum pa na yang ste/ /las ni dge mi dger 'gro ba/ /nub bdun na ni grol bar 'gyur/ /srid pa yi ni 'pho gsum ni/ /'chi bar 'gyur ro mtshan mo ni/ /lnga na de rnams
grol bar 'gyur/ /yang na de ni mi grol te/ /'das pa bzhi pa'i dus rnams su/ /bde ba de kun rtogs par gyis/ /de lta'i rigs 'gyur de rnams su/ /ji lta'i rim pas shes par bya/ /len pa'i
'chi ba'i 'pho ba ni/ /gsum pa dang ni bzhi pa na'o/ /gal te las ni dge mi dges/ /mtshan mo bcu na grol bar 'gyur/ /bsod nams phun sum tshogs kun dang / /blo dang ldan pas 'pho med bsgrub/ /
sred pa'i 'pho ba gsum na 'chi/ /las ni dge dang mi dge ste/ /nor bu'i nang son la blta bya/ /mtshan mo bdun na nges grol te/ /nga yi ngag la the tshom med/ /tshor ba'i 'pho ba lnga na ni/ /
'chi 'gyur las kyang ngo de bzhin/ /dgu dang bcu dag na grol te/ /rdo rje pad dbus son pas so/ /reg pa'i nyin mo'i 'pho ba ni/ /brgyad na 'chi bar shes par bya/ /de ltar las dge mi dge srid/ /yan
lag drug gis thim par bya/ /gcig dman nyi shu'i nyi ma na/ /grol ba'am yang na mi grol lo/ /skye mched drug gi 'chi ba ni/ /las dge mi dges blta bya ste/ /'pho ba brgyad na shes par bya/ /khams
kyi nad rnams de mthong 'gyur/ /nub bcu na ni grol 'gyur te/ /'khor lo bzhi ru thim par bya/ /ming dang gzugs la 'chi ba'i las/ /gsum pa 'am ni lnga pa yi/ /'pho ba dag ni shes par bya/ /
mtshan mo brgyad na 'grol ba'o/ /sems ni thig le'i gnas son par/ /brten par 'gyur ba'i cho ga bya/ /rnam par shes pa'i 'chi ba'i las/ /slar yang brgyad dang bcu pa yi/ /
'pho bar sa la shes par bya/ /yang na de nyid la 'grol te/ /bcu drug phyed phyed kyi gzugs can/ /ye shes rlung gis gzung bar bya/ /'du byed kyi ni 'chi ba'i las/ /gsum dang bdun gyi
de bzhin du/ /bltas par gyur pas 'pho ba yin/ /de yi lta bas grol bar 'gyur/ /thig le gnyis ni shes byas nas/ /steng du 'gro bas thim par bya/ /'di yis nad dang 'chi med 'gyur/ /
de phyir sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang / /sum bcu bdun bdag nyid dge ba/ /slar yang dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /keng rus chen po'i gtso bo yi/ /rnal 'byor pa yis thams cad mthong / /zhes bya
ni bong bu'i rnal 'byor la keng rus chen po bsgom pa po'i man ngag de kho na nyid dang ldan pa ste rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o// // de nas keng rus kyi sbyor bas/ /yul yul rang gi skye gnas skyes/ /
rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' gtso mo/ /ye shes ldan pas shes par bya/ /a Ta Ta ra dgod par rdul lha mo/ /rnal 'byor ma ni kun gyi gtso/ /de yi gnas su gnas lha mo/ /ka dam shing la dril
chen ma/ /lha mo de yi rtag pa'o/ /zhing skyong zhal chen po yin no/ /keng rus bde ba'i sgyu ma yin/ /bdag nyid che las nges 'byung 'gyur/ /de rnams keng rus kyis rgyas btab/ /o T+yan bu ga las
steng son/ /rang khams las bzhengs rnam par shes/ /rim gyis yul thams cad du 'gro/ /ko l+la'i ri dang ba ru N+ya/ /de bi ko T+Ta bi ra dza ka~M/ e ru N+ya dang de nas grong / /ai la'i grong dang kha

che dang / /ma ru'i grong dang de bzhin du/ /puN Da ba d+ha na yi zhing / /dza yan ti dang briSh+Ta'i grong / /sau pa re dang spyod de bzhin/ /o T+yan dang ni 'bar ba 'dzin/ /k+She re ke dang sgyu ma'i grong / /am bu ke dang rgyal

po'i khab/ /bod kyi yul dang de bzhin du/ /mA la be dang pu lir sogs/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i gnas yin no/ /ri yi rtsi dang tA la'i shing / /pa Ta a mra gser de bzhin/ /ral pa'i shing dang gzhan gnon dang / /

ri yi rtse mor yang dag rten/ /thang chen po dang rtsa khung dang / /a shwad tha dang khang pa brtsegs/ /u dum ba ra shal ma li/ /ka ran dza mya ngan med la rten/ /gser shing dang ni sA la dang / /tsu ta d+hA tu dil la ki/ /

brag brtsegs pa dang sbrang rtsi'i shing / /sngon du yang dag brten pa'o/ /rdul gyi skye gnas chol pa'i lus/ /stobs chen dang ni rnal 'byor gnas/ /thod pa las dang rdul rab gtum/ /skye gnas dpa' bo chol
pa'i lus/ /stobs chen rnams dang khrag de bzhin/ /dpa' bo'i skye gnas nus las byung / /skye gnas zla ba las byung dang / /stobs chen rigs las byung ba dang / /'jigs byed khrag
las byung de bzhin/ /tshil dang g.yul ngo che las skyes/ /me tog skye gnas gnyis de bzhin/ /slar yang de nyid tshig dran bya/ /'di rnams rigs las byung lha mo/ /lhan cig skyes gzugs bu mo yin/ /
dpal chen mo dang me yi kha/ /zhing skyong mchog gi zhal can te/ /me yi gdong can zhes grags pa/ /keng rus bde ba rig pa ba'o/ /de yi 'pho ba 'dzin pa ni/ /rnal 'byor ma gnyis spro bar byed/ /
de yis de 'dod sbyor ba yis/ /dpa' bo gnyis med yang dag rten/ /sems can rnams la phan don du/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du gnas te/ /kun tu spyod pa'i bgrod gzugs kyis/ /yul thams
cad du 'gro ba yin/ /lang dbang phyug ma gyen rdzes skra/ /zhing skyong gtsigs pa chen po ste/ /gyen brdzes skra zhes bshad pa ni/ /keng rus bde ba'i rgyu can te/ /rnal 'byor ma mchog khyad par ni/ /
lhag ma sngon gsungs bzhin shes bya/ /rna ba gcus dang drag mo ste/ /zhing skyong ba ni lus chen no/ /de nas yang na rgyu can dang / /mchog dbang phyug ma drag chen po/ /keng rus bde ba'i stong pa
yis/ /go 'phang mchog tu shes par bya/ /zhi ba'i gzugs dang me dang ni/ /zhing skyong a Ta Tar dgod pa'o/ /me dang 'phrul chen dag dang ni/ /sgra chen por yang shes par bya/ /keng rus kyi ni gtum
mo ni/ /'bar ba'i dbus su bde ba che/ /me yi stong dang brtson chen ma/ /zhing skyong ba ni dril bu'i sgra/ /brtson 'grus chen mo zhes grags pa/ /keng rus bde ba'i 'byung gnas yin/ /dmar ser
grags dang 'jigs mig ma/ /zhing skyong byin pa chen po ste/ /'jigs byed ma dang spyan ma 'am/ /keng rus bde ba'i 'gengs byed pa'o/ /'jigs chen ma dang stobs chen ma/ /zhing skyong glang po chen

po ste/ /yang na glang po'i rna ma dang / /zhing skyong glang po'i rna can te/ /keng rus bde ba la zhon pa/ /rtsa thams cad du de'i rang bzhin/ /ba lang rna ma ri'i rtse ma/ /zhing skyong 'jigs byed chen po ste/ /de nas
slar yang sbug ma'i byin/ /keng rus bde ba la thim pa'o/ /bgrod pa mo dang 'jigs zhal ma/ /zhing skyong ba ni gtsigs pa ste/ /rmongs par byed ma zhal chen po/ /keng rus bde ba la chags pa'o/ /

ro langs ma dang de bzhin bzang mo/ /zhing skyong ba spu'i byin pa can/ /yang na gyen gtsigs chen po ste/ /keng rus bde ba la za'o/ /tsA mun Ta dang lha chen mo/ /zhing skyong bum pa'i rlig pa can/ /yang na
lha mo chen mo dang / /zhing skyong bum pa'i grul can te/ /yang na lha chen po yin no/ /keng rus bde bar gar byed pa'o/ /rab gus ma dang ral gsum ma/ /zhing skyong gtsigs pa chen po ste/ /yang na ral
pa gsum shes bya/ /keng rus bde ba'i pha rol phyin/ /glog gi gdong ma dril sgra ma/ /zhing skyong 'ug pa'i gdong can te/ /dril bu'i sgra ru nges grags pa/ /'dir ni keng rus bde za ba'o/ /me zhal ma

dang lha chen mo/ /zhing skyong 'jigs par byed pa ste/ /yang na lha chen por shes bya/ /keng rus bde ba'i gzi can no/ /ka ran dza gnas ma de bzhin/ /gzhan yang dril bu chen mor grags/ /zhing skyong ba ni

stobs chen te/ /keng rus bde bas mdzes pa yin/ /gsang grags ma dang lha chen mo/ /drag gzugs ma dang stobs chen ma/ /zhing skyong sgra chen po dang ni/ /drag po'i gzugs dang stobs chen te/ /keng rus bde
las yongs byung ba'i/ /mchog tu mi 'gyur rnal 'byor ldan/ /gtum mo dang ni drag mo dang / /zhing skyong ba ni 'bar bar grags/ /de nas yang na drag po'i gzugs/ /
keng rus bde ba'i cha lugs can/ /'jig rten gyi ma gyen skra mo/ /zhing skyong ri rab chen po ste/ /de nas yang na gyen brdzes skra/ /keng rus bde ba sgom pa po'o/ /'jigs pa mo dang stobs chen ma/ /
zhing skyong 'jigs pa de bzhin te/ /stobs po che dang 'jigs gzugs ma/ /keng rus bde ba'i snying po can/ /srul mo dang ni lha chen mo/ /zhing skyong brtul zhugs chen po ste/ /keng rus bde
ba'i nus pa yis/ /de phyir dbang po kun bde ba'o/ /bi pan sa ma dril li sgra/ /zhing skyong rna ba chen po can/ /yang na dril li sgrogs pa ste/ /keng rus bde ba 'dzag pa'o/ /lhan skyes
grags ma 'byor grags ma/ /dpa' bo chen po de bzhin mchog /zhing skyong shin tu thub dka' ste/ /keng rus bde ba dpog byed pa'o/ /dbang skur mnyam ma skyes dbang phyug /zhing skyong

sna tshogs dbang phyug ste/ /keng rus bde ba la gnas pas/ /rang nyid 'dod pa'i bde bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje mgo dang rtse gsum dang / /dar dang rdo rje mdung thung dang / /gtun shing zhags pa de bzhin du/ /
rdo rje'i lcags sgrogs lcags kyu dang / /zhags pa bshal dang kha T+wA~M ga /rdo rje lcags sgrogs phyag can dang / /dbyug pa mdung thung gri gug dang / /mdung thung rdo rje lcags sgrogs can/ /gri gug

ral gri de bzhin du/ /rdo rje dang ni mdung thung gshol/ /ga da rdo rje kyo de bzhin/ /chu srin rgyal mtshan tho ba'o/ /zhi ba'i zhal du shes bya dang / /gtsigs ma dang ni rab 'jigs ma/ /chos kyi dbang

phyug rab ster ma/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug kun mchog ma/ /'dod pa'i dbang phyug rab ster ma/ /yang dag rmongs pa'i zhing ster ma/ /gtsigs ma rmongs pa'i zhing ma dang / /'jigs chen ma dang de bzhin gzhan/ /
gtum zhal ma dang dgra 'joms ma/ /rmongs pa'i zhing gi 'jigs byed ma/ /dpa' bo kun la mchog ster ma/ /longs spyod grol ba sdigs 'joms ma/ /bde ba kun gyi mchog ster ma/ /bsam pa
thams cad rdzogs byed ma/ /gtsigs ma drag cing 'jigs pa mo/ /sha yi gdan can ma dang gzhan/ /bde ba'i dbang phyug mchog ster ma/ /mdzes shing thams cad dgos ma dang / /'jig rten dngos grub ster
ba mo/ /lha mo gtsigs ma 'jigs par byed/ /shin du drag mo gzugs bzang mo/ /dbang phyug thams cad rab ster ma/ /dngos grub thams cad rab ster ma/ /'jigs ma sgrub ma grags ster ma/ /nag
po'i gzugs dang drag chen po/ /dgra thams cad kyi 'jigs pa zhon/ /thams cad dbang du byed pa dang / /sems can thams cad 'jigs byed ma/ /'khor lo kun rgyal ma nyid dang / /'jigs par byed dang
de bzhin gzhan/ /zhi ba'i zhal ma gzugs bzang ma/ /bsgrub po rnams la mthun byed ma/ /snyan grags ma dang rab sdong ma/ /de ltar thams cad rim bzhin no/ /aT Tar dgod pa'i 'khor lor bzhugs/ /
ko la'i rir ni ro la bzhugs/ /ba ru N+ya sid d+ha sim Dir/ /lha mo'i mkhar du yi dgas gnas/ /bi ra dza ru shing leb bzhugs/ /e ra n+ye ru phag la bzhugs/ /de nas grong du yi dgas bzhugs/ /

e le'i grong du bong bur gnas/ /kha cher nor sbyin la ni gnas/ /ma ru'i yul du ma her gnas/ /grong du mgo yi rgyab tu ste/ /puN Da ba d+ha ra ro la gnas/ /dza yan t+ya ru keng rus gnas/ /praSh+Ti'i grong du
brtsegs par gnas/ /so pA red par ta la gnas/ /ka ran dzar gnas tsa ri tA ri/ /o D+yan du ni bdud la bzhugs/ /'bar ba 'dzin par ro la gnas/ /k+Shi ri kar ni me la gnas/ /
sgyu yi grong du re yi steng / /am bu ke ru seng ger gnas/ /rgyal po'i khab tu 'khor lor gnas/ /bod kyi yul du yi dgas gnas/ /ror gnas ma la bar de bzhin/ /keng rus kyi ni rab sbyor bas/ /
de lta'i zhing du dngos grub 'gyur/ /keng rus las byung bde ba ni/ /rtsa yi rtsa ba las yongs langs/ /mtshams rnams kun du khyab par ni/ /ye shes khu ba de mthong 'gyur/ /mgo med las byung ba'i ngag
'di/ /khams de nyid ni za ba'o/ /dbang po gnyis kyi mkha' gnas las/ /de yis bde ba mthong bar 'gyur/ /thams cad dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma/ /mkhas rnams cung zad med par 'gyur/ /de'i

rang bzhin 'gro rgyu mar ni/ /lto ba bsdus pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /'phyang ba yis ni thams cad du/ /bdud rtsi de ni 'gro dang 'ong / /'dzag bzhin pa yis rnal 'byor ma/ /rang gi zhing skyes rnam par spro/ /phyi nang
bdag nyid gsang ba yi/ /de rnams la ni mchod chen bya/ /mi shes ri bo gcod pa yi/ /dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /sngon bshad dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /de nas keng rus bsgom par bya/ /

skye 'gro'i gtso bo'i dpa' bo yang / /shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin can/ /gsungs pa'i yul du rnal 'byor ma/ /de nas rab gtum sogs ming ste/ /sgrub pa pos ni dngos grub rgyur/ /der ni 'du ba yang bya'o/ /

bza' dang btung sogs yang dag brtsam/ /nyer spyod lnga sogs mchod pa dang / /nyer spyad gtor ma'i snod rnams ni/ /rlon pa'i sha dang nya la sogs/ /bza' dang rdzas rnams thams cad dang / /bdud rtsi lnga dang de bzhin

gzhan/ /g.yon par snod rnams gzhag byas nas/ /g.yas su khro bo bstan par bya/ /shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dam/ /ri dang khrod dang khyim dang ni/ /grong dang grong khyer ngos rnams dang / /khang stong lam gyi bzhi

mdo dang / /chu la 'gro dang thang la rgyu/ /sa dang ma mo'i khyim dang 'gram/ /nag mo drag mo drag chen mo/ /lha sbyin yang dag brten ma dang / /nag mo gtsigs dang 'jigs byed dang / /dga' las 'das dang

log 'dren dang / /tsA muN Di dang drag gzugs ma/ /lha mo dbu ma dang ni ma/ /rgyal ma rnam par rgyal ma dang / /me thub ma dang gzhan mi thub/ /bzang nag mo dang nag chen mo/ /sbom nag mo dang rnal 'byor ma/ /
dbang mo zla ba mo drag mo/ /sdang ma 'phyang ma sum bcu'i dbang / /kam po dzam me ma 'jib ma/ /grong du gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ma/ /drag gzugs ma dang gzugs chen ma/ /mche ma drag mo gtsigs pa mo/ /

lha mo thod pa'i phreng can dang / /kha T+wA~M ga ni 'dzin ma dang / /mi'u thung ma dang dgra sta'i phyag /rdo rje'i phyag can de bzhin gzhu/ /mkha' 'gro ma lnga de nyid che/ /las rnams thams cad rab sgrub ma/ /sbyor ba'i

dkyil 'khor rgyal mo dang / /rdor dbang phyug ma gtso de bzhin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen po/ /rdul med rnal 'byor stong pa nyid/ /rdo rje'i dbang phyug bka' yis ni/ /kun nas 'dir ni spyan 'dren no/ /

oM ka k+ka kaD+d+ha na ba b+ba ban d+ha na kha kh+kha khA da na sarba duSh+Ta na ha na ha na g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya che ge mo'i dgos pa mdzod cig /hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT dzaHswA hA/ bdud rtsis kha ni yongs bkang nas/ /lha thams cad ni mnyes
par bya/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma bsgom bya/ /las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /oM b+ha k+Sha sarba yo gi shwa rI hU~M hU~M dzaHswA hA/ ji lta'i las sogs yongs spyor ba/ /gtor ma'i las sogs
yongs sbyar bya/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang ni/ /dgug dang gsad dang dbye ba dang / /rengs pa gtor ma'i de nyid kyis/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyi las rnams kun/ /bsgrub bya'o ye shes lcags kyu

yis/ /rang gi 'dod pa'i lha tshim bya/ /zhing dang gnas dang de bzhin grong / /grong khyer ram ni ri bo ru/ /'byung po mang po rab tu bsdu/ /de yi tshogs ni 'du ba'o/ /rtsa thams cad kyi kun spyod kyis/ /de yi srog kyang
bsdu ba'o/ /rang gi mdud pa'i gnas 'dus pa/ /de nas lte ba snying kar 'dod/ /rnal 'byor ma la gus 'dud pas/ /sgrub pa pos ni mchog thob 'gyur/ /rtag tu gnas dang nye gnas su/ /sdod la lha

yis mchog ster 'gyur/ /gnas der nyams pa dang ldan pa/ /sngon gyi cho gas bsgrub par bya/ /bug rdol dang ni rgas pa dang / /shu ba mdze sogs spang pa ni/ /'byung po'i nyi ma thob byas nas/ /de ltar legs mnyam
bzhag pas bsgrub/ /lha yi chu yis khru byas te/ /khyad par du yang bdud rtsi lngas/ /yan lag mar nag chen pos byug /de nyid kyi ni bdug spos sbyin/ /nges par gru bzhi gru gsum pa'i/ /dbus su 'bad

pas bya ba yin/ /ji lta bar ni sngon bzhin du/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gsan du gzhug /gad mo rnam pa brgyad bya ste/ /hA hA hI hI hU~M hU~M he hai/ /zhes bya sgrub pa po yis so/ /me yi sa bon yang dag zhon/ /
rlung gis su ni phye ba yi/ /spyi bo'i gtsug tu sbyar byas nas/ /sa yi mthil du mchod byas nas/ /skye gnas dbus su dgong bya ste/ /'bad pas zhu ba blta bar bya/ /skye gnas dbus su rim ji bzhin/ /
bdag nyid bsam bya rnal 'byor pas/ /pho nya'i 'od zer kun nas 'khrig /'bar ba'i phreng ba rgya mtsho blta/ /de ltar rnam par bsam gyur pas/ /rnal 'byor thams cad bde ba'i gnas/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro
de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni keng rus kyi cho ga ste rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o// // de nas mche ba rnam gtsigs pa'i/ /ting
'dzin sbyor gnas bshad bya ste/ /gzhu 'gengs rim pa 'ong ba ni/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor pas yod de/ /srog gi thig le son bsam pa/ /mtshams thams cad du de brgyud de/ /gzhu dbyug mtshan
mar bsam par bya/ /sgra thams cad ni bskul ba yis/ /kun nas 'gengs bzhin pa'i mda'/ /dbus ma'i lte bar 'dzom pa yis/ /rnam par shes pa'i 'ben gzhom bya/ /'byung gnas thams
cad gsad pa yin/ /bgrod bzhin pa yi bde ba cher/ /der rig pa yis gzhan du 'gro/ /mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa yi/ /rab sbyor rnams kyis nges 'byung 'gyur/ /mtshon bya zad pa med 'joms pa/ /
skye bo rnams la 'jug par 'gyur/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i spyod yul las/ /gzhan gyi grong rnams su 'jug pa'o/ /sngon gyi sprul pa'i bag chags ni/ /de la rgyun du 'joms par byed/ /rnam par
zhu ba'i bdag nyid che/ /zhi ba'i gzugs su ster bar 'gyur/ /Sh+T+ri zhes rkang pa'i 'thil bar du/ /nor bu'i skud pa bzhin du bgrod/ /na de mtshams kyi don dam par/ /sa gsum po la lta bar 'gyur/ /
de phyir skye bo thams cad la/ /mtshon bya mtshan nyid kyis 'byed do/ /dbang po de rnams thams cad la/ /bdag nyid kyis 'bugs slar ci smos/ /'gro ba gzhan du rab 'jug par/ /mchog tu
rmad byung 'gro bar 'gyur/ /sgyu 'phrul dra bar yang dag gnas/ /skye ba kun la rnam par blta/ /mig sogs rnam par shes pa ni/ /nad rnams su ni bskyod par byos/ /mkha' 'gro'i rnam par
de shes bya/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi gzugs kyi gtso/ /dkyil 'khor sngon du sprul par ni/ /mche gtsigs la sogs bsgom par bya/ /rang gi khams ni bde ba'i gzugs/ /
rang rang gtso bor bya ba yin/ /de las skyes pa'i mkha' 'gro che/ /mkha' 'gro ma dang bcas pa'i gzugs/ /thams cad chos 'byung sna tshogs pa'i/ /snying por gzhom du med zhi ba/ /chos kun
gcig tu yongs bsdus pa/ /sngags pas cho ga bzhin du bri/ /A li kA li mnyam byas nas/ /sde tshan rnams kyis yongs brjes pa/ /'dod don thams cad sgrub byed pa/ /der gnas
dpa' bos yang dag btu/ /ye shes lha sogs sku bzhi po/ /zhes bya 'thob 'gyur the tshom med/ /steng 'og rtag tu dngos grub ster/ /bdag nyid pho nya kun 'gros so/ /yi ge lnga bcu sde
tshan brgyad/ /de nyid mkha' 'gro mchog rmad byung / /sdom pa'i dkyil 'khor yang na ni/ /chung ngu'i rgyud dang 'dra ba mchog /yi ge thams cad kyi ni tshad/ /sdom pa sogs su mtshon par bya/ /
yi ge rnams dang ming rnams dang / /sdom pa rnams su de brjod do/ /dkyil 'khor rnams dang rgyud rnams dang / /le'u rnams dang de bzhin du/ /las tshogs rnams ni thams cad de/ /
nyis 'gyur thung ngu ring ba'o/ /de nyid du ni kun nges rgyal/ /'byin cing sdud par byed pa po/ /sems can rigs zhes 'dir de bshad/ /re re yi ni mtshan nyid do/ /re re yi ni bsgom pa ni/ /ji lta'i
rim pas shes par bya/ /yi ge yi ni ming dang gzugs/ /de ni sems can gzugs su 'dod/ /gsang sngags de ni zlos bzhin pa/ /de nyid du ni rab bzhug bya/ /a yig thig le dang bral ba/ /
dmar po phyi mo rnam par spangs/ /a yig thig le dang bcas pa/ /de phyir mtshal gyi rigs can no/ /gu nya dza yi me tog de mnyam par/ /i yig la ni brgyan par 'dod/ /I yig sin d+hu
ra yi mdog /bzang po lnga par shes par bya/ /u yig dbang po'i gzhu yi 'od/ /U yi yi ge drug pa nyid/ /klog gnyis dang ni 'dra ba'o/ /ri yig du ba'i kha dog ste/ /phra mo lus ni spangs pa'o/ /
rI yi yi ge mun pa'i gzugs/ /li ni bya rog gshog pa mtshungs/ /lI yi yi ge mtshal gyi mdog /e yi yi ge dmar skya te/ /ai sin d+hu ra dmar mdog ma/ /o yi yi ge nyi ma 'dra/ /
'od zer stong phrag gyen du 'bar/ /au yi yi ge rtag 'bar ba/ /nyi ma bye ba dang mnyam 'od/ /zla phyed de bzhin du thig le/ /aM yig sngon du bshad pa can/ /zla ba gnyis dang tsheg drag ste/ /aH

yig rgyal po de bzhin du/ /de ltar stong pa nyid bcu drug /las rnams kyi ni dag pa'i rgyu/ /myos dang brlab gdol rmongs pa dang / /sems bral dang po'i stong nyid do/ /rmongs pa dang 'khrugs dbang dang ni/ /
myur du thams cad ster ba'o/ /bsam bral ba dang myos pa dang / /brlab gdon du ni bsal ba'o/ /stong pa nyid kyi las bsgoms pas/ /de ni rmugs dang dbang du 'ong / /yang dag rmongs dang rnams
rmongs 'gyur/ /lus brlan pa dang sems pa bral/ /dbang du 'od dang dgug pa dang / /ye shes shes bya can mchog go/ /bskrad pa dang ni bzhu ba'i las/ /rnam pa bdun du 'dod pa yin/ /sa yi zil
gnon 'dzin bzhin dang / /bsngags min pa dang rmongs pa'i sems/ /skye ba 'di la nam du yang / /de yi slar yang 'ong min pa'o/ /rnam par sdang dang thams cad kyi/ /'jig rten gyis ni smod pa'o/ /
'jig rten kun dang mthun med la/ /skad cig gnas pa spangs pa'o/ /yid kyi las ni thams cad rnams/ /de phyir 'jig rten gsum gang 'gyur/ /bde ba kha yis bkug byas nas/ /
dbugs med ri mo 'dzag pa nub/ /phyi mo'i yal ga rnams kyis bya/ /dam tshig dbang phyug ma'i gnas kyis/ /phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin ni/ /gnyis stong mchog tu zag pa med/ /sangs rgyas
ri mo steng 'og tu/ /pad ma'i snal can rab tu gnas/ /A li kA li mdor bsdus pa/ /bcud len khams kyi lus las so/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs lha/ /zhal du yongs su 'gyur ba'o/ /
de yi 'og dang gang gzhan du/ /yi ge thams cad nges par gnas/ /so sor snang ba ma byung bar/ /bsrung ba gyis zhes bdag gis bshad/ /sems ni rjes mthun dbyangs su 'gyur/ /sems ni stong

pa'i rang bzhin can/ /zla gnyis yang dag sbyor ba ni/ /phyag rgya mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'o/ /de ltar khams kyi rang bzhin kyang / /ji ltar 'dod pa'i las bya'o/ /slar yang thams cad byed pa yi/ /stong pa nyid

ni so sor dgod/ /thog ma gnyis ni rkang gnyis dgod/ /brla dang gsang ba rked pa dang / /lte ba snying ka steng dang ni/ /mgrin pa dang ni rkan de bzhin/ /kha dang sna dang rna dag dang / /dpral ba mgo bo rgyab tu ste/ /

rang gi khams ming 'du shes kyis/ /dbang la sogs pa'i las byed do/ /slar yang re re yi yang ni/ /las ni nyi shu lnga'i bdag nyid/ /stong nyid de nyid rig byed pa/ /rgyun du nang du bsgom par bya/ /ka yig
la sogs ma yig mthar/ /lha mo bdag nyid chen mos nyon/ /gang gis sa gsum gyi ni lha/ /thams cad lha ma yin dang mi/ /bsgrub pa'i legs par nges par ni/ /de rnams thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ /

de nyid nyi shu rtsa lnga ni/ /ka yig sogs su 'du shes so/ /bdag dang dkyil 'khor lus dang ni/ /lha dang bla ma dang ni sngags/ /rnam shes ye shes snying po dang / /dus dang rgyu dang 'bras de bzhin/ /'bugs

dang bcud len las dang ni/ /gtor ma sa dang phyag rgya gzhan/ /dbang po dbu ma sgyu ma dang / /mtshams dang rigs rus de bzhin te/ /lung ni rjes su rig pa dang / /mig 'phrul 'dra ba rim ji ltar/ /de ltar
de nyid las mdzes pa/ /shes rab chen pos shes par bya/ /rang bzhin gyi ni brjod pa'i las/ /dus kyi me yi mdog can no/ /ji ltar dbang las sogs pa'i las/ /lnga lnga ru ni gsal ba yin/ /dmar dang
gnag dang de bzhin dkar/ /ser dang ljang gu de bzhin no/ /sgrub po'i bsgrub bya'i 'dod pa ni/ /de rnams de nyid 'gyur gyis 'ong / /ya yig la sogs dgu rnams kyi/ /ji lta'i cho gas yi ge rnams/ /
phung po khams kyi rigs rnams dang / /yan lag dgu rnams brjod pa'o/ /ji lta'i rim pas blo ldan gyis/ /dgu dgu ru ni shes par bya/ /las ni de rnams shes bya ste/ /'dus pa bde mchog bla ma dang / /

bde mchog rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / /'byung ba de nyid 'dus pa dang / /rdo rje 'jigs byed sa~M bu Ta/ /ji lta'i cho gas gzhan du yang / /de ltar nges brjod 'bum gsum las/ /phyung ba bde mchog chung ngu ste/ /
a yig la sogs k+Sha yig mthar/ /le'u rnams ji lta'i rim pa yis/ /de kho na nyid ldan par sbyar/ /sdom pa rgya mtsho mkha' 'gro skyes/ /mkha' mnyam nang du rab bshad pa'i/ /de yi sgrub thabs bshad

par bya/ /ji ltar dbus ma'i pad mar ni/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni gsal bar bsgom/ /sku yi rgya mtsho ser sna rgya mtsho dang / /'dod chags rgya mtsho phrag dog rgya mtsho ste/ /phyogs bzhi por ni bsgom par bya/ /

pad 'dab rnams su rnal 'byor ma/ /rdo rje rgya mtsho rin chen rgya mtsho ma/ /pad ma rgya mtsho sna tshogs rgya mtsho ma/ /g.yon skor du ni bsgom bya ste/ /'dab ma bzhi la thod pa ni/ /rgya mtsho bzhi po

yi ni gzugs/ /dngos kun bdud rtsir son pa'o/ /slar yang grwa bzhi po rnams su/ /ji lta'i rim pas dgod bya ba/ /rnal 'byor ye shes de kho na/ /thar pa'i rgya mtsho g.yon skor du'o/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri

dang ro/ /reg dang chos dang yid dang sems/ /kun kyang rgya mtshor shes bya ste/ /g.yon dang g.yas kyis dgod par bya/ /sa dang nam mkha' lce dang ni/ /rna ba thams cad rgya mtsho ste/ /ye shes shes bya'i rgya mtsho dag /

sngon gyi rim pas dgod par bya/ /sgo skyong ba yi lha mo che/ /g.yon skor du ni dgod bya ba/ /glang po rgya mtsho rta rgya mtsho/ /seng ge rgya mtsho ma he mtsho/ /grwa la gnas pa'i lha mo ni/ /sgyu ma rgya mtsho rmi lam rgya mtsho ma/ /

gsang snang rgya mtsho snang ba'i rgya mtsho ma/ /kha dog 'khor lo gzhan gyi bzhin/ /byang chub chung ngu bdag nyid che'i/ /dkyil 'khor de yir shes par bya/ /dur khrod brgyad kyi rim pas ni/ /sgrub thabs rim pas
bsgom par bya/ /sangs rgyas gzugs kyi zhal nas ni/ /pad ma'i yu ba nges par 'thon/ /kha dog dkar po 'bar chen po/ /pad ma 'dab ma stong phrag can/ /de yi dbus su bsgom bya ba/ /mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho
bde mchog ste/ /phyag stong pa ni rnam par bsgom/ /zhal ni sum bcu rtsa bdun no/ /zhabs bcwa brgyad kyis gar du mdzad/ /spyan gsum pa la sna tshogs mdog /ral pa'i cod pan can gyis gzugs/ /sna

tshogs rdo rje zla phyed can/ /rgyab tu dbang phyug chen po 'dzin/ /lhag mar dpa' bo dpa' dbang mo/ /bcu gnyis bdag nyid can 'khor lor/ /ji ltar bdag gis sngon bshad pa'o/ /shes rab phyag g.yon du bshad te/ /g.yas

par rgyun du thabs yin no/ /khyab 'jug drag po de bzhin tshangs/ /gshin rje dang ni log 'dren dang / /bden bral dang ni thags bzangs ris/ /dbang po tshogs bdag kar ti ka /dgra bcom zla ba nyi ma dang / /bla ma

skyob pa bla de bzhin/ /nor rgyas dang ni skyes bu me/ /myos ba zhabs kyis gnon pa ste/ /rang rang khyim thab yang dag ldan/ /mdog dang mtshon cha yang bya'o/ /phag mo yis ni 'khyud pa ste/ /de'i gzugs can
nam phyag gnyis skyes/ /sna tshogs gzugs 'dzin rab myur ma/ /slar yang rang 'dra'i gzugs can ma'o/ /'dab ma stong du bsgom bya ba/ /rang bzhin rnal 'byor ma kun te/ /bcom ldan kha dog gang 'dra ba/ /

de 'drar de rnams mtshon par bya/ /thung ngu ring po yon tan 'phar/ /a yig la sogs sde brgyad de/ /phyi mo bcu gnyis kyis phye ba/ /stong phrag rnal 'byor ma'i yang ngo / /ka rdo rje sogs shes bya ste/ /
khams kyi rkyen gyi yid kyis so/ /'khor lo drug bdag rnal 'byor can/ /de thams cad ni gar du mdzad/ /thams cad kyis ni ro la gnon/ /phyag gnyis pa 'am mkha' 'gro'i bdag /thod pa kha T+wA~M ga
'dzin ma/ /bde chen rnam pa'i gzugs can ma'o/ /sangs rgyas thugs ka nas spro ba/ /'khor lo gsum 'gro 'od zer phreng / /srog ni 'og dang steng lta bas/ /sdom pa rgya mtsho dgug par bya/ /slar

yang dbugs kyis dbyung ba ni/ /mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho gnyis med bdag /thams cad sdom pa'i sgrub thabs su/ /ji lta'i rnal 'byor gzhan bya'o/ /de ltar byed bzhin pa nyid kyis/ /phyag rgya'i dngos grub skye bar

'gyur/ /gzhung thams cad ni blta bar bya/ /gzhan pa'i rnal 'byor dmigs mi bya/ /dam tshig gi ni spyod pa can/ /sdom pa chung ngur rab tu bshad/ /thams cad sog ma bzhin dor la/ /thams cad sdom pa gzung bar
gyis/ /mche ba rnams gtsigs rab sbyor bas/ /gzhu 'gengs rim pas 'ong bar gyis/ /de yi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yang / /sngon gyi sbyor bas bsgom par bya/ /'og dang steng gnyis mche
ba gnyis/ /bde mchog mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho dag /rang ming brjod pa'i gsang sngags la/ /hU~M phaT yi ge mthar sbyar gyis/ /yang dag ting 'dzin rdo rje yi/ /gsang sngags thams cad la bya'o/ /thams
cad rgyan ni rab bshad pa'ang / /sngags rig pa yis sngon bzhin no/ /bdag gi bdag pos rgyud 'di ni/ /gsungs pas yang dag dga' bar 'gyur/ /nyid dang lhan cig bya ba byas/ /phyag rgya 'og ste ji
ltar lags/ /khyod kyis 'og dang steng phyag rgya/ /rab bshad bya yis lha mo nyon/ /mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho shes rab che/ /thabs ni sdom pa rgya mtsho'o/ /'og dang steng du snyoms 'jug pas/ /de ni
phyag rgya mngon brjod 'gyur/ /zhal las nges par 'thon yu ba/ /ngag gis bsgos pa'i bdag nyid do/ /de ni mkha' 'gro spyod de yang / /rnam par shes dang thams cad 'ong / /zhu ba'i gzugs ni
snying ga ru/ /'od kyis thams cad sdom par gyis/ /de ni theg pa cher sdom pa/ /bdag nyid chen po ye shes gzugs/ /de ltar gnyis su byar med gzugs/ /de ni phyag rgyar mngon par brjod/ /
dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho che/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i cho ga ste
rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'o// // de nas lha mos mchod byas nas/ /phyag byas nas ni 'di skad gsol/ /sems can rnams kyi sdom byung ba/ /bcom ldan bdag po nyid kyis gsungs/ /lha dgra yi ni rab sbyor

bas/ /rab bshad bya yis lha mo nyon/ /byang chub sems kyi cha can gyi/ /bde ba 'ongs ba gang zhig rtsa/ /sdom pa sems can smin byed pa'i/ /rnal 'byor der ni rnam par spro/ /'dod chags chags bral rnam 'dres
pa/ /sdom pa skya 'gro'i gzugs can no/ /gang phyir de nyid kyis sdom pa/ /sngon gyi spyod pa'i sdom pa'o/ /bai yi nam mkha' nam mkhar te/ /sku gsum rnams kyi yang dag bzhugs/ /chos dang longs spyod
rdzogs sprul pa/ /'thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /gang tshe sems ni 'gro bzhin pa/ /gzugs kyi dbus su thim par gyis/ /rang rig bdag nyid byang chub ldan/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i sku 'thob 'gyur/ /
ting 'dzin skad cig rig med pa/ /gang gi srid gsum la thim gyis/ /de ni 'byung bar shes bya ste/ /lus can gzhan rnams kyi sdom min/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyi gsang sdom pa/ /de ltar de nyid nges
shes bya/ /nang gi bdag nyid nyin zhag gi'ang / /de yis sdom par bshad par 'gyur/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yongs ldan pa'i/ /A li kA li sogs sde tshan/ /dang po'i yi ge'i cha la sogs/ /
gang du ming ni nges par mthong / /rigs ni de ru shes bya ste/ /ang ka'ang sems can yang dag ldan/ /mtha' yas la sogs klu gang dang / /nyi ma la sogs gza' de bzhin/ /mkha' 'gro ma'i mi de
thog byas nas/ /ma mo de rnams su rab grags/ /lha rnams kun gyis bskyed pa dang / /sngags rnams kyi dang rgyud nyid kyi'ang / /'jig rten kun gyi ma yin te/ /de yis ma la yang dag brten/ /rtsa ni

dgu po 'gog pa las/ /srog rgyu rnams su shes par bya/ /a A ka tsa Ta ta pa dang / /ya sha'i sde tshan yi ge dgu/ /i I kha tsha Tha tha pha/ /ra Sha gnyis par brjod pa'o/ /u U ga dza Da da ba/ /la sa sde
tshan gsum pa'o/ /e ai g+ha dza D+ha d+ha b+ha/ /bo ha sde tshan bzhi pa'o/ /o au a~M aHnga nya Na/ /na ma de ltar dgu'i bdag nyid/ /bzhi po yongs su grags pa ste/ /nyi can
lnga rnams kyis de bzhin/ /de ltar 'jig rten kun gyi de/ /sdud pa dang ni 'byin par gnas/ /sgyu chen bcu gnyis de rnams kyis/ /sa bon gzugs kyi tshogs dran bya/ /de rnams rA sir yang dag grags/ /

rgyu skar kun dang yang dag ldan/ /zla ba dang ni nyi ma'i chas/ /'og dang steng gi kha de bzhin/ /brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba gnyis/ /rgyu skar dang ni rA sir bshad/ /srog zung ngu ni de bzhin grags/ /ring dang chung

ngu rgyal dang pham/ /steng du de yi rgyal bar bshad/ /'og tu 'chi ba mnyam mi mnyam/ /nyi ma'i rgyu bar son pa kun/ /rgyu skar rA si gza' de bzhin/ /rA si rnam gsum spyod gang phyir/ /nyi mar gnas par
'char bar 'gyur/ /srog 'char ba dang yang dag ldan/ /rA si kun gyis shes par bya/ /kar ka Ta seng bu mo dang / /bum pa rigs drug yang dag ldan/ /'char bar 'gyur dang shar ba yang / /ji lta'i

rim dag gza' kun gyis/ /bri sh+tsi ka dang rta nyid dang / /ri dgas bum par yang dag ldan/ /cha shas lnga yi tshad gyi ni/ /gza' shar ba yis 'char bar 'gyur/ /ri bong lug de bzhin nyid dang / /skan da ru ni
son de bzhin/ /cha shas kyang ni bzhi pa nyid/ /'char ba 'ong bar 'char bar 'gyur/ /zhag gi 'char ba ma lus pa'ang / /'bras bu'i ming dang yang dag ldan/ /nag mo sogs nas 'jib ma'i mthar/ /

yongs su rim pas nyi shu bzhi/ /gang dang 'dra ba'i ming de 'dra'o/ /de rnams 'bras bur shes par bya/ /nyis 'gyur longs spyod bris pa dang / /dbang po rnams kyi cha dang ldan/ /thob pa zhag tu shes bya ste/ /bdag gi rtag

lha mo/ /bdag nyid kyis ni dgos kun dang / /gzhan rnams la yang de ltar sbyar/ /de phyir phyi dang nang rnams su/ /dge dang mi dge'i las shes bya/ /sdom pa 'byung ba'i dus su ni/ /rnam rtog med pas mtshon par
bya/ /gza' gang de rnams dbyangs shes bya/ /dbyangs gang de rnams rA si'o/ /dbyangs dang rA si de bzhin skar/ /rang gi gzugs rnams kyang blta'o/ /dngos grub 'bras bu ster ba po/ /yang dag sbyor dang
bral na med/ /g.yo ba'i 'char bas g.yo ba'i las/ /nges par brtan pas g.yo med 'gyur/ /'dren ma yis ni 'dren mar 'gyur/ /sems can rnams kyi bsod nams rgyus/ /lha rnams grol ba'i rgyu nyid pas/ /

lha yis dgra ni bsgom par bya/ /sum bcu bdun bdag nyid 'khor lo/ /rnal 'byor dngos grub byed pa'i gtso/ /kha dog dang ni mtshan nyid dbyibs/ /las rjes 'brangs pas bsgom par bya/ /lha 'am lha min sbyin byed
kyi/ /dgra ni 'khor lo sdom pa'o/ /dpa' bo thams cad snyoms 'jug pas/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro lha yi dgra/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni

lha dgra yi cho ga ste rab tu byed pa lnga pa'o// // de nas rnal 'byor ma thams cad/ /'dus par byas nas 'dri ba ni/ /lha dang sbyin byed sems can gyi/ /sdug bsngal ster po ji ltar lags/ /gal te kun rang
bzhin ston pa/ /dge dang mi dge de 'dri ba/ /de nas bcom ldan lha la sogs/ /sems can kun ster po ci lags/ /'di la bdag ni the tshom mchis/ /gtso bo gsal bar mdzod cig kyi/ /phag mo la sogs

mang po yi/ /lha mo sgyu ma chen mo nyon/ /rang rang las kyi rjes 'brangs pas/ /lha dang sbyin byed sems can gyi/ /bdag gi rang bzhin du ni med/ /byang chub chen por zhu las yod/ /rang gi rang bzhin yon tan nyid/ /
bdag gi las kyis yang dag 'byung / /de phyir dge dang mi dge blta/ /sna tshogs kun rtog 'thob par byed/ /de yis lha dang sbyin byed rnams/ /gza' dang rA si rgyu skar can/ /rang gi las

'bras la za ba/ /ster ro gzhan du ci yang med/ /ston pa ji ltar grol bar 'gyur/ /glu 'di yis ni dgyes par byed/ /a mi tA b+ha dza ni tA ma sa mA d+h+ya mA ga mA ga mA d+hanya/ ma pA nya rI sA mA nya ri ga mA sA nya mA rI gi ma b+hU ya te/

sa rI re sA rI re sA nya shru ta ni sA mA nya sA nI/ shI rI b+ha ga mA d+hA m+mA d+ha m+mA sA nya pA yA ma pA pA ma dang mi te/ 'od dpag med kyi rab sbyor bas/ /'di 'dra'i grol ba bsgrub par bya/ /a ba d+hU tI'i dbus su ni/ /
rnam shes grol ba la mtshon bya/ /srog la sogs pa'i rlung thams cad/ /rnam 'gyur byas pa'i bar thim bya/ /rnam par shes pa 'dres gyur pa'ang / /khams thams cad kyi bcud len te/ /'thungs pas dngos

grub thob par 'gyur/ /dbang po rnam bgrod mtshan nyid las/ /rkan gyi phyogs su gnas pa'i lce/ /a ba d+hU tIr de rab bshad/ /cha shas can gyi tha ma yi/ /bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni 'dzag par 'gyur/ /rtsa thams
cad du bkang ba ste/ /yang dag rig pa'i gzugs su thim/ /mdor bsdus pas ni khams lnga ste/ /gzhan gyi dngos po 'dir ma brjod/ /dbang chen la ni me yis bsreg /chu yi dbus su rab tu thim/ /myur du
zhu nas 'gro bar 'gyur/ /rlung gi nam mkha' la gnas so/ /chu yi tshogs ni bskam byas pas/ /de nyid du ni thim nas 'gro/ /sems ni stong nyid la son bya/ /stong nyid nam mkha'i khams la'o/ /nam mkha'

ye shes la 'jug bya/ /ye shes sgyu ma'i rang mtshan nyid/ /mkhas pas ye shes shes bya'i bdag /de ltar 'od dpag med pa bsgom/ /brtsibs brgyad legs par brgyan pa yi/ /shes bya'i 'khor lo 'di bsgom bya/ /
pu med bri ba mi u ku/ /d+ha si me ro ma ka 'drer/ /rlung du tu ka bi mi te/ /dbang ldan du ni rA si'o/ /de rnam 'khor lo rim ji bzhin/ /de bzhin 'di la 'di rnams dgod/ /a i u e o'i sa bon/ /

bkra shis la sogs gza' lnga ni/ /shar la sogs par dgod par bya/ /ring po de nyid du dgod bya/ /a~M a nyi ma zlar shes bya/ /nyi ma zla ba 'dir grol ba/ /ku le re la nyi ma ste/ /gza' lhag gdong lnga pa
'dir gnas/ /mthar ni gang zhig lhag ma yi/ /so so'i cho gas za bar 'gyur/ /rA si rnams kyi brgyan pa yi/ /'gro kun la phan 'khor lo de/ /de ltar do la'i 'khor lor 'gyur/ /rgyu skar rA si dus dang

zhag /lugs rnams ro hi ti sogs dang / /zla ba dang ni nyi ma rnams/ /'chi ba'i mtshan nyid mtshon pa ni/ /mdor bsdus pa yis bshad par bya/ /rgyu skar dus tshod yang dag ldan/ /gza' dang nad ni de bzhin

to la rA si'i tshad kyis ni/ /skye ba'i las su brjod pa yin/ /kAr te ka dang bzang po'i tshe/ /mig dmar de bzhin smin drug ste/ /de la 'chi bar shes par bya/ /gal te rnal 'byor pa med na'o/ /mri ga shir sha mgo dang ni/ /gza' lhag nyi ma la smyo ba/ /

mgul pa'i nad kyi nyin bzhin no/ /khyu mchog la ni rtag tu 'chi/ /rgyal dang mri ga'i rgyu skar dang / /gza' lhag 'khrig pa la 'chi'o/ /ku li ra mchu'i tshes brgyad kyi/ /tho rangs pa sangs la 'chi'o/ /gre dang mchu yi rgyu skar dang / /tshes bcu spen pa seng

ge la/ /nub mo 'chi bar shes bya ste/ /gal te brgya byin mnyam gyur kyang / /bu mo nyi mar gul mas 'chi/ /sa ga dang ni bcu bzhi dang / /gzhu dang phur bu'i re mo dang / /gal te sangs rgyas mnyam gyur pa/ /srang la 'chi bar shes par bya/ /snron dang bcu gcig nam po dang / /phur bu
