sdig pa la 'chi'o/ /chu stod chu smad tshes dgu dang / /gro bzhin gzhu dang pa sangs 'chi/ /gro bzhin tshes bdun zla ba dang / /rgyal dang chu srin lag nor med/ /khrums stod khrums smod bcu gsum pa/ /zla ba mon gre bum pas 'dzad/ /tha skar brgyad pa nam gru dang / /spen pa dang ni
nya la 'chi/ /sems can kun gyi skye ba'i rtsis/ /dus smra bas ni shes par bya/ /sa bon gcig las skyes yon tan/ /gnyis pa skye ba'i dus kyis so/ /rigs gnyis su ni shes byas nas/ /
de'i dus skye rtsis brtsam par bya/ /sngon las rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /mkhas pas de'i rigs su skye'o/ /de yi 'bras bu shes bya ste/ /mtshan nyid kyis ni rjes su gnas/ /rA si sogs 'khor
'brel pa de/ /rnam shes kun gyi mtshan nyid do/ /'od dpag med kyi rab sbyor bas/ /dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgom par bya/ /dbus su 'od dpag med mgon po/ /lhag mar mkha' 'gro
ma sogs so/ /de ni rnam shes skye gsal bar/ /las kyi 'bras bu de dran bya/ /thams cad bde ba kun sbyor las/ /de tshe gnyis med la brten pa'i/ /'od dpag med kyi sbyor ldan pa/ /bcom ldan
ston pas 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni 'od dpag med kyi cho ga ste rab tu byed pa drug pa'o// // rdo rje 'od kyi rab sbyor bas/ /ye shes de kho nyid bshad bya/ /lha mos slar yang mchod byas nas/ /
de kho na nyid ye shes zhus/ /sems can rnams kyi rnam nges pas/ /'chi ba'i mtshan nyid gang 'dra ba/ /de 'dra bdag gis bshad bya yis/ /rtse gcig pa yi yid kyis nyon/ /lus la rtsa rnams mtshan
ma ni/ /de rnams ji ltar gsal bar dbye/ /rtsa chen sum bcu rtsa gnyis te/ /de rnams kyi ni gtso bo mchog /bcu gnyis de bzhin du lha mo/ /dbyangs rnams bgrod pa'i mtshan nyid de/ /dkar po nag
po'i phyogs kyis ni/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru ni brjod/ /der ni snying po dgu po mchog /lus kyi mtshan ma'i mtshan nyid do/ /gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni/ /'chi ba'i dus lta bur gnas so/ /dbugs ni

rnam par spros tsam gyis/ /lus can 'pho ba drug gnyis na/ /snga dro ro hi ta yi char/ /de yi rtags ni mtshon par bya/ /sna dang mig gi phyogs dang ni/ /'gram pa dang ni rna ba'i rtsar/ /lce dang mche ba'i mtshams

dang ni/ /mgrin pa rtsibs logs de bzhin du/ /snying gi gur dang lte ba dang / /brla dang byin pa de bzhin gzhan/ /'doms dang ling ga dag de bzhin/ /mgo bo dang ni spyi bo'i phyogs/ /mtshams ni de rnams
thams cad du/ /dbugs ni 'chad cing 'chad pa'o/ /lus kyi mtshan ma dgu rnams te/ /'chi ba'i dus ni bstan pa yin/ /nyi ma'i tshad kyi grangs rnams ni/ /'khor lo dus bdag nyid can dga'/ /gang tshe
nyi ma drug rnams zhon/ /gcig brjod pa ni brgyan pa yin/ /der ni lo gsum 'gyur can te/ /sum brgya drug bcu rnams de bzhin/ /cha shas de ltar gyi ni tshad/ /mdor bsdus pa yis bshad par bya/ /

nyi ma bdun ni yongs thob nas/ /gang tshe rlung ni 'bab pa na/ /lo gnyis yang dag brjod pa na/ /dus kyi grangs can zla ba dang / /nyi ma rnams ni bcwa brgyad kyi/ /gang zhig tshad du yang dag brjod/ /zhag brgyad

rnams su yongs gtong pas/ /rlung ni gang tshe 'bab pa na/ /lo gnyis su ni yongs bshad par/ /de yi 'tsho ba yi ni grangs/ /nges par de tshe 'chi ba ni/ /de yi zla ba rig byed grangs/ /nyi ma nyi shu rtsa
bzhir bshad/ /'tsho ba yi ni dus grangs so/ /lha mo nyi ma dgur 'bab na/ /lo gnyis su ni de 'tsho ste/ /zla gnyis nyi ma nyi ma yi/ /tshad ni sbyor ba'i lus can no/ /lha mo nyi ma bcu rnams kyis/ /

lo gnyis su ni de 'tsho'o/ /nyi ma bcu gcig de bzhin du/ /gang tshe rtsa ni rab 'jug na/ /lo gcig gi ni lam bcas pas/ /zla ba yang ni dgu'i grangs kyis/ /nyi ma bcwa brgyad rab tu bshad/ /the tshom med par
bshad pa'o/ /zhag ni bcu gnyis rab 'bab pas/ /lo gcig tu ni rab tu grags/ /zla ba yang ni lo'i grangs can/ /nyi ma rnams ni dus kyis mdzes/ /bcu gsum du ni gang tshe rtsa/ /
g.yas su bgrod pa 'bab pa na/ /lor ni yang dag bshad pa ste/ /zla ba yang ni rig byed grangs/ /nyi ma rnams ni dgu'i grangs na/ /'chi ba'i mtshan nyid bshad pa'o/ /lha mo gang tshe bdun gnyis su/ /

rtag tu rlung ni 'bab pa na/ /lo ni tshe ru yang dag bshad/ /zla ba'i tsher ni yang dag grags/ /nyi ma rnams ni bcu gnyis ste/ /de yi 'tsho ba'i tshad yin no/ /gang tshe lnga bcu nyi mar ni/ /rlung ni de bzhin 'bab

pa na/ /de tshe 'chi bar shes bya ba/ /lo gcig na ni the tshom med/ /nyi ma mchog ni phan pa yi/ /gang tshe brgyad gnyis su 'bab na/ /'tsho ba zla ba bcu dang ni/ /nyi ma rnams ni mchog grangs kyi/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i

nyi rnams kyi/ /tshad du bdag gi bshad pa'o/ /nyi ma rnams ni bcu bdun du/ /nges par gang tshe rlung 'bab na/ /de tshe de yi tshad kyi ni/ /zla ba rnams ni dgu dang ni/ /nyi ma bcwa brgyad na de bzhin/ /'chi ba'i

dus la the tshom med/ /nyi ma bcwa brgyad rgyu ba yis/ /zla ba yang ni brgyad na dang / /nyi ma rnams kyang nyi ma'i grangs/ /dus kyi grangs ni bshad pa'o/ /gang tshe gcig dman nyi shur ni/ /dri la zhon pa sbyong ba na/ /

nyi ma yang dag bshad bya ba/ /'tsho ba zla ba bdun dang ni/ /nyi ma rnams ni dus grangs bshad/ /dus 'di rnams kyis mchog gdong can/ /gang tshe nyi shu ru ni spyod/ /zla ba drug na tshe dang 'bral/ /nyi ma nyi shu gcig

rnams su/ /gang tshe nyi ma rab 'bab na/ /zla ba lnga ru yongs 'tsho ste/ /nyi ma rnams ni nyi ma'i grangs/ /nyi shu rtsa gnyis gang tshe 'bab/ /zla ba'i rig byed na tshe 'gro/ /nyi ma rnams ni nyi shu bzhi/ /zla ba rig byed

du bshad do/ /lha mo gang tshe nyi shu gsum/ /rlung ni rgyun du 'bab pa ni/ /de ni zla ba bzhir 'tsho ste/ /nyi ma dus rnams su dran bya/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhir rab 'bab pas/ /zla ba gsum du bshad pa ste/ /nyin bcu
gcig na de bzhin du/ /'chi ba'i dus su rnam par brjod/ /dus kyi grangs ni mdor bsdus nas/ /gong du sngon du bshad de'i phyir/ /bar gyi nyi ma ma bshad gang / /bcu gnyis nyid kyi grangs kyis ni/ /
cha yi rim pas de sbyangs nas/ /bar ni gsal bar byed pa yin/ /blo dman rnams kyis rtogs don du/ /dus 'di rnams ni rab tu bstan/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams shin phra mo'i/ /mthun ma dus ni
bdag gis bshad/ /lha mo de rnams kyis yid ches/ /khams ni mnyam pa can du 'gro/ /sna yi sha ni rnam chad cing / /steng bltas ma ni de bzhin 'bab/ /de yi 'tsho bar shes bya ba/ /nyi ma bdun
na the tshom med/ /mig gis gos ni yang dag chad/ /gyen kha bltas ma mchog de bzhin/ /cha shas dgu la yang dag zhon/ /lngas lhag pa na 'chad de bzhin/ /go dA ba r+ya 'khur ba yi/ /ngos su
steng du 'gro ba mo/ /nyi ma bcu ru shes bya ste/ /nub gcig gis lhag de bzhin no/ /rna ba g.yas la yongs brten nas/ /bzang mo steng du yang dag brten/ /bcu gcig cha shas la zhon te/ /
'chad pa bcwa brgyad na de bzhin/ /bcu gnyis de bzhin du lha mo/ /lce la ri mo nag po can/ /lus can kun gyi 'chi ba ni/ /nam zla'i mtshan mos shes par bya/ /bcu gsum so yi bar du ni/ /gdong
nag mo ni reg de bzhin/ /nam zla'i grangs kyi nyi rnams kyis/ /'byung po rnams kyi bgrod pa yin/ /rgyun du mchi ma 'bab gang rtsa/ /steng bltas mar ni rab tu grags/ /bcu bzhi pa yi dbyangs la zhon/ /
bcu phyed kyis ni the tshom med/ /snying ga'i gzeb ni zhom pa dang / /steng du lta ma de mchog ma/ /gsum dang lnga ru mdzes lha mo/ /zla ba phyed du the tshom med/ /lte ba'i dbus su son lha mo/ /

bcu drug cha bdag can yongs rdzogs/ /sen mo'i khrag med de bzhin zhag /nyin rnams bcu ru the tshom za/ /bcu bdun pa yi rtsa yang ni/ /brla yi steng du skams pa ni/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhir yang dag grags/ /

nyin gzhan nyin la the tshom med/ /byin pa zung gi gang zhig rtsa/ /steng du bltas ma de bzhin mchog /bcwa brgyad pa ru shes bya ste/ /nyi ma rnams kyang nyi grangs kyis/ /gcig gis dman pa'i nyi shu 'doms/ /
'chi'o steng du kha bltas mchog /mnyam pas 'chad par 'gyur ba la/ /'di yis 'tsho bar the tshom med/ /mtshan mar rol ldan mar grags ma/ /steng bgrod mchog gi dbang phyug ma/ /bcu gnyis su
ni yang dag grags/ /nyin rnams dus tshod the tshom za/ /bar gyi nyi ma gang bshad pa/ /bcu gnyis nyid la the tshom med/ /lo yi rim pas de sbyangs nas/ /bdun bcu rtsa gnyis rim pa yis/ /drug dang sum

bcu bcwa brgyad bcu/ /'di ni zla bas rim ji ltar/ /shes bya de ltar lha chen mo/ /rim gyis rim gyis dbye ba'o/ /lhag ma nyid ni bsdus 'gyur bar/ /'tsho ba yir ni shes par bya/ /yang dag cho ga 'di rnams kyis/ /

rdo rje 'od ni bsgom par bya/ /rab tu sbyor bas srog bkang bas/ /sangs rgyas lus la 'chi ci smos/ /rab tu sbyor ba 'di brten nas/ /mdor bsdus pa yis 'chad par 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i lam nas son pa'i srog /

snal ma bcu gnyis mtha' bar du'o/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran sbyor bas/ /'dod pa lnga can la za 'gyur/ /gsang sngags chen po'i 'od la ni/ /gnas nas kun du bgrod par bya/ /sgyu ma'i bdag nyid 'chi med 'gyur/ /
rnam pa dri za'i ris can no/ /rtswa yis kun nas 'gengs bzhin pa/ /dngos po kun la gnas pa yin/ /skye bo kun gyi khams rnams ni/ /ye shes rnam par 'thob par byed/ /chos bdag med pa 'dzag par
'gyur/ /gang zag rnams la dgod par 'gyur/ /gnyis ka sgyu ma chen mo ste/ /snying rje'i dbang gis bzhugs pa yin/ /mthar thug pa yi sbyor bas sems/ /mtshams rnams kun du 'chi ba yin/ /
'chi ba chen po sangs rgyas gzugs/ /rnal 'byor rnams la bde ster byed/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad gzung ba yi/ /thams cad bde ba'i bdag nyid 'gyur/ /'khor lo'i rim pa'i rab sbyor bas/ /
bde ba dam pa yang dag myang / /rdo rje'i 'od ni bsgom par bya/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs mtshungs ma/ /lha ni mngon rtogs gzugs can te/ /shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid can/ /srog kun
yang dag sbyor ba las/ /mchog tu zag med bzhugs ldan pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dus 'khor grags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'od kyi cho ga ste rab tu
byed pa bdun pa'o// // de nas phyag na rdo rje sogs/ /byang sems de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis/ /mchod pa byas shing phyag byas nas/ /'di skad du ni gsol ba'o/ /gtso bo lha rnams sgrub
thabs dang / /de rnams rang sngags bdag la gsungs/ /gang gis thams cad dbang gyur pa/ /gang gis rab sbyor nyid kyis lags/ /lha la sogs pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ /rdo rje sku yi rgyal po nyon/ /
gang gis yang dag cho ga yis/ /myur du dngos grub rab tu 'jug /dkyil 'khor bri ba byas nas ni/ /sku bsgom bya ba 'dir bshad de/ /de la ma mo lha rnams dang / /pho nya 'byung po gza' de bzhin/ /
lus srul po ni chen po dang / /rig pa'i gsang sngags 'dir brjod bya/ /dbus ma yi ni nang gnas pa/ /srid pa dag pas bsgrubs pa yin/ /dus thams cad du bskyed pa ni/ /dkyil
'khor du ni rab 'bab can/ /ma mo dbang chen bsgrub bya dang / /lha ni chu yi dkyil 'khor du/ /'byung po me la bsgrub bya ba/ /gza' ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor la/ /lus srul po ni namakhar to/ /rdo rje'i
sku yi rab sbyor bar/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor cha yis ni/ /a ba d+hU tIr 'bab pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor lnga rnams kyi tha ma/ /de yi dus su shes par bya/ /de bltas nas ni phyi rol du/ /ras bris logs
dkyil 'khor dgod/ /nag bo'i brgyad dang bcu bzhi la/ /'byung po'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya/ /'bum phrag bzlas pas de nas ni/ /ster 'gyur mdun du mngon sum du'o/ /tshangs ma zhi ba mo de

bzhin/ /gzhon nu ma dang phag mo dang / /dbang mo nyid dang tsa muN Di/ /tshogs kyi dbang mo me gdan mo/ /gnyis pa'i dum bur dbang po dang / /gshin rje chu lha lus ngan dang / /yi dgas dbang dang me stan

can/ /bden bral dang ni rlung de bzhin/ /dum bu gsum par dgod bya ba/ /nyi ma zla ba mig dmar dang / /gza' lag phur bu pa sangs dang / /spen pa dang ni rA hu'o/ /bzhi par tshangs khyab 'jug de bzhin/ /

drag po gzhon nu nges par sgor/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung / /'byung ba chen po'i khams rnams dang / /mkha' 'gro mar me 'jib ma dang / /kam po dzI khyab bdag de bzhin/ /'byung po 'byung po'i gzugs
kyis ni/ /rtag tu cho ga bzhin bsgrub bya/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba yis/ /kun nas phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri/ /ri mo sum skor dbus byin pas/ /brtul zhugs can gyis mdzes par bya/ /pad ma 'dab

brgyad bri bar bya/ /lte ba zab pa'i spyod yul can/ /de'i dbus su rdo rje'i sku/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /bzhad pa'i zhal la khro dang bcas/ /kha dog sngon po drag
chen po/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /nyi mar gar mdzad ro la bzhugs/ /sum bcu pa rnams 'jigs par mdzad/ /stag gi lpags pa'i na bza' 'dzin/ /bzang po'i gzugs can

spyan gsum pa/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M 'dzin/ /cang te'u gri gug gis ni brgyan/ /shar dang lho dang nub dang ni/ /byang du rim pa ji lta bas/ /mkha' 'gro kam po dza nyid ma/ /'jib ma dang ni mar me ma'o/ /

de ltar rdo rje sku yi don/ /mdor bsdus pa yis brjod par bya/ /lte bar rdo rje'i rnam par 'gyur/ /pho nya rkang pa drug bgrod ma'i/ /snying ga gsang ba mgrin pa ru/ /de nyid rnam par slar dgod bya/ /de nas srog
ni 'dzin bzhin pas/ /bsam gtan sems te gzhan gyis min/ /lha rdzas 'od zer bskyed par 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor pa rnams rang lus skyes/ /las dang po'i sbyor ba yis/ /phyogs bcur
rnam par spro bar 'gyur/ /hrIHyig las byung ba'i lha mo/ /phag mo phyag ni bzhi ma ste/ /gzhu dang mda' nyid de bzhin du/ /rgyal mtshan dang ni thod pa nyid/ /kha dog sngon mo drag chen mo/ /phag gi
gdong can 'jigs rung ma'o/ /pheM yig gis bris zhi ba mo/ /kha dog dmar mo 'od chen mo/ /thod pa dang ni lcags kyu nyid/ /kha T+wA~M Da ma ru de bzhin/ /hrI yi yi ges gzhon nu ma/ /kha dog ser mo

phyag bzhi ma/ /rtse gsum pa dang ba dan gsum/ /gzhu dang mda' nyid de bzhin no/ /ho yi yi ge sa tsa muN Di/ /kha dog nag mo phyag bzhi ma/ /kha T+wA~M ga nyid thod pa dang / /cang te'u chang snod de bzhin no/ /oM yig
las ni tshangs pa mo/ /kha dog dkar mo phyag bzhi ma/ /pad ma nyid dang thod pa dang / /gzhu dang mda' ni de bzhin mchog /gaM yig las ni tshogs dbang mo/ /kha dog ljang khu phyag

bzhi ma/ /rtse gsum po dang thod pa dang / /bgrang phreng dang ni la tU'o/ /bi yig las ni khyab 'jug ma/ /kha dog sngon mo phyag bzhi ma/ /'khor lo dang ni thod pa dang / /zhags pa ral gri de bzhin mchog /
i yig las byung ba dbang mo/ /kha dog ser mo phyag bzhi ma/ /rdo rje mdung thung thod pa dang / /sdigs mdzub bcas zhags de bzhin no/ /thams cad 'bar bzhin gyen brdzes skra/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis

rnam par klubs/ /ro la zhon ma spyan gsum ma/ /rkad par stag gi lpags pa dkris/ /shar sgor tshangs pa bri bya ba/ /kha dog dkar po phyag bzhi pa/ /thod pa dang ni bgrang phreng dang / /spyi blugs pad ma de

bzhin no/ /byang du de bzhin khyab 'jug ni/ /kha dog nag po phyag bzhi pa/ /ral gri de bzhin 'khor lo dang / /thod pa dbyug pa de bzhin no/ /lho ru drag po bri bya ste/ /du ba'i mdog can phyag bzhi pa/ /rtse gsum

thod pa de bzhin du/ /zhags pa phreng ba 'dzin de bzhin/ /nub tu gzhon nu bri bar bya/ /kha dog ser po phyag bzhi pa/ /dpa' bo mdung thung dbyug pa 'dzin/ /thod pa bgrang phreng 'dzin de bzhin/ /dbang ldan khyu mchog

la zhon pa/ /kha dog dkar po phyag bzhi ste/ /thod pa dang ni rtse gsum 'dzin/ /phyag gzhan thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /dbang po glang po la zhon pa/ /kha dog ser po phyag bzhi ste/ /rdo rje dang ni thod pa dang / /

thal mo sbyar ba byas pa mchog /me ru lug la zhon pa ni/ /kha dog dmar po phyag bzhi pa/ /me yi thab dang thod pa dang / /skrag nas de bzhin lag thal sbyar/ /gshin rjer ma he la zhon pa/ /kha dog nag po phyag

bzhi pa/ /dbyug pa de bzhin thod pa dang / /kun du skrag nas thal sbyar 'dzin/ /bden bral me la zhon pa ste/ /kha dog sngo skya phyag bzhi pa/ /ral gri dang ni thod pa 'dzin/ /kun nas skrag pas thal sbyar mchog /

chu lhar chu srin la zhon pa/ /kha dog dkar po phyag bzhi ste/ /zhags pa de bzhin thod pa dang / /thal mo sbyar ba de bzhin gzhan/ /rlung lha ri dgas la zhon pa/ /du ba'i mdog can phyag bzhi ste/ /ba dan dang ni

thod pa dang / /de bzhin thal sbyar 'dzin pa mchog /lus ngan du ni gter la zhon/ /kha dog ser po phyag bzhi pa/ /rin po che dang thod pa 'dzin/ /thal sbyar byas pa'o de bzhin gzhan/ /thams cad rgyu skar

dang ni gza'/ /rang dkyil 'khor la gnas pa bsgom/ /rang gi dam tshig las byung ba/ /de rnams rdzu 'phrul ldan stobs che/ /ma mo rnams dang kun gyi ma/ /'byung po rig ma de bzhin gzhan/ /de lta'i cho ga'i
bya ba yis/ /de phyir re re bsgom par bya/ /dur khrod la sogs gnas rnams su/ /sna tshogs dam tshig za rnams kyis/ /rnal 'byor longs spyod rtag dga' la/ /pho nya'i las ni yang dag brtsam/ /zla ba
rdo rje'i go cha yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'byung bzhin no/ /sngags kyi rgyal pos bskul ba yis/ /de thams cad ni bran bzhin byed/ /gnas sogs nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru/ /de phyir rim pas mchod par bya/ /
de nas dri sogs dbul bya zhing / /sngags kyi bzlas pa yang bya ste/ /rang mi brjod pa'i gsang sngags la/ /oM hU~M phaT sogs nang bcug pa'o/ /dbus su bcom ldan 'das brjes nas/ /der ni thams
cad bsgrub par bya/ /de nas gzhan brjes pa'i nang du/ /bcom ldan gzhan gyi gzugs can te/ /ba dan gsum pa 'bar ba dang / /rdo rje thod pa rdul can mchog /gzhu dang mda' ni 'dzin pa nyid/ /
g.yas dang g.yon pa'i phyag gis 'phyar/ /lhag ma sngon gyi gzugs can te/ /lus dang zhal sogs sngon gyi don/ /nges par dbus ma'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /'grub 'gyur 'di
la the tshom med/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i bdag /thams cad lus kyi rang bzhin can/ /gzugs thams cad kyi nang bzhugs pa/ /bcom ldan gzugs kyis 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni
rdo rje sku'i cho ga ste rab tu byed pa brgyad pa'o// // de nas 'dir ni bde rgyal po/ /rnal 'byor ma'i sad mdzad nas/ /ngag 'di yis ni 'dri bar mdzad/ /blo gros chen po du ci lags/ /kye rnal

'byor ma rnams khyed nyid dus/ /myu gu can gyis skyes pa'o/ /sna tshogs sa bon sems chen po/ /myu gu can gyi sbyor bas bshad/ /gza' dang rgyu skar tshes grangs ni/ /sems kyi dusu mngon par brjod/ /gzugs

med grangs ni de'i dus/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyi bde ba'i rgyu/ /'jig rten gyi ni dus tsam du/ /thub pa skyes mchog rnams kyis gsungs/ /de tshe myu gu can bsgom pa/ /sa bon sa bon gyi mtshan nyid/ /myu gu
sems kyi gzugs can te/ /sems las byung ba myu gu can/ /rgyu skar rA si gza' sogs pas/ /gang zhig du ni myu gu skyes/ /de yis myu gu can des bya/ /rang bzhin rang bzhin du sbyong bya/ /dge ba
'am ni mi dge kun/ /tshes grangs rgyu skar gza' 'char ba/ /de rnams thams cad dus rnams su/ /thams cad bde bdag nyid skyes sgom/ /ro tr-i ma ni rnyed byed pa'o/ /ma b+ha ma nad dang 'joms pas
spang / /ku swa A dus byed gzugs su ste/ /tshes grangs dus zer de ni yongs su spang / /mo bu mo bzang dang bkra shis so/ /ra bu A 'joms par byed pa'o/ /b+hu bu b+ha dus kyi gzugs kyis so/ /

b+ha pU gu rnyed pa byed pa po/ /mi gu d+ha nor la sogs par mdzad/ /tra gu a dus kyi gzugs can no/ /pri shu pU dge ba rnams byed do/ /b+hi shu pU nad dang 'joms pa yin/ /b+hu b+ha shu gshin rje'i mche can no/ /

kU ma kri grags dang bsod nams 'thob/ /byA ma a gdung ba byed pa po/ /pU ra ma 'chi ba'i dus can no/ /me'i gdan can du mi ki ra/ /slar yang gshin rjer raN Da spang / /srin por bcu lnga pa nyid dang / /

khyu mchog chu lhar spang bar bya/ /sems g.yengs rab tu 'joms nyid du/ /gter du rmi lam can de bzhin/ /bzang po mig gsum pa nyid du/ /'byung po'i nyi ma shar de bzhin/ /zla ba dang ni nyi sogs tshes/ /de
rnams res mo rab bshad bya/ /bzang po yugs sa mo de bzhin/ /sems g.yeng 'byung po'i nyi mar gnas/ /skye bo kun gyi nyi ma yi/ /cha yi rgyu bar shes par bya/ /khyu mchog mi ki ra nyid dang / /rmi lam
bcwa lnga pa de bzhin/ /zla ba'i rgyu bar yang dag grags/ /rim pa 'di rnams rnam par brjod/ /nyi la me ru yang dag gnas/ /stong la rlung gi gnas su'o/ /de ltar de dbus gnas pa ni/ /phyogs su
gdung byed yang dag gnas/ /zla ba nyi las byung ri mo/ /mnyam par lta bas mnyam par 'gro/ /zhi dang sdig pa bltas pa yis/ /shes rab can gyis des de spang / /mche ba dang phrad ma bltas pas/ /
bden par 'chi bar byed pa yin/ /dus smra ba ni mdor bsdus pa/ /rA hu'i rgyu bar grags pa yin/ /dkar dang gcig shos cho ga yis/ /blo gros mthar thug pas shes 'gyur/ /rgyu skar sogs dang mi mthun

par/ /rmongs pa gang zhig smra bar byed/ /skye bo rang gis byas pa yis/ /las 'di shes par ma gyur to/ /las de yis ni dus rnams ni/ /the tshom med par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /lus kyi tshogs pa ji srid pa/ /
de srid du ni dus rab 'jug /rnal 'byor pa rnams nyams su myong / /yang dag byang chub gnas 'thob 'gyur/ /de ni myu gu can du grags/ /kha dog dmar po 'od chen po/ /myu gu myu gu'i
gzugs can ni/ /lte ba'i rtsa bar gnas pa bsgom/ /'bar ba'i 'khor lo'-i nang son pa/ /gzugs de lha rdzas kyi ni gzugs/ /ye shes myu gu rnam bsgoms pas/ /las rnams thams cad mthong mi
'gyur/ /thams cad bdag nyid sbyor chen las/ /sngon las rnam par 'joms mdzad pa/ /rgyu rnams su ni rtag bzhugs pa'i/ /rdo rje rgyu yis 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni myu gu rdo rje myu gu can gyi
cho ga ste rab tu byed pa dgu pa'o// // de nas rdo rje'i gar byas nas/ /rnal 'byor mas ni 'di dris so/ /ji ltar ston pa sems dpa' che/ /las dang bral bas 'byung bar 'gyur/ /
sngon gyi las ni rnam nyams pas/ /rgyun nyams pas ni 'ong med pa/ /'di la bdag ni the tshom mchis/ /snying rje mnyes gshin pas bka' stsol/ /sems can chen po'i 'byung ba yang / /sngon gyi sangs rgyas
rnams gsungs pa/ /mdor bsdus pa yis bshad bya yis/ /khyod ni yid gcig pa yis nyon/ /rdo rje ral pa can sbyar bas/ /las kyi nang du sgrub par 'gyur/ /re re yi ni sbyor ba yi/ /de ni rang 'byung
du gnas so/ /shin du dad pa la gnas pas/ /dbang po thams cad 'du bar bya/ /de yi ral pas rtag 'jig rten/ /ral pa'i ming gis 'ching ba yin/ /dga' ba kun las khyad 'byed pa'o/ /rdo rje'i
sku khyod 'thob bar 'gyur/ /de phyir bag chags thams cad dang / /dge ba'i las las zad par 'gyur/ /skye bo chen po de 'byung ba/ /gcig nyid lam gyis 'thob par 'gyur/ /rtog pa med las rtog par 'gyur/ /

rtog pa yis ni rtog med 'byung / /dril bu'i sgra ni thob byas nas/ /de rnams mtshan nyid bshad par bya/ /rtse dgu rtse mo gcig pa dang / /rtse lnga rtse mo gsum pa can/ /de ltar la sogs dril bu che/ /rtse mo stong gi
bar du'o/ /sgra brjod pa yis dngos po yis/ /spros pa med cing yi ge med/ /rnal 'byor pa yis mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho dag /de yi sgra las rtog pa yang dag byung / /de nyid kyis ni rtog pa med pa'i bdag /

gnas rnams gang la nges par zhugs pa yin/ /sngon bshad rtse can de rdo rje/ /gang du yid ni rnam 'phro ba/ /chos dang sprul pa'i ris sku can/ /de nyid du ni gsor bar bya/ /phyi yi dril bu'i mtshan nyid ni/ /dpa'
bos gsungs pa bshad par bya/ /ril bu rtag tu cha gsum can/ /lha yis yang dag brgyan par bya/ /re re yi ni lha'i bdag po/ /ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor du ji ltar/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyis lhag
mos pas/ /de bzhin thams cad zhal bya'o/ /lha mo de rnams kyi ni gdan/ /dril bu de la pad sogs bya/ /ji ltar de rnams kyi ni rgyan/ /de bzhin dril bu'i ska rags so/ /lha ni sgo dang grwa rnams su/ /
phyogs brgyad rnams su bya ba nyid/ /ji ltar rnal 'byor pa'i mtshon bya/ /de rnams zhal nas rtse mo 'thon/ /bum pa sogs dang zhal gnyis la'ang / /steng du rang rigs mtshan ma can/ /'di 'dra

ba yi dril bu che/ /tshad ni gzhan du bshad pa yin/ /de ni nang gi gzugs can dag /de phyir sgra ni rnam mtshon bya/ /thig le'i gzugs ni khyab bdag che/ /rdo rje'ang de dang mnyam par bya/ /de ltar ral
pa'i sbyor ba las/ /sems can thams cad sgrub par bya/ /ral can dril bur yang dag grags/ /rdo rje rdo rjer brjod par 'gyur/ /rdo rje ral can bdag nyid kyis/ /dkyil 'khor du yang bsgom par bya/ /
rnal 'byor ma dang mkha' 'gro kun/ /de tshe nang du mngon par bzhug /thams cad gnyis pa yongs sbyor las/ /rdo rje ral pa can byung ba/ /rdo rje dril bur yang dag brten/ /bcom ldan dpa'
bos 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni rdo rje ral pa can gyi cho ga ste rab tu byed pa bcu pa'o// // de nas gzhan gyi sbyor ba che/ /dpa' bo chen po'i rab sbyor bas/ /bdag gis mngon sum du
bshad kyis/ /rnal 'byor ma kun mnyan par gyis/ /lus can kun gyi lus gang la/ /gnad ni stong phrag gnas pa ste/ /de rnams la yig dgod pa ni/ /ka sogs ha yig mthar de bzhin/ /yon tan
la sogs dbyangs rnams yig /khams re re la yi ge rnams/ /slar yang phyi mo bcu gnyis kyis/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis dbye bar bya/ /gtum mo stong phrag bdag nyid can/ /mtshams kun du ni gnas
pa 'bar/ /khams thams cad kyi bde gnas las/ /dpa' bo'i longs spyod 'thob par 'gyur/ /'od zer de rnams kyis bkug pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i rigs chen po/ /bdag med pa yis
bdag tu gzhag /gnyis med chos 'byung nang du'o/ /de ltar stong phrag gi ni lce/ /dpa' bo chen po'i go 'phang gnas/ /sman thams cad dang nye ba yin/ /sbas pa'i bcud len gsungs pa'o/ /
phyi rol rnams kyi'ang yi ge'i bdag /de yi ming nyid du shes par bya/ /me tog 'bras sogs sde tshan gyi/ /dang po'i ming ni stong phrag can/ /de rnams kyis ni bcud len bsgrub/ /gzhan du 'bras
bu med par 'gyur/ /ji lta'i rim pas rigs sogs kyi/ /ka sogs thams cad sman chen te/ /las smra ba yi rgyud gzhan du/ /der ni nges par gsal rig bya/ /dang po'i mgon po rnam bsgoms
nas/ /rtags rnams thob par bya ba yin/ /yang na grub rnal 'byor rnams kyi/ /bcud kyis len ni gang mthong ba/ /des kyang mthong ba tsam gyis ni/ /bla med dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur/ /
sde tshan rnam pas yongs sbyor las/ /bdud rtsi'i tshigs mtshams gzugs rnam pa'i/ /grub pa'i sman rnams rang bzhin can/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so/ /zhes
bya ba ni dpa' bo chen po'i cho ga ste rab tu byed pa bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas rnal 'byor ma dpa' mo/ /'dres pas mchod pa byas nas ni/ /grong khyer gsum gyi nang byung ba/ /
ston pa rdo rje che ci lags/ /gang gi gzugs kyis byon pa lags/ /sprul pa gang du bzhud pa lags/ /chos nyan pa yi dus su yang / /ci zhig gis ni brtan par bya/ /lha dang lha ma yin
dang mi/ /ci yi ngag gis 'gro dang 'ong / /mngon par tshigs mtshams mtshan nyid ni/ /sngon gyi ji bzhin bshad du gsol/ /mngon par tshigs mtshams mtshan nyid ni/ /ji lta'i rim pas bshad
kyis nyon/ /shin tu zab mo'i don chen po/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyis ma shes/ /sems can rnams kyi rang snang can/ /bdag gis nges par mdor bsdus pas/ /rdo rje sems 'od gzhan
nyid du/ /khams dang mtshan mar gnas min can/ /lus dang ngag sems dag pa yi/ /grong khyer gsum rnams su byung ba'o/ /sngon gyi dngos por khyer nas 'ong / /nges par las chung bar 'gro'o/ /
yang na dus rnams thams cad du/ /ji ltar me long la bzhin mthong / /sngon du nyan pa thob byas nas/ /sems kyang de yi gnas la'o/ /rdo rje la sogs ting 'dzin gyis/ /lha la sogs pa de rnams
rmongs/ /de yis rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi/ /rab tu sbyor bas rtag tu sprul/ /rdo rje'i rtse mor 'jig rten sprul/ /'od zer lcags kyu spro ba ste/ /hU~M gi ye ge'i sgra yis ni/ /ston pas 'khor lo
can mchog byas/ /chos 'byung khang pa brtsegs pa ru/ /nyi shu'i lhan cig skyes gdan du/ /ngag gi spyod pas nyan par byad/ /der song nas ni de la thim/ /de ltar rnal 'byor dbang po yi/ /slob dpon
khyab bdag ches shes bya/ /rdo rje la sogs de'i ming nyid/ /de yi mtshan nyid bshad par bya/ /sems can kun la phan bdag nyid/ /mi 'jigs pa ni ster nyid dang / /sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor
ba shes/ /sbyor ba bzo dang sgyu rtsal sogs/ /mthun pa'i ngag dang thams cad la/ /bu gcig pa ltar mthun pa dang / /gtong ba sogs la rtag tu dga'/ /bsam gtan ting 'dzin de mchog gzhon/ /
ji ltar smras pa de bzhin byed/ /'tshe ba med cing bden pa'i ngag /sems can kun la thugs brtse dang / /lam du 'dzud pa de mthar phyin/ /kun mkhyen yon tan dang mnyam dang / /bstan bcos kun
gyi pha rol son/ /mgon med rnams kyi pha dang ma/ /phyag rgya brda ni byed pa po/ /de sogs yon tan rnams kyis gang / /skye ba 'di la de bzhin gshegs/ /rnal 'byor ma 'khor lo dbus su/ /

rdo rje hU~M mdzad bsgom pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor byang chub sems kyi ste/ /bde ba'i rgyal po rnal 'byor ma/ /sgra rnams su ni sgra yi ye shes/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad can khyab bdag /'phos pa'i lhag ma 'gyur
ye shes/ /dang po'i mgon po'i rgyu yin no/ /sems kyi nyams su myong ba ni/ /de phyir phra mo'i rang bzhin can/ /spar sha'i khams su yang dag grags/ /de nyid kyis ni khyer nas 'ongs/ /mkha'
'gro rgya mtshor rtag nges par/ /sa gsum de yi rang bzhin byas/ /de ltar sbyor ba mchog gtso bo/ /shing srin gzhan ni sog ma bzhin/ /'di yi bgrod pa ma shes pas/ /byis pa mi shes pa yis bcings/ /
mtha' yi bde ba gsung ba po/ /bstan bya ston pa rdo rje 'chang / /lhan cig skyes gzugs ston pa po/ /bcom ldan ye shes kyis 'di gsungs/ /zhes bya ba ni rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi cho ga ste rab tu byed pa
bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas gang gis sgrub pa po/ /'grub pa'i bsam med sbyor bshad bya/ /de ni shin bzang rab sbyor bas/ /spyod dang brtul zhugs bshad par bya/ /lhun gyis
grub 'gyur de'i spyod pa/ /dngos grub 'dod rnams kyis shes bya/ /phyi rol gnyis med sbyor bdag nyid/ /spyod pa de ni rab tu sngags/ /kun gyi bdag nyid yid bzang la/ /dbang po'i grong khyer yang dag
brten/ /grong de rnams su spyod pa dang / /yid kyis brtul zhugs bstan par bya/ /srid dang zhi ba'i gzugs rnams kyis/ /gang der bdag nyid kyis 'gro bya/ /bdag nyid gzugs kyi rang bzhin can/ /
yang dag me long la mthong 'gyur/ /zhu ba'i sems la brten byas nas/ /lus ni lus la thim par gyis/ /sdom par bdag nyid kyis bsdams nas/ /phyag rgya chen por yang dag grags/ /phyag rgya
lnga sogs lus la gnas/ /thod pa dang ni kha T+wA~M 'dzin/ /bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa za/ /lhan cig rnal 'byor ma rol ldan/ /chags pa'i sems kyis bsgom pa ste/ /mi 'dod kyang ni de phyir 'gro/ /
gzung dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po yis/ /yid 'di la ni gos pa med/ /'jigs med rnam pa'i sems kyis ni/ /mtshan mo dur khrod sogs par 'gro/ /sa bzhi gang du spyod pa na/ /rnam shes brgyad du shes
par bya/ /lnga ldan spyod dang brtul zhugs ni/ /bde ba can du de rtsen to/ /dang po'i sbyor bar yongs brten nas/ /phyi nas yid kyis rab tu bshad/ /srog thams cad ni mnyam sbyor bas/ /
dbang po'i grong khyer bde ba yi/ /ye shes spyod ba'i brtul zhugs 'dzin/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni shin tu bzang po'i cho ga ste/ rab tu byed pa bcu gsum pa'o// //
de nas skye bo'i rigs kyi ni/ /khyad par bshad kyis mnyan par gyis/ /rdo rje bzang po'i rab sbyor bas/ /de rigs 'dir ni nyams par 'gyur/ /de la dang por lnga dang bdun/ /brgyad dang
bcu gsum bcwa lnga dang / /bcu bdun dang ni nyi shu gnyis/ /nyi shu rtsa bdun de bzhin mchog /tha skar la sogs shes bya ste/ /lha rnams tshogs su dran par bya/ /bzhi pa dang ni shar ba gsum/ /
gnyis pa dang ni drug de bzhin/ /byang phyogs pa rnams de bzhin gsum/ /mi yi tshogs su dran par bya/ /gsum pa dang ni bcu nyid dang / /dgu pa dang ni nyi shu gsum/ /bcu bzhi pa dang bcu
drug pa/ /bcwa brgyad pa dang bcu dgu pa/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi de grags pa/ /srin po'i rigs su dran par bya/ /ra'i rigs gsum pa dang brgyad pa/ /klu ni bzhi dang lnga pa'o/ /drug pa nyi shu rtsa

dgu pa/ /khyi yi dngos por bshad pa'o/ /bcu dang bcu gcig byi ba ste/ /byi lha de bzhin dgu pa'o/ /bcu bzhi pa dang bcu drug pa/ /rtag tu de ltar brjod pa'o/ /bcu gnyis pa dang nyi shu lnga/ /khyu mchog
gi ni rigs 'thob bo/ /thog ma tha ma bong bu yin/ /rigs su de rnams rab tu grags/ /bcu gsum pa dang bcwa lnga pa/ /de ni ma her mngon par brjod/ /thog ma dang ni nyi shu drug /rta yi rigs su

rab tu brjod/ /nyi shu pa dang nyi shu gnyis/ /spre'u zhes bya bar brjod pa'o/ /gnyis pa dang ni mtha' de bzhin/ /glang po yi ni rigs su 'gro/ /nyi shu gsum dang nyi shu bzhi/ /mi ste stobs ni che ba yin/ /
nyi shu gcig pa sre mo ste/ /mdor bsdus pa yis rab tu bshad/ /stobs dang bdag byed pa'i rgyu skar/ /bshad kyis da ltar mnyan par gyis/ /mi rnams srog ni rgyu skar te/ /gzhan du rab tu 'thob

pa min/ /skar mar dus kyi rtsa son par/ /'dzin pa po ni nges par 'chi/ /lug dang srang dang kar ka Ta/ /chu srin mthon po la dran bya/ /kI Ta bum seng khyu mchog ni/ /brtan pa'i bya bar rab tu bstan/ /
nya dang 'khrig pa de bzhin 'dir/ /gzhu dang bu mo 'dren ma la'o/ /bla ma nyi ma sa'i skyes bu/ /ngan spong rA hu zla bud med/ /gza' lhag bkra shis ma ning ste/ /mkha' dkyil 'khor la gza'
gang yin/ /de ltar rigs rnams so gzhan du/ /byang chub sras po mi 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje bzang por de bshad de/ /rab sbyor rnam pa'i sems kyis ni/ /g.yon pa'i rtsa ru son pa'i sems/ /
dbu ma'i tha ma'i sbyor bar ldan/ /byang chub sa bon rnams 'bab la/ /byang chub sems rnams kyi rigs so/ /snying rjer son pa'i yid kyis ni/ /las kyi nyi ma 'dzag pa yin/ /yang dag rab ster
rtag tu ldan/ /rigs med rigs can kyang med do/ /srid par rtsed mo tsam du ni/ /bsam gtan rnam pa'i lus son pa/ /me long gi ni yul la gzugs/ /gang 'dra mthong ste de med do/ /de 'drar byang chub
sems dpa' rnams/ /bsam gtan sbyor ba'i gzugs can no/ /de yi nang du zhu ba'i sems/ /de dang mnyam pa gzhan yod min/ /nges par dkyil 'khor rnams dbus su/ /rdo rje bzang po bsgom par
bya/ /shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis/ /gsang sngags mchod pa sngon gyi can/ /dus dang dus min cha'i bdag nyid/ /dngos med ma yin byed por bzhugs/ /byang chub gzugs kyi bdag nyid
che/ /bcom ldan sems dpas 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bzang po'i cho ga ste rab tu byed pa bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas gsang ba'i sbyor gang gis/ /bde kun bdag nyid

du skye bshad/ /don dam pa yi sbyor ba yis/ /de bzhin nyid du rab 'jug bya/ /'jigs byed chen po'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /sngags kyi phreng bar rang nyid byon/ /bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa nyid ni/ /sa rnams la
ni rab tu bshad/ /'khor lo drug dbyibs ri mo ni/ /sa yi dbus su bya ba yin/ /thams cad du ni gsang sngags tshig /bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad bri bar bya/ /de rnams sngags kyi gzugs rnams ni/ /srog
ni yi ge'i rnam pa can/ /yi ge'i cha rnams bzang po ni/ /spangs nas dbus mar gnas pa yin/ /stong par nges par thim byas nas/ /'og dang steng du blta bar bya/ /rkang pa'i mtha' nas
mgo bo ru/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug de srid byed/ /khams kun rab tu zhugs pa la/ /sems kyi spyod pa can ci smos/ /de ltar gsang ba gyen gnon pa/ /dpa' bo chen po'i don can no/ /dbus
mar rab tu zhugs pa yi/ /bsnun dang bsgrub pa la sogs spangs/ /'thor rlung 'dzin bzhin pa yis ni/ /nyi ma dang po zad med can/ /rdo rje'i lam ni langs pa'i sems/ /gang phyir brgyud pa'i rim pas so/ /
de ltar sgyu ma'i bzlas pa 'di/ /rtsa ba'i sngags sogs re'u mig can/ /dpa' bo kun gyi re'u mig rnams/ /sngags kyi 'khor lor dgod par bya/ /ting 'dzin mgon po'i dpa' bo rnams/ /
bcu gnyis rnams kyi'ang 'khor lor son/ /gang zhig gang gi ming sngon gyis/ /de dang de yi gnas su bri/ /gzhan gyi sngags kun 'di rnams la/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sku la
sogs pa'i bzlas kun dang / /de bzhin ngag sogs bzlas pa can/ /sems sogs bzlas pa thams cad dang / /de bzhin ye shes sogs bzlas can/ /sngags kyi rgyal pos bskul pa yis/ /
de nas dpa' bo 'byung bar 'gyur/ /'jigs byed chen po dbus rnams su/ /me yi gzugs can bsgom par bya/ /shes rab rigs kyi nus pa yis/ /'byung po'i tshogs de kun spyod bya/ /zhi ba
dang ni rgyas dang dbang / /drag por nges par byed yi ge/ /las dang rjes mthun gzugs bsgoms te/ /'bar ba'i rnam pa sogs dgod bya/ /'chi ba glu zhib de nyid kyis/ /rnal 'byor dang ni ldan par 'gro/ /

nA da nA dar 'dzom bya zhing / /thig le thig ler thim par bya/ /de ltar cho ga'i bya ba yis/ /gsang sngags bzlas nas phur bu gdab/ /'di rnams sngags kyi gtso bo yis/ /rkang pa bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad de/

oM hU~M hU~M phaT gyi yi ge mtha'/ /ji lta'i rim pas 'di kun la'o/ /na maHshrI badzra DA ka ma hA bi ra bI re shwa rA ya/ tri b+hu rbar+Na kam pA kam bA ba nA ya/ Da~MSh+To ta rkaT b+hI Sha Na b+he re bA ya/ sha ta sa ha sra ne trA ya/

bi d+yuta dzi hwA ya/ ka~M kA la mA lA b+ha ra No grA ya/ ko Ti la k+Sha b+hu dzA ya/ dz+wA la ba lI Da lA ga nA ya/ par shu pA sho d+ya ta shU lA ya/ ka ta d+hu mru gra ba pu ShA ya/ bi ka Ta mu kha hA hA ra bA ya/

mA tri ga Na pa ri pU ri ta man trA ya/ sa ha dza sun d+ha rI bal+la b+ha ka rA ya/ hU~M hU~M kA ro ts+tsha ra Na mu khA ya/ ma hA sh+ma sha na pra yA ya/ sarba b+hU ta sa~M trA sa na ka rA ya/ ma hA kalpAn ta g+ni te dza ya/ dza Ta ka lA pa mu ku TA

ya/ kha T+wA~M ga ka pA la shU la b+hin na d+hA ri Ne/ ma hA sa mu dra me kha lA ya/ byA g+h+ra tsarma ma ba ra d+ha ri Ne/ bi ta la sa~M g+ha marda na ka rA ya/ ma ha big+h+na ni bA re Ne/ sha tru ni sum+b+ha na ka rA ya/ tri sa hA

sra ma hA sa ha sre ka ro mA ba l+yAn+ta rti Na/ sha ta sa ha sra mu khA ya/ dz+nyA na sA ga ra mu khA ya/ ma hA pi she ta ru d+hi ro ba sA hA ri ni/ sarba mA ra ba la d+h+wa~M si Ne/ sriSh+Ti sa~M hA ra kA ra kA ya/ sarba nA gA nA~M sho Sha na stam

b+ha na bi d+hA ba NA ya/ an tra mA lA d+hA ri Ni/ su me ru gam / pi ta nA dA ya/ kro d+ha bi gra ha d+ha ra NA ya/ ma hA kA sha ti la kAta ma ni/ bud d+ha ko Ta sa ha sra k+Sha Na ni da nA ya/ dz+nyA na mri ta bar ShA pa ya/ sarba karma pra bar+t+ta

nA ya ni/ bam d+ha na ka rA ya/ sarba bi kalpa b+hanya dza na ka rA ya/ mun DA pa li lag+na sha rI rA ya/ pa ra kri ta yan tra man tra nA sha nA ya/ ma hA rak+Sha ka rA ya/ duSh+TA nA~M bi dA la ne/ d+harmo da ya ka rA ya/ kro d+ha s+pha ra s+pha ra NA ya/

in dra dza la sarba satwAta ma ne/ grasta bA da pra ba da ma hA ma te/ /de ltar la sogs gsang sngags gang / /rab tu mang ba rgya che'o/ /sna tshogs rnam pa du ma'i ming / /sems can ming gis shes par bya/ /
sngags rnams thams cad mnyam sbyor bas/ /khams gsum rnams su yongs bzhugs pa'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gtso/ /bcom ldan sngags pas 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni 'jigs
byed chen po'i cho ga ste/ rab tu byed pa bcwa lnga pa'o// // de nas mi la sogs dbang po/ /kun gyi mngon shes cho ga bshad/ /mig mi bzang gi rab sbyor bas/ /rdo rje gsum ni rab bsgrub bya/ /
gang du byang chub sems gnas pas/ /der ni mig gis nges par blta/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyi zag med mchog /sems ni mig tu shes par bya/ /rtsa rnams kyi ni rab sbyor bas/ /so sor rlung ni dbab par bya/ /
gang nyid du ni skyes dus su/ /de yi dus su thim nas 'gro/ /de ni mngon shes mig rnams kyi/ /sems 'di yis ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /skye 'gro'i nang du son pa'i gzugs/ /yid kyis sgra ni nyan par 'gyur/ /

'gro dang 'ong ba'i cho ga ni/ /lha rdzas dri ru rjes mtshon bya/ /lha rdzas ro yi rab sbyor bas/ /lce ni dga' ba dang bcas kyis/ /lce yi mngon shes la brten nas/ /dbu ma'i pho nya skyes pa yin/ /lus kyi

reg pa'i rnam pa yis/ /mchog tu zag med de bsgrub bya/ /sngon gyi bag chags dran pa la/ /de nyid rnal 'byor ldan par 'gro/ /nyin zhag mtshan mo mnyam byas nas/ /chu tshod drug bcu nyid dang ni/ /chu'i srang

drug bcu tham pa dang / /g+ha Ti kar yang sbyar bar bya/ /rgyar ni sor mo bcu gnyis la/ /dpangs su sor brgyad nyid yin te/ /gun dza drug bcu'i tshad la ni/ /sor bcu gnyis pa'i thur ma'o/ /skad cig thang cig yud

tsam dang / /kASh+Ti mig btsums phye ba dang / /se gol gtogs par shes bya ste/ /dbugs rgyu'i mngon par shes pas so/ /pha rol phyin drug tshul dag gis/ /chos kyi dbyings ni mtshon par bya/ /dus dang dus min
sel ba po/ /mig mi bzang ba bsgom par bya/ /mtshon bya mtshan nyid rnal 'byor ma'i/ /dkyil 'khor nang du byas pa nyid/ /sems 'di sna tshogs gzugs can te/ /srog chags rnams kyis gar bgrod pa/ /bdag

med rang bzhin 'thob par 'gyur/ /mdud pa rnams kyi phrad pas gnas/ /gzugs su byed 'gyur de'i dngos po/ /mchog gi dang po bral mtha' can/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas gang gnas pa/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gror de shes

bya/ /thur sel lam la rtag brten nas/ /slar yang re re'i nang du ste/ /srog la sogs pa'i rlung lnga yis/ /mig ni lnga ru shes par bya/ /'dzag pa med pa'i sa bon 'dzag /ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i sbyor ldan/ /
sa bon lnga rnams thig le yi/ /mngon shes byed po sogs lnga pa/ /de lta'i rnal 'byor mchog yongs rdzogs/ /rnal 'byor kun gyi'ang mchog yin no/ /dngos po'i ye shes can ma lus/ /
ring du yongs su spangs pa yin/ /thams cad lus su mnyam sbyor las/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i spyan 'jug pa/ /dngos kun dngos po med mdzad pa/ /bcom ldan mig gis 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya
ba ni mig mi bzang gi cho ga ste rab tu byed pa bcu drug pa'o// // de nas lha mos phyag byas nas/ /de bzhin mchod pa chen po byas/ /stobs po che yi sbyin sreg ni/ /bdag po chen pos bstan
du gsol/ /mkhas pas rgyun du nang bdag gi/ /sbyin sreg bshad kyis mnyan par gyis/ /stobs po che yi rab sbyor bas/ /khams rnams kun gyis dgang blugs te/ /bde ba thab tu yang dag 'thob/ /nyi zla dgang
gzar blugs gzar ro/ /slob dpon gnyis med de de la/ /yang dag rigs pa'i gzugs su bsreg /sna tshogs mkha' 'gro rnams 'di me/ /gsang sngags rang bzhin mtshan nyid do/ /yam shing rtsa ru yang dag

grags/ /gang phyir sA li las skyes 'bras/ /tshil ni rtag tu zho zan yin/ /'di ru mar ni byang chub sems/ /khrag ni sbrang rtsir shes par bya/ /srog sogs rlung rnams dur ba'o/ /gcin dang bshang ba dag de ltar/ /

tsan dan dang ni gla rtsi'o/ /me tog rtag tu khrag tu grags/ /mchil ma lud pa 'bras thug yin/ /bud shing so sen rus pa'o/ /mdor bsdus pa yis lpags pa gos/ /me yi thab kyi dbus su ni/ /skra dang ba spu lha ru 'gyur/ /

sna tshogs phra mo'i khams gzhan ni/ /sna tshogs 'bru ste de la bsreg /rim gyis mkha' 'gro rdzogs son pa/ /gang ba'i bsreg blugs su shes bya/ /dbang po thams cad gar byed de/ /de yi bag chags glu len no/ /

sna tshogs sgra chen pos rol mo/ /snying rje sogs pas ston mo yin/ /srog rnams kun gyi bdag po yi/ /stobs po che ni bsgom par bya/ /las thams cad pas sbyin sreg ni/ /des mnyes pa yi dngos grub 'gyur/ /

'jig rten mchog gi khams kun du/ /yid ni de ru yang dag rol/ /gang tshe'i dus su bde gyur pa/ /de tshe'i dus su rab tu gnas/ /sbyin sreg rang bdag nyid mthong bas/ /smod dang rjes 'dzin byed pa yin/ /'jig rten 'jig
rten 'das ye shes/ /de rnams dbus mar 'thob par bya/ /mtshams rnams kun du khong khro ba/ /sems chen po ni bsad par 'gyur/ /rtog pas sprul pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ /de las byung ba bza' bar bya/ /mtshon

bya mtshon byed rab bcom pas/ /gnyis dag shes par 'os pa yin/ /sgyu ma'i bdag nyid mtshan nyid ni/ /de la thim par byed par 'gyur/ /khams kun yang dag sbyor ba las/ /ye shes gnyis byar med mtshan nyid/ /
me yi gzugs su rtag bzhugs pa'i/ /bcom ldan thab khung gis 'di gsungs/ /zhes bya ba ni stobs po che'i cho ga ste rab tu byed pa bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas rdo rje par 'du ba/ /ji bzhin bshad
kyis mnyan par gyis/ /rin chen rdo rje'i rab sbyor bas/ /a ba d+hU tI can dngos grub/ /rnal 'byor ma ni yang dag rol/ /don dam pa yi nyams la gnas/ /de yi sbyor bas grol bar ni/ /gnyis med rgyu rnams

kyis 'gyur ro/ /lus kyi nyams su myong bzhin pa/ /byis pa rnams kyi byang chub 'ong / /ha yig drug pa dang ldan pa'i/ /sa bon rdo rje'i nor bur dgod/ /a ba d+hU tI'i rtsar 'bab ste/ /steng du kha bltas

dpral bar son/ /bsrung ba'i dus su blo ldan gyis/ /rang gi lag pas rdo rje gzung / /byang chub sems la rtsen byed la/ /rgas dang 'chi ba ring ba yin/ /srid pa'i skyon las 'goms pa yis/ /srid gsum de yi
rang bzhin 'gyur/ /las kyi phyag rgya'i rab sbyor bas/ /nyi ma re re bsgrub par bya/ /de yi dus su gang mthong ba/ /dngos po kun la ltung bar bya/ /'dod chags chen po'i tshul bdag nyid/ /

rtag tu bdag nyid la 'byung 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor rgyud kyi rgyu'i don du/ /bstan bya ston pa por 'gyur ro/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud kyi ni/ /sems can don ni nges par byas/ /sku bzhi bo yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /
bden min bdag gis bshad mi bya/ /rin chen rdo rje'i rang bzhin can/ /sbyor skyes ye shes gyen du bgrod/ /pho nya rnams kyi gtso nyid bya/ /'dod chags me yis dgyes par bya/ /byang chub sems ni rtag
gzung ba/ /lce yis bya yi lag pas min/ /lhan skyes 'phos pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /mkha' lding phyag rgya nyid kyis gzung / /phyag rgya'i kha nyid du sbyin te/ /de nas btung bar bya ba yin/ /stobs
thams cad kyi bza' bar bya/ /sA li skyes sogs 'bad pas so/ /sbyin sreg kun kyang nga nyid kyis/ /dbang la sogs pa gang gang byed/ /de de'i thod par bya ba ste/ /de nas sa bon gdab par bya/ /
de rnams rdzas kyis spang ba dang / /gtor ma dang ni bsrung bar bya/ /de yis bcings pa tsam gyis ni/ /de dang 'dra ba'i gzungs 'jug 'gyur/ /ri lu 'am ni skud pa ni/ /dpa' bo rang nyid kyis gsungs
pa'o/ /b+ha ga'i dbus rnams su bsgom pa/ /rin chen rdo rje can de sman/ /dkyil 'khor khams rnams kun gyi ste/ /spangs pa rab tu bstan pa yin/ /gang dang gang gi las kyi ni/ /de dang de'i ming can

sngags so/ /sa bon kun gyi yongs sbyor las/ /de ni rtag tu sman rnams te/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya ni/ /rtag tu 'ching bas 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni rin chen rdo rje'i cho ga ste rab tu byed pa bcwa
brgyad pa'o// // de nas 'khor ba'i mthar gnas pa'i/ /mkha' 'gro'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya/ /rta mgrin gyi ni rab sbyor bas/ /pho nya'i mtshan nyid sgrub par bya/ /ha yig skye gnas dbus su te/ /
ya yig mgo bor gnas pa'o/ /yig dbus ma'i pad mar te/ /ba yi yi ge snying ga ru/ /rnal 'byor che la 'dzin bzhin pa/ /dbyangs can ma dang 'dra bar byed/ /rmongs pa nyid ni thams cad 'phrog /gang phyir

gzhung ni rjes 'jug 'gyur/ /mgrin par rtag tu tshigs bcad ni/ /mgrin par dag tu gnas pa nyid/ /'tsho ba rta yi dbyibs 'dir ni/ /gnas pa rnal 'byor lhag ma yin/ /de yi sbyor bas 'gro 'gyur ba/ /sngon du
nyi ma'i gdan du'o/ /nyi de rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /khams gsum por ni bskor bar 'gyur/ /nam mkhar nyi mas mdzes byas nas/ /byang chub yid kyis 'gro bar 'gyur/ /phyogs kyi 'khor lo ma lus rtogs/ /

rnal 'byor ma'i chu skyes mchog /sems can kun gyi rmongs nyid dang / /lam mthong ba ni nyams can la/ /de nyid nyi ma rtag snang bar/ /mtshan mo mun pa drag po 'phrog /rnal 'byor ma 'khor dbus son par/ /
rta yi mgon po bsgoms pa yin/ /gang gi sangs rgyas su 'gro ba/ /sgrub thabs yan lag 'char bar 'gyur/ /bgegs rnams rnam par nyams 'gyur te/ /sprin la sogs pa nyams par 'gyur/ /kun gyi sdig pa'ang

'phrog par byed/ /rang gi dga' ba shar mtshan nyid/ /mchod sbyin dus kyis 'jig rten du/ /thams cad skad cig la sgrub 'gyur/ /khams bdun rnam par bzung ba yis/ /de tshe sa 'og dngos grub 'gyur/ /bdag med 'di rnams de lha mo/ /

yan lag gcig gi rol par byed/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa mi bya ste/ /sbyin sreg A ga sogs de bzhin/ /ji ltar bde bas rtogs bya ste/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid 'thob 'gyur/ /'dod chags kyis ni 'dod chags sgo/ /me yis tshig la gdung bar bya/ /de bzhin 'dod chags kyis

'dod chags/ /bsten par gyur pas mi 'ching ngo / /de nyid thabs so yid kyi las/ /dge ba'i mtshan nyid can bya'o/ /nang du byed pa ma yin te/ /gus pa yid kyis dbu mar gnas/ /phyi rol ye shes can rnams kyis ye shes/ /de nyid sangs

rgyas rdo rje 'chang ba sogs/ /sems can 'jig rten sogs 'byung ba/ /de rnams spangs pas sangs rgyas med/ /mu stegs can dang sangs rgyas par/ /kun du dbye ba yod ma yin/ /lung thams cad ni 'gal ba ste/ /tshad ma pa rnams

tho cho can/ /thams cad tshig ni rnam shes pas/ /ye shes can rnams de'i phyir shes/ /mkha' 'gro thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /nam mkha' rnams su bzhugs pa yin/ /bcom ldan 'jig rten 'jig rten par/ /rtag tu bzhugs

pas 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni rta mgrin gyi cho ga ste rab tu byed pa bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas rab tu 'joms yon tan/ /bshad kyis sgrub pa po rnams nyon/ /nam mkha'i snying po'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje rlung gi

mtshan nyid de/ /'chags pa dang ni 'jig rnams su/ /gang zhig stong pa de srog chags/ /khams rnams de 'drar shes bya ste/ /dul ba'i sbyor bar yang dag gnas/ /zla ba'i gzugs su yongs grags pa'i/ /rang gi rang bzhin las

skyes 'dzag /rnal 'byor lhag ma'i ye shes kyang / /de ni rab 'joms la brjod do/ /dus thams cad du g.yo ba med/ /g.yo ba'am 'dir ni mi mthong ngo / /de ni thams cad bdag nyid rlung / /bsam pa thams cad rab 'jug pa'o/ /

do lA hA ra sogs sbyar bas/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyi thar ster po/ /sgra dang thig ler de shes bya/ /'od gsal ba dang snang ba gsum/ /de phyir nam mkha'i snying po yang / /mkha' 'gro'i sbyor rnams kyis shes bya/ /nang gi dbu ma'i

sbyor ba yis/ /srog de'ang rab tu bsngags pa yin/ /de yang kun gzhi shes bya ste/ /me long du yang rab tu bshad/ /chos sku la sogs pa 'ang de/ /dmyal sogs 'gro ba de bzhin te/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyi/ /

gnas ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /zla ba'i lam du gang tshe mkha'/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyi lhag med 'pho/ /de'i dus rnam par gzhag med 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor byis pas bgrod bya min/ /nam mkha'i khams rnams thams cad kyi/ /

de yi snying por rab tu bstan/ /de dag shes rab thabs gnyis so/ /gnas skabs kyang ni gnyis nyid do/ /srid pa rnam par 'phro ba nyid/ /dbang po'i dbus su sbyar bar bya/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten mtha' yas rnams/ /sa yi

nang du rtsen par 'gyur/ /de ltar rnam bcas de nyid dang / /rnam pa med pa'i go 'phang bzhugs/ /sems dang rnam par shes pa'i rgyun/ /gnyis po nyid ni gnyis med 'gyur/ /dbu mar lta rnams kyis 'grub ste/ /ye shes der

'di rdzogs pa'o/ /gal te sangs rgyas rjes chags yod/ /chos dge 'dun la de bzhin mchog /gal te mu stegs mkhas pa yi/ /tshul chen chos de 'dod pa dang / /gal te shes rab thabs rnal 'byor/ /stong nyid snying

rje'i bdag nyid can/ /gal te thams cad mi rtag bdag /tshul 'di bsgom par bya ba yin/ /'dir mang smras bas ci bya ste/ /chos dbyings gal te 'dod kyang ngo / /nam mkha'i snying po'i gzugs can gyi/ /sangs rgyas sprul
pa bsgom par bya/ /shan pa smyig ma mkhan la sogs/ /gsod pa'i don la yongs gnas pa/ /de kun de'i gnas nyams dga' bar/ /lam rjes skyob rnams kyi gol 'thob/ /nges par dkyil 'khor dbus rnams su/ /

gzugs su sdom pa bsgom par bya/ /'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du/ /rmongs pa'i bdag nyid dngos grub 'thob/ /rnam shes kun gyi sbyor bdag nyid/ /stong nyid snying po gcig pu pa/ /bcom ldan rab 'joms rnam pa
yi/ /rnal 'byor la bzhugs pas 'di gsungs/ /zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i snying po'i cho ga ste rab tu byed pa nyi shu pa'o// // de nas lha mos mchod byas te/ /phyag byas pas ni 'di
gsol to/ /rang gis rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /bcom ldan rdo rjes gsung bar mdzod/ /rang rig ye shes las byung ba/ /ji lta'i rigs pas bshad par bya/ /dpal he ru ka'i rab sbyor bas/ /rnal 'byor zla
ba'i bgrod pa dang / /dkar po'i tshes gcig la sogs nas/ /ye shes rgya mtsho 'phel bar 'gyur/ /thog mar ye shes skye bar 'gyur/ /gnyis par nam mkhar 'gro ba'i gzugs/ /gsum par mda' yi dbyibs dang
'dra/ /bzhi par 'ben gyi gzugs can no/ /lnga par rtse mo lnga'i bdag nyid/ /drug par khams drug 'byung ba yin/ /bdun par rgya mtsho yi ni gzugs/ /brgyad par pad mar brjod pa yin/ /dgu pa ru ni
bcud len te/ /bcu par lhan skyes gzugs kyis so/ /bcu gcig pa la zhi ba'i gzugs/ /bcu gnyis pa la 'khor lo'i gzugs/ /bcu gsum pa la nyi ma ste/ /bcu bzhir zla ba de bzhin no/ /bcwa lnga pa

nyid rA hu ste/ /thig le zhes byas bcu drug pa'o/ /rnam pa bcu drug mtshan nyid ni/ /rang gis rig par shes par bya/ /dpal he ru ka'i sbyor ba yis/ /'khor lo bzhi rnams su bsgrub bya/ /rgas pa med cing
'chi ba med/ /nad dang mdze sogs spangs pa yin/ /lte bar shrI yi yi ger gyur/ /he yig snying gar dgod par bya/ /ru yig mgrin pa'i 'khor lor te/ /thod par ka yi yi ge'o/ /thig le bzhi yi rab
sbyor bas/ /rang gis rig par 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nyid rnam pa bcu drug ni/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyi mchog zag med/ /gnas dang gnas su 'pho ba nyid/ /dbu ma'i nang du rab tu gzhug /'khor lo bzhi
yi 'dab son nas/ /rang gis rig pa mtha' yas mchog /rigs de rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi/ /byung bar rnam par shes par bya/ /sems chen po ni sad bzhin pas/ /don yod mthong ba thob par 'gyur/ /

rtag tu rmi lam du 'gyur te/ /dus thams cad du nges par gnas/ /longs spyod sprul pa'i mtshan nyid du/ /gnyid log pa yis de tshe mthong / /bzhi pa rab mang bdag med de/ /de phyir de rnams mtha'i longs spyod/ /de ltar

'khor lo bzhir gnas nas/ /nges par lam du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /shes rab de nyid rtogs byas nas/ /nyi mas thabs kyi de nyid can/ /rdul gyi sbyor ba 'byung ba ste/ /nag po'i phyogs su gang 'dir yang / /bcu drug

rnams kyi cha rnams kyi/ /nyi ma nyid ni bar du'o/ /stong nyid snying rje'i sbyor ba las/ /rdo rje 'bar ba 'bar zhing 'bar/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i dbus rnams su/ /dpal he ru ka bsam par bya/ /mtshan nyid thams

cad yang dag ldan/ /rdo rje'i dga' bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /gnas skabs thams cad yang dag sbyor/ /gtso bo rang rig bdag nyid can/ /bcom ldan 'das pa'i bzhi pa'i mthar/ /rtag tu bzhugs pas 'di gsungs so/ /
zhes bya ba ni dpal he ru ka'i cho ga ste rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas lus sogs lha rnams kyi/ /ston mo mngon par bshad par bya/ /pad ma gar dbang phyug nyid kyi/ /rab tu

sbyor ba'i de byung ngo / /rtsa ni pad mar yang dag grags/ /srog gi rlung gis gar byed do/ /byang chub sems kyis dbang phyug ste/ /de rnams kyi ni nang du bzhugs/ /rang gis rig pa bza' bar bya/ /snying rje'i
kha yis btung bar bya/ /gnyis med rnal 'byor ma dang rol/ /sgyu ma'i rjes su 'gro rnams 'grub/ /thams cad de yi rang bzhin du/ /bza' ba bza' ba med par bya/ /pad ma gar dbang bsgom par bya/ /ji
lta'i rim pas mtshon par bya/ /pa yig gzhan gyi grong du 'gro/ /brtan pa thams cad dam yi yig /na yig g.yo ba'i rnal 'byor te/ /rte yig bde ba'i lha can yin/ /shwa yig ta la sogs pa'i stobs/ /ra yig
dga' rol rgyu can yin/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das kun la/ /de yi rab tu sbyor ba bya/ /mtshams kyi skad ni 'di rnams kun/ /bde mchog phyi mar shes par bya/ /bgrod pa 'di rnams la brtan nas/ /pad ma gar

gyi dbang phyug rang / /he ru ka dang bde mchog nyid/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sogs gtso bo/ /pad ma gar dbang phyug de yang / /sbyor ba kun la shes par bya/ /pad ma ye shes yang dag grags/ /gar gyi dbang phyug rnam shes

can/ /gnyis po gnyis med yang dag byung / /lha kun 'dir ni byung ba yin/ /shes po thams cad de la gnas/ /khams gsum du ni gar dbang phyug /gar byed pa yi sku chen la/ /de nas rtags ni mtshon par bya/ /

nam mkhar zhen pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /mchog tu rmad du byung bar 'gro/ /rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo dbus su/ /lhan skyes gzugs kyis rol par gyis/ /'di yis rtag tu dbang gi las/ /de rnams kyis ni dga' ba byed/ /

gang dag gang gi las rnams la/ /de dang de yir bsgom par bya/ /sgrub po rnams kyi byang chub rtsar/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du 'ong / /de nas bdud ni bcom byas nas/ /gar bya bzhin sa pad ma 'dzin/ /sdig pa

thams cad rab 'joms shing / /tshe son pa rnams gnas par byed/ /'dod pa thams cad 'grub 'gyur zhing / /rnal 'byor rnams kyi srid la sbyong / /rang gi sems kyis dngos grub 'thob/ /rnam rtog nyid du mi bya'o/ /
gzhan du srid pa'i sbyor bdag nyid/ /sems thams cad ni rab 'jug pa/ /'khrul zhing chud zos mu stegs rnams/ /bstan pa rnams la rab 'jug bya/ /bag chags ngan pa yongs spongs nas/ /phyi nas rang bzhin
bstan par bya/ /bza' ba thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /bza' ba med par rtag tu gnas/ /bcom ldan pad ma gar mdzad pa'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pas 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni pad ma gar dbang gi cho ga
ste rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi/ /mtshan nyid bshad kyis lha mo nyon/ /gzugs las 'das pa'i ye shes gang / /de ni ye shes chen por brjod/ /

rnam par snang bzhin pa de bzhin/ /sems dpa' chen po'i ming can no/ /sbu khung rtse mo thams cad las/ /de rnams nges 'thon stobs chen po/ /de rnams bu gar rab zhugs pa/ /'khor lo bzhi yi mtsho skyes son/ /

ji ltar mar la mar zhugs pa/ /de bzhin du ni khams la zhugs/ /g.yo ba 'gog par byas pa yis/ /de 'drar thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ /gang mthong ba ni de mthong nyid/ /gdong gis gdong ni lta bar gyis/ /
mi dang mi mo lha sogs kyi/ /gzugs ni pad ma'i 'dab chu bzhin/ /srog chen po der shes bya ste/ /shi ba'i lus las nges par 'thon/ /oM gyi yi ge yid la bya/ /dbugs rgyu ba yis mtshon par bya/ /
bdag nyid kyis ni hU~M yig spro/ /gsor ba yi ni rnal 'byor ldan/ /sems la oM gyi yi ger 'gyur/ /lus la gnas par mtshon par bya/ /ha~M yig mchog gi dang po yis/ /ye shes dngos po rnams su sprul/ /

chos kyi dbyings rnams kyi dbus su/ /rnam snang mdzad kyi bsgom pa'o/ /bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'dzag pa rnams kyis/ /sngags pa la ni 'bar bar bya/ /bye ba stong phrag grangs kyi ni/ /rnal 'byor ma la 'dod spyod 'gyur/ /

'dod pa rnams kyis mi 'pho ste/ /'dod na bde ba rnam par spro/ /de tshe rnal 'byor ma mnyes nas/ /dngos grub thams cad ster bar byed/ /sdug dang mi sdug rnam dpyod pa/ /rnal 'byor ma la mi bya'o/ /myur

bar stong phrag rnams kyi gzugs/ /rnam par snang mdzad du bsgrub bya/ /sna tshogs du ma'i skad kyis chos/ /de rnams lus ris can gyis nyan/ /rnam snang mdzad dang mi bskyod dang / /rin chen dbang dang A ro lig / don

yod rdo rje sems dpa' dang / /rgyu yi rdo rje 'chang la sogs/ /shes rab pha rol phyin sogs kyang / /de rnams rnal 'byor ma las rig /'gro drug grol bar byed nyid dang / /bde 'gro rnams su 'jug pa po/ /

blo ldan so sor sems can don/ /gnyis med dngos por byed par 'gyur/ /mi shes nyon mongs gzhom don du/ /tshul 'di yang ni bsgom par bya/ /khams thams cad kyi til mar ni/ /dogs pa med pas bya ba yin/ /rnam

snang sbyor bas btung bya 'am/ /byug pa yang de nyid kyis bya'o/ /de yis sna nas sbyin par bya/ /rdo rje'i lam du rtag tu'o/ /rdo rje 'chang gi gzugs su 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi yid 'ong / /gnyis pa thams cad

kun sbyor las/ /rnal 'byor mas 'dod thar pa stsol/ /bcom ldan thams cad dag pa'i sku/ /rab grol mdzad pas 'di gsungs so/ /zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi cho ga ste rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// //
de nas gsang chen bshad bya ste/ /mdor bsdus pa yis rgyas par min/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i rab sbyor bas/ /gnas thams cad du yang dag bzhugs/ /rdo rje mi phyed ye shes te/ /

sems dpa' snying po ston pa'o/ /stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa/ /rdo rje sems dpar rab tu grags/ /zla ba rdo rje'i rab sbyor bas/ /gnas rnams bgrod pa bstan par bya/ /pul+li ra las lte bar 'bab/ /

dzA lan d+ha rar yang dag gnas/ /o T+yin du ni kun du spyod pa 'grub/ /ar bu dar ni bza' dang btung can no/ /go dA ba ri'-i gnas su rol ba ste/ /rA me shwa rir rgyal dang pham pa'o/ /de bi ko Tir rjes su 'dzin pa ste/ /

mA la we ru rnal 'byor ma yi gtso/ /kA ma rU par tshig ni 'grub pa'o/ /o drer mngon sum dngos grub ster ba ste/ /tri sha ku nar dbang po rnams kyi ni/ /myur du dngos grub rab tu 'jug pa'o/ /ko sa la ru rnal 'byor dngos grub ste/ /

ka ling ka ru phra mo'i dngos grub skye/ /lam pa ka ru rtag par 'grub par 'gyur/ /kAnya tsi rar ni bsad pa'i dngos grub bo/ /hi ma la yar mthun par 'grub pa ste/ /pre ta pu rir rang gi lta ba'o/ /gri ha de ba tAr ni bkas gnang

ba/ /lhan skyes 'pho med sau rASh+Ta ru/ /gser gling du ni rang gi don 'grub bo/ /nA ga rar ni gnas kyi dngos grub ster/ /sin d+hu ra ru stobs 'grub de bzhin du/ /ma rur 'chi ba med pa'i dngos grub bo/ /ku lu tar ni rang bzhin
dngos grub tu/ /de nyid rnal 'byor rnams la skye ba'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rtag bsgoms nas/ /thams cad dngos grub 'gro bar byos/ /gnas sogs rnal 'byor ma dbus su/ /khams su gyur pa'i ro chen po/ /
gsang ba'i tshig tu shes par bya/ /mchog ni lhan cig skyes par dran/ /dgyes pa ye shes shes bya ste/ /thams cad bdag nyid yon tan gnas/ /rtag bzhugs gnyis med rnam pa ste/ /sems can 'jig rten las la
ni/ /rnal 'byor ldan pa rnams kyi yang / /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid kyis/ /nA da'i dbus las yang dag byung / /de nyid du ni thim nas 'gro/ /gnas par de ni mngon par brjod/ /de ltar thams cad cho ga
bzhin/ /dpa' bo mchog rnams kyis shes bya/ /de nyid nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bdag /de ni nus par rab tu bshad/ /skyes pa dang ni skye bzhin pa'i/ /nus pa thams cad rab 'jug gis/ /dngos med ma yin
pa'i gzugs kyis/ /dbyangs dang phyi mo gsum spangs pa/ /thig le'i gzugs ni sems dpa' che/ /rdo rje sems dpar rab tu grags/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams kun gyi

gtso/ /sgyu ma'i gnas kyi dngos grub ni/ /'jug mdzad bcom ldan gyis 'di gsungs/ /zhes bya ba ni gnas thams cad kyi bdag nyid can gyi rab tu byed pa ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de ltar dpa' bo gtso bo yi/ /
las kyi tshogs rnams shes par bya/ /nyi shu bzhi bdag nyid nyams dga'/ /thams cad gsang chen gyis gnas su/ /gsang chen rgyas par bshad pa can/ /kun spyod cho ga bshad par bya/ /sngon bshad

khams kyi 'du shes ni/ /gsum gsum du ni bshad pa yin/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi gsum rnams can/ /de rnams brgyad brgyad shes par bya/ /dpa' bo nyi shu bzhi rnams kyi/ /re re'i nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste/ /zlum pa'i rnam pa'i

rnal 'byor du/ /thig le nyid ni gzhag par bya/ /de rnams dkyil 'khor phyi rol du/ /bskor bas ting 'dzin rdo rjer 'gyur/ /shar la sogs pa rim bzhin du/ /rdo rje 'khor lo sogs par 'phro/ /dkyil 'khor du

ni lha thams cad/ /rnal 'byor ma kun shes par bya/ /bdun bcu drug lhag pa'i lnga brgya/ /nyin zhag rnams su yongs 'pho bya/ /re re yi ni srog 'gyur ba/ /sum bcu rtsa bdun phyed bcas pa'o/ /nyi khri brgya phrag bcu

drug ni/ /nyin zhag la ni shes par bya/ /lus can kun gyi rang bsam pa/ /de rnams kyi dus rab tu 'jug /rnal 'byor de dngos bsgom rnams la/ /sangs rgyas bsam pa rab tu bskor/ /'di rnams kun nyid dpa' bo

rnams/ /gnas sogs nyi shu bzhi can la/ /thim dang longs spyod bdag byed pas/ /dus dang dus tshod za bar byed/ /'di lta'i cho ga'i bya ba yis/ /kun du gnas pa bdag ma yin/ /rnal 'byor ma tshogs dang dpa' bo/ /

de ni bdag dang bdag gi rim bzhin/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten thams cad du/ /bdag dang bdag gi spyod yul med/ /yid ches tsam du myang 'das pa/ /gzhung smra ba la bstan pa'o/ /de kho na nyid ma rig pa yis 'jig rten mongs/ /

de kho na nyid rnam par spangs pas dngos grub min/ /rnal 'byor rnams la rgyud rgyal du/ /de dang de yi chog ye shes/ /'od gsal sgyu ma bdag gis ni/ /sgyu ma'i 'jig rten la bshad do/ /kye lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin gcig

pur bstan/ /lha dang lha min sa gsum 'joms la 'dud/ /dbang po dang ni 'jig rten pa yis mi shes te/ /mchog tu bde ba chen po'i glu yis mchod par gyis/ /las thams cad pa'i gzugs su bsgom par byos/ /srid
dang mya ngan 'das par ston pa ci/ /sgyu ma gti mug gis ni mi mor gnas/ /sems can theg pa da dung nyams byed ci/ /de ltar yongs su dgyes pa'i mgur/ /bcom ldan rang nyid kyis gsungs so/ /de nyid dkyil
'khor rnams dang ni/ /byang chub dus su blang bar gyis/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di

gsungs so/ /'di ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ de kho na nyid nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid rgyud thams cad kyi don ston pa po gsang chen thams cad pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga bcu
pa'o// // de nas rnal 'byor ma dpa' bo/ /rnam pa du ma'i 'khor gyis kyang / /rdo rje mkha' 'gro khyab pa'i bdag /bcom ldan bdag po la bstod pa/ /khyod ni 'dod chags chen po'i
tshul/ /dngos dang dngos med rang bzhin can/ /dag pa'i rang bzhin gyi ni gzugs/ /chos rnams bstan pas tshim par 'gyur/ /chos dang chos min pa yi gzugs/ /chos dang chos pa khyod gnyis med/ /
bdag gis sprul pa'i dngos po yis/ /'jig rten kun gyi don can te/ /bdag nyid chen po ster ba po/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'jug byed pa/ /khyod kyis dam tshig bsten pa ste/ /gzhan min dam tshig nyid

las byung / /bdag gis bsod nams rjes bsgoms pas/ /byang chub mchog tu yid bsgrubs so/ /ston pa mchog tu bde la bzhugs/ /de yis sems can don mdzad pa'o/ /hU~M gi yi ge'i sgra sgrogs pas/ /nga rgyal can gyi

bgegs skrag 'gyur/ /khyod kyis nye bar bsten pas ni/ /de rnams la ni skye 'chi med/ /bde ba'i rgyal po nyid du rtsen/ /byang chub kyi ni yid du bgrod/ /khyod dang thabs gcig 'dres par 'gyur/ /gong bu gcig

pu gnyis med bzhugs/ /de ltar bstod pas rdo rje che/ /mchod pa bzhi ni rab ston mdzad/ /dkyil 'khor bdag dang gnyis med nyid/ /mchod pa rnams ni gnyis med byed/ /phyi dang nang bdag nyid can rdzas/ /gnyis
pa yi ni mchod par dran/ /bza' dang btung sogs la rol pa/ /gnyis med mchod pa gsum pa'o/ /bzhi pa chos dang rnal 'byor dag /'dzin pa yi ni mchod pa'o/ /de lta'i mchod pa la brten nas/ /thams
cad byas pas las rgyal por/ /'gyur ro rdo rje mkha' 'gro ni/ /gru gsum du ni mnyes bya ste/ /sngon du dkyil 'khor byas nas ni/ /lag pa g.yon pas thams cad du/ /pad ma yi ni bskor bas snod/ /

sngags pa rnams kyis gzung bar bya/ /sngon du rnal 'byor ma la ni/ /skra grol ba yis gtor ma sbyin/ /rnal 'byor ma kun chu skyes ni/ /kha yis bzung nas dkrug par bya/ /de yi lag par son pa'i dpal/ /gang

su yis kyang dbrog mi nus/ /ji ltar bde bas bde ba gzung / /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchog mnyes bya/ /rtag tu dam tshig bskyang bar bya/ /spun gyi spyod pa'ang bsten par bya/ /snying rje'i mchog dbang gyur bya zhing / /

dbang po rnams ni mi rtag par/ /bsgom bya snang ba med pa yi/ /rang bzhin dbang du gyur par gnas/ /rdo rje pad ma snyoms 'jug pas/ /phyag rgya nang gi bdag nyid mchog /stong nyid gnyis med rnal 'byor pas/ /

dngos po thams cad spang bar bya/ /don dam can de nyid 'dir bya/ /rtag tu byang chub sems dran bya/ /man ngag gcig ni bsgoms pa yis/ /man ngag thams cad mtshon par bya/ /ji ltar sa gcig thob pa yis/ /sa thams cad

ni thob par 'gyur/ /de bzhin man ngag thams cad kyang / /man ngag gcig gis 'thob par 'gyur/ /byis pa rnams dang rgan po dang / /rnal 'byor ma rnams thams cad du/ /mnyam pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga yis/ /mkhas pa
yis ni bya ba yin/ /mi mnyam pa yis dngos grub 'joms/ /dmyal ba sogs par ltung bar 'gyur/ /rgan po yon tan kun gnas pa/ /de rnams mnyes pas byang chub ster/ /khyad par mchod pa nyid ni 'dir/ /byis pa

rnams dang de bzhin yang / /gnyis bcas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis/ /me tog bskor ba la sogs bya/ /kun tu smod pa'i ngag mi bya/ /'dod dang 'dod min sbyor bral bya/ /ma byin par yang blang bya zhing / /rtag tu srog chags

gsad par bya/ /sems can rnams la brdzun smra zhing / /ma sogs rnal 'byor ma la bgrod/ /'khor lo mchod pa rgyun du bya/ /bza' bya lnga la sogs pa sbyin/ /de yi bsod nams kyis 'thob pa/ /dus thams cad du
bgegs med dang / /grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma mthong bas/ /bsam pa gzhan ni rab tu 'jug /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /

bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las bstod pa dang mchod pa bzhi la sogs pa gnyis su med pa'i dam tshig bsten pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste lnga bcu rtsa
gcig pa'o// //rgyud 'di rab tu byung ba ni/ /ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /mtshan nyid med pa thams cad spangs/ /sum bcu bdun bdag nyid rnal

'byor/ /gnyis med mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho dang / /gnyis med rtsa rgyud rgyud chen po/ /'dus pa'i rnam pa'i gzugs can te/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyi/ /dus thams cad du zhal na gnas/ /yi ge kun gyi
za ma tog /'bum phrag sum bcu drug dang po/ /mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rab bshad de/ /chen po chung ngur gsungs pa'o/ /ri rab kyi ni rdul tshad kyi/ /mkha' 'gro thams cad kyis gsungs so/ /mtha' yas shing

ni mu med nyid/ /rtsod pa'i dus kyi sa'i nang du/ /bcom ldan mtha' yas pas 'di gsungs/ /shAg kya seng ges gsungs pa'i rgyud/ /rnal 'byor pha rol son pa'o/ /nyan pa ston pa rang nyid de/ /'chad po skye bo gzhan kyang
ngo / /legs par gsungs dang 'chad 'gyur ba/ /de'i rang bzhin du'ang bgrod par 'gyur/ /bsdu ba mdzad pa sogs rnams kyis/ /bdag las bgrod pa de thob bo/ /ma mo thams cad 'dus rnams kyis/ /rdo rje'i
gnas rnams su bsdus so/ /gcig la gcig gis bzhed pa ni/ /gsol ba 'debs shing gsol 'debs mdzad/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yi/ /tshig 'di la ni mngon par dga'/ /sdig pa rnams las
grol bar 'gro/ /srid pa las ni 'gro bar byos/ /dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs/ /bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so/ /

dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las rgya mtsho drug la sogs pa la rnal 'byor dang ye shes dang sdom pa dang bya ba dang de kho na nyid rgya mtshor gyur pa dang / mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho las 'di rnams
dang mi mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs s+h+yo// //dpal bal yul grub pa'i gnas mchog chen po yu tung lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang chen por rgya gar

gyi paN Di ta chen po rdo rje slob dpon rtog ge pa rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bu dus deng sang 'gran pa med pa/ snying rje chen pos thugs brlan pa'i ngang tshul can/ phyogs sna tshogs nas 'dus pa'i skye 'gro rnams la

chos dang zang zing gi char gyis tshim par mdzad pa dpal rdo rje phag mo'i zhabs kyi chu skyes kyi rdul la reg pa shAkya'i sras po rgyal ba'i sde'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba shAkya'i dge slong d+d+harma yon tan gyis mnyan
cing bsgyur ba'o// //phyis gang zag chos kyi spyan can dpal mchog dang po'-i rdo rje'i bka'i tshul dang yang bstun te zhus gtugs legs par byas so/ /mkha' mnyam bde rdzogs sna tshogs sprul pa

sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku/ /des gsungs dri med sna tshogs gdul bya'i bsam dbang gis/ /gsung gcig gis kyang sna tshogs don mang ston pas dpyad pa dka'/ /de ltar yin yang ji ltar mi bdag shing rta cher zhugs
nas/ /g.yul ngor 'jug dus rkang gis bgrod rnams 'thab par mi brtson nam/ /de bzhin sngon gyi mkhas pa chen po rnams kyi rjes 'brangs pas/ /kho bos gzhan don nus pa min na'ang phan pa'i bsam
pas bsgyur/ /'di la gzhung dang bla ma'i ma yin rang gi blo gros skyon gyis ni/ /sgra don 'gal bar gyur pa bcom ldan dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams dang / /mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang
bstan dga'i lha rnams mkhas pa rnams kyis bzod par rigs/ /'di las thob pa'i dge ba dri med cung zad des/ /'gro kun rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang thob gyur cig /bdag gis
srol btod tsam 'di la/ /sgra don 'jug pa mkhyen rnams kyi/ /skad gnyis smra bas gzigs pa na/ /skyon du gyur snang bcos par zhu/ /
phrag dog sgo nas mi 'phyar zhing / /rjes su yi rang ba yang mdzod/ /rdzogs so// // sid d+hi/ sid d+hi/ sid d+hi/ zhus so//
@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA sam ba rod dA ya tan tra rA dza s+ya nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal bde mchog 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs te/ 'phags pa dga' bo la sogs pa 'dod

chags dang bral ba rnams kyis bskor cing / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la sogs pa rnal 'byor kyi dbang phyug bye ba phrag brgyad bcu'i dbus su phyag na rdo rje la gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad pa dang /

phyag na rdo rje stan langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ lag pa thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ kye rnam pa kun mchog sdom pa yi/ /

bskyed pa'i rnal 'byor mtshan nyid dang / /rdzogs pa yang ni ji ltar lags/ /bcom ldan lha las nyan par 'tshal/ /rlung dang me dang chu dang sa/ /de bzhin nam mkha' ji ltar lags/ /rnam pa lnga ni ji ltar lha/ /gtso bo

yul drug de bzhin ci/ /phyi dang nang du gnas pa yi/ /sku gsum byin brlabs ji lta bu/ /lha yi sku ni ji ltar lags/ /gtso bos de bzhin lha mo gsungs/ /zla ba nyi ma ci zhig lha/ /lam lnga po ni ji ltar lags/ /

lus kyi rang bzhin ji lta bu/ /de bzhin rtsa yi gzugs ni ci/ /rtsa yi grangs kyi tshad ni du/ /de bzhin lus kyi gong bu ci/ /sbas pa'i dam tshig gi ni brda/ /gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol/ /phyi dang nang gi bdag

nyid kyi/ /gnas la sogs pa'i brda du zhig /ji ltar sa la sogs pa 'thob/ /mtshan ma ji ltar mthong bar 'gyur/ /khyod kyi las ni bcu gnyis gang / /sngags kyi bzlas pa ji ltar 'gyur/ /bgrang phreng dag ni

ji ltar rigs/ /bzlas pa'i grangs ni du zhig lags/ /lha yi rnam pa'i rnal 'byor ci/ /dkyil 'khor bri ba du zhig mchis/ /sngags kyi dngos grub ci zhig lha/ /gzhon nu ma yi mchod pa ci/ /bya dang bya min nyi ma

gang / /gtso bo myos byed gtor ma ci/ /bdud rtsi lnga sogs ji ltar lha/ /lcags kyu lnga sogs ji ltar 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor bri ba bshad du gsol/ /thig gdab pa ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /ji ltar sa ni yongs su sbyang / /

srung ba'i 'khor lo ji ltar 'gyur/ /slob dpon gyi ni bya ba gang / /ji ltar slob ma yongs su gzung / /dbang bskur ba yi grangs ni du/ /bzhi pa yang ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /dus kyi nges pa ji lta bu/ /de bzhin 'chi ba blu ba

gang / /dus bzhi'i ming ni du zhig mchis/ /gling bzhi pa ni ji ltar lags/ /dus dang dus min dngos grub ci/ /spyod pa ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ /rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud ni du/ /rnal 'byor rgyud ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /

mdo sde'i grangs ni ji lta bu/ /de bzhin pha rol phyin pa du/ /rab gnas sbyin sreg mchod sbyin dang / /sngags kyi dngos grub ji ltar 'gyur/ /bcud kyis len ni ji ltar lta/ /myos byed btung ba ji ltar 'gyur/ /gsang sngags ji ltar 'byung

'gyur lha/ /sngags btu ba ni ji ltar 'gyur/ /tshar gcad pa ni ci zhig lha/ /gtso bo rjes gzung ji lta bu/ /bcom ldan de nyid rnams ni ci/ /stong pa nyid dang snying rje gang / /stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ci/ /ji ltar de bzhin nyid
rang bzhin/ /chos rnams thams cad yongs shas pa'i/ /bsgom pa'i mtshan nyid gtso bos gsungs/ /dpal bde mchog 'byung ba'i rgyud las zhus pa'i le 'u ste dang po'o// //

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa phyag na rdo rje gsang ba 'byung ba 'di zhus pa legs so legs so/ /de nas de'i phyir bskyed pa yi/ /rim pa'i bsgom pa yang dag bshad/ /sna tshogs las kyi rang bzhin gyis/ /

skye gnas bzhi po rnams su 'gyur/ /sgong skyes mngal nas skyes pa dang / /drod gsher dang ni rdzus skyes rnams/ /ngang pa khrung khrung rma bya dang / /ne tso bzhad sogs sgong skyes te/ /glang po ma ha ba lang

rta/ /bong bu mi sogs mngal nas skyes/ /srin bu 'bu dang phye ma leb/ /nya la sogs pa drod gsher skyes/ /lha dang dmyal ba'i sems can rnams/ /de bzhin bar do'i sred pa dang / /bskal pa dang po pa la sogs/ /'di

rnams rdzus skyes sems can no/ /shar gyi lus 'phags ba lang spyod/ /de bzhin byang gi sgra mi snyan/ /gling gsum po yi mi rnams ni/ /longs spyod chen pos yang dag 'tsho/ /blun rmongs bye brag mi phyed cing / /rtog

med rnam par dpyod med pa'o/ /'dzam bu gling du legs skyes pa/ /las kyi sa par rab tu grags/ /legs byas nyes par byas pa'i las/ /mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma rnams/ /skye ba sngon gyi rnam smin 'dir/ /skye bo
rnams la snang bar 'gyur/ /rgyags dang ser sna gdug sems rnams/ /g.yo sgyu mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang / /chags sdang gti mug la sogs kyis/ /rims dang nad la sogs pas gzer/ /'dzam bu gling pa'i gtso bo

mchog /yul dbus su ni skyes pa ste/ /sngon gyi dge ba la ltos nas/ /dbang po rno 'bring rtul por 'gyur/ /mi ru skyes pa 'bras bu'i dam pa dang po ste/ /rang gi khyim nas nges 'byung rnyed pa gnyis pa yin/ /rab tu

byung nas dge ba bsgrub pa gsum pa ste/ /rtse gcig yid ni thob par gyur pa bzhi par gsungs/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin/ /mi rnams kyis rab mi shes te/ /thog med dus kyi nyon mongs kyi/ /bag chags rab tu bsags

byas pas/ /de phyir sngon byas las kyis ni/ /skye dang 'chi ba yang dag 'byung / /tshogs pa ma rnyad de srid du/ /zhag bdun bar do'i srid par gnas/ /srid pa bar do'i sems can ni/ /'gron po'i bgrod pa ji bzhin du/ /

'di ltar las kyi zhags pa yis/ /'gro ba drug tu rab tu skye/ /pha ma'i kun tu sbyor sogs ni/ /srid pa'i skye bos mthong gyur nas/ /rta la zhon bzhin rnam shes ni/ /rlung gi bzhon pa zhon nas su/ /skad cig thang cig nyid la

ni/ /shin tu myur bar 'ongs gyur nas/ /shin tu dga' dang bcas stobs kyis/ /kha yi lam nas 'jug par 'gyur/ /rtsa ni stong phrag bdun bcu gnyis/ /rab bskul de yi skad cig la/ /A li kA li zhu byas pas/ /
mchog tu dga' ba yang dag 'thob/ /khu ba khrag de'i dbus su ni/ /thig le'i gzugs kyis yang dag gnas/ /dang po'i rnam pa nur nur po/ /mer mer po ni gnyis pa yin/ /ltar ltar por skyes gsum pa ste/ /de

bzhin bzhi pa gor gor po/ /rlung rnams kyis ni bskul tsam gyis/ /sha yi rnam pa lta bur 'gyur/ /zla ba lngar gyur sa bon las/ /yan lag lnga ni rab tu skye/ /zla ba bdun na skra dang spu/ /sen mo rtags ni skye bar

'gyur/ /zla ba brgyad na dbang po dang / /lus kyi yan lag 'byung bar 'gyur/ /zla ba dgu na yang dag rdzogs/ /zla ba bcu na sems dang ldan/ /nur nur rang bzhin mi bskyod pa/ /mer mer po ni rin chen 'byung / /

'od dpag med mgon star star po/ /gor gor po ni don yod grub/ /mkhrang gyur rnam par snang mdzad de/ /rnam pa lngar ni bstan pa yin/ /dri chu khrag ni mi bskyod pa/ /sa bon rang bzhin 'od dpag med/ /gong bu

rin chen 'byung ldan te/ /ro gcig 'dres pa rnam snang bzhugs/ /skye gnas dbus su rtsa gnyis te/ /g.yas dang g.yon na de bzhin gnas/ /g.yon nas khu ba zhes bshad de/ /g.yas nas de bzhin khrag yin no/ /de dag

gcig tu 'dus gyur pa/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin no/ /las kyi sa bon dbang thob pas/ /rlung gis yang dag bsgyur nas su/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas sgo ru ni/ /gdong ni nges par phyogs par 'gyur/ /dku
g.yas su ni brten nas su/ /tsog pur mngon par phyogs te gnas/ /dku g.yon yang dag brten nas ni/ /shes rab ltor ni mngon phyogs 'gyur/ /mkhas pas sa bon ltung ba'i rim/ /dus kyi skad

cig yang dag mtshon/ /g.yas na rlung ni rgyu ba gang / /thams cad du ni skyes bur 'gyur/ /g.yon nas rlung ni rgyu ba gang / /nges par bud med rnams su 'gyur/ /gnyis ga'i dbus rgyu'i sa bon gang / /rtag tu ma ning

'gyur ba'o/ /chu khams pha yir shes par bya/ /me yi khams ni ma yi'o/ /lpags pa sha dang khrag rnams ni/ /ma las skyes zhes bshad pa ste/ /rgyus pa rkang dang khu ba rnams/ /pha las skyes zhes bshad pa yin/ /

drug po 'di dag bsdus pa'i lus/ /rdo rje sems dpas gang gsungs pa/ /gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang / /'du byed rnam shes de bzhin te/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin du/ /phung po nges par skye ba yin/ /

srid pa skyed pa'i rim shes pas/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob bya'i phyir/ /'di ni phung po yongs mkhyen pa'i/ /de nyid gsung ba rnams kyis bshad/ /'di ni bskyed pa'i rim pa nges par bstan pa'i rim pa bye ba ste
gnyis pa'o// // de nas gang zhig shes tsam gyis/ /myur du dngos grub thob 'gyur ba'i/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i bsgom pa ni/ /yang dag rab tu bshad par bya/ /lus kyi dkyil 'khor la brten
nas/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim bsgrubs pas/ /lus kyi dkyil 'khor zhes gsungs so/ /dbang po dman pas bskyed rim gyi/ /dkyil 'khor bsgom zhing bsam par bya/ /
dbang po rno bos skad cig gi/ /rnam pas sems tsam dkyil 'khor bsam/ /skad cig rnam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa ni/ /khams gsum gzhal yas khang bdag nyid/ /srog
chags rnams ni dkyil 'khor pa/ /de dbus skad cig rnam pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po rnal 'byor ba'o/ /oM AHhU~M gi sngags kyis ni/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor te/ /mtho ris sa stengs sa 'og tu/ /

skad cig gis ni sku gcig 'gyur/ /skad cig rnam pas rnal 'byor te/ /skad cig rnam pas gsang sngags 'don/ /dbang po kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde ba mchog /khams bzhi pa dang phung po

lnga/ /de bzhin yul drug bdag nyid ni/ /khrag 'thung lha mo'i ye shes te/ /de la tha dad mi brtag go/ /dkyil 'khor de bzhin nyid rgyas btab/ /de bzhin mkha' mnyam stong pa nyid/ /sna tshogs de bzhin nyid bdag

med/ /thabs ni snying rje'i stobs yin te/ /zung du 'jug pa rnam rtog bral/ /dkyil 'khor snying po mchog yin no/ /rnam par mi rtog sbyor bsams kyang / /de tshe mi rtog bsam mi khyab/ /de yang rnam pa kun

gyi mchog /bde ba'i dbang po rnam pa med/ /de nyid dngos dang dngos min bdag /rtag tu srid pas 'byung bar mdzad/ /sna tshogs spros pa'i rtog pa med/ /rtag tu 'byung ba bde ba che/ /skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin

gyis/ /de las skye ba yang dag 'byung / /bems po min phyir bdag nyid rig /mi shes rnam par mi mthong bas/ /gzugs med gang du'ang mi gnas shing / /'gyur ba med phyir brtan pa'o/ /kun rdzob skye ba 'byung

bas na/ /chad pa min phyir dngos med min/ /lhan cig skyes dga'i rang dngos su/ /chos rnams thams cad lhan cig skyes/ /bdag byin brlab pa rang 'byung ba/ /mi shigs 'jig pa med pa ste/ /skye ba med pa'i
ro myong bas/ /sgom pa yang ni de nyid de/ /stong nyid so sor rtogs pas na/ /bsam gtan shes rab tu yang 'gyur/ /chos kun yongs su shes pa yi/ /bsgom pa de nyid bsgom med pa'o/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub
bde ba che/ /phyag rgya chen po mchog de bzhin/ /de nyid chos la 'jug pa'i phyir/ /de rnams dbye bas rab bstan pa/ /bla ma dam pa'i man ngag gis/ /gsal bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du min/ /sangs

rgyas kun gyi sdom pa ni/ /e ba~M yi ge la rab gnas/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi las/ /rnam kun mchog gi sdom pa'o/ /sdom pa byang chub bde mchog ste/ /bltar med brjod du med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi
gsang ba ni/ /'dus pa bde ba'i mchog yin te/ /bdag byin brlab pa'i rim pa 'di/ /bla ma'i drin gyis gsal bar 'gyur/ /'di ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa nges par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste gsum pa'o// //
de nas de phyir 'byung ba bzhi'i/ /mtshan nyid yang dag bshad par bya/ /dngos po dag ni ma lus gang / /de ni 'byung ba'i rang bzhin te/ /sa de la ni dngos po brten/ /mes ni thams cad 'tshed par
byed/ /chu yis 'jig par byed pa ste/ /rlung gis lhan cig bskyod par byed/ /nam mkha' yul gyis stong par gnas/ /der ni thams cad de las skye/ /gang du gcig ni gnas pa der/ /bzhi po kun kyang nye bar
gnas/ /rtswa shing ljon pas 'khril shing sogs/ /bems po lta bu'i rnam shes tsam/ /gang dag 'gro drug sems can rnams/ /tshigs dang tshigs ni thams cad du/ /rnam shes bcas pa lta bur gnas/ /de ltar

srid pa'i dngos po kun/ /blo dang ldan pas shes par bya/ /sems can rnams ni 'chi ba na/ /yan lag nying lag thams cad kyi/ /rlung ni thams cad bskyod par 'gyur/ /skad cig de la me drod 'dor/ /chu ni rtag tu skams

gyur nas/ /de nas tshor ba med par 'gyur/ /lus la sogs pa'i sa khams kyi/ /sra ba nyid tsam gnas par 'gyur/ /skye ba dang ni 'chi ba dag /thams cad du ni 'byung bar 'gro/ /lha dang lha min mi rnams ni/ /'byung

ba med par skye mi 'gyur/ /lha yi 'jig rten skyong la sogs/ /thams cad la ni lhan cig gnas/ /rig byed grub mtha' thams cad kyi/ /rtag tu 'dod cing bsgom pa ste/ /gang phyir thams cad kun tu 'gro/ /sa stengs skyes bu

kun la gnas/ /'byung ba bzhi po gtso bo mchog /bstan bcos kun las yang dag bshad/ /rlung ni srog tu yang dag blta/ /me ni 'tsho ba'i mtshan nyid de/ /chu ni bdud rtsi'i ngo bo nyid/ /sa ni zhing tsam nyid du gnas/ /de la

rtag tu gnas pa'i lha/ /rnam shes mchog gi dbang phyug ste/ /lha lnga yi ni rnam pa ru/ /rnam shes de ni yongs su 'gyur/ /gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang / /de bzhin 'du byed rnam par shes/ /me long lta bu mnyam

nyid dang / /so sor kun tu rtog pa dang / /de bzhin bya ba grub pa dang / /chos dbyings shin tu rnam dag ste/ /ye shes 'di dag rab tu gnas/ /rnam snang mdzad dang rin chen 'byung / /'od dpag med dang don yod grub/ /de

bzhin mi bskyod pa nyid de/ /rnam lnga ro gcig rdzogs byang chub/ /gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri/ /ro dang reg bya chos de bzhin/ /yul drug tu ni shes bya ste/ /'di dag rnam par dag par bshad/ /khams ni bcwa brgyad

ces bya ste/ /de dag phung po'i rang bzhin nyid/ /yi ge mchog ni bsgom bar bya/ /sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob bya'i phyir/ /mig la sogs pa bsgom bya ste/ /mig gi dbang po'i rnam shes ni/ /thugs kyi rdo rje'i rnam
