'phrul yin/ /ngo bo nyid gsum rnam dag don/ /'od gsal ba yi go 'phang 'gyur/ /sgra dang rna ba rnam shes ni/ /dmigs pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /sna dang dri dang rnam shes kyang / /de bzhin rnam dag shes par bya/ /

ro dang lce dang rnam shes ni/ /don dam nyid du rnam par dag /lus dang reg bya rnam shes kyang / /sgyu ma lta bu'i ngo bor skyes/ /yid dang chos dang yid rnam shes/ /snying po nyid du rnam par dag /rnam shes drug ni
kun gzhi ru/ /'jug pas de bzhin gshegs pa yin/ /'od gsal ba yi go 'phang thob/ /he ru ka dpal yang dag gnas/ /yul dang yul can sbyor ba yis/ /rnam rtog med pa'i go 'phang 'gyur/ /
rnam pa kun gyi mchog gnas pas/ /yul ni rnam dag shes par bya/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /gcig la de bzhin gsum du brtags/ /skyabs gsum dang ni de nyid gsum/ /sku gsum rnam par grol ba
gsum/ /zhal gsum yig gsum lha gsum ste/ /khams gsum pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ /dkyil 'khor gsum dang rnal 'byor gsum/ /lam gsum du ni bstan pa ste/ /dam tshig gsum dang dge ba gsum/ /de bzhin

sku dang gsung dang thugs/ /shes rab dang ni thabs nyid dang / /de yi sbyor ba gsum pa ste/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas rang bzhin gyis/ /ji ltar gsang gsum mthong ba dang / /'khor gsum mi dmigs sbyor ba yis/ /sngags

gsum gyi ni rang bzhin nyid/ /phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid kyi/ /rtsa gsum gyi ni rang gi dngos/ /phyi rol 'jig rten pa yi chos/ /lha la sogs pa'i bdag nyid nang / /phyi nang dag pa nyid kyi phyir/ /rnal 'byor pas ni sangs rgyas 'thob/ /

chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du/ /lha ni mngon sum dmigs par bya/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog rang bzhin/ /lha mor yongs su brtag par bya/ /dang po'i lha yi rang bzhin du/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bzhugs/ /gnas

dang zhing la sogs pa'i brda'/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma'i 'dus pa/ /de bzhin gnyis med mnyam sbyor la/ /lha rnams yang dag 'phro ba ste/ /tshad med lha ni 'phro ba las/ /dkyil 'khor tshad can rnam par brtag /

lha yi rnal 'byor bsam mi khyab/ /sangs rgyas rol pa'ang bsam mi khyab/ /mkha' 'gro dra ba'i gzugs kyis ni/ /he ru ka dpal yang dag sbyor/ /de dag mi phyed ngo bo nyid/ /bsgom par nga yis bshad pa yin/ /

de dag thams cad gnyis med thob/ /gzung dang 'dzin dang rnam bral ba/ /rags pa sgra zhes bshad pa ste/ /phra ba sems kyi rang bzhin 'gyur/ /bsam dang bral ba'i de nyid ni/ /go 'phang mchog ces yongs su

grags/ /'di ni 'byung ba bzhi dang rnam pa lnga dang / yul drug lha'i rnam par dag pa rim par phye ba ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas zla ba nyi ma yi/ /rab tu dbye ba yang dag bshad/ /g.yas dang g.yon du sbyor

ba yis/ /rim pa ji bzhin rgyu ba ste/ /g.yon du rkan nas bzung nas ni/ /lte ba'i dkyil 'khor rab 'jug pa'i/ /zla ba'i rtsa ni 'og bltas par/ /A li zla bar yang dag 'bab/ /g.yas su lte ba nas bzung nas/ /

rkan gyi gnas su rab 'jug pa'i/ /nyi ma'i rtsa ni steng bltas te/ /kA li nyi mar rtag tu 'bab/ /sna yi sgo ni gnyis po nas/ /rtsa gnyis rgyu ba'i mtshan nyid ni/ /rtsa g.yon 'jug pa'i lam yin te/ /g.yas pa 'byung

ba'i lam yin no/ /nyi shar nas brtsams ji srid de/ /nub kyi bar ni nyin mo ste/ /nub pa nas brtsams ji srid de/ /shar ba'i bar ni mtshan mor 'gyur/ /nyin dang mtshan mo zhag yin te/ /mel rtse thun zhes brjod pa

yin/ /thun bzhi nyin mor shes bya ste/ /de bzhin mtshan mo'ang thun bzhi'o/ /zhag gcig la ni 'pho ba yi/ /yan lag bcu drug rnams yin te/ /thun ni phyed phyed rtag tu rlung / /sna yi bu gar yang dag rgyu/ /

yar ngo'i tshes gcig nas gzung nas/ /nyin zhag gsum gyi thun phyed la/ /zla ba'i rlung ni rgyu ba ste/ /de nas zhag gsum nyi ma'i rlung / /go rim 'dis ni ji srid du/ /yar tshes bcwa lnga'i bar du'o/ /mar ngo'i
tshes gcig nas bzung na/ /nyin zhag gsum gyi snga dro ni/ /nyi ma'i rlung du grags pa rgyu/ /
de bzhin tshes ni bcwa lnga'i bar/ /thun re yi ni bzhi cha rnams/ /chu tshod du ni brjod pas na/ /nyin zhag gcig la rtsa rnams ni/ /sum bcu rtsa gnyis shes par bya/ /nyin zhag gcig la dbyug gu

yi/ /drug bcu rtsa bzhi'i tshad kyis ni/ /rtsa dang chu tshod phyed dbyug gu/ /thun gyi brgyad cha zhes su bshad/ /sna sgo'i rlung ni 'byung 'jug la/ /dbugs gcig tu ni rab tu grags/ /rlung gi sbyor ba la mkhas pas/ /

dbugs drug srog tu shes par bya/ /srog ni lnga bcu tham pa dang / /dbugs gsum rkang pa'ang de dang ldan/ /nyi ma byang du rgyu dus kyi/ /nyi ma dang po'i dbyug gu yin/ /nyi ma lhor ni rgyu dus kyi/ /mtshan mo yang
ni de bzhin 'gyur/ /dbyug gu re re'i 'phel 'grib ni/ /dus kyi dbye bas shes par bya/ /dbugs ni drag po bzhi char bcas/ /'pho ba so so'i 'phel 'grib yin/ /dbugs kyi sum cha de'i bzhi cha'i/ /drug
chas nyi ma re rer 'gyur/ /thun ni phyed phyed rgyu ba las/ /phyin ci log tu 'phos gyur na/ /rtsod pa la sogs nges 'gyur bas/ /mkhas pas 'di dag yang dag brtag /nyi ma gcig gnyis gsum dang bzhi/ /

lnga dang drug tu gang tshe rlung / /phyin ci log tu rtag rgyu na/ /de tshe rtsod pa chen por 'gyur/ /zla phyed rtag tu log par rgyu/ /nad ni chen po yang dag 'byung / /zla ba gcig tu log par rgyu/ /snying sdug gnyen ni brlag
par 'gyur/ /phyed dang gnyis su log par rgyu/ /zla ba drug na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /thun mong dus su shes par bya/ /gzhan yang khyad par bshad bya ste/ /mnyam po bdun du nyi ma song / /gang tshe skye ba'i
nyin zla ba/ /de tshe rgyas pa zhes bya'i dus/ /'chi ba'i nges pa'i dus yin no/ /mi ni khyim gang las skyes pa/ /gang zhig gzhan yang bdun de'i phyir/ /der ni nyi ma mnyam bdun song / /mnyam po bdun

zhes bya bar bshad/ /nyi ma'i lam nas thams cad du/ /rlung ni rtag tu rgyu ba dag /rgyun mi 'chad par yang dang yang / /mkhas pas dus ni mtshon par bya/ /dus kyi skad cig gang la rlung / /bgrod pa gzhan du 'jug 'gyur

na/ /dus de'i skad cig rdzogs pa na/ /'chi 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /nyi phyed dang por byas te nyi ma rdzogs dang de bzhin nyin zhag gcig gi bar/ /de las zhag gnyis zhag gsum dang ni de bzhin zhag ni bzhi'i bar dag tu/ /

rlung ni gang zhig rtsa la brten te g.yon pa min pa'i nyi ma'i lam nas rgyu/ /de las sa dang nyi ma phyogs dang bkra shis drug bzhi 'di dag shes par bya/ /lnga nas nyi shu rtsa lngar nyin zhag 'di dag lnga lngar spel bas bgrod par 'gyur/ /

de las re res spel bas bcu ni sum 'gyur ji srid gsum gyis lhag pa'i bar/ /de las rgyas pa'i dus su gsum mig zla ba'i lo dang drug gsum zung zla'i zla/ /lhag ma tshes dang phyogs mda' yon tan zung dang zla ba'i

zhag tu 'tsho ba yin/ /re'u mig sum bcu bdun bcas pa'i/ /'khor lo rim gsum bris nas ni/ /tshe dang srog gi rlung dag dang / /nyin zhag mtshan ma rim bzhin bri/ /zhag lnga nas ni nyi shu lnga'i/ /bar bar gyi ni nyin

zhag la/ /grangs ni bcu drug ma bshad gang / /de rnams tshang bar brjod par bya/ /zhag ni drug bdun brgyad dgu yi/ /rim pas gal te rlung rgyu na/ /yon tan ldan yang nyin zhag ni/ /nyer bzhis ma tshang lo gsum

na'o/ /drag po nyi ma yan lag sa'i/ /zhag ni rim pas rgyu na ni/ /yon tan ldan pa'ang nyin zhag ni/ /nyer bzhis ma tshang lo gnyis na'o/ /zhag ni bcu drug de bzhin du/ /bcu bdun dang ni bcwa brgyad dang / /bcu dgu

yi ni rim pa yis/ /rlung rgyu yon tan can yang zhag /bcu gnyis gnyis 'gyur ma tshang ba'i/ /lo gcig na ni skyabs med gang / /de ni gshin rje'i grong khyer du/ /the tshom med par 'gro bar 'gyur/ /nyi ma nyi shu
gcig gnyis gsum/ /nyer bzhi'i rim pas rlung rgyu na/ /yon tan ldan pa'ang zhag drug ni/ /ma tshang zla ba drug na 'chi/ /re'u mig sum bcu gnyis ldan pa'i/ /rim gnyis 'khor lo bris nas ni/ /

der ni tshe dang yan lag rlung / /grangs kyi mtshan ma rim bzhin bri/ /'chi ba'i rtags ni 'di dag kun/ /rnam pa thams cad shes byas nas/ /blo ldan 'chi ba blu ba yis/ /gal te brten pa'i go 'phang 'dod/ /rtsa ni yang dag sbyang

byas pas/ /de srid rlung ni sbyangs 'gyur te/ /so so'i rim bzhin rnal 'byor pas/ /yang dang yang du mnan par bya/ /g.yon pa'i bu gar bcug nas ni/ /rtsa ni bsdams nas mnan bya zhing / /de bzhin du ni g.yas par rlung / /

bkug ste dal bus mnan par bye/ /sems can rnams kyi zhag gcig la/ /rgyu ba'i dbugs kyi grangs kyi tshul/ /brgya phrag drug gis lhag pa yi/ /stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig go/ /dbang chen gyis ni rgyal srid de/ /chus

ni don rnams yang dag 'byung / /me yi rlung ni rnam rgyu bas/ /bkres skom dug dang sdug bsngal nad/ /bya ba thams cad nyams 'gyur zhes/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa mchog gis gsungs/ /rlung gis rtsod dang skyo dang rmongs/ /

nor nyams nyon ni mongs par byed/ /dbang chen nor dang 'bru la sogs/ /rnyed pa thob dang sdud byed pa'o/ /chu yi rlung ni rnam rgyu bas/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub kun byed pas/ /de yi sbyor ba mchog gtso bor/ /rdo rje

sems dpas gang gsungs pa'o/ /rlung ni bcom ldan he ru ka'i/ /rang bzhin nyid de gsum du 'gyur/ /g.yon pa shes rab rang bzhin te/ /g.yas pa snying rje'i bdag nyid do/ /gnyis po mi phyed sbyor ba yang / /
gnyi ga nas ni rnam par rgyu/ /de bas de nyid rig pas der/ /dge mi dge sogs shes par bya/ /dug sogs gzhom dang lhag ma ni/ /bkra shis dpal ni bskyed pa la/ /shes rab bdag nyid rab tu bsngags/ /

rtag tu dpal ldan snying rje'i stobs/ /g.yul bsham rol rtsed ston mo dang / /gcad pa dang ni dbug pa dang / /bsreg dang btso ba'i las la ni/ /snying rje'i bdag nyid rab tu bsngags/ /gzhan yang gnyis bdag rdo rje can/ /
the tsom 'gyur bar shes bya ste/ /dge dang mi dge nges med par/ /rlung rig pas ni 'dir mtshon bya/ /mgon po ji ste A lir rgyu/ /'ga' zhig kA lir gnas 'dri 'am/ /kA li'i rgyu la A lir gnas/ /
de yi 'dod don nyams par 'gyur/ /gang nas mgon po de rgyu ba/ /der gnas 'ga' zhig 'dri byed na/ /de yi don kun yang dag 'grub/ /gnyi kar gnas las the tshom 'gyur/ /rlung gi bdag nyid kyis
mgon po'i/ /sku gsum por yang shes par bya/ /'jug pa chos kyi sku yin te/ /gnas pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/ /'byung ba sprul pa'i sku zhes bshad/ /'di dag sku ni gsum por bzhad/ /'dri

ba po'am rang gi'ang rung / /chos skus thams cad dge ba ste/ /longs spyod rdzogs pas the tshom 'gyur/ /sprul pas 'thab mor ston pa'o/ /rnal 'byor pa yi srog rtsol ni/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi ngo bor gnas/ /
g.yon dang g.yas kyi gnas gang na/ /rim pa ji bzhin rnam par rgyu/ /g.yas nas rnam par rgyu ba'i 'od/ /me yi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te/ /nags kyi me tog lta bu'i mdog /de ni 'od dpag med pa'i lha/ /

g.yon nas rnam par rgyu ba'i 'od/ /rtag tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor te/ /kha dog ljang gu ltar snang ba/ /lha ni don yod mchog yin no/ /gnyi ga nas ni rgyu ba'i 'od/ /gser gyi 'od ltar snang ba ste/ /dbang chen

dkyil 'khor gyi ni rlung / /rtag tu rin chen 'byung ldan rgyu/ /'og nas dal bar rab rgyu ba/ /kun da zla ba lta bur dkar/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor rgyu ba ste/ /'od chen rdo rje mgon po'o/ /lus kun la ni rjes 'gro'i
rlung / /sems kun rab tu 'jug byed pa/ /mgon po rnam par snang mdzad ni/ /'byung bar rab tu grags pa yin/ /rnal 'byor ma ni mnyam gzhag pas/ /'jug pa'i rlung ni bgrang bar

bya/ /ji srid 'bum la sogs pa'i grangs/ /sgra dang bral bar rtag tu bzla/ /sgrub pos sgra dang bral bar ni/ /'bum bzlas yongs su rdzogs pa na/ /tshe nyams pa yang lo lnga ru/ /'tsho bar 'dir ni the tshom med/ /
rtag tu nang par langs nas rlung / /stong phrag gcig tu bgrang bya ste/ /de bas rlung gi rnal 'byor la/ /rtag tu mnyam gzhag gnas par bya/ /yang na bum pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /rtag tu 'chi bdag las
rgyal bya/ /bdag nyid rig pas rkyang mthil bar/ /kun tu rlung gis dgang bya ste/ /bum pa can la brtan byas nas/ /dbye ba gsum gyis gzhom par bshad/ /tha ma sum bcu rtsa drug tsam/ /de yi nyis 'gyur
'bring de bzhin/ /sum 'gyur chen por shes bya ste/ /bum pa can des rgyal bar bya/ /bum pa can sngar shes byas nas/ /bdag nyid skyil mo dkrung bcas te/ /lag pa lan gsum mnyes nas ni/ /de nas
lan drug se gol brdab/ /ji srid sum bcu rtsa drug bar/ /de srid bum pa can gyis bya/ /sum 'gyur chen pos gzhom pa ni/ /brgya las rtsa brgyad lhag pas so/ /brtan pa'i go 'phang 'dod pas ni/ /
brtson pas de nyid kyis rgyal bya/ /bum pa'i sbyor bas rgyal bas na/ /'chi bdag las ni ring du 'jug /bum pa can ni shes byas nas/ /'gog la brtan par gnas pa na/ /de la bskal pa stong du yang / /
'chi bdag nye bar 'ong mi 'gyur/ /snying gi chu skyes dbus son rlung / /hU~M yig dkar po'i rnam par ni/ /gang gis mnyam par gzhag bsams na/ /de la yul sogs dmigs mi 'gyur/ /rlung gis

'khor ba'i steng du 'gro/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i 'og tu bgrod/ /snying ka yi ni chu skyes la/ /mi gnas mya ngan 'das par gnas/ /steng dang 'og tu rgyu ba'i rlung / /kha sbyar du ni yid kyis byas/ /de yi sbyor bas
goms byed na/ /des ni brtan pa'i go 'phang thob/ /rlung gi rnal 'byor mi shes pa'am/ /gang zhig shes kyang mi byed pa/ /de ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal tshogs/ /du mas gtses pa'i srin bur 'gyur/ /
gang zhig 'gro dang 'ong ba'i rlung / /blo dang ldan pas brtag bya ste/ /rlung gis thams cad byin gyis brlobs/ /rlung ni kun tu 'gro 'gyur ba'o/ /'di ni zla ba dang nyi ma'i man ngag gi rim par phye
ba ste lnga pa'o// // de nas lam lnga bzang po mchog /rnam par nges par rab bshad bya/ /bdag gzhan don ni phun tshogs pa'i/ /sgrub pos dge dang mi dge brtag /me dang rlung ni nyid dag dang / /

de bzhin dbang chen dang ni chu'i/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag rgyu ba las/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang dgug /de bzhin bsad dang bskrad pa yi/ /mtshan nyid mkhas pas brtag par bya/ /de yi sbyor ba mi shes pa/ /
de ni ngal ba don med 'gyur/ /mes ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba ste/ /rlung gis nor rnams nyams par 'gyur/ /dbang chen gyis ni rgyal srid 'gyur/ /chus ni nor dang 'bru rnams ster/ /g.yas pa nas ni rgyu
ba'i khams/ /byin za'i dkyil 'khor nyid yin te/ /kha dog dmar zhing gsal ba ni/ /pad ma'i mgon po'i 'byung ba'o/ /g.yon pa nas ni rgyu ba'i khams/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te/ /
kha dog ljang zhing gsal ba ni/ /las kyi mgon po'i 'byung ba'o/ /gnyi ga nas ni rgyu ba'i khams/ /gser gyi mdog ltar gsal ba ni/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor nyid yin te/ /rin chen mgon po'i rgyu
ba'o/ /dal zhing rgyu ba med pa'i khams/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te/ /dag pa'i shel ltar snang ba ni/ /rdo rje mgon po'i rgyu ba'o/ /khams rnams kun ni yang dag bsdus/ /rten dang brten
pa'ang yang dag 'dzin/ /rnam snang mdzad ni rlung chen te/ /'chi ba'i lus las rnam par rgyu/ /rlung gi de nyid mi shes par/ /las dang las min mi 'grub ste/ /rlung ni thams cad bgrod 'gyur bas/ /
rtog ge pa yis mi shes so/ /rlung gi de nyid sngon 'gro bas/ /sngags kyi de nyid bsgrub par bya/ /sems can rnams kyi srog gyur pa/ /rlung zhes bya ba las kun byed/ /'di ni rnam shes bzhon pa ste/ /
sangs rgyas go 'phang 'thob byed pa/ /rgyud rnams kun gyi gsang ba ste/ /byang chub rgyu yi thabs yin no/ /'di ni lam lnga nges par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste drug pa'o// //
de nas rtsa yi 'khor lo ni/ /rim pa bzhin du rab bshad bya/ /lus kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i rtsa/ /stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis 'gyur/ /rtsa rnams dang ni nye ba'i rtsa/ /de dag gnas la brten pa ste/ /

brgya las nyi shu lhag pa'i rtsa/ /gtso bo zhes ni bya bar brjod/ /rtsa yi gnas dang yul rnams ni/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i grangs yin te/ /de rnams dbus kyi rtsa gsum gang / /thams cad khyab cing rten pa'o/ /
mgor ni pul+lI ra yin te/ /so dang sen mo 'bab pas gnas/ /spyi gtsug dzA lan d+ha ra ste/ /skra dang spu ni 'bab par gnas/ /o D+yin rna ba g.yas pa'i rtsa/ /lpags pa dang ni dri ma 'bab/ /mgo rgyab
ar bu da yin te/ /sha ni yang dag 'bab pa'i rtsa/ /go ta ba ri rna ba g.yon/ /rgyus pa yang dag 'bab pa'i rtsa/ /smin dbus ra me shwa ri ste/ /rtag tu rus pa 'bab pa'o/ /mig ni de bi ko Tir gnas/ /

mchin pa 'bab pa'i rtsa yin no/ /ma la ba ni dpung pa gnyis/ /snying la 'bab pa'i rtsa gnas so/ /mchan khung kA ma rU pa ste/ /rtag tu mig ni 'bab pa'o/ /nu ma gnyis ni o tri ste/ /rtag tu mkhris pa 'bab pa'i

rtsa/ /tri sha ku ni lte ba ste/ /rtsa ni glo ba 'bab pas gnas/ /sna rtse ko sa la yin te/ /rgyu ma'i phreng ba 'bab pas gnas/ /kha ni ka ling ka yin te/ /rtag tu gnye ma 'bab pas gnas/ /mgrin pa lam pa ka yin

te/ /rtag tu lto ba 'bab pa'i rtsa/ /kan tsi snying ga'i gnas yin te/ /bshang ba 'bab pa'i rtsa yin no/ /mdoms bar hi ma la ya ste/ /mtshogs ma'i mtshams ni 'bab pa'i rtsa/ /pre ta bu ri mtshan ma ste/ /

bad kan 'bab pa'i rtsa yin no/ /gri ha de ba ta bshang lam ste/ /rtag tu rnag ni 'bab pa'o/ /brla gnyis sau raSh+Ta yin te/ /rtag tu khrag ni 'bab pa'o/ /byin pa gnyis ni gser gling gnas/ /rdul 'bab pa

yi rtsa yin no/ /rkang pa'i sor mo na ga ra/ /rtag tu tshil 'bab rtsar shes bya/ /rkang pa'i bol ni sin d+hu ste/ /mchi ma 'bab pa'i gzugs can ma/ /ma ru de she mthe bo ste/ /rtag tu mchil ma 'bab pas
gnas/ /ku lu ta ni pus mo ste/ /rtag tu sna chu 'bab pas gnas/ /de dag dbus na gnas pa'i rtsa/ /la la nAr ni gci ba 'bab/ /g.yas su khrag ni 'bab pa'i rtsa/ /ra sa nA zhes grags pa yin/ /

dbus kyi char ni yang dag 'jug /snying ga'i chu skyes dbus son pa/ /chu shing snye ma'i me tog bzhin/ /'phyang ba kha ni thur du bltas/ /til gyi mar me ltar 'bar zhing / /byang chub sems ni mnyam 'bab

de/ /a ba d+hU tIr shes bya ste/ /lhan cig skyes pa ster byed pa'o/ /la la na la sogs pa'i rtsa/ /rtsa rnams kun gyi gtso bo ste/ /de bas 'dir ni gzhan bsten pa/ /gang gA sin d+hur gzhan 'jug bzhin/ /
gcig gyur kha kha mu kha ste/ /de nyid skye gnas gzhan ma yin/ /longs spyod rdzogs sku'i rang bzhin gyis/ /lus la brten par shes par bya/ /bud med rnams la'ang gtso bo gsum/ /la la nA

sogs rtsa rnams yin/ /shes rab rang bzhin la la nA/ /ra sa nA ni thabs su gnas/ /dbus nas a ba d+hU tI ni/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa'o/ /longs spyod rdzogs sku la la nA/ /ra sa nA ni sprul pa'i sku/ /

a ba d+hU tI chos sku ste/ /sku gsum por ni bshad pa yin/ /rtsa rnams de dag thams cad ni/ /lus ni dge bar byed pa ste/ /de yi tshogs las yang dag byung / /gong bu lha yi bdag nyid do/ /gzugs las 'das

pa gong bur 'gyur/ /gong bu las 'das lha nyid de/ /de phyir bsam mi khyab sbyor bas/ /de bzhin nyid bdag kun tu 'gro/ /sgrub pos cho ga gang gang gis/ /gong bu las 'das go 'phang gnas/ /des ni de yi bdag
nyid du/ /gyur pas sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur/ /'di ni rtsa'i 'khor lo'i thabs rim par phye ba ste bdun pa'o// // de nas gang zhig shes tsam gyis/ /myur du dngos grub 'gyur ba yi/ /dam

tshig rnams kyang rim pa bzhin/ /yang dag par ni bshad par bya/ /rang gi khyim mam gsang ba'i gnas/ /dben zhing yid ni dga' ba dang / /ri bo tshang tshing ri sul dang / /rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram dang ni/ /ma mo'i
khyim dang dur khrod dam/ /chu bo 'dus pa'i dbus su ni/ /bla med 'bras bu 'dod pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag bri bar bya/ /yon bdag dad pa chen po yis/ /zhing skyes gnas skyes sngags skyes ma'i/ /

rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor pa/ /slob dpon lha kun spyan drang bya/ /khyim pa 'am ni dge tshul lam/ /de bzhin dge slong slob dpon te/ /slob dpon kha cig 'jig rten pa/ /bstan la gnas pa'i dge slong ngam/ /

kha cig yon tan ldan pa'am/ /de bzhin mngon shes thob pa'ang rung / /'di rnams nang na yon bdag ni/ /gang la dad pas gtso mchog bya/ /slob dpon sngon du 'gro ba yis/ /dkyil 'khor dge ba bri byas te/ /

slob dpon dbang bskur yon tan ldan/ 'jig rten rnams kyis ma smad cing / /mi dge bcu yongs spangs pa ni/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i gtso bor bya/ /rtag tu yon bdag blo ldan gyis/ /snying rje med cing khro dang gdug /

khengs dang brkam chags bdag nyid bstod/ /mnyam par ma gzhag gis mi bya/ /gang zhig khyim gnas longs spyod bsten/ /gshol 'dzugs dang ni tshong pa dang / /rmongs pas dam chos 'tshong ba ni/ /tshogs kyi 'khor

lo'i gtso bor min/ /'di ltar yon tan kun ldan zhing / /thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin/ /dul zhing brtson 'grus yang dag ldan/ /sred pa med cing nga rgyal med/ /rtag tu sems can bsten par ni/ /

ltos bcas rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / /thod pa'i rgyan la dga' ba dang / /rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pa'i/ /mkhas pas g.yon gyi phyogs su ni/ /g.yon pa'ang rab tu gzhag par bya/ /'di ltar yon tan ldan

slob dpon/ /las rnams kun la rab tu bsngags/ /rim pa ji bzhin slob dpon dang / /lha rnams spyan drang byon pa la/ /ji ltar rnyed pa'i dri chu yis/ /zhabs bkru bas ni gtsang byas nas/ /sa yongs brtag pa'i gnas
su ni/ /slob dpon sngon du 'gro ba yis/ /rgan dang gzhon pa'i dbye ba bzhin/ /zhugs nas gdan la gnas par bya/ /skal ba med dang nga rgyal can/ /de bzhin bla ma smod pa dang / /dam tshig ma mthong
rang gi bu/ /de bzhin skyes pa bud med rnams/ /sgrub po dngos grub 'dod pa yis/ /dam tshig der ni gzhug mi bya/ /gal te phyugs ni de rnams zhugs/ /dngos grub ring du 'jug par 'gyur/ /dam tshig
smad pas lus sems ni/ /sdug bsngal de bzhin gnas nyams dang / /dpal las ring zhing sna tshogs pa'i/ /sdug bsngal gyis ni nyer 'tsher 'gyur/ /de ltar shes nas spang bya ste/ /
mchod pa'i spyod yul can rnams bsdu/ /rgan dang gzhon pa'i rim bzhin du/ /me tog bdug pa mar me dang / /tsan dan dris ni khyad par du/ /blo dang ldan pas rtag mchod bya/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan gyis
brgyan pa'i/ /gtor ma slob dpon gyis rab brtag /lha ni bsnyen phyir mchod bya zhing / /yon bdag yid la 'dod pa yi/ /gang zhig zhi dang rgyas pa'i las/ /dngos grub don du dris nas ni/ /gang gang mngon

bar 'dod pa yi/ /las de byin gyis brlab par bya/ /sbrang chang bur chang khur ba'i chang / /ji ltar rnyed pa dbul bar bya/ /gtsang zhing dul dang dpa' ba'i sems/ /sred dang gti mug rnam par spangs/ /thams
cad mtshungs par lta ba ni/ /las kyi rdo rjer rab tu brtag /bza' dang bca' dang de bzhin btung / /so rtsi dang ni yon de bzhin/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun nyid du/ /yon bdag gis ni dbul bya zhing / /
phyi nam las kyi rdo rje ni/ /mkhas pas rdzas rnams yongs su spyad/ /thog mar lcags kyu mnyam ldan pa'i/ /dam tshig yongs su spyad par bya/ /de nas thams cad yongs rdzogs par/ /slob dpon
gyis ni byin gyis brlab/ /gnas dang nye gnas zhing dang ni/ /'dus dang dur khrod gnas pa'o/ /dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma kun la/ /bdag ni gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha mo rnams kyi tshad ma dam tshig
tshad ma dang / /des bshad gsung ni mchog tu tshad mar gyur pa ste/ /bden par gyur pa des na lha mo rnams kyis 'dir/ /bdag ni rjes su gzung ba'i rgyur ni 'gyur bar shog /gzhan yang dkyil 'khor

mdun du ni/ /snying gar thal mo rab sbyar te/ /yon bdag gis kyang smon lam ni/ /yongs su bsngo ba nyid du bya/ /srid dang zhi ba mnyam bar chags pa bcom zhing yang dag rtog pa 'dzoms/ /khyed kyi dngos po thams cad

mkha' dang mnyam pa'i bdag nyid gzigs par ldan/ /mgon po thugs rje chu yi ljid kyis brlan par gyur pa'i thugs kyi chus/ /bdag la mdzod cig lha mo rnams kyis shin du rjes brtser mdzad du gsol/ /rnal 'byor
bdud rtsi ro gcig gsol bas thugs ni rnam par dag pa ste/ /gnas la sogs pa'i yul du bgrod pas sku ni rnam par dag pa yi/ /dpal ldan gnas kyi dbus kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo mchog gi mgon po
ni/ /bla ma mchog la rtag tu mgo bos btud de gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpa' bo kun gyi sku ni rtag tu mdzes pa ste/ /lha mo rnams kyi rin chen sku yis 'khyud pas brgyan/ /'khor lor gnas mgon lhan
cig skyes dga' dri med pa'i/ /rnal 'byor snying po bde mchog la yang rtag phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas kun mkhyen shin tu rnam par dag pa'i gnas/ /lha mo rnams ni lhan cig skyes pa'i gnas kyis mdzes/ /
'dren pa lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba 'byung ba ste/ /dri med lhan cig skyes pa mchog la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /tshigs bcad gsum gyis yang dag bstod/ /ji ltar bde bar phyag kyang btsal/ /yid spro ji ltar
bde bar ni/ /ca co'i spro ba chen po yis/ /me tog phreng bas rnam brgyan cing / /sna tshogs me tog gis mchod lus/ /chang gi ston mo'i dga' bcas pas/ /rdo rje'i glus ni dgang bar bya/ /mchog tu

dga' bas gar bya zhing / /gnas kyi mtshan ma'i stangs stabs gar/ /phyag rgya sngags kyis gar bya'o/ /der ni pa Ta ha sogs dang / /cang te'u dang ni bkra shis rnga/ /rnga rings la sogs sna tshogs pa'i/ /
rol mo yid 'ong bsgrags par bya/ /he ru ka bcas dpa' bo dang / /rnal 'byor ma mchog g.yon pa ste/ /de rjes tshogs kyi gtso bo yis/ /yon bdag gi ni dge ba bsam/ /rnal 'byor
rnal 'byor ma 'dus pas/ /skad cig shis pa brjod pa sbyin/ /bde ba phun tshogs ldan pa dang / /nad med pa dang dge ba'i sems/ /'dod dang grol sogs yang dag 'thob/ /dngos grub phun sum tshogs
par 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor rnam par spros pa ni/ /cho ga bshad bzhin bsdu bar bya/ /lhag ma'i gtor ma bsdus nas ni/ /'byung po 'chol ba rnams la sbyin/ /gnas dang zhing gnas rnal 'byor ma'i/ /
tshogs la dri zhim tshim par bya/ /spyan drang dpa' bo thams cad ni/ /bde ba chen por gshegs su gsol/ /'di ni dam tshig gi brda'i cho ga rim par phye ba ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas lag
pa g.yon pa'i brda/ /cung zad tsam ni bshad bya ste/ /sgrub pos gang zhig shes tsam gyis/ /myur du dngos grub 'gyur ba'o/ /gang zhig sor mo gcig ston pa/ /de la gnyis bstan legs 'ongs lan/ /
gang zhig g.yon pa'i sor mo bsdams/ /bde 'am zhes pa'i rgyar shes bya/ /gang zhig ming med ston byed pa/ /de la mthe'u chung bstan par bya/ /gang zhig gung mo ston byed pa/ /de la mthe bo bstan par
bya/ /gang zhig srin lag ston byed pa/ /de la mgrin pa rab bstan bya/ /gang zhig ba ston pa/ /de la rtse gsum bstan par bya/ /gang zhig nu ma ston byed pa/ /de la skra mtshams bstan par bya/ /

gang zhig so ni ston byed pa/ /de la 'khor lo bstan par bya/ /gang zhig khro gnyer ston byed pa/ /de la gtsug phud bstan par bya/ /gang zhig dpral ba ston byed pa/ /de la rol pa bstan par bya/ /bud med gang zhig

g.yon nas 'gro/ /rnal 'byor ma brtag g.yon nas te/ /skad ni chen pos rab tu smra/ /g.yon pa'i lta bas rnam lta zhing / /bud med rnams la dgar smra ba/ /de ni dam tshig ldan shes bya/ /bud med rnams la
gsol btab na/ /rigs kyi sa bon rab smra zhing / /rigs kyi bya ba mi 'dor la/ /rang gi rigs kyi rig pa zlos/ /gang zhig rig pa rnam par 'dri/ /lag pa g.yon pas rang gi mgor/ /mgo la 'phrug
par byed pa dang / /sgrub pa pos ni khyed par du/ /de yi rang rig dran par 'gyur/ /'khur ba 'am ni kos ko 'am/ /sna dag tu ni sor mo ston/ /zur gyis lta bas dus rtag tu/ /rang gi rigs la rnam par

blta/ /bden 'byung 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor ma/ /rnyed dka' nges par dam tshig can/ /rang gi khyim du thod pa dang / /dgra sta ral gri rgyal mtshan dang / /'khor lo dang ni rnga yab dung / /rtse gsum bris nas
dga' byed cing / /rtag tu sha dang chang la dga'/ /'jigs dang ngo tsha 'joms byed gang / /mkha' 'gro ma'i rigs yang dag 'byung / /lhan cig skyes ma zhes byar bshad/ /yul dang yul du mngon par skye/ /

sgrub po rnams kyis rtag tu bsten/ /gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang ni/ /de bzhin zhing dang nye ba'i zhing / /tshan d+ho nye ba'i tshan d+ho ha/ /'dus pa nye ba'i 'dus pa dang / /dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod de/ /'dzam

bu'i gling na yang dag gnas/ /gnas ni pul+li rir grags te/ /de bzhin dzA lan d+ha ra'ang gnas/ /u D+yin de bzhin gnas yin te/ /de bzhin ar bu ta yang gnas/ /nye gnas go da ba ri ste/ /de bzhin ra me shwa

ri'i ming / /de bi ko Tir mngon brjod dang / /ma la ba yang nye ba'i gnas/ /zhing ni kAm rU'i ming can te/ /o drer mngon par brjod pa'ang zhing / /nye zhing tri sha ku na ste/ /ko sa lAng nye ba'i zhing / /ka ling ka dang lam pa ka'ang / /de bzhin

tshan d+ho ha yin te/ /kAnya tsi hi ma la ya ni/ /khyad par nye ba'i tshan d+ho ha'o/ /'dus pa pre ta ba si ni/ /gri ha de ba yang de bzhin/ /sau raSh+Ta dang gser gling gang / /nye ba'i 'dus pa gnyis yin no/ /pa til pu tra dur khrod

de/ /sin d+hu'ang de bzhin dur khrod do/ /ma ru ku lu tA gnyis ni/ /nye ba'i dur khrod gnas su bshad/ /de ltar phyi rol gnas su grags/ /nang gi gnas nyid lus su brjod/ /rang lus rtsa yi gzugs la 'dir/ /gnas kyi ming du

rab tu grags/ /de gzugs lha yi rnam pa ste/ /des na nang gi bdag tu gnas/ /de phyir de yi gong bu'i dngos/ /lus 'di sangs rgyas kun mtshungs pa'o/ /gnas ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa/ /de bzhin nye gnas dri ma med/ /zhing

ni 'od byed sa yin te/ /nye ba'i zhing ni 'od 'phro ba/ /mngon du gyur pa tshan d+hor shes/ /nye ba'i tshan d+ho sbyang dka' ba'o/ /'dus pa ring du song ba ste/ /mi g.yo bar grags nye 'dus pa/ /dur khrod de bzhin legs blo gros/ /nye ba'i dur

khrod chos kyi sprin/ /gnas sogs sa yi rnam dag pa/ /rim pa ji bzhin bshad pa yin/ /gnas dang nye gnas sogs bsten pas/ /mi rnams dri ma med par 'gyur/ /blo ldan rnam rtog med pa ni/ /rgyu zhing mtshan ma

yang dag brtag /sna tshogs gzugs dang 'jigs gzugs ma/ /drag cing mi bzad dgod brtags la/ /rang 'dod lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /hU~M gi sgra ni bsgrags par bya/ /thi tshom thams cad rnam spangs nas/ /sgrub

pos seng ge bzhin du spyad/ /mthong ngam reg la thos pas kyang / /myur du dngos grub rab 'gro 'gyur/ /'di ni brda dang gnas la sogs pa'i brdas sa rnams nges par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste dgu pa'o// // de nas gang zhig

bris tsam gyis/ /sgrub pos dngos grub thob 'gyur ba'i/ /zhi ba la sogs rab sbyor ba/ /yang dag rab tu bshad par bya/ /gur kum tsan dan bsres pas gang / /yar ngo yi ni tshes la bri/ /'khor lo rtsibs drug bris nas ni/ /yi ge

bdun pa'i sngags sbyar zhing / /phyi rol rdo rje'i phreng bas bskor/ /dbus su ming ni rnam spel ba'o/ /dar ram ras ni gtsang ma 'am/ /yang na kham phor kha sbyar la/ /gsang ste las ni bris nas kyang / /srad bu dkar pos bkri

bar bya/ /kha dog dkar pos shar bltas te/ /me tog dkar pos mchod par bya/ /mdun du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bsgrub bya gnas par bltas/ bum po dkar po zla ba'i bdud rtsi'i chus gang bas dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /

the tshom med pas thun gsum du/ /yi ge bdun pa'i sngags bzlas na/ /de ma thag tu zhi ba dang / /bde legs skyid dang tshe ring 'gyur/ /rims nad dug dang 'tshe ba la/ /lag pa g.yon par bsgom bya ste/ /'khor lo tsan dan gyis bris

la/ /me tog bdug pa mchod par bya/ /bsgrub bya shar du kha bstan te/ /mkhas pa yis ni sbyar bya ba/ /gtor ma chu dang de bzhin me/ /de yi dbus su dur ba 'am/ /rma bya'i sgro 'am ku sha'i chus/ /khyad par du ni de la byab/ /gsang

sngags 'di ni gtso bo mchog /zhi sogs cho ga rim bzhin byed/ /gur kum dri bzang sres pa yis/ /rgyas pa'i 'khor lo bri bya ste/ /swA hA'i yi ge dang spel bar/ /kham phor gnyis la bris nas ni/ /srad bu ser pos dkri

byas la/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi'i nang du gzhug /byang du kha bltas thun gsum du/ /kha dog ser por bsgom byas la/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ser po la/ /bsgrub bya gnas par mkhas pas bsam/ /bdud rtsi ser pos dbang bskur zhing / /

me tog ser pos mchod par bya/ /rnam par mi rtog sems kyis ni/ /rgyas pa'i bsam pas bzla bya ste/ /che ge mo bauSh+Ti ka~M ku ru swA hA/ /bau ShaT sngags kyis spel bar bya/ /nor dang 'bru rnams 'phel ba dang / /dpal dang bkra

shis mnyam par 'jug /las kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /rgyas par 'gyur te gzhan du min/ /tsan dan dmar dang sen rtsi dang / /ming med kyi ni khrag bsres te/ /ras sam gro ga'i 'dab ma 'am/ /kham phor so ni ma btang bzung / /yi ge hoH
dang spel ba yis/ /'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam par bri/ /srad bu dmar pos bcings nas ni/ /me tog dmar pos mchod par bya/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi'i dbus gzhag la/ /nub kyi phyogs su kha bltas te/ /kha dog

dmar por bsgom byas la/ /dkyil 'khor dmar po la gnas pa'i/ /bsgrub bya chags par rnam par bsam/ /rtag tu yig bdun 'byung ba ni/ /rgyun mi 'chad bar bzlas bya ste/ /myos par 'gyur bas zhabs drung lhung / /de ni

grub par rnam par bsam/ /gal te dbang du 'ong bar ma gyur na mar dang sbrang rtsi dang bral ba'i 'khrul 'khor seng lding gi 'dab ma la gdung bar byas na/ gang su yang skal ba ngan pa yang skal ba bzang por 'gyur te gzhan du ma yin

no/ /dur khrod kyi ras sam/ zla mtshan 'dzag pa'i ras la/ rgya skyegs kyi khu ba dang ldan pas yi ge dzaHhrI dang spel ba'i 'khrul 'khor bri ba'am/ kham phor ram/ bud med kyi thod pa la grub pa'i 'khor lo bris la srad bu

dmar pos dkris te/ /me tog dmar pos mchod la bsgrub bya'i snying gnas lcags kyus dbug cing mgrin pa nas zhags pas bcing bar bya'o/ /gang gis de ltar bsams kyang bsgrub bya nam yang 'ong bar ma gyur na seng ldeng gi

shing las me sbar la bsres bas 'khrul 'khor tshar gcad par bya zhing che ge mo A kar Sha ya hrIHdzaHzhes bya ba des bsgrub bya skad cig tsam de nyid la dgug par bya ste/ rkang pas dgug pa bla na med pa'o/ /de nas gzhan yang

mnan pa yi/ /cho ga bla med bshad par bya/ /ri mo brgyad brgyad mnyam sbyar bas/ /re'u mig bzhi bcu rtsa dgu ste/ /mkhas pas de yi bar gyis ni/ /re'u mig bcu gsum stong par bya/ /zur dang zur du re'u mig dgu/ /grwa

bzhi la ni yang dag gnas/ /grwa bzhi kun gyi dbus kyi ni/ /re'u mig stong pa nyid byas la/ /dur khrod ras la zhal bzhi pa'i/ /sngags ni yang dag sbyar te bri/ /yung ba ldong ros bsres pa'i chus/ /'khor lo gnyis la bsgrub bya'i ming / /

yi ge la~M dang spel te bri/ /ri rab zur brgyad gnas bris pa'i/ /kham phor kha sbyar nyid du bya/ /ri rab steng du dbang chen gyi/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su la~M gyis ni/ /mtshan cing sna tshogs rdo rje yis/ /steng nas mnan par

rnam par bsgom/ /srad bu ser pos rnam par dkrid/ /he ru ka ni phyag gnyis pa'i/ /rnam par bdag lus yang dag bsgom/ /rnal 'byor pas ni lhor bltas te/ /kha dog dmar por rnam par bsgom/ /bsgrub bya ri rab dbus gnas

shing / /ri rab kyis ni mnan par bsgom/ /de stengs sna tshogs rdo rje yis/ /yongs su mnan par rnam par bsgom/ /rang gi gnas su de byas na/ /dgra yi kha ni gnon pa dang / /dpung rnams kun kyang gnon par byed/ /dgra yi

snying yang gnon pa'o/ /oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hU~M hU~M phaT la~M lhas byin sta~M b+ha ya/ oM gr-i h+Na gr-i gr-ih+Na hU~M hU~M phaT/ la~M lhas byin sta~M b+ha ya/ oM gr-i h+nA pa ya gr-i h+nA pa ya/ hU~M hU~M phaT la~M lhas byin stam b+ha ya/ oM A na ya ho bid+yA rA dza hU~M hU~M phaT/

la~M lhas byin sta~M b+ha ya/ sngar bshad rim bzhin 'khor lo ni/ /de nyid kyis ni nges par bri/ /me tog ser pos mchod bya ste/ /ngag gnon pa yi mchog yin no/ /rtag tu dur khrod ras la ni/ /'khor lo gnyis ni mngon bris te/ /

yi ge ba~M ni bsgrub bya yi/ /ming dang spel bas kha bcings pa/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /ga'u kha sbyar byas pa yi/ /lug gi snying kar bsgrub bya ni/ /rab tu zhugs par rnam par bsam/ /sngags ni rgyun mi

'chad par bzla/ /nges par lkugs pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de nas gzhan yang nges par ni/ /gsad pa'i cho ga mchog bshad bya/ /lan tshwa ske tshe tsha ba'i mar/ /nim pa'i lo ma de bzhin dug /dur khrod sol ba d+ha du ra/ /rang gi

sdigs mdzub khrag kyang rung / /rdzas 'di dag ni snag tshar bya/ /lho phyogs kha bltas sbyor bas ni/ /khwa yi gshog pa'i smyu gu yis/ /bsgrub bya de yi ming bzung ste/ /yi ge hU~M dang rnam spel ba'i/ /'khor lo gnyis ni yang dag

bri/ / khro zhing drag po'i nga ro dang / /g.yon brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /bskal pa'i me 'dra zhal rnam 'gyur/ /sngo zhing mi bzad hU~M gi sgras/ /mgur ni gang bar rnam par
bsgom/ /gyo mo khrod kyi sar bsam pa'am/ /dur khrod sol ba yi ni dbus/ /'di la sogs pa'i sa phyogs su/ /bsgrub bya gnas par mkhas pas bsam/ /rid cing dri ma dang bcas pa/ /gos hrul gyon par rnam bsam

ste| yan lag kun dang mgo bo dang / /snying ga dang ni dpung par yang / /sngags kyis phug par bsam par bya/ /bsgrub bya'i lus la gnas pa'i lha/ /rang gi lus la rab tu gzhug /khyim stong lta bur bltas nas ni/ /phyag na sna

tshogs mtshon cha can/ /khro bo'i tshogs ni spro byas la/ /mtshon chas gsod par rnam bsam ste/ /dum bu drug tu gtubs nas ni/ /tshil dang rkang dang zhag dang sha /za dang 'thung bar byed pa dang / /de bzhin du ni khrag kyang 'thung / /ral gri

dbyug to gtun shing dang / /dgra sta 'khor lo tho ba yis/ /bsgrub bya la ni rdeg cang gtub/ /dum bu brgyar ni gsheg par byed/ /khwa dang 'ug pa bya rgod dang / /lce spyang srin po mkha' 'gro ma/ /de rnams khros pa'i yid kyis ni/ /za ba dang
ni 'thung bar byed/ /yi ge hU~M phaT dang spel ba'i/ /sngags dang de yis bzlas byas te/ /dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed pa'i/ /dgra yi tshogs rnams bsad par bya/ /e ma'o gang phyir bsad pa'i las/ /bsad

par 'gyur kyang ma bsad de/ /'khor ba'i rnam par rtog pa tsam/ /de bzhin nyid du yid kyis rtogs/ /de nas yi ge phaT spel ba'i/ /'khor lo gnyis ni bris byas te/ /bsgrub bya'i ming ni yang dag blang / /sngags kyis

sbyar te bri bar bya/ /rta dang ma he mnyam zhon pa'i/ /bsgrub bya bltas te yang dag bris/ /thod pa kha sbyar nang gzhag ste/ /srad bu sngon pos dkri bar bya/ /khro ba'i sems kyis nyi phyed dam/ /mtshan mo de yi khyad par la/ /

rab tu gtum pa'i bzhi mdo 'am/ /dur khrod 'jigs pa'i dbus su ni/ /gsangs nas brkos te gzhug par bya/ /sngar bshad cho ga bzhin du mchod/ /rta dang ma he dag 'thabs pas/ /de yi mod la 'byed par byed/ /

gnyis ga khro zhing khro bas 'jigs/ /g.yul 'gyed pa yi bdag nyid che/ /phan tshun rtsod pa byed pas ni/ /rnam par sdang 'gyur gzhan du min/ /yi ge hU~M phaT rnam spel ba'i/ /cho ga 'di nyid kyis 'dir bri/ /sngags dang bsgrub

bya mnyam ldan pas/ /dur khrod ras la bris nas ni/ /thod pa kha sbyar nang bzhag ste/ /srad bu nag pos dkris nas ni/ /he ru kar ni bsgoms nas su/ /ro bsregs sa brkos sba bar bya/ /mdun du ya~M las byung ba'i rlung / /

gzhu yi dbyibs can dbus gnas shing / /kha dog sngon po rnga mo zhon/ /lho phyogs su ni bskyod pa dang / /khro bo'i tshogs kyis khrid pas na/ /sa stengs smyon pa bzhin du byed/ /yi ge hU~M phaT sbyar ba yi/ /sngags kyi rgyun mi

'chad par bzlas/ /gang gi cho ga ci byas pa/ /de yi mod la skrod par 'gyur/ /sgrub po lhor bltas khros pa yis/ /rang khrag dur khrod thal ba dang / /dug dang lan tshwa 'bru mar tshe/ /myos byed 'dab ma'i khu ba ni/ /ske tshe mnyam

bar yang dag sbyar/ /dur khrod ras la de bzhin du/ /'khor lo gnyis po nyid rim bzhin/ /cho ga rdzogs par bri bar bya/ /gsad pa gshin rje'i lus la gnas/ /dbye ba rta dang ma he la/ /bskrad pa rnga mo la gnas pa/ /

zhi ba zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /mi mo rnams kyi snying gar dbang / /rgyas pa glang chen rgyab tu'o/ /lkugs pa lug gi lus la gnas/ /mnan pa ri rab dbus te dgug /sha ra b+ha yi seng ger gnas/ /'di ltar las ni

brtag par bya/ /las 'di dag dang bral ba'i las/ /bsgrubs kyang des ni mi 'grub ste/ /bla ma'i man ngag med pa'i las/ /stong pa bzhin du 'bras med 'gyur/ /'di ni las rab 'byam ba 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rim par phye ba ste/

bcu pa'o// // de nas sngags kyi bzlas pa yi/ /mtshan nyid gsang ba bshad par bya/ /ri bo tshang tshing ri sul dang / /rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram dang ni/ /bzhi mdo dang ni mdun khang gnas/ /dur khrod dam

ni yid dga' ba/ /sngon du dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /phyi nas lha yi bdag nyid kyis/ /sngar bshad cho gas yang dag par/ /sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs bya/ /ri 'am ri bo'i gnas su ni/ /snying po'i sngags ni bzla bar bya/ /

oM shrI badzra he ru he ru ka hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ 'bum phrag gcig tu bzlas nas ni/ /bcu cha yi ni sbyin sreg bya/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das dngos grub/ /myur du 'grub te gzhan du min/ /tshang tshing ljon shing gtams par ni/ /

rtag tu dkyil 'khor bris nas su/ /nye ba'i snying po'i sngags rtag tu/ /rgyun mi 'chad par bzla zhing bsgrub/ /oM hrIHha ha hU~M hU~M phaT/ /'bum phrag gsum du bzlas nas ni/ /bzlas pa'i bcu cha'i sbyin sreg bya/ /char dbab pa

dang gter dang ni/ /ngag gi dngos grub bsgrub par bya/ /ri sul dri med chur bcas par/ /dkyil 'khor dge ba bris nas ni/ /rgyun mi 'chad par sngags bzlas te/ /zhal bzhi pa'i gsang sngags bzlas/ /oM sum b+ha ni

sum b+ha hU~M hU~M phaT/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hU~M hU~M phaT/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hU~M hU~M phaT/ A na ya ho bid+yA rA dza hU~M hU~M phaT/ rnal 'byor pa yis bzhi 'bum bzlas/ /bcu cha yi ni sbyin sreg bya/ /zhi dang rgyas dang bcud kyis len/ /de bzhin

sems can don sgrub pa'o/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram song nas/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag bris nas ni/ /lha mo'i sngags ni khyad par du/ /'bum phrag gsum ni bzlas nas su/ /ji skad gsungs bzhin cho ga ni/ /rdzogs pas bcu

cha'i sbyin sreg bya/ /oM badzra bai ro tsa nI ye hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ 'jig rten dngos grub thams cad dang / /de bzhin mkha' spyod dngos grub thob/ /dur khrod du ni sngar bshad pa'i/ /cho ga'i rim pas dkyil 'khor bri/ /yi ge bdun pa'i

gsang sngags ni/ /'bum phrag gsum du bzlas la bsgrub/ /bcu cha'i sbyin sreg byas nas las/ /rnam par nges pas bsgrub par bya/ /dbye ba dang ni bskrad pa'i las/ /khyad par du ni bsad pa'i las/ /rdo rje sems dpas

gang gsungs bzhin/ /bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /bzhi mdor dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /mnan pa'i cho ga bsgrub par bya/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi gsang sngags ni/ /khri bzlas pas ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /oM DA

ki nI ye hU~M hU~M phaT/ bcu cha'i sbyin bsreg bsgrub na ni/ /'byung po ro langs 'grub par 'gyur/ /gtsug lag khang ngam mdun khang du/ /dkyil 'khor mchog ni bri bar bya/ /lA ma'i sngags ni nges par yang / /'bum phrag gcig tu

bzlas nas ni/ /lha mo bcu cha'i sbyin bsreg bya/ /oM lA me hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ mig sman dang ni rkang mgyogs dang / /de bzhin dbang du byed pa ni/ /'grub par 'dir ni the tshom med/ /dben zhing nyams dga'i gnas su ni/ /rtag tu

dkyil 'khor bri byas la/ /khaN Da ro hi la sogs sngags/ /cho ga sngon bzhin bsgrub par bya/ /oM khaN Da ro he hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ 'bum phrag gnyis ni bzlas nas kyang / /bcu cha yi ni sbyin sreg bya/ /rgyun mi 'chad par

sngags bzlas te/ /gnod sbyin gnod sbyin mo rnams bsgrub/ /gzugs can ma yi gsang sngags ni/ /nges par 'bum phrag bzhi bzlas nas/ /lha mo'i bcu cha'i sbyin sreg bya/ /'grub par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /oM rU pi Ni

ye hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ me tog dang ni spos dang dri/ /lha bshos gtor ma de bzhin te/ /bza' dang btung bas khyad par du/ /dkyil 'khor mchog ni mchod bya zhing / /glu dang gar gyi khyad par gyis/ /phyag rgya sngags ni bsgrags

par bya/ /yid 'ong dam tshig rnyed nas ni/ /phyogs su gzhag nas bsgrub bya ste/ /las ni gang gis khyad par gyis/ /de yi rigs sogs brtag par bya/ /lha yi rnam pa la gnas te/ /cho ga ji bzhin bzlas shing mchod/ /

dus gang tshe na mi smra zhing / /der ni sngon du bsnyen pa bya/ /myos byed gtor mar mnyam ldan pas/ /sngags kyi nus pa bsgrub bya ste/ /brgya dang stong dang 'bum gyi bar/ /der ni grangs nyid mtshon par bya/ /

grangs med sngags ni bzlas pa yis/ /bla na med pa'i dge ba 'byung / /de dag nges par sbyor ba yis/ /bsgrubs na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /'di ni sngags kyi bzlas pa'i nges pa bstan pa'i rim pa phye ba ste bcu

gcig pa'o// // yang dag cho ga gang gis 'dir/ /'grub par the tshom med pa yi/ /bzlas pa'i phreng ba'i mtshan nyid ni/ /gnod sbyin bdag po legs par nyon/ /gser dang dngul dang zangs ma dang / /de bzhin

shel dang dung la sogs/ /zhi dang rgyas pa dag la sbyar/ /zhi la ri lu brgya pa ste/ /ri lu brgya rtsa brgyad pa ni/ /rgyas pa'i las la rab bsngags te/ /mkhas pas rgyal srid ched dam dpal/ /bde spro phun sum tshogs

phyir bzlas/ /dbang dang dgug pa'i rab sbyor la/ /gur gum la sogs dri'-i ri lu/ /byi ru tsan dan dmar po'i 'bru/ /rtag tu ri lu lnga bcu'o/ /ru drAk+Sha dang lung tang 'bras/ /de bzhin mi rus rnga mo dang / /bong

bu ma he'i rus pa ni/ /drag spyod lkug dang gnon pa dang / /dbye bas dgra ni tshar gcad dang / /gsad dang bskrad la sbyar bya ste/ /las kyi khyad par ji lta bar/ /bzlas pa'i phreng ba'ang bya ba yin/ /bong bu rnga mo'i spu

dang ni/ /khwa'i sgror ni bsre byas la/ /mnan dang bskrad pa'i las la ni/ /de yi srad bus brgyu bar bya/ /rta dang ma he'i spu yis ni/ /rnam par sdang la srad bu bya/ /dur khrod skra yi srad bu dang / /khyi yi spu ni bsre bya ste/ /

de yi srad bu drag po yi/ /las la bsngags phyir sbyar bar bya/ /dge ba'i las la gzhon nu mas/ /bkal ba'i srad bus brgyu bar bya/ /zhi ba la ni 'dzub la gzhag /rgyas pa rtag tu gung mo yis/ /ming med kyis ni dbang

zhes gsungs/ /tha ma yis ni mngon spyod yin/ /mthe bo lha yi rang bzhin gyis/ /las kun las ni sbyar bar bya/ /rilu dgra bcom mdo 'dzin ni/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin te/ /bzlas pa'i phreng ba'i khyad par
gyis/ /mnyam gzhag bsgom zhing bzlas par bya/ /rdzogs ldan dus su gcig bzlas pa/ /gsum ldan dus su gnyis 'gyur bzlas/ /gnyis ldan dus na sum 'gyur bshad/ /rtsod dus bzhi 'gyur du ni bzla/ /
sngags kyi grangs ni bzhi po yis/ /rgyun mi 'chad par gsang sngags bzlas/ /bzlas pa'i phreng ba sogs bsdus ba/ /'di ni ngag gi bzlas pa ste/ /lha yi gzugs su dmigs pa yis/ /spro dang bsdu ba'i

bdag nyid can/ /sngags kyi de nyid brda yis ni/ /'gro dang 'ong ba yang dag bsam/ /mtha' gsum las ni rnam grol ba/ /don dam de bzhin nyid kyi don/ /'di rnams sngags kyi bzlas pa yi/ /cho ga'i mtshan nyid gsungs
pa yin/ /'di ni sngags kyi bzlas pa'i bgrang phreng nges par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /lha yi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba ste/ /gsang ba mchog

gi dgyes pa can/ /dngos grub yon tan kun gyi gnas/ /'dod pa'i yon tan kun khyab pa'i/ /sa phyogs mkhas pas yang dag brtag /khrag 'thung phyag gnyis sbyor ldan pas/ /phung po lnga sogs nga rgyal bya/ /

zhal bzhi pa yi sngags brjod pas/ /phyogs ni bcing zhing ra ba ste/ /oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hU~M hU~M phaT shar du'o/ /oM gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na hU~M hU~M phaT/ byang bu'o/ /oM gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hU~M hU~M phaT/ nub du'o/ /oM A na ya

ho bid+yA rA dza hU~M hU~M phaT/ lho ru'o/ /phyogs su se gol brdabs pa yis/ /gdug pa'i bdud ni bskrad par bya/ /snying ga'i chu skyes hU~M yig las/ /'od zer phreng ba spro bar bya/ /de yi snang bas mdun du ni/ /bla ma sangs
rgyas sogs bltas la/ /phyag btsal me tog bdug sogs pas/ /mchod de rjes la sdig pa bshags/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs 'gro zhing / /byang chub sems ni rnam par bskyed/ /gzhan la

phan pa'i sems ni byams pa ste/ /gzhan gyi sdug bsngal 'joms byed snying rje yin/ /gzhan gyi bde bas tshim pa dga' ba ste/ /sems can kun snyoms btang snyoms rnam par bsam/ /oM swa b+hA ba shud d+hA sar+b+ba

d+harmA swa b+hA ba shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M zhes bya bas/ sems tsam nyid la rnam gnas shing / /byang chub tshogs ni bsgom par bya/ /oM shUn+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ rten dang brten pa'i gzugs su ni/ /b+hai ram ba la sogs

pa bsam/ /ya~M las byung ba'i rlung dkyil 'khor/ /gzhu 'dra kha dog sngon po ste/ /de yi steng du ra~M las ni/ /me yi dkyil 'khor gyi ni gzugs/ /kha dog dmar po zur gsum pa/ /rdo rje rtse gsum gyis mtshan pa'o/ /

de yi steng du ba~M byung ba'i/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor zlum bo dkar/ /de yi steng du'ang la~M byung ba'i/ /sa yi dkyil 'khor zur bzhi pa/ /kha dog ser po grwa bzhir ni/ /de bzhin rdo rje rtse gsum mtshan/ /de yi steng du su~M byung ba'i/ /zur

bzhi pa ni ri rab ste/ /rin chen bzhi yi bdag nyid mdzes/ /rtse mo brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /de yi steng du hU~M byung ba'i/ /sna tshogs rdo rje rnam par bsgom/ /de yi steng du pad ma ni/ /lte ba ge sar ldan par bsgom/ /

de dbus A li kA li yi/ /dag pa'i sbyor ba bsgom par bya/ /de yi dbus su yi ge hU~M/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin las/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus bzhugs pa'i/ /dpal he ru ka rnam par bsgom/ /dpa' bo zhal
gsum phyag drug pa/ /g.yas brkyang ba yis gdan la bzhugs/ /rtsa ba'i zhal ni nag po che/ /g.yas pa kun da lta bu ste/ /g.yon pa dmar po cher 'jigs pa'o/ /ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ /'jigs

byed dang ni dus mtshan dag /mnan zhing bde ba chen pos bzhugs/ /rdo rje rnam snang mdzad mas 'khyud/ /thugs rje'i chags pas shes cher dgyes/ /phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu ni/ /mnyam par ldan pas yang dag 'khyud/ /

gnyis pa'i phyag ni mchog gnyis kyis/ /glang chen lpags pa gos su 'dzin/ /g.yas kyi gsum pas cang te'u ni/ /chos kun ngo bo nyid sgra sgrogs/ /g.yon gyi phyag ni gsum pa yis/ /kha T+wA~M ga brten thod pa

bsnams/ /thod pa'i phreng bas thod du mdzad/ /zla ba phyed pas rnam par brgyan/ /dbu la sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan/ /rigs kyi bdag pos cod pan mdzad/ /zhal ni rnam 'gyur cher 'jigs pa/ /sgeg pa'i nyams

dang ldan pa'o/ /stag gi lpags pa'i na bza' can/ /mi mgo nyi shu'i phyed kyis brgyan/ /lha ni phyag rgya lnga 'chang zhing / /gar gyi nyams ni dgu dang ldan/ /de la 'khyud pa'i bcom ldan ma/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis
spyan gsum ma/ /gcer bu ban d+hu ka yi mdog /dum bus brgyan pa'i sku rags can/ /skra grol ba dang rnam par gtsigs/ /khrag la dgyes shing 'dzag pa'o/ /phyag g.yon 'khyud pas gdug pa yi/ /bdud
sogs khrag can thod pa 'dzin/ /g.yas pa sdigs mdzub rdo rje can/ /bskal pa'i me 'dra'i sku chen ma/ /byin pa gnyis ni mnyam 'khyud cing / /rtag tu bde ba cher dgyes pa'o/ /mkha' 'gro de bzhin lA ma
dang / /khaN Da ro he gzugs can ma/ /dngos grub kun gyi bde 'byung ba/ /pad ma'i phyogs kyi gnas su dgod/ /gnag dang ljang dang dmar ba dang / /ser skya'i mdog can spyan gsum ma/ /zhal gcig

phyag ni gnyis ma ste/ /kha T+wA~M thod pa'i phyag ldan ma/ /g.yas pas rdo rje gri gug ste/ /gcer bu g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs/ /skra grol mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /phyag rgya lngas ni rnam par brgyan/ /
mtshams kyi 'dab ma bzhi la ni/ /byang chub sems la sogs pa'i snod/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa dang / /glu dang gar gyi dga' bde mchod/ /sgo bzhir lha tshogs gnas pa ste/ /rtag tu

lha rnams bsgom par bya/ /shar gyi sgor ni khwa gdong ma/ /phyag gnyis sngon mor bsgom par bya/ /byang gi sgor ni 'ug gdong ma/ /ljang gu skra ni grol ba'o/ /de bzhin khyi gdong ma ni dmar/ /nub kyi sgor ni yang
dag gnas/ /phag gdong ma ni ser mo ste/ /lho sgor yi dgas gdan la gnas/ /me dang de bzhin bden bral dang / /rlung dang dbang ldan mtshams su ni/ /gshin rje brtan ma pho nya mo/ /gshin rje mche ba
'joms ma ste/ /de bzhin zur gnas lha mo ni/ /yid 'phrog gzugs ni gnyis ma ste/ /yi dgas la gnas drag mo che/ /phyag rgya lngas ni rnam brgyan pa'o/ /g.yon na thod pa kha T+wA~M ga /g.yas

na rdo rje gri gug ste/ /rnal 'byor ma ni de rnams kun/ /dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ba'o/ /de nas go cha gnyis shes nas/ /ye shes 'khor lo rnam par bsgom/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis/ /
dam tshig 'khor lor mnyam par gzhug /de nas go cha gnyis bshad par bya ste/ oM ha snying dkar ro/ /na ma hi mgo bo la'o/ /swA hA hU spyi gtsug tu'o/ /bau ShaT he phrag pa gnyis la'o/ /
hU~M hU~M hoHmig gnyis la'o/ /phaT ha~M yan lag thams cad la ste mtshon cha'o/ /dang po rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ /gnyis pa rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs/ /gsum pa pad ma gar dbang ste/ /dpal

he ru ka bzhi par grags/ /lnga pa rdo rje nyi ma yin/ /drug pa de bzhin rta mchog ste/ /go cha drug po rnams kyis bsrungs/ /oM ba~M ni rdo rje rnam snang mdzad ma'o/ /oM ha~M ya~M ni gshin rje ma'o/ /oM hra~M ma~M ni rmongs byed

ma'o/ /oM hriM hriM ni bskyod byed ma'o/ /oM hU~M hU~M ni skrag byed ma'o/ /phaT phaT ni gtum mo lus thams cad la mtshon cha'o/ /lte ba dang snying ga dang de bzhin du kha dang mgo bo dang / spyi gtsug la de bzhin du ni mtshon cha

yin no/ /oM yo ga shud d+hAHsarba d+harmA yo ga shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ /lag pa g.yas dang g.yon pa snying gar bzhag ste/ pad ma rgyas pa'i gar bya'o/ /snying po'i phyag rgya la sogs lha/ /bskor ba mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom/ /

rnal 'byor 'di ni gtso bo mchog /lha yi rnal 'byor rnam par bsgom/ /chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa/ /bde chen 'khor lo sbyar bar bya/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i rtsa rnams ni/ /lus kun dag par byed pa ste/ /
gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi yis/ /lus ni sdud cing 'dzin pa yin/ /lus 'di dpa' bo'i rang bzhin te/ /'di de sangs rgyas kun mtshungs pa'o/ /gnyis med rnam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /bsam mi khyab pa'i
go 'phang bstan/ /rjes mthun rnal 'byor sems kyis ni/ /go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya/ /'di ni dpal he ru ka'i bskyed pa'i rim par phye ba ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas rdo rje rnal
'byor ma/ /mchod pa yang dag rab bshad bya/ /gnas sogs bgrod par mi nus na/ /phyi yi rnal 'byor ma mchod bya/ /rang gi khyim du rnal 'byor ma/ /mchod de sngon du bsnyen sogs bya/ /sngon du bsnyen

pa med pa las/ /de yi don med yongs su ngal/ /mar ngo yi ni tshes bcu 'am/ /yar ngo'i yang ni de bzhin te/ /khrus dang gtsang sbra sogs ldan pas/ /dad pa'i sems kyis spyan drangs te/ /rang gi khyim du

shar bltas par/ /yang dag gnas pas lha mo mchod/ /gur gum mig sman de bzhin du/ /li khri yis ni mgo la byug /rkang pa lag pa gdong de bzhin/ /byug pas byug cing mchod par bya/ /mgo la me tog phreng ba

dpyangs/ /dri zhim pa yi bdug pas bdug /gcig dang gsum dang bzhi dang lnga/ /khyad par du ni bdun dang dgu/ /ji srid nyi shu rtsa bzhi yi bar/ /yon bdag nges par dang ba yis/ /bza' dang myos byed btung

ba dang / /nya dang sha la sogs ldan pas/ /phyag rgya byin gyis brlabs nas mchod/ /dpa' bos brda ni bstan par bya/ /rdo rje rnam snang mdzad pa'i tshogs/ /lha yi bdag nyid rtag tu mchod/ /gtor ma'i bya ba sngon

'gro bas/ /mar me lnga dang bza' ba dbul/ /glu dang bstod par rab ldan pas/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams mchod/ /'dir ni brtson pas rdo rje lha mo rnams/ /myos byed sha yis rab tu mchod byas te/ /dpal ldan
rdo rje theg par mos 'gyur de'i/ /dad pas ston mos de rnams mchod byas na/ /thugs ni mnyes pas mchog ni rtsol 'gyur te/ /gang phyir mchog ni de yi lag na gnas/ /rnal 'byor ma ni mchod nas su/ /
zhi rgyas mtshan ma brtag bya ste/ /gzhon nu ma mchod skad cig la/ /dge dang mi dge'i las 'bras brtag /gang zhig lag gnyis nyed pa na/ /yid ni mnyes par ma gyur nas/ /des na nad rnams 'phel

ba dang / /sdug bsngal thob pa nyid du 'gyur/ /mchod byas de yi skad cig la/ /gad mo'i sgra ni phyung gyur na/ /nad med pa ni mi 'grub cing / /'chi ba nyid du the tshom med/ /mchod pa'i mod la du byed cing / /

mig gnyis nyed par byed na ni/ /skad cig la ni 'chi zhes brjod/ /sgrub pos rtag du mchod byas pas/ /so so so sor zung rer ni/ /phan tshun gdong ni phyogs gyur na/ /thams cad du ni rtsod 'gyur bar/ /gzhon
nu mas ni rtag tu ston/ /rnal 'byor ma ni rgyab phyogs lta/ /so yis sen mo 'cha' byed na/ /sha yi bza' bas ma tshim ste/ /slar yang las ni dgos par 'gyur/ /bza' dang btung ba thams cad kyi/ /ston mos

mnyes par ma gyur na/ /mtshon la sogs pa glo bur ba'i/ /nad ni 'phral du skye bar 'gyur/ /'di ltar glu dang rol mo byed/ /yang dang yang du rgod pa na/ /rgyal po chom rkun 'jigs pa dag /gzhon nu de ston mkhas
pas brtag /myos byed 'thungs nas yang dang yang / /rnam pa du mas gar byed na/ /de rnams la ni nad chen 'byung / /mchod pa'i dus su brtag par bya/ /ston mo'i bza' ba thams cad ni/ /dor nas phyogs su

lha byed na/ /spyod pa nyams par byas pa'i skyon/ /lha rnams bdag la 'khrugs pa'o/ /phan tshun gtam la 'jug pa dang / /gal te phan tshun rgod byed na/ /gtso bo'i cho ga nyams par ni/ /gzhon nu de bstan

shes par bya/ /zos ma thag tu skyug byed na/ /smyo ba'i nad ni 'byung bar ston/ /mdzes ma gal te 'gro ba'i tshe/ /rgyab kyi phyogs su lta byed na/ /slar yang las ni dgos pa dang / /yun ring zhig na nad
byung ston/ /sa la rkang pas nyed pa na/ /gnas ni 'pho ba'i don du 'gyur/ /mchod dus babs par gyur na ni/ /phan tshun g.yul ni 'gyed par ston/ /rnam 'gyur 'di dag bral bas ni/ /mchod pa 'grub par
mtshon par bya/ /de bas brtson pas mchod nas ni/ /sgrub pos rtag tu brtag par bya/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams mchod/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu kun rab ster/ /'di ni rdo rje rnal 'byor ma/ /mchod pa'i
cho ga nges par bstan pa'i rim par byed ba ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas de phyir snod kyi ni/ /mtshan nyid mchog ni yang dag bshad/ /'jim pa'am de bzhin rus sbal snod/ /'khar ba'am zangs
sam lcags las byas/ /gser ram dngul las byas pa 'am/ /dung ngam de bzhin nya phyis te/ /bal po se'u yi 'bras bu mchog /de bzhin gzhan yang gsar byung ba/ /ra las byung dang shing snod sogs/ /
gzhan yang rdo snod khyad par ro/ /dum bu gcig dang dum bu gnyis/ /de bzhin gsum dang bzhi dang lnga/ /dum bu drug dang dum bu bdun/ /dum bu brgyad par rab tu grags/ /bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs
sam/ /dmangs rigs bud med rigs mthar skyes/ /dkar dang dmar dang ljang skya dang / /ser dang de bzhin ser skya ste/ /thal ba'i mdog dang mdog ngan dang / /sna tshogs mdog tu rab tu grags/ /lhag

pa dman dang tha ma ste/ /de bzhin dbyibs ni sna tshogs dbye/ /gshongs gnyis glang po'i rgyab lta bu/ /de bzhin rdo rje'am khwa yi rkang / /so ni ljang dang ser ba 'am/ /lto ba'am srin bus zos de bzhin/ /'di kun
rnam par bltas nas ni/ /de la yongs su brtag par bya/ /sa gzhi mnyam pa'i yul rnams sam/ /thang ngam bya ma'i gshongs dag tu/ /sngags pas der ni bsgrubs byas la/ /de yi lhung ba brtag par bya/ /lhor
bltas bram ze 'jigs par 'gyur/ /bden bral lhung bas ba lang dang / /rigs med pa dang rigs ngan 'jigs/ /rlung bltas sngags ni 'jigs pa ste/ /byang du bltas na phyug por 'gyur/ /dbang ldan
sngags kyi dngos grub ste/ /brtul zhugs rgyun ni nyams pa med/ /mer bltas nye bar 'phrog pa ste/ /de bzhin 'og bltas chom rkun ma'o/ /steng bltas gnas pas bud med 'joms/ /logs su lhung bas
gtum mo ste/ /snod kyi mtshan nyid rnam shes bya/ /dum bu gcig pa gnas la dbang / /dum bu gnyis pa dkyil 'khor dbang / /dum gsum sgrub po'i dngos grub 'gyur/ /dum bu bzhi pas sngags dngos

'grub/ /lnga pa yis ni zhi dang rgyas/ /dum drug slongs mo rnyed par shes/ /dum bu bdun pas dbang du byed/ /dngos grub sgrub pa 'bras med phyir/ /de bzhin dum bu brgyad pa spang / /bu ga gcig pa bram zer 'gyur/ /
bu ga gnyis pa rgyal rigs 'gyur/ /bu ga gsum pa rje'u rigs shes/ /bu ga bzhi pa dmangs rigs rnams/ /bu ga mang po'am bu ga med/ /mkhas pa yis ni spang bar bya/ /bud med thod pa'ang mi bzung ste/ /

khyad par du ni mdog nyams dang / /so med pa'am so nyams pa/ /dge ba 'dod pas bcang mi bya/ /so ljang pas ni sdug bsngal mang / /khwa yi rkang 'dres rtsod par 'gyur/ /gshong bu gnyis pas rgud par 'gyur/ /

de bzhin glang po'i rgyab kyis nang / /dbus kyi gnas su gshong bu bzhi/ /'dod 'jo'i bar ni lta bar bya/ /mdun phyogs su ni gshong bu gnyis/ /yid bzhin nor bu zhes byar bshad/ /dung dang kun da zla ba yi/ /mdog
mtshungs snum par shes par blta/ /sngags rnams kun gyi dngos grub ster/ /sgrub pos dngos grub thob par byed/ /che zhing mdog ni ser po 'am/ /pad ma lta bu pad mas mtshan/ /rgyas la bsngags par
gsungs pa ste/ /nor ni phun sum tshogs pa 'grub/ /snod ni gang zhig kha dog dmar/ /gzhan yang thig le dmar pos mtshan/ /rtag tu dbang dang dgug pa yi/ /dngos grub ster snod mtshan nyid do/ /
ba lang kha lta bu yi dbyibs/ /shin du sra zhing mu tig bcas/ /gsad dang bskrad dang dbye ba la/ /khyad par du ni rab tu bsngags/ /snod ni rab bsngags yang dag 'thob/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu
kun rab ster/ /gnas dang zhing du bgrod nas ni/ /sgrub pos lha mo bsgrub par bya/ /mtshan nyid 'di dag yongs rdzogs pa/ /bcangs na dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur/ /'di ni snod kyi mtshan nges

par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste bcwa lnga pa'o// // de ni de phyir bdud rtsi lnga'i/ /sgrub pa yang dag rab tu bshad/ /yang dag cho ga gang gis ni/ /dngos grub kun gyi 'bras 'byung ba'o/ /cho ga sbas
pas bram ze yi/ /mngal nas skyes las yang dag blang / /des na rnam snang mdzad pa'i ming / /grags te dngos grub yang dag bzhed/ /kha dog ljang zhing rab bzang lus/ /
mig gi 'bras bu gnas pa yi/ /rin chen rigs ma rnyed nas de'i/ /dri chu bsangs te bsgrub par bya/ /yongs su rdzogs pa'i lus ldan zhing / /yan lag mdzes gzhon pad ma'i rigs/ /bza'
dang btung bas yang dag mchod/ /mkhas pas mchod yon phul nas ni/ /de yi mod la snyoms 'jug byas/ /phan tshun gyi ni shu kra blang / /des na gar mkhan rigs ming can/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
de bzhin grags/ /sngar bshad pa yi cho ga yis/ /dngos grub yongs su rdzogs bgrod pa/ /chos mkhan zhes ni rab grags pa'i/ /dang po'i me tog rab tu bsngags/ /dam tshig can ma'i gdol pa mo/ /

gal te rnyed na rtag brten bya/ /sha dang tshil dang de bzhin khrag /mkhas pa yis ni gzung bar bya/ /sgrub po dngos grub 'dod pa yis/ /lcags kyu lnga ni ci rnyed pa'am/ /'dir ni gsad pa gtsor bshad pas/ /ci ste yang

dag rnyed na gzung / /ba lang sha dang rta sha dang / /glang po'i sha yang de bzhin te/ /mi yi sha dang khyi yi sha /mkhas pa yis ni gzung bar bya/ /rdo rje sems dpas gang gsungs pa'i/ /sgron ma lnga zhes grags

pa'o/ /rnyed nas tshes bcu'i dus su ni/ /dngos po 'di dag yang dag bsdu/ /dri zhim pa dang bsres nas ni/ /rab tu gsang ste sbyar bar bya/ /sgrub pa po yis gsang ba yis/ /ri lu'i rnam pa yang dag bya/ /de yi mod la
yongs rdzogs pa'i/ /bza' dang btung ba'i khyad par gyis/ /tshogs kyi dbus su byin brlabs nas/ /phyi nas las ni yang dag brtsam/ /sngags bzlas de bzhin bsam gtan dang / /'dod pa kun gyi
'bras 'byung zhing / /lus kyi bcud kyis len dang ni/ /mchog tu grol ba'i dngos grub ster/ /rtag tu ri lu bsten byed pa/ /'dod pa kun gyi 'bras rab ster/ /las rnams kun la rab sbyar na/ /mkha' spyod

go 'phang thob par 'gyur/ /'di ni bdud rtsi lnga sgrub ba nges par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste bcu drug pa'o// // de nas dkyil 'khor bri ba yis/ /cho ga mchog ni yang dag bshad/ /'di ltar 'ga' zhig

gsol 'debs pa'am/ /rang nyid bsod nams 'dod pa yis/ /dang por rang lha'i bdag nyid kyi/ /'khor lo la gnas sngon bsnyen bya/ /sngon du bsnyen pa'i dbang byas nas/ /der ni gtor ma sbyin par bya/ /brtan zhing zab mo'i

chos shes pa/ /rab gnas gtor ma'i pha rol son/ /sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor de nyid shes/ /rig pa'i gnas ni thams cad rig /gsang sngags tshul la dad cing mos/ /gzugs bzang blta na sdug pa dang / /bla ma la gus

brtser ldan na/ /sdom pa 'byung bar rab bshad bya/ /gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten gnas/ /gnas khang 'dun khang sa phyogs gtsang / /gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod du/ /der ni dkyil 'khor brtsam par bya/ /sngon du
las ni byas pa'i sar/ /brko ba la sogs mi bya ste/ /lag pas reg nas hU~M yi ge/ /sngags bzlas pas ni sa sbyang bya/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni sa yi cha'i/ /nyis 'gyur sa ni sbyang bar bya/ /rang gi sems

ni yongs dag pa/ /de nyid kyis na sa dag 'gyur/ /slob dpon sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin/ /lha yi sku yi bdag nyid can/ /dpa' bo rdo rje dril 'chang ba/ /mkha' 'gror bcas la gsol ba gdab/ /blo ldan rdo rje gsor

byed cing / /dril bu 'khrol bar brtson pa yis/ /lha dang lha min gsad pa dang / /rab tu gdug pa'i bgegs tshogs bskrad/ /nga ni dpal ldan snying rje'i stobs/ /srung ba'i 'khor lo rab sbyor bas/ /lus srul la sogs
gang ci'ang rung / /bgegs kyi tshogs rnams gzhan du deng / /ji ste ngas bsgo su zhig 'da'/ /rdo rje'i bdag po'i sku yis ni/ /lus gsum las byung dgas bya ste/ /'dir ni brlag 'gyur gzhan du
min/ /sa ni yongs su bzung byas nas/ /ra bas mtshams ni bcing bar bya/ /lag g.yas dam bcas phyag rgya yis/ /yi ge ba~M byung sa'i lha mo/ /mdog ser gser gyi bum 'dzin la/ /bstod nas rab tu bskul bar

bya/ /che ge zhes bya bdag dkyil 'khor/ /'dri la lha mo khyed dbang gyur/ /me tog bdug pa sogs pas mchod/ /mkhas pas mchod yon phul byas la/ /bcom ldan khro mchod rdo rje can/ /de bzhin gshegs la gsol ba
gdab/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams dgongs su gsol/ /slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang / /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /mgon po lhan cig skyas 'byung ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor 'dri bar 'tshal lags
na/ /de bas bcom ldan gus bdag la/ /bka' drin gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ /gang gzhan gsang sngags lha rnams dang / /'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang / /rdzogs pa'i byang chub la brten pa'i/ /
'byung po bstan la mngon dga' ba/ /gang su rdo rje'i spyan ldan kun/ /dkyil 'khor bde mchog 'byung ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor 'dri bar bgyid lags pas/ /bdag dang de bzhin slob ma la/ /rjes su brtse ba

bskyed du gsol/ /srad bu ye shes lnga ldan zhing / /nyi shu rtsa lngar rnam dbye bas/ /chos kun ngo bo nyid kyis ni/ /srad bu phan tshun bsgril bar bya/ /sgrub pos yi ge hU~M brjod de/ /bdud rtsi lngas ni byug par bya/ /

dkyus su 'khor lo'i nyis 'gyur la/ /sboms su sgo yi nyi shu cha/ /dzaHgsum brjod nas lte bar ni/ /g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis bzung nas/ /blo ldan nam mkhar thig gdab ste/ /de bzhin sa la'ang gdab par bya/ /
gsar zhing mdzes par ldan pa dang / /tshad ldan gtsang ma'i srad bu yis/ /dpal ldan lhan skyes 'byung dkyil 'khor/ /shes rab can gyis thig gdab bya/ /khru phyed la sogs nas brtsams nas/ /ji srid

khru ni brgya yi bar/ /dang por tshangs pa'i thig yin te/ /gnyis pa la ni zur thig gdab/ /nub dang lho yi gnas su ni/ /slob dpon nges par yang dag gnas/ /shar dang byang gi phyogs gnas su/ /slob ma gnas te
mnyam gzhag pas/ /dang por bzhi 'gyur bdag nyid du/ /re'u mig gcig ni thig gdab bya/ /de nas brgyad 'gyur bdag nyid du/ /re'u mig gcig gi thig rab gdab/ /gzhan yang brgyad 'gyur nyid du ni/ /re'u mig

gcig ni thig gdab bya/ /de nas gzhan yang nyis 'gyur nyid/ /re'u mig gcig ni thig rab gdab/ /de nas bzhi 'gyur nyid du ni/ /re'u mig gcig ni thig gdab bya/ /gzhan yang nyis 'gyur nyid du ni/ /re'u mig
gcig gi thig rab gdab/ /de nas mkhas pas bzhi 'gyur nyid/ /re'u mig gcig ni thig gdab bya/ /de nas gnyis 'gyur bdag nyid te/ /re'u mig gnyis ni thig gdab bya/ /de nas phyed ni rim gnyis bre/ /
'di ni dkyil 'khor thig yin no/ /thig skud mtshan ma drug bcu bzhi/ /dkyil 'khor thig gi mtshan nyid de/ /'khor lo'i phyi rol mthar thug par/ /cho ga gsungs bzhin thig gdab bya/ /rin chen
lnga yi phye ma 'am/ /yang na 'bras la sogs pa ste/ /dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar/ /ljang gu nag po'ang de bzhin te/ /slob dpon dbang ldan phyogs su ni/ /song ste mnyam par bzhag nas su/ /

legs sbas g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis/ /ri mo lnga ni dgye bar bya/ /phan tshun bar du nas re tsam/ /shong ba'i tshad du bri ba ste/ /ri mo sboms na nad du 'gyur/ /phra bas nor ni nyams par 'gyur/ /yon pos
'dir ni rtsod par 'gyur/ /chad pas 'chi ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ /shar phyogs su ni dkar po che/ /lhor ni ser po yang dag ldan/ /nub kyi cha ni dmar po ste/ /byang du mar gad yang dag ldan/ /

dbus kyi sa yi cha nyid ni/ /in dra nI la 'od 'bar ba'o/ /grwa yi cha ni thams cad dang / /sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen gyis spras par/ /mnyam bar gzhag ste yang dag bri/ /rdo rje

ra ba'i nang du ni/ /dur khrod brgyad kyis brgyan pa ste/ /gtum drag de bzhin tshang tshing dang / /rdo rje 'bar ba keng rus can/ /dbang ldan du ni mi bzad bzhad/ /byin za ru ni bkra shis mchog /mun pa drag po bden

bral du/ /rlung phyogs ki li ki li'i sgra/ /shar gyi shiR+Sha a shwata shing / /kang kel khyad par tsU ta'i shing / /ba TAT de bzhin ka rany+dza/ /la TA par ka ti pAr thi dbang po de bzhin sbyin byed dang / /klu yi dbang dang gshin rje'i

bdag /dbang ldan de nas byin za dang / /srin po'i dbang po rlung gi bdag /bA su ki dang 'jog po nyid/ /kar ko Ta dang pad ma nyid/ /pad chen hu lu hu lu dang / /rigs ldan dang ni dung skyong ngo / /sgrogs pa

dang ni cher sgrogs dang / /drag dang g.yo dang brtan de bzhin/ /gang ba dang ni de bzhin 'bebs/ /gtum pa 'di dag sprin dbang phyug /gzhan yang sna tshogs du ma yi/ /khwa dang 'ug pa bya rgod dang / /
lce spyang lce spyang mo dang ni/ /'ol pa dang ni 'ol pa mo/ /seng ge'i gdong dang stag gi gdong / /drag cing 'jigs pa'i gdong can ma/ /sbrul ni ba lang mgo can dang / /gdong gnyis la sogs phyogs su

rgyu/ /keng rus dang ni mdung gnyis phug /'phyang dang phyed tshig pa dang mgo/ /thod pa byin pa mgo rdum dang / /gtsigs pa'i mgo dang rus pa dang / /rigs 'dzin grub pa sna tshogs dang / /dam tshig spyod pa'i
rnal 'byor pa/ /rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs rnams dang / /gnod sbyin ro langs srin po sogs/ /ki li ki la'i sgra chen bdag /dngos grub rdzu 'phrul yang dag par/ /thob pa'i slob dpon gyi ni tshogs/ /
dur khrod dbus su blta bar bya/ /'di ni dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i rim pa phye ba ste bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas slob dpon mtshan nyid ni/ /yang dag rab tu bshad
par bya/ /zhi zhing dul ba'i cha lugs can/ /sems can kun rab mi 'jigs ster/ /sngags dang rgyud kyi rab sbyor shes/ /bstan bcos rig cing snying rjer ldan/ /sems can kun la bu bzhin blta/ /thams cad

du ni snyan par smra/ /sbyin la sogs la rtag tu dga'/ /bsam gtan rnal 'byor mngon par brtson/ /kun la mi 'tshe bden par smra/ /snying rje dang ni phan sems ldan/ /mnyam sems dang ni phyag rgya ldan/ /
sems can rnams kyi mgon gyur zhing / /sems can bsam pa'i khyad par shes/ /mgon med pa ni rnams kyi gnyen/ /dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa'i lus/ /gzugs dang ldan zhing lta na sdug /dbang

bskur don gyi de nyid shes/ /tshig gsal yon tan rgya mtsho ste/ /rtag par rgyun du gnas brten pa/ /de ni slob dpon rig par bya/ /slob ma rigs bzang chos la spro/ /slobs dpon gyis ni yang dag bsdu/ /snying rje med

cing khro dang gdug /khengs dang brkam chags rnam g.yengs can/ /drag dang rmongs dang snyom las can/ /gzhan gyi srog la snying brtse med/ /gzhan gyi nor la sred pa ni/ /bla mas rtag tu spang bar bya/ /brtan zhing

dul la blo gros ldan/ /bzod ldan drang zhing g.yo sgyu med/ /mi dge bcu ni yongs su spangs/ /sems can rnams la byams par lta/ /'bar ba'i me dang dug bzhin du/ /gzhan gyi nor la mi reg cing / /rtag par rgyun
du bla ma mchod/ /dam chos lta bar spro ba dang / /rtag tu sbyin pa la sogs dga'/ /'jig rten pha rol mngon par 'dod/ /de dag slob mar rab bsngags te/ /dkyil 'khor dge ba bstan par
bya/ /thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni/ /gus pa'i yid kyis gsol gdab bya/ /rnal 'byor ma mchog kha sbyor ba'i/ /dpa' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po
bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol/ /byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol/ /dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang mo dang / /de bzhin phag mo he ru ka /gsang ba'i gnas sogs yang dag dgang / /
lus la rnam gnas bshad du gsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon po bdag ni 'jug par mdzod/ /bu tshur theg pa

chen po yi/ /khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te/ /gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni/ /khyod la yang dag bshad par bya/ /rdo rje gsang sngags mthu yis ni/ /mnyam med ye shes yang dag 'thob/ /de bas kun mkhyen

thob bya'i phyir/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig /bla ma mchod dang de bzhin byams/ /sangs rgyas la gus 'gro la brtse/ /rtsa ba'i ltung ba yongs spang zhing / /sbom po'i ltung ba'ang rnam par spangs/ /
sems can rnams ni bsten par bya/ /theg pa dman la 'dod mi bya/ /ma rgal ba rnams brgal bar gyis/ /ma grol ba rnams grol bar gyis/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis dkrugs pa'i/ /sems
can dbugs ni dbyung bar gyis/ /bslab pa de dag yang dag ldan/ /slob ma rnams ni lhag gnas bya/ /cho ga ji bzhin khrus dang ni/ /bsang byas so shing sbyin par bya/ /srad bu dmar pos khyad par du/ /

dpung par bcings te rtag tu bsrung / /yi ge d+hI yi sngags bzlas pa'i/ /ku sha de la rab tu sbyin/ /rmi lam dge dang mi dge brtag /sku gsung thugs kyi sdom pa'ang sbyin/ /yon dang lhan cig mnyam ldan pa'i/ /
me tog sil ma rab gzung nas/ /der ni gdong g.yogs bcings nas su/ /dkyil 'khor du ni rab tu gzhug /skye ba sngon bsag sdig pa rnams/ /dkyil 'khor mthong bas byang bar 'gyur/ /kye khyod

su zhes dri bya zhing / /bdag ni skal bzang zhes kyang smra/ /dam tshig chu dang mna' bsgag dang / /me tog dkyil 'khor dor ba ste/ /gang dang gang du me tog babs/ /de dang de yi rigs su 'gyur/ /chu dang cod

pan rdo rje dang / /dril bu dang ni ming dbang bskur/ /de bzhin gshegs lnga'i bdag nyid dbang / /brtul zhugs dang ni lung bstan nyid/ /rjes gnang dang ni dbugs dbyung dang / /phyir mi ldog pa'ang sbyin bya
ste/ /gdugs dang gdan dang rig pa sogs/ /rdo rje dril sogs yang dag ldan/ /slob dpon dbang bskur yang dag rdzogs/ /bum pa las ni byung ba'o/ /gnyis pa gsang ba mchog yin te/ /gsum
pa shes rab ye shes yin/ /bzhi pa de ltar yang de bzhin/ /dbang bskur 'di dag yang dag ldan/ /de ni dam tshig can shes bya/ /gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du/ /mchog tu rab zhugs mthong bas
na/ /deng khyod sdig pa thams cad las/ /rnam grol bzung por gyur pas gnas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mnyam gsungs pa'i/ /rjes gnang mchog tu dbugs dbyung ba/ /dngos grub dam tshig snom
pa ni/ /'di dag rtag tu bsrung bar gyis/ /slob ma dad pa'i stobs kyis ni/ /bla ma'i zhabs la phyag btsal nas/ /gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa/ /de ltar bgyi zhes smra bar bya/ /de nas de bzhin
gshegs gsungs pa'i/ /sna tshogs rgyan dang na bza' sogs/ /khyad par du ni rang gi lus/ /bla ma la ni yon du dbul/ /dbang bskur gtso bo thob pas ni/ /bya ba byas pa'i
blo chen gyis/ /gzhan yang rab dgas 'di skad du/ /smra zhing mjug ni rdzogs par bya/ /deng du bdag tshe 'bras bu yod/ /bdag gi gson pa 'bras bur bcas/ /de ring sangs rgyas rigs su skyes/ /
sangs rgyas sras por bdag gyur to/ /sbyin sreg gis ni rdzogs bya zhing / /dge 'dun la ni ston mo drang / /de nas tshogs kyi 'khor lo bya/ /nad pa'am mgon med rnams la'ang sbyin/ /phyi nas man
ngag ji bzhin du/ /dam tshig spyod pa la brtson pas/ /snod du byas pa'i rgyun gyis ni/ /'khor lo la sogs bsgom pa'i rim/ /yang dag man ngag phun tshogs pas/ /dngos grub 'gyur gyis
gzhan du min/ /'di ni dbang bskur ba'i rim par phye ba ste bcwa brgyad pa'o// // de nas 'chi bar nges pa yi/ /mtshan nyid mchog tu bshad par bya/ /rang gi lus sam phyi rol gyi/ /ltas ni mkhas pas

brtag par bya/ /rkang 'thil dag tu phug snyam dang / /gang tshe lte bar phug snyam 'gyur/ /de tshe nyin zhag gsum pha rol/ /lnga yi gong du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bshang dang gci ba'i dus dag tu/ /dus mtshungs

sbrid pa byung gyur na/ /lo gcig na dus de nyid kyi/ /dus tshod la ni 'chi zhing brlag /mtshan gnyis mnyam par sbyor ba yi/ /bar dang tha mar sbrid pa ni/ /dus mtshungs byung na de yi tshe/ /zla ba na ni nges par 'chi/ /snying ga

rkog ma'i dbus dag du/ /dus mtshungs gal te zug gzer gyur/ /ci ste chos la mi brten na/ /zla ba phyed dang gnyis na 'chi/ /gal te mig g.yon 'bras bu yi/ /gzugs brnyan me long la ma mthong / /ci ste zlog

par mi byed na/ /zhag bdun na ni nges par 'chi/ /rna rtsa dang ni smin ma'i dbus/ /spyi bo'i rtse mor zug pa ste/ /bzhi po mtshungs par zug gyur na/ /de tshe 'phral du 'chi bar 'gyur/ /glo bur du ni tsho gyur cing / /
rid dang khro dang 'jigs pas 'khrugs/ gal te chos ni ma bsten gang / /de ni lo gcig dag na 'chi/ /yar ngo yi ni tshes gcig la/ /gal te khu ba nag por mthong / /de tshe zla ba drug na 'chi/ /dmar pos

nad kyis 'debs par ston/ /mig las rtag tu 'dzag pa dang / /gzugs mthong ba yang rnam 'khrul dang / /me long ngam ni tshur gang zhig /rang gi grib ma ma mthong dang / mtshan mo'i tshe na dbang po 'i gzhu/ /

nyin par skar ma'i dkyil 'khor mthong / /sprin med par ni lho phyogs su/ /rten pa'i glog 'gyu mthong ba dang / /nyin par grib ma'i lam dang ni/ /de bzhin skar mda' lhung ba mthong / /ngang pa bya rog rma bya ni/ /

gcig tu 'dres pa mthong ba dang / /zla ba gnyis dang nyi ma gnyis/ /de bzhin rang gi mgo bo 'bar/ /shing rtse ri yi rtse la ni/ /dri za'i grong khyer mthong ba dang / /yi dgas sha za 'jigs rung ba/ /gzhan dag

kyang ni mthong ba dang / /glo bur du ni rab 'dar dang / /yang dang yang du brgyal ba dag /de yis gcig cig mthong gyur na'ang / /zla ba gcig gis 'chi bar 'gyur/ /zla ba ra ri med pa dang / /nyi ma 'od dang bral ba dang / /

mtshan mo nyi ma nyin par ni/ /zla ba de bzhin rang mig 'bar/ /skar ma ri rab dag gi tshad/ /rgya mtsho chu bo lta bu dang / /khu ba dang ni bshang gci rnams/ /dus mtshungs par ni 'bab 'gyur na/ /gal te chos la ma

brten na/ /zla ba phyed na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /der yang nyin mo grib ma ni/ /skye bo'i gzugs can blta bya ste/ /de yi mgo bo ma mthong na/ /lo gcig gi ni nang du 'chi/ /lag pa g.yon pa ma mthong na/ /bu dang chung ma
nges brlag 'gyur/ /lag pa g.yas pa ma mthong na'ang / /pha dang bu sogs tshegs chen 'chi/ /gcin ni rgyun lngar 'gyur ba dang / /g.yon nas 'khor zhing dri nga dang / /skyur ba la sogs

gcin byung na/ /zla drug nang du 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig gi ni rmi lam mthar/ /bye ma'am thal ba'i phung po 'am/ /lha khang ngam ni mchod sdong mdzeg /de ni sngon bzhin 'chi bar 'gyur/ /gal te bong
bu'am spre'u zhon nas/ /grog mkhar phyag dar phung po la/ /mngon mdzeg lho phyogs 'gro bar ni/ /gang gis rmi lam mthar mthong na/ /bud med gang zhig gos gnag cing / /mdog gnag mi ni 'dod spyod

pa/ /de ni dus mtshan yin zhes bya/ /gshin rje'i lto bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bya rgod lce spyang khyi dang khwa/ /dred dang yi dgas sha za yis/ /za bar rmi lam mthong na ni/ /lo gcig na ni nges par 'chi/ /gos ni
dmar pos g.yogs pa dang / /phreng ba dmar pos brgyan pa dang / /til mar gyis bskus rmi lam mthong / /zla ba drug na gson mi 'gyur/ /man ngag ji bzhin ldan pa yis/ /'chi ba blu bar 'gyur ba ste/ /
de nyid kyis ni 'chi las rgyal/ /chos kyis 'chi las rgyal ba ste/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim sgrub pas/ /de bas chos ni mchog tu bsam/ /gzhan yang bsgom pa'i khyad par ni/ /mdzes pas yang dag

bshad par bya/ /dbugs ni skad cig 'chad pa dang / /sna tshogs ltas ni yang dag mthong / /'thor dang dgang ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /lus kyi dkyil 'khor sbyang bar bya/ /'chi ba'i dus la yang dag bab/ /'pho ba'i

rnal 'byor mchog bya ste/ /bu ga dgur ni son pa'i rtsa/ /pu ri kas ni dgang bar bya/ /re rtse kas ni dbugs mnan bya/ /kum pa kas ni bsdam byas te/ /bu ga'i sgo ni sbyang bar bya/ /rab tu zhi bas zhi bar 'gyur/ /

rnam shes dbrog pa'i sbyor ba dang / /gzhan yang pha rol bgrod pa la/ /A li kA li mnyam ldan par/ /mkhas pa yis ni sbyar bar bya/ /snying gar yi ge hU~M sbyar te/ /yi ge phyed dang gnyis po ni/ /'og dang steng du gzhag

par bya/ /de yi 'og gi char rlung gi/ /sa bon 'og du bltas pa'o/ /rlung gi sa bon gnyis byas te/ /rnal 'byor ldan pas kha sbyar bya/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig rim pa yis/ /yi ge phyed dang gnyis sngags brjod/ /rnam shes

bzhon pa rlung yin te/ /gang dang gang du bgrod pa yi/ /rlung gi sgor ni bsam byas na/ /grol ba'i dngos grub ster byed pa'o/ /mchog dang tha ma'i dbye ba ni/ /bshad kyis gsang ba'i bdag po nyon/ /lte bas 'dod khams
bde 'gro ste/ /thig le las ni gzugs can lus/ /steng nas gzugs med khams su ste/ /de ni bde bar 'gro byed pa'o/ /sna las gnod sbyin rnams su 'gyur/ /rna ba las ni mi 'am ci/ /lha mo gal te mig
las ni/ /mi yi rgyal por 'gyur ba yin/ /kha yi sgo las yi dgas rnams/ /gci las de bzhin dud 'gro'o/ /bshang lam nas ni dmyal bar 'gro/ /grol ba las ni gzhan du 'gro/ /dus la bab na 'pho bya yi/ /

dus min lha rnams gsod par 'gyur/ /lha rnams bsad pa tsam gyis ni/ /mi ni dmyal bar 'tshed par 'gyur/ /des na mkhas pas 'chi ba yi/ /mtshan ma yang dag shes par bya/ /'di ni 'chi ba'i ltas blta ba dang

'pho ba'i rnal 'byor rim par phye ba ste bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas de phyir dus bzhi yi/ /tshad ni yang dag rab bshad bya/ /gang zhig rnam par shes tsam gyis/ /bskal pa myur du shes 'gyur ba'o/ /nyi khri dang ni
brgyad stong dang / /sa ya phrag gcig bdun 'bum ste/ /de dag la ni rdzogs ldan gyi/ /bskal pa zhes ni grags par bshad/ /rdzogs ldan gsum ldan gnyis mtshams su/ /de bzhin stong phrag brgyad yin no/ /
sa ya phrag gcig 'bum phrag gnyis/ /dgu khri dang ni drug stong ste/ /gsum ldan bskal pa zhes grags pa/ /der ni mkhas pas shes par bya/ /gsum ldan gnyis ldan bar
mtshams su/ /stong phrag drug ni shes par bya/ /drug khri dang ni bzhi stong dang / /'bum phrag brgyad ni gnyis ldan te/ /bstan bcos kun las bsdus nas ni/ /gnyis ldan bskal par yang dag grags/ /gnyis

ldan rtsod pa'i bar mtshams su/ /de bzhin stong phrag bzhi yin te/ /sum khri dang ni nyis stong dang / /bzhi 'bum rtsod dus shes par bya/ /rtsod dus rdzogs ldan gnyis mtshams su/ /stong phrag dag ni bzhi dang

ldan/ /de rnams dus zhes grags pa ste/ /'grub par 'dir ni the tshom med/ /gling bzhi pa yi dngos po ni/ /mgon po yis ni bshad du gsol/ /shar gyi lus 'phags sgra mi snyan/ /de bzhin nub kyi ba lang spyod/ /
gling ni gsum po de dag rnams/ /'bras bu'i sa bar yang dag gnas/ /'dzam bu'i gling du legs skyes pa/ /dngos grub sa bar shes par bya/ /gling gsum por ni skye ba yi/ /'bras bu 'byung ba'i bsod

nams gnas/ /'dzam bu'i gling pas grol ba dang / /dngos grub nyid ni sgrub pa ste/ /de dag sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyis/ /gsungs pa'i gling du shes par bya/ /'di ni dus bzhi po nges par bstan pa'i rim par
phye ba ste nyi shu pa'o// // de nas sbyor ba pha rol son/ /mchog ni yang dag rab bshad bya/ /sgrub po dngos grub rgyu nyid kyis/ /gang gi dngos grub mthar bgrod pa'o/ /thun mong rnal 'byor rgyud
rnams su/ /gsang ba rnam par ma bshad pa/ /dngos grub rnams las mchog dngos grub/ /brtul zhugs rnams las mchog brtul zhugs/ /bla ma dam pa bsnyen bkur nas/ /bla med rgyud ni mang thos te/ /

de nyid ji bzhin bla ma yi/ /zhal las thos nas rtag tu bsgom/ /nor dang chung ma de bzhin srog /sbyin pa nyid du gtang bar bya/ /mdud pa 'di gsum las grol na/ /rtag tu spyod pa spyad par 'gyur/ /spro ba chen pos

rig pa bzlas/ /de bzhin bden par smra la dga'/ /dam bcas pa la rab gnas te/ /ji ltar dad pas sngon du brtsam/ /'dod dang khro ba 'jigs pa dang / /sred dang gti mug nga rgyal spang / /slob ma brtag dang bshad

de bzhin/ /gzhung rnams bsdu ba rtag tu spang / /gtsang dang mi gtsang dag byed dang / /btung dang btung min brtag mi bya/ /smad dang bstod la khro ba dang / /mngon pa'i nga rgyal rnam par spang / /rtag tu mi chags

dga' med par/ /thams cad la ni mnyam par gnas/ /sbyin sreg med cing mchod pa med/ /phreng ba med cing bzlas pa med/ /nyi ma gza' dang skar ma dang / /tshes grangs kyang ni brtag mi bya/ /bdag gzhan bdag
nyid gzugs kyis ni/ /the tshom med par gnas par bya/ /'dod pa med par mi spyad de/ /kun la 'dod pa cung zad spyad/ /stag gi lpags pa gos su byas/ /phyag rgya lngas ni rnam par brgyan/ /shes rab
thabs bdag rnal 'byor pas/ /he ru ka dpal rnam par bsgom/ /kun du bzang po'i spyod pa yis/ /yid ni bde bar gnas par bya/ /grong du mtshan mo gcig gnas shing / /grong khyer du ni lngar gnas bya/ /

yid dang rjes mthun sbyor ba yis/ /sa yi steng du gnas par bya/ /yang na rlung zhes bya ba yi/ /spyod pa bde zhing dga' bar spyad/ /rtag tu grogs po med par rgyu/ /gcig pa yid ni rtse gcig pas/ /smyon
pa'i brtul zhugs la brten nas/ /lo ma rlung gis bskyod bzhin 'khyam/ /dur khrod dam ni mtshan gcig gam/ /shing gcig gam ni nags tshal lam/ /ri yi rtse 'am chu bo'i 'gram/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram
yang rung / /bskyed mos tshal lam ri phug gam/ /khang bzangs sam ni khang stong ngam/ /bzhi mdo dang ni sgo mdun nam/ /de bzhin rgyal po'i pho brang sgor/ /gdol pa'i gnas sam

phyugs lhas sam/ /bzo yi khang par sbas pas gnas/ /tshong srang dor ba'i me tog phreng / /me tog rnying pa gang ci'ang rung / /dur khrod mtshan gcig me tog phreng / /de dag gis ni lus rab mchod/ /rang gi

mgrin par me tog phreng / /khyad par du ni tshangs skud dang / /ska rags dag kyang bcing bar bya/ /rkang pa gnyis la rkang gdub bya/ /smra ba bzlas pa'i bdag nyid grags/ /lag pa bskyod pa phyag rgya ste/ /
rnam par mi rtog rab sbyor bas/ /rnal 'byor pa ni ci bder gnas/ /dogs pa thams cad rnam spangs te/ /sgrub pos seng ge bzhin du spyad/ /yang na g.yo med brtul zhugs la/ /brten nas rnal 'byor
