la'o/ /nye bar 'du ba can no/ /na ga ra ni sor mor ro/ /sin d+hu rkang pa'i bol gnyis la'o/ /dur khrod do/ /ma ru mthe bo gnyis la dgod/ /ku lu tA ni pus mor gnas/ /nye ba'i dur khrod do/ /pu dzA o a go rA de
mA/ /kA o tri ko ka la kA hi/ /pre gr-i sau su na si ma ku/ /gnyid log ma log ldang ba dang / /bza' 'am 'gro ba'i chos spyod pa'am/ /gang yin der ni rnam bkod na/ /'jig rten gsum gyis mi g.yo'o/ /
ming gi rgyud ni 'bum sde las/ /snying po bsdus par gyur pa yin/ /nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa'i rgyud/ /'bum gcig nang nas de bzhin bshad/ /shes rab rgyud ni gsang ba ste/ /ming 'byung ba las
gnas pa yin/ /bstan pa yis ni sprul pa yin/ /bshad pas longs spyod rdzogs par 'dod/ /so sor bstan pa ma lus nyid/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i de nyid bstan/ /sku gsum 'khor lo gsum du
bshad/ /chos sogs longs spyod rdzogs pa nyid/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs dag ni/ /bden pa gnyis la gnas pa yin/ /blo ngan glen zhing lkugs pa dang / /shes rab dman zhing log lta can/ /

phyi rol bstan bcos kyis 'chal pa/ /bla ma la ni sun 'byin yin/ /de dag kun kyang rnam spangs te/ /gus kyang bshad par mi bya'o/ /cha dang cha yi khyad par la/ /der ni gnyis su med par bshad/ /dag byed dbang gi

lha mo dang / /bka' bsgo'i lha mo dpa' bo skyes/ /de 'og ma lus kun spyod pa/ /'khor ba las grol gtso bo yin/ /ma lus rig byed las sprul pa/ /grub pa'i mthar ni de rab bsgrags/ /dpa' bo khyod kyis nga

la bshad/ /sangs rgyas mu stegs can la sba/ /sgra dang sgra nyams brda rnams kyi/ /lam 'di nyid kyi rjes su 'brang / /bsdus don yang dag blangs pa dang / /brda yi tshig ni rgyas pa yin/ /gang gis kun spyod mi
shes par/ /rnal 'byor pa ni rnal 'byor ston/ /de yi ngal ba don med de/ /'bras bu de ni thob mi 'gyur/ /'gro la 'phags pas sngon gsungs pa/ /sbas te gzhan du gsungs pa yin/ /kun spyod 'dir ni

bshad pa las/ /sgrub pa pos ni rab mnyam gzhag /rgyal bas sngon ni rgyud chen po'i/ /sngags kyi yi ge sgrub mdzad pa/ /las kyi bya ba gang yang rung / /dge dang mi dge brtags te bya/ /yi ge mtha' dang
dbus dag tu/ /der ni thams cad rab tu grub/ /rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pa las A li kA li dang / las thams cad kyi nges pa gnyis su med par bstan pa ste bcu gsum pa'o// //
de nas rgyud rnams thams cad du/ /sbas gsang cho ga bshad bya ste/ /sangs rgyas bzhi yi gdan bzhugs pa/ /rdo rje la sogs dpa' rnal 'byor/ /mkha' 'gro la sogs rdo rje yi/ /dpa' bo rnal 'byor
dbang phyug gtso/ /me long la sogs rnam pa bzhi/ /gnyis med gnyis su med sbyor nyid/ /gnyis med rdzas ni me tog sogs/ /re re nas ni dbul bar bya/ /phyag rgya lnga sogs mchog lus kyi/ /
pha rol son pas phar phyin drug /lag pa'i mchod sogs ye shes can/ /blo ldan dpa' bos shes par bya/ /rnal 'byor ma drug go rims bzhin/ /rdo rje sems sogs bcu gnyis dang / /dpa' bo chen por
sbyar bya la/ /lag pa'i mchod la sogs pas bstod/ /lnga po lnga dang yang dag bsre/ /'o ma dang yang bsre bar bya/ /mchod pa des ni legs gnas la/ /spyod dang grol ba'i 'dod dang ldan/ /lag pa'i mchod
pas rnal 'byor pa/ /dbul ba'i 'dod don grub par 'gyur/ /sems ni gzhan du gyur pa dang / /bza' btung gos sogs thob par 'gyur/ /lha yi mchod pa byas na ni/ /de la bsam pa rnam grub 'gyur/ /dpa'

bo 'di ni dpa' chen po/ /sa steng rnal 'byor ma rnyed dka'/ /rnal 'byor pa yi spyod brtul zhugs/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug kun gyi gtso/ /gang zhig rtag tu 'dir rang mchod/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu kun rab ster/ /
rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pa las/ dpa' bo bzhi dang yang dag par sbyor ba'i lag pa'i mchod pa bstan pa ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma/ /gnyis med spyod pa'i cho ga
bshad/ /dang por mnyam gzhag rnal 'byor pas/ /'bad de nus pa bskyed par bya/ /nus pa bskyed pa'i rjes thogs la/ /yid la 'dod pa'i brtul zhugs spyad/ /sems can rjes gzung don gyi phyir/ /dpa' bo chen
po 'gro bya zhing / /srog chags yan lag go bgos la/ /bde don gnyer bas bde ba srung / /mchod phyir thogs ni kun spangs la/ /he ru ka dpal gtsang sbrar gnas/ /grol ba'i 'bras bu 'dod pa yis/ /

rnal 'byor ma kun mnyes par bya/ /rtsa ba'i sngags kyis dpa' bo gang / /tshangs pa'i skud pa la sogs brtag /lha yi snying po'i gsang sngags kyi/ /brgya phyed phreng bas brgyan pa yin/ /thod pa'i dum bu la
sogs kun/ /lus kyi khams su brtag par bya/ /dpa' bo'i go cha drug gi ni/ /rgya 'dis lus ni mdzes pa yin/ /rdo rje phag mo sogs sngags gang / /mgur chus rke ba mdzes pa yin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha'

'gro ma'i/ /lpags pa'i gos ni 'dzin pa'i mchog /kha T+wA~M ga ni lha yi sku/ /shes rab Da ma ru ru brtag /yi ge bdun gyi gsang sngags kyi/ /rna chas snyan ni mdzes pa yin/ /rnal 'byor ma drug gsang sngags

gang / /ska rags byas pa brgyan pa yin/ /'khor lo kun gyi rnal 'byor ma'i/ /sngags ni lag pa'i thod pa yin/ /rnam par snang mdzad yum sngags dang / /thod pas mgo bo brgyan pa yin/ /de ltar bdag nyid rnam

bsams nas/ /tsham ngam sngags kyis legs par bsrung / /rtag tu tshangs par spyod 'gyur ba/ /gsang sngags rkang pa brgyad mchod pa'o/ /nyin mo bcom ldan dpa' bo ste/ /mtshan mo bcom ldan ma brtag bya/ /
mi bya ci yang yod min te/ /rtag tu mi bsam yod ma yin/ /mi bza' ci yang yod min la/ /dge dang mi dge mi smra med/ /bdag nyid ji bzhin 'gro de bzhin/ /bdag ci 'dra bar gzhan de bzhin/ /de ltar rnam
bsam rnal 'byor bdag /'jigs pa thams cad yongs spangs te/ /dpa' bo seng ge bzhin du spyod/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed yin/ /he ru ka dpal gzhir gnas pa'i/ /yan lag bskyod pa ji

snyed dang / /tshig tu brjod pa ji snyed pa/ /de snyed phyag rgya gsang sngags yin/ /rigs lnga'i kun du spyod pa ni/ /rigs gcig nyid du spyad par bya/ /de ltar shes pa'i bdag nyid can/ /go 'phang mchog tu 'gro
bar 'gyur/ /gnyis med ye shes sems ldan la/ /mi bya ba ni ci yang med/ /mi rtog bdag nyid sems kyis ni/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams spyad/ /rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pa las
gnyis su med pa'i brtul zhugs dang gsang sngags bstan pa ste bcwa lnga pa'o// // gzhan yang phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe/ /dus mthar dngos grub mi thob ste/ /blo ni gzhan du rnam 'khrugs pas/ /phyag
rgya dkyil 'khor bzlas pa yis/ /bde bar 'grub par mi 'gyur gyi/ /bkres dang skom gyi sdug bsngal 'gyur/ /'bad de 'dod bya dmigs nas ni/ /de nyid kyis bdag rnal 'byor pa/ /ji ltar he ru ka'i ye
shes/ /ji 'dod par ni yongs su rgyu/ /rna ba ring nas thos pa dang / /skad cig gis mthong rnal 'byor pas/ /chos 'di de ltar shes nas ni/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed yin/ /shes rab chen por
byas pa nyid/ /gnyis med ye shes brtul zhugs bzang / /A li kA li ma gtogs par/ /gal te chos 'di 'dod na ni/ /de yi ngal ba don med de/ /'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /mdo dang bya ba'i spyod pa
rnams/ /rnal 'byor gsang sogs dbye ba nyid/ /'jig rten kun la bshad pa ni/ /byang chub don gyi rgyu nyid yin/ /nga yis 'jug par bshad pa ni/ /tshogs gnyis gnyis su med pa yin/ /de nyid chos
kyi rang bzhin zhes/ /mya ngan 'das pa 'ba' zhig 'dod/ /thams cad bden pa gnyis la ni/ /brten par nges ni sngon bshad pa/ /rnal 'byor pa yis dngos grub kyis/ /sgom pa mngon dgar gyur
pa yin/ /spros pa kun la dmigs nas ni/ /spros pas spros pa med par bya/ /rgyud rnams kun du gsang ba gang / /sprul pa rnams kyi de nyid bstan/ /rgyud 'di yis ni rnal 'byor pa/ /bden pa gnyis
la yang dag brtan/ /sems rnams thams cad bsal nas ni/ /longs spyod kun la nyer spyad bya/ /blo ldan chen po 'khor lo sdom/ /sdom pa la ni rnam par dpyad/ /rnal 'byor ma yi mtshan ma gang / /gzugs

dang brda dang tha snyad dag /khyim lnga la sogs yul rnams su/ /rnal 'byor ma ni lnga nyid gnas/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i gnas kun du/ /g.yon nas bskor ba la rab brtson/ /ji ltar sngar bshad 'khor lo yi grangs
kyi cho gas brtul zhugs can/ /dpa' bo'i sngags sogs rnal 'byor ma'i/ /yid la 'dod pa dgod par bya/ /shar gyi 'dab mar mkha' 'gro ma/ /bong bu'i rnam par bsgom par bya/ /he ru ka dpal zhes bya
ba/ /las rnams thams cad byed pa yin/ /he ru ka dpal go 'phang gnas/ /lus ngag yid kyi las rnams la/ /bshad dang ma bshad gang bsam pa/ /de dag thams cad myur du 'grub/ /rnal 'byor ma yi
kun du spyod pa las dngos grub kyi nges pa dang dpal he ru ka'i mdzad pa bstan pa ste bcu drug pa'o// // de nas he ru ka dpal rgyud/ /sems ni dri med yin par bshad/ /dag pa'i
chos kyi sprul pa ni/ /phag mo'i gzugs su bstan pa yin/ /thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba las/ /de nyid dang ni thams cad 'byung / /me long la sogs rnam pa bzhi/ /pad ma'i 'dab gnas rnal 'byor
ma/ /mkha' 'gro ma bzhi pad mar gnas/ /mA ma kA'i sogs bzang mo yin/ /thod pa'i dum sogs 'khor lor gnas/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi gnyis med yin/ /sems can 'khor ba las grol ba/ /
dpa' bo nyid ni yin par brtag /khro bo rnam rgyal la sogs kun/ /sgo dang mtha' yi mtshams rnams su/ /sna tshogs gdul ba'i thabs can gyis/ /sems can don la brtson par mdzad/ /
gsang ba'i gnas kyi rnam gnas pa/ /rab tu 'bad de sba bar bya/ /rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo yis/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub ster/ /rnal 'byor 'bras bu thob nas ni/ /srid mtshor ltung bar
mi 'gyur ro/ /'khor ba las ni bsgral ba'i thabs/ /rgyud kyi snying po bsdus pa yin/ /bla ma slob mas rtogs sla phyir/ /cho ga rgya cher ma bshad de/ /sems ni ngal so rnal 'byor pa/ /mya ngan
'das pa bstan mi bya/ /de ltar spyod pa'i skyes mchog 'di/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam dag 'gyur/ /'jig rten 'di 'am pha rol du/ /'dis ni sangs rgyas nyid mthong 'gyur/ /ji ltar sngar bshad sdig
pa rnams/ /spang bar bya ba'i mtshan nyid yin/ /gang zhig 'di sgom rnal 'byor pa/ /'dod pa'i bde ba thams cad ster/ /he ru ka dpal mtshan brjod pas/ /lha sogs kun gyi gsang gang dang / /
mi la sogs la gang zhig yod/ /de yi bsod nams des 'thob bo/ /bsam gtan gyis ni bsams tsam mam/ /'don cing klog gam bris pa yis/ /mtho ris longs spyod 'thob 'gyur te/ /yang na
'khor los bsgyur nyid 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor pa ni 'pho ba'i tshe/ /dpal ldan he ru ka la sogs/ /dpa' bo dag ni thams cad dang / /rnal 'byor ma ni ji snyed pa/ /lag na sna tshogs me tog bsnams/ /

ba dan rgyal mtshan sna tshogs dang / /rol mo'i sgra ni sna tshogs dang / /sna tshogs glus ni nye bar mchod/ /'chi ba zhes bya rnam rtog ste/ /mkha' la spyod pa'i gnas su 'khyer/ /de lta'i dpa' bo chen po

dang / /rnal 'byor ma ni sa steng dkon/ /ji ltar bud med byis gtam rjes yi rang / /kun smra sten pa'i gtam yang brjod par byed/ /lam yang bshad cing 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /rnal 'byor lam ngan de dang
'dra bar bshad/ /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /gnas sogs rnal 'byor ma yi gnas/ /he ru ka dpal sogs rnal 'byor/ /dpa' bo gnyis med rnal 'byor ma/ /phul+lIr ma la yar rab gtum/ /dzA lan

d+ha rar gtum pa'i mig /o T+ya na ni 'od ldan ma/ /ar bu dar ni sna chen mo/ /go dA ba rir dpa' blo ma/ /rA me shwa rar mi'u thung ma/ /de bi ko Tar lang dbang phyug /mA la bar ni shing grib ma/ /kA ma rU par sa

srung mo/ /o Tar 'jigs byed chen mo yin/ /tri sha ku ner rlung shugs ma/ /ko sa lar ni chang 'thung ma/ /ka ling lha mo sngo bsangs ma/ /lam pA kar ni rab bzang mo/ /kAn tsi kar ni rta rna ma/ /hi ma la

yar bya gdong ma/ /pri ta pu rir 'khor lo'i shugs/ /gr-i ha de bar dum skyes ma/ /sau rA Sh+Tar sna chen mo/ /gser gling 'khor lo'i go cha mo/ /na ga rar ni rab dpa' mo/ /sin d+hu'i yul du stobs chen mo/ /
mya ngan yul du 'khor sgyur ma/ /ku lu tAr ni brtson chen mo/ /yul 'di rnams kyi bu mo gang / /dpa' bo gnyis med rnal 'byor ma'o/ /gsang ba'i sngags la rtag gnas nas/ /rab tu 'bad de bsgrub
par bya/ /rnal 'byor ma ni re re zhing / /bye ba grangs snyed dag gis bskor/ /mtshan ma mtshan nyid phyag rgya sogs/ /g.yon pa'i sgrub pa po yis sba/ /mi bzad las ni gang gang gis/ /skye bo rnams ni
'ching 'gyur ba/ /thabs dang bcas na de nyid kyis/ /srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol 'gyur/ /'khor ba'i pha rol rgal nas 'di/ /ci 'dod ye shes can du 'gyur/ /mgur chu gtsug rgyan dpung rgyan

dang / /rna rgyan tshangs pa'i skud pa dang / /mgul pa brgyan cing spyi bor phreng / /ska rags rkang gdub sgra nyid do/ /ri steng sna tshogs pad ma yi/ /ge sar A li kA li las/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi yang dag ldan/ /
dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma tshogs bcas/ /u ma'i bdag po yang dag mnan/ /rdo rje dril bu sku la 'khyud/ /he ru ka dpal rgyal po che/ /go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya/ /de nas rtag tu spos chus 'dir/ /
rtag tu lus ni yan lag dril/ /dri zhim yan lag gis brgyan cing / /thal ba'i phyag rgya sogs pas bsgos/ /kha dog la sogs g.yogs pa'i gzugs/ /rang gi lus ni yongs su bsgyur/ /spyod pa'i
brtul zhugs la zhugs par/ /shes nas rnal 'byor la legs gnas/ /yan lag can dang tshig can dang / /sdud dang de bzhin snying stobs dang / /gar gyi tshul ni bzhi po 'di/ /de nyid mthong bas shes
par bya/ /gdung ba'i tshul zhes bya ba ni/ /rnal 'byor shes pa yin par bshad/ /de la 'bad de bya ba ni/ /skal ba bzang po'i gar chen yin/ /gar gyi gnas su gnas pa kun/ /rgyan rnams de ni yin

zhes bya/ /kun du dbug dang bcing bya dang / /gzhug dang de bzhin bskyon pa dang / /'bebs dang 'di ni 'khyil pa dang / /de bzhin 'dir ni brgyan pa dang / /tshangs skud lus las dgrol ba dang / /rnam pa

kun du bcing ba dang / /rkang gdub rab tu gzhug pa dang / /rkang pa'i rgyan ni nyid dag dang / /srog shing gcig gyur srad bu yin/ /'og pag drug bcu rtsa brgyad dang / /rol ldan bcu drug par shes bya/ /phreng
ba nyi shu rtsa lnga yin/ /rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pa las de kho na nyid dag pa la sogs pa bstan pa ste bcu bdun pa'o// //rnal 'byor ma'i kun du spyod pa rdzogs so// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ tsa tur yo gi nI sa~M pu Ta tan tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i kha sbyor gyi rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /

rnal 'byor bzhi yi kha sbyor te/ /zhal bzhi zhes ni rnam par bshad/ /rgyud rnams kun du sbas pa ste/ /zhal rnams kyang ni kha sbyor ma/ /'di ru rgyas par brjod pa yin/ /'og dang steng du rnam bshad dang / /de bzhin

g.yon dang g.yas pa'o/ /A li kA li'i bye brag gis/ /lte ba'i dbus su rnam par gnas/ /zla ba nyi mar rnam par bshad/ /sa dang rlung gi nyid dag dang / /chu me de bzhin nam mkha' dang / /khams lnga dag dang

yang dag ldan/ /gzugs dang reg pa de bzhin sgra/ /mig gnyis dang ni sna dag dang / /lus kyi steng 'og tu yang gsal/ /rtag tu rdor can rnam par gnas/ /cha dang cha min rnam par grol/ /stong pa'i ngang las yang
dag gnas/ /ya yi sde mtha' yang dag rdzogs/ /u yig dag ni thig ler bcas/ /'byar zhing gsal bar 'gyur ba ste/ /kha sbyor rnam pa rnal 'byor gyi/ /rdor can ji ltar chang gis myos/ /'khor nas
sems ni rnam par grol/ /khams gsum po ni ma lus pa/ /rdo rje mig gis mthong bar 'gyur/ /bdun gyi rgyal po'i dngos grub kyis/ /ma lus lus pa med pa mthong / /tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang ldan dang / /
dbang po de bzhin 'dod dbang phyug /pha rol stobs kyis mnan nas ni/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis ni mchod/ /tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams kyis/ /dam tshig sgra yis bshad pa ste/ /srog dang
rtsol ba kun du bya/ /de yis 'di ni dam tshig sdom/ /de la kha sbyor rnam pa bshad/ /zhal bzhi ru ni rab tu gnas/ /rnal 'byor ma bzhi sde zhes bya/ /sbyor ba bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /gang gang
dbang po'i lam nas byung / /de dang de yi rang bzhin nyid/ /'dod pa kun las longs spyod pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'gyur/ /gzugs ni ji ltar rdzogs pa las/ /de la bsgom pa ci lta bu/ /
sngags rnams ji ltar bskyed par bgyi/ /rdzogs par yang ni ci ltar 'gyur/ /de dag thams cad tha snyad tsam/ /sngags dang rgyud rnams yang dag 'byung / /byang chub sems ni 'di ru sngags/ /'dod

pa lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /mtshon cha mtshan nyid kyis ni mtshon/ /mtshon bya du ma'ang mtshon mi bya/ /sngags rnams rgyas par bshad nas ni/ /lha rnams kyi ni bsgom pa nyon/ /steng gi sgo ni gsum yin
te/ /lte bar rlung gi gzugs can ma/ /de la dbus su rtag tu stong / /dag pa yi ni shel lta bur/ /longs spyod chen po nges par 'byung / /dgu pa bcu yis ldan pa ste/ /cha brgyad de yi yan lag gis/ /
sgo dgu'i sa bon yin pa ste/ /lus la lha mo rjes su brjod/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro bdag nyid kyis/ /steng gi char ni shes rab ste/ /rdo rje 'dzin dang bcas par 'byung / /sems kyi rdo rje zhes ni bshad/ /
'dir ni steng gi pad mar bshad/ /de la gnas ni b+ha gar bshad/ /shes rab de nyid rdor can bcas/ /rten dang brten par 'byung ba yis/ /rtsa rnams kun la rnam par gnas/ /khu ba'i gzugs su gyur
pa yis/ /spro dang sdud par byed pas so/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /bsgom pa'i rim pa phyed pas so/ /gdams ngag rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /lha rnams bsgom par brjod pa ste/ /
de rnams sna tshogs rnal 'byor gyis/ /zla ba nyi mar bshad pa yin/ /gzhan yang gzhan min rnam par grol/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni g.yo ba med/ /der ni gzung bar bya ba ste/ /gang zhig de ru ji ltar
gnas/ /nyin mo bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /mtshan mo shes rab tu ni brjod/ /nam mkha'i nang song mchog tu zhing / /dag cing dge ba yid du 'ong / /sangs rgyas la sogs mu stegs kun/ /lha min

gnod sbyin srin po dang / /de nyid 'dod chags chags bral dang / /'dod pas thar par gyur pa 'di/ /de nyid bud med rnams la chags/ /de nyid mngal ni rab tu len/ /de nyid 'chi ste ril po'i gnas/ /de nyid
bskams pas mthong ba yin/ /de nyid gong du gyur pa ste/ /de nyid dri ru rnam par gnas/ /de nyid sdug bsngal rig pa ste/ /rig pas bde ba nyid dag la/ /de nyid gcig pus khyab pa yin/ /bdud rtsi thigs
pa'i gzugs kyis ni/ /gzugs bzang gzugs dang ldan pa'i mchog /sna tshogs gzugs rnams yid du 'ong / /gzugs kun gsal bar byed pa'i dpal/ /gzugs brnyan ma lus 'chang ba'o/ /
bcu drug phyed phyed de yi phyed/ /rtag tu de nyid rig pa po/ /sna tshogs rtag tu zhi ba'i gzugs/ /nam mkha' lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /de nyid rab tu zhugs par brjod/ /'gro la gsal ba mar me bzhin/ /
sna yi rtse mor rnam par 'byung / /'bar ba'i phreng ba'i 'od zer te/ /'di rnams kun ni bdag gis brjod/ /rten dang brten pa'i mtshan nyid du/ /gang gis shes pas cho ga shes/ /de yi dpal ni rgyas par

'grub/ /gzhan yang sngags kyi tshogs bshad de/ /gsang ba'i sbyor ba sbas pa ste/ /sde tshan brgyad kyi mtha' ma gzung / /sa bon lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /de bas b+h+ru yig sbyin par bya/ /dang por o yig yang
dag ldan/ /a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog /thig le chen po yi ge med/ /nam mkha' nam mkha'i dbus gnas par/ /sngags dang rgyud ni yang dag 'byung / /ci ltar de ltar sngags kyang ni/ /de bzhin nyid
kyi tshul lta bur/ /yi ge tsam dang yang dag ldan/ /de la dbus su rab tu grags/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /gang yang gzhan gyi lha tshogs dang / /'byung po ma lus thams cad dang / /
lha dang lha min gsang ba pa/ /de yi dbus su yang dag rdzogs/ /yi ge la sogs gzugs can gyis/ /gzugs can rnal 'byor lA ma dang / /dum skyes ma yi bye brag gis/ /zhal bzhi

zhes ni rnam par bshad/ /rnal 'byor bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /lte ba dang ni ge sar ldan/ /'dab ma bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /de la dbus su dpa' bo che/ /phyag brgyad kyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /dang po la ni

sha yis gang / /gnyis pa khrag gis bkang ba nyid/ /gsum pa bzhi pa lus phyag rgya/ /kha T+wA~M ga dang Da ma ru/ /de bzhin kha dog dkar po 'phro/ /dri med ston ka'i nam mkha' bzhin/ /dkar dang dmar dang de bzhin

nag /ljang gu'i zhal te gtsigs pa'o/ /phyag rgya brgyad ni mdo ru bshad/ /phyag gis mtshon char rab tu grags/ /dang por 'jug pa'i phyag rgya ste/ /gnyis pa snying ni 'byin pa'o/ /gsum pa rmongs byed phyag rgya

yin/ /bzhi par ltung byed de bzhin no/ /lnga par gar ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /drug par gsod byed mar ni brjod/ /bdun par za byed ma'i phyag rgya/ /brgyad par steng du len par nges/ /gshin rje mo dang skrag byed drag /

gtum mo dang ni bzang za dang / /b+ha su ma dang 'dod pa nyid/ /de nyid brgyad po phag mo nyid/ /mi zad rnam par 'gyur ba'i gzugs/ /khrag dang khu ba za za mo/ /'od zer 'bar ba sna tshogs 'bar/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro

ma bsgom bya/ /mang por rnam bshad ye shes ni/ /de la dbus su rnam par 'byung / /dpag tshad 'bum gyi rgya khyon du/ /de yi gsal bar byed pa yin/ /sems can thog ma tha ma med/ /rdo rje sems dpa' chags pa

che/ /thig le rdo rje can du 'gyur/ /zla ba phyed pa lta bur gsal/ /gdan ni pad ma rA ga ste/ /rgyal po'i gzugs ni gsal ba yin/ /rgyal po nyid ces rnam par bshad/ /steng du 'byung bar rab tu grags/ /yang ni

dgod par bya ba ste/ /rigs kyi dbye bas brjod pa'o/ /shar du rdo rje sems dpar gyur/ /lho ru rnam par snang mdzad brjod/ /nub du rta yi rgyal po'o/ /byang du pad ma gar dbang ste/ /'khor lo'i dbus su he ru ka /
steng gi sgra ni rta gdong yin/ /'di rnams 'di ru dgod par gsungs/ /rigs kyis dbye ba rnam pa lnga/ /de ru bsgom par bya ba yin/ /gzhom med gzhig tu med pa ste/ /de yi dbus su yang dag rdzogs/ /mgon

po rnam par snang mdzad sogs/ /rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i kha sbyor las tshogs kyis bsgyings pa'i rgyud chen po zhes bya ba ste brtag pa dang po'o// // de nas rdo rje phag mo de/ /rkang rgyan dang ni do shal

rgyan/ /de yi dkyil 'khor la gar byed/ /dbang bskur ba ni ster ba yin/ /dam tshig la ni legs gzhag phyir/ /phag mos de bzhin rdo rje can/ /ci 'dod de bzhin rdo rje can/ /dri chen dri chu za ba dang / /khrag

dang khu ba de bzhin sha /rtag tu bud med dang nus sam/ /b+ha ga'i pad mar 'o byed dam/ /snros shig rdo can bde ba che/ /de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /bzhad par gyur nas 'di dag smras/ /lha mo ci ste
bdag mi spro/ /khrag dang khu ba la sogs bza'/ /rtag tu bud med gus par bgyi/ /b+ha ga pad mar 'o bgyid do/ /yang ni legs so legs so byin/ /sgo skyong de bzhin rdo rje can/ /thod pa yang dag blangs

nas ni/ /rdo rje can la bza' ba dbul/ /zhi zhing gcer bur 'dug pa dang / /rdo rje can ni skra grol bas/ /legs par dbang bskur ster bar byed/ /b+ha gar 'o byed rdo rje can/ /de nas brtsams te rdo rje khyod/ /

sems can don gyis brtul zhugs bzang / /bza' ba dri chen dre chu dang / /khrag dang khu ba sha dag go/ /b+ha ga'i pad mar 'o bya ste/ /bdud rtsi rnams ni bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor pho nya mos/ /
de nas rtag tu dbang bskur ro/ /hU~M hU~M haHhaHaHaHhrIHhrIHswA hA/ de nas de ma thag tu kun/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma nyid kyis/ /sgra chen po ni rab tu bsgrags/ /rdo rje can de dbang
bskur ro/ /sna tshogs gzugs can drag po che/ /thod pa'i gdan la yang dag bzhugs/ /sha dang khrag dag 'thung ba ste/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du ni sbyor/ /la la rol mo'i cha byad brdung / /pa Ta ha

sogs mu kuN Da/ /la la rab tu glu len cing / /la la pi wang bsgreng ba ste/ /la la rdor can gar byed do/ /la la dril bu'i sgra sgrogs byed/ /la la sgra dag rab tu bsgrogs/ /phyogs bcur pheM gi sgra dag
go/ /la la gar dag rab tu byed/ /la lar dkyil 'khor du glu len/ /la la me tog rab tu 'grems/ /de yis rdor can la dbang bskur/ /la la spos kyis rab sbyin byed/ /la la dri yis de
bzhin no/ /'di ltar gyur pa'i mchod pa yis/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la ni bya/ /de nas rdor can lha mo de/ /tshig 'di dag ni brjod pa ste/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid dag dang / /dbang dag
legs par brjod nas ni/ /nga yis gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /lha rnams dgod pa mchog dag go/ /rgya ru kun du khru brgyad de/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /sngags pas de yi nyis 'gyur dpyad/ /gang
du mkha' 'gro'i tshogs 'gying ba/ /nam mkha' 'od kyis rgya khyab par gang gang de dkyil 'khor mchog yin no/ /dbus su 'khor lo yang dag bri/ /lte ba dag ni ge sar ldan/ /'dab ma bzhi dang
yang dag bcas/ /kha dog dkar por yang dag ldan/ /de la dbus su dpa' bo dgod/ /dag pa'i shel bzhin dri ma med/ /dang po'i zhal ni rnam par bzhad/ /dang po'i spyan gyis rnam par gzigs/ /

smin ma khro gnyer rab tu gsal/ /mche ba gtsigs shing 'jigs pa ni/ /lho ru bltas pa'i zhal dag go/ /g.yon pa rmad du byung ba ste/ /rgyab ci 'jigs pa chen po yin/ /mdun rgyab rta yi zhal gyis brgyan/ /

dkar po dmar po de bzhin gnag //ljang gu yi ni kha dog go/ /phyag brgyad kyang ni bri bar bya/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /dpal ldan mgo bo'i phreng ba 'dzin/ /'jigs byed ljags ni 'dril ba ste/ /
'jig dus chen po'i med dang mtshungs/ /dur khrod lta bur 'jigs su rung / /brtsegs par rgod cing bzhad pa che/ /pheM gi sgra ni sgrogs pa'o/ /zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ru/ /lha bzhi rnams ni brjod
par bya/ /kha T+wA~M ga dang thod pa'i lag /khrag dang khu ba dag 'thung ngo / /'khor lo gnyis pa yang dag bshad/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor zlum po la/ /'khor lo chen po yi ge brgyad/ /'od zer dmar po
'bar ba ste/ /gzugs can ma dang 'od byed ma/ /lA ma mchog 'phel dang sa ma li/ /phyir mi ldog dang e hi ki/ /rdor can brgyad par brjod pa yin/ /lha mo brgyad po 'di ru dgod/ /kha dog dkar po
shin tu 'bar/ /lag pas kha T+wA~M ga gzung zhing / /thod pa khrag gis bkang ba'o/ /phyi rol 'khor lo yang dag brjod/ /lha rnams bkod pa mchod dang ni/ /sa~M ka ri dang pu ka sa~M/ /gsod ma dkar mo

sgrog ma dang / /gtum mo ri khrod ma nyid dang / /sgrol ma de bzhin khro gnyer ma/ /khams gsum rnam rgyal glang chen mo/ /de bzhin g+hasma rI dag dang / /durga tsa muN Da dag dang / /de bzhin tshangs ma

khyab 'jug ma/ /sgo skyong yang dag bshad pa ni/ /sgo bzhi rtag tu sbyar bar bya/ /'khor lo chen po kha dog sngo/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba'i tshogs kyi 'od/ /lha mo chen mo kha dog dkar/ /kha T+wA~M ga dang nya phyis
'dzin/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ni rgyal po ste/ /rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i sdom pa ni/ /rang gi rgyud du thun mong ste/ /dkyil 'khor bla ma'i bla ma yin/ /bsrung pa chen po'i sdom pa ni/ /de yi bla ma
zhes su gsungs/ /rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i kha sbyor las dkyil 'khor gyi brtag pa zhes bya ba ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /dam tshig chen po'i sgrub thabs so/ /

glang po rta dang bong bu dang / /ba lang rnga mo dag dang ni/ /khyi yi sgron ma rab tu 'byung / /sgron ma chen mo rab tu bshad/ /'gro ba dga' bas gsal bar byed/ /bya rog 'ug pa khra dang ni/ /chu skyar bya rgod
lnga po yi/ /spos chen po ni rab tu bshad/ /spos su 'bul bar byed pa'o/ /'di rnams dbang du byed par 'gyur/ /sa gsum po ru rnam par spyod/ /ci srid sbyor ba tshogs pa yis/ /dngos grub thams
cad byed pa'i mchog /bdud rtsi lnga ni rnam brjod pa/ /'chi med dngos po med pa'o/ /rtog pa med par bza' bar bya/ /blo ldan rang bzhin med pas so/ /sde tshan tha ma'i sngags btus te/ /bcu drug cha
yis yang dag ldan/ /phra Na ba sbyor steng du ste/ /thig les gnon cing brgyan pa yin/ /dri zhes kun du brjod pa yin/ /kun nas thugs kyi dkyil 'khor lo/ /nyi shu bdun pa 'og du sbyin/ /sngags
la sogs pas phye ba yin/ /spyi bo de ru yang dag sbyar/ /yi ge lha yi gzugs kyis ni/ /nyi shu rtsa drug yang ni sbyar/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pas brgyan pa yin/ /nyi shu rtsa gsum yang ni blang / /'og
gi cha ni sbyar bar bya/ /dbyangs kyi gsum pa yang dag ldan/ /bzhi pas sbyar bar bya ba yin/ /de yi dbus su yang dag gsungs/ /yi ge dbang phyug gis ni brgyan/ /bcu drug mtha' ni yang dag
bshad/ /steng dang 'og tu khyab pa yin/ /de la dbus su yang dag gsungs/ /stong pa chen po'i yi ge ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gzhig tu med/ /dag pa yi ni shel lta bur/ /rdzas 'di rnams ni bza'
ba yin/ /rnal 'byor 'di rnams mchog yin te/ /rnal 'byor kun las mchog tu 'phags/ /khyod la mdor bsdus par bshad/ /bza' ba rnams ni yang dag brjod/ /gang gi rigs pas thams cad
bza'/ /dngos po ro mnyam bsres nas ni/ /dag dang ma dag mi byed par/ /de bzhin nyid rnams thams cad dang / /bza' ba thams cad bza' bar bya/ /de nyid bcu yis rab dbye bas/ /gzung dang
'dzin pa rnam par grol/ /sbyin pa'i snying po sbyin par bya/ /sems kyis rnal 'byor rdzogs nas ni/ /thams cad rtswa sogs bzhin du btang / /sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshul khrims gyur/ /de nyid kun
gyis mi 'jigs pa/ /skye bo thams cad 'tshe mi byed/ /dang por snying rje bla na med/ /bzod pa tshul khrims bgegs med dang / /gzhan gyi gnod pa 'gegs pa ste/ /gur dang phur bu dra ba dag /
gdug pa'i bdud ni 'joms pa ste/ /bdud med 'chi ba med pa yin/ /bdag gi sems ni bcing bar bya/ /gang gis rang sems gdul ba yis/ /bdud kyis gnod pa smos ci dgos/ /mnyam pa'i
sems kyi dri yis ni/ /gru bzhi pa ru yang dag bri/ /lus la ste'u dang tsan dan dang / /sems kyis mnyam par gnas pa na/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes brjod/ /dngos po bdag med bsres pa ste/ /
gang zhig rnal 'byor rgyal bar 'gyur/ /gang dag rnal 'byor ma yi ni/ /zhu ba rnams la za ba dag /de yis sa stengs mtha' dag tu/ /rga dang na ba rnam par 'joms/ /rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i kha sbyor
las dam tshig chen po'i bdud rtsi lnga zhes bya ba'i brtag pa ste gsum pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /sbyor ba dang po'i sgrub thabs te/ /sbyor ba rnam bzhir shes par bya/ /

dam tshig bzhi ni bsgrub pa ste/ /dang po khu ba rnam shes bya/ /gnyis pa de bzhin khrag nyid do/ /rdo rje chu dang dri chen ni/ /dam tshig bzhi ni bsten pa ste/ /'dod chags khu bar rnam par bshad/ /phrag dog

khrag ni nyid dag go/ /gti mug rnam snang rgyal po ste/ /zhe sdang dri chur bcas pa yin/ /dam tshig bzhi yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /dam tshig bzhi la spyad pa pos/ /dang po sbyor ba 'grub 'gyur zhing / /rdo rje
sems dpa' dang mnyam 'gyur/ /bris sku gzhug pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /dam tshig de nyid bsgrub bya ste/ /stong pa'i rdo rje brjod bya ste/ /ye shes sems dpa' rnam par bsam/ /mdor bsdus pa ni
sngags bzlas bya/ /hU~M b+h+yo sngags ni brjod par bya/ /dngos pos bsgom pas bsgom par bya/ /spro dang sdud par byed pa'o/ /bdud bzhi gzhan las brgyad pa yi/ /go cha mtshon cha 'di yis bcing / /
ra ba phur bu gur sogs kyis/ /phyogs bzhi la sogs bcing bar bya/ /khams bzhi por ni yang dag 'byung / /bdud bzhi po ni rnam par brjod/ /bad kan sha dang rkang dag dang / /rus pa'i khams
la yang dag 'byung / /spyan dang bdag ma sgrol ma dang / /gos dkar la sogs bzhi pa'o/ /khams bzhi dag ni rnam dag pa/ /sbyor ba dang por brjod pa'o/ /brtson chen zhes su rnam bshad pa/ /
rlung dang me ni mchog yin te/ /de la dbus su yang dag gnas/ /dzA ta ri yi rang bzhin ming / /dbyibs dang kha dog sna tshogs pa/ /kha dog med par rab tu grags/ /dbyangs dang yi ge'i tshul
dag du/ /dbyangs med yi ge med pa'o/ /tshangs min khyab 'jug drag po min/ /nam mkha' min zhing 'dod pa min/ /zla ba min zhing skar ma min/ /nyi ma min zhing rlung yang min/ /gnod sbyin srin po lha
min min/ /'byung po yi dgas nyid min cing / /snod dang bcud ni sna tshogs dang / /khams gsum po ni ma lus la/ /bdag nyid chen po de yis khyab/ /bems po nyid la yid kyis rtogs/ /de nyid 'jig

rten pa ru 'gyur/ /tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che/ /zla ba gza' zin skar ma lha/ /de nyid thams cad bde ba che/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa rnam snang mdzad/ /pad ma nyi ma khrag 'thung rta/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor pho nya mo/ /

de nyid rdo rje bde chen po/ /rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid/ /de bzhin pad ma pad ma 'dzin/ /nor bu nor bu 'dzin pa nyid/ /rigs 'di rnams su bsgyur ba'o/ /de nyid dkyil 'khor bri ba nyid/ /rdul tshon kha dog lnga

pa'o/ /de nyid sngags su rab tu bya/ /hU~M hU~M phaT kyi yi ge nyid/ /dmyal ba dud 'gro yi dgas dang / /lha dang mi dang lha min dang / /rmongs pa'i sems su gyur pa yis/ /'khor ba 'di ru 'khor bar 'gyur/ /rnal
'byor chen po mdor bsdus pa/ /rdo rje can la gnas pa'o/ /lha mo chen mo slar yang dri/ /'gro dang 'ong ba ji ltar 'gyur/ /gnas nas 'di yi sems dag ni/ /skye ba ji ltar brjod pa yin/ /khu ba ji
ltar gzugs su 'gyur/ /skye bo'i skye ba ji ltar yin/ /de yi gzugs kyi skye mal ni/ /khrag las ji ltar 'byung ba lags/ /'byung ba rnams kyi 'byung ba ci/ /de yi skye ba ji ltar lags/ /sa dang
chu dang de bzhin me/ /rlung dang nam mkha' nyid dang ni/ /skye gnas kun la chags pa ni/ /dngos po rnam pa ji ltar khyab/ /zhi ba'i gzugs ni ji ltar yin/ /thams cad du ni ji ltar skye/ /'di
rnams yang dag bshad pa ni/ /lha mo bden par bdag la gsungs/ /ji ltar de bzhin rdo rje nyon/ /sems can kun gyi bskyed pa dag /'khor bar yang dag bsrubs pa las/ /ding 'dir
thabs kyis 'di 'gyur ro/ /thog ma tha ma med dus su/ /sems can thams cad yang dag 'byung / /rgya mtsho 'khrugs sogs gting gi bar/ /blo gros chen po bsrubs pa yin/ /de las de dag skye
bar 'gyur/ /sa yi khams dang yang dag ldan/ /me yis mnyam par nges par bsrubs/ /chu dang rlung gi bye brag go/ /yid kyis de ru rab zhen pa/ /mngal ni gzung zhing blangs pa ste/ /de ni 'khor bar
'khor bar 'gyur/ /dga' ba mya ngan ldan pa ste/ /de las 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni/ /so sor skye ba smra ba ste/ /de bzhin chos dag zab mo nyid/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis sangs rgyas brjod/ /de nyid 'di
rnams mnyam bshad pa/ /sum bcu pa ste rnyed par dka'/ /rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i kha sbyor las de kho na nyid kyi man ngag sbyor ba bzhi'i cha zhes bya ba ste brtag pa bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad
bya ba/ /sbyin sreg las ni rab tu bsgrub/ /sbyin sreg rnam pa gnyis su gsungs/ /phyi dang nang du yang dag gnas/ /phyi ru ji ltar gsungs pa lags/ /nang du yang ni de ltar 'gyur/ /nyon cig rdo rje
nang gi ni/ /ji bzhin sbyin sreg rab bsgrub bya/ /me chen po dag rab tu sbar/ /rnam rtog med pa'i sbyin sreg bya/ /bza' ba btung ba gang yang rung / /de ru thams cad sbyin sreg bya/ /bsreg rdzas rang
bzhin gsungs pa dag /gzugs phung la sogs lnga po dag /rnam rtog med pa'i sbyin sreg bya/ /de dag thams cad sems las byung / /khrag dang khu ba de bzhin sha /dri chen dri chu lnga po dag /rnam rtog

med par bza' bar bya/ /blo ldan rang bzhin med pas so/ /gti mug nga rgyal de bzhin chags/ /zhe sdang de bzhin 'dod chags nyid/ /phrag dog ser sna phra ma dag /dam tshig de nyid dri ma med/ /ji ltar nyi ma
'bar ba bzhin/ /de ltar dri ma med par 'gyur/ /ji ltar ston gyi zla gsal ba/ /de ltar 'di yi dbus gsal yin/ /'dod chags chen por 'gyur ba yin/ /rdo rje snang byed sgron ma bzhin/ /de nyid thar par
gsungs pa ste/ /bla med go 'phang thob par 'gyur/ /sbyin sreg 'di la rab gnas na/ /lha rnams dga' bas tshim pa yin/ /sbyin sreg las ni rab gsungs nas/ /rab gnas dag ni brjod par bya/ /
sngon gyi rnal 'byor la gnas nas/ /de nas rab gnas bya ba ste/ /rab gnas sku sogs thang ka dang / /rnal 'byor can gyis glegs ba~M ste/ /dpal ldan g.yon gyis dril bu 'dzin/ /g.yas kyis rdo rje
yongs su gzung / /don kun rnal 'byor kun gyis ni/ /mdzes par sku gzugs mchod par bya/ /sha dang chang dag rab tu bkang / /ro yi steng du yang dag gnas/ /par pa Ti kA sha~M ku li/ /mchod pa kun
gyis dgyas par bya/ /me tog spos dang mar me dang / /dri nyid dang ni rnam pa bzhi/ /glu dbyangs de bzhin gar dag dang / /sgrub pos pa Ta ha sogs te/ /sku la sogs pa 'di rnams la/ /rab gnas

chen po bya ba yin/ /ya iM aM hiM ya i a~M/ /dze idz+dza i mA a u~M/ /mA a u~M mA a d+ha m+mu pA/ /bidz+dza i tsit+ta ya~M mu/ /tsiN+Ti dz+dza ai sa e la/ /sat+t+rA t+thu ki ri dz+dza i/ /glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis/ /dbang rnams
kun kyang blang ba ste/ /chos rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gzhi/ /mchod pa kun gyi sprin chen mo/ /spro zhing bsdu bar brjod pa'o/ /nga yis rab gnas bshad pa
ni/ /rgyud gzhan las ni rnyed par dka'/ /rnal 'byor ma bzhi yi kha sbyor las sbyin sreg rab gnas kyi brtag pa ste lnga pa'o// // de nas mdor bsdus rab bshad pa/ /de nyid gtan la dbab
pa'i mchog /rtag tu sems ni rnam rtog med/ /rnam rtog bcas pas ci ltar 'gyur/ /ci ltar me dag rab 'bar ba/ /rtag tu shing rnams tshig par brjod/ /de la tshig pa shing rnams te/ /'di yis tshig par

mthong ba yin/ /de yis tshig pa ji bzhin du/ /blo ldan rnam rtog med pa yis/ /phung po lnga yi shing rnams te/ /de bzhin gzugs kyi phung po nyid/ /rus pa rkang dang bad kan dang / /khrag dang khu ba dri chen dag /

mig gnyis de bzhin rna ba dang / /de bzhin du ni sna nyid dang / /sa dang chu dang de bzhin me/ /rlung dang nam mkha' nyid dag dang / /'byung ba lnga po thams cad la/ /de nyid nyi shu rtsa lnga dag /de yi gnas ni bye brag tu/ /
nga yis bye brag brjod pa ste/ /lte bar gnas pa'i 'khor lo chos/ /'dab ma drug bcu bzhi dang ldan/ /shes rab gnas su rab tu gsungs/ /zla ba'i gzugs bzhin gsal ba ste/ /de yi dbus su gnas
pa dag /me lta bur ni 'bar ba yin/ /me chen de ni 'bar ba ste/ /de yi rtse mo mthong ba ni/ /de yis de ni gzugs mthong yin/ /dngos po thams cad gzugs 'dzin pa/ /blo yi gnas su gsungs shing
brjod/ /hU~M yig nga ro tshul 'dzin pa/ /rdo rje can ni rtag tu 'byung / /rdo rje 'dzin chen gzugs bzhin no/ /rlung gis bskyod pa me yin te/ /de yi dbus su rab tu grags/ /gang zhig ri bong can gzugs
gsungs/ /shes rab de nyid mdor bsdus so/ /ji ltar nyi mar rab tu brjod/ /rdo rje 'dzin dang bcas par 'gyur/ /sde tshan brgyad kyi tha ma gzugs/ /thig le dang ni zhabs kyur bcas/ /de nyid nyi ma zhes
su gsungs/ /'od zer 'bar ba'i phreng ba can/ /de yi dbus su yang dag 'byung / /rdo rje can gnas mnyam par 'gyur/ /ji ltar gnyid kyis gzung ba ni/ /cung zad kyang ni mthong ba med/ /gzugs la sogs
pa'i gzung ba dag /langs na rtag tu mthong ba yin/ /de ru thabs ni bsgom pa yin/ /de yi rang bzhin mchog tu grags/ /sems can thogs med bde chen brjod/ /de ru der gnas dngos po yis/ /shes
rab pha rol phyin pa gsal/ /de phyir de nyid dngos po yis/ /blo ldan sems kyis de nyid gsungs/ /sems ni rnam par dag pa ste/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'khyam par 'gyur/ /sngags pa gar
'dod 'gro ba yin/ /skad cig gis ni gnas par 'gro/ /'dod chen rnams ni chags par 'gyur/ /drag po rnams la drag po mtshon/ /zhi ba rnams la zhi ba ste/ /'di ni mdun rgyal mthu rtsal las/ /
ji ltar 'di ru pad ma rim/ /'dod chags skyon gyis gos mi 'gyur/ /sna tshogs bag chags skyon mi chags/ /khams gsum po ni de bzhin dag /stong pa ma yin mi stong min/ /dbu ma nye bar
thob pa'o/ /shes rab pha rol phyin rnal 'byor/ /thabs ni snying rje'i bdag nyid do/ /'di ni byang chub sems rdo rje/ /sems dang sems byung rang bzhin gyis/ /dngos po med par bsgom pa'i dngos/ /
de la bsgom par brjod pa min/ /phreng ba med cing bya ba med/ /spungs pa med par brjod pa ste/ /rnal 'byor 'di la gnas pa ni/ /dbu ma'i mchog gi go 'phang ngo / /bla na med pa'i ye shes ni/ /bla
med zhes ni rim pa med/ /'dis ni 'khor ba rnam par grol/ /phy-ir mi ldog pa'i go 'phang mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes su gsungs/ /de yis rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub/ /skye ba 'di la grub

pa ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam 'gyur/ /khrag dang khu ba bza' ba ste/ /dri chen dri chu sha dang lnga/ /de yi tshe ni rgyas par 'gro/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam 'gyur/ /ba hu bi ha hU~M kA ra

ga ti ba hU~M bi ha/ rU pa d+hA ri Ne ba hU~M bi d+ha nA nA rany+dzi ta/ ba hU bi ha br-i t+ya gI tad+ya/ ba hu bi ha dzi ba san+ta t+ya she/ ShaHni she Sha sa twa bi na ya bi di g+b+han sa ma ra stu bi shud+d+he haHhaHhaHhaHhoH/ a hai sam+ba re sidz+dz+ha ma hU~M a ho/ shu~M ha

hU~M re u pa rU a la la la la hoH glu 'di dag ni blangs pa ste/ /brtag pa kun gyi bla na med/ /de yi tshe ni rgyas par 'gro/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i kha sbyor las de kho na nyid
gtan la dbab pa zhes bya ba ste brtag pa drug pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /de nyid rnal 'byor thams cad ni/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims brtson de bzhin/ /bsam gtan bzod pa shes rab dang / /
stobs dang de bzhin thabs dang ni/ /smon lam ye shes yang dag 'byung / /pha rol phyin pa bcu rdzogs pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa yi/ /sbyin pa rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs/ /tshul khrims gsum
gyi ngo bo nyid/ /bsam gtan rnam bzhir gsungs pa ste/ /brtson 'grus rnam pa lnga ru 'gyur/ /bzod pa rnam pa bcur shes bya/ /shes rab rnam pa drug du 'gyur/ /stobs ni rnam bcu rab tu gsungs/ /
thabs ni rnam pa lngar 'gyur te/ /smon lam gnyis su shes bya ste/ /ye shes rnam lngar gnas pa'o/ /chos dang mi 'jigs rdzas dang byams/ /sbyin pa rnam pa bzhi po ni/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa'o/ /
ngar 'dzin med cing khengs pa bral/ /bden pa gnyis med gnas pa ni/ /tshul khrims rnam gsum brjod pa ni/ /tshul khrims pha rol phyin par gsungs/ /gang gis rnal 'byor ma gnyis dang / /phyi yi

rnam pa gnyis su gsungs/ /bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa ni/ /dri chen dri chu de bzhin sha /khrag dang khu bar yang dag 'byung / /'di rnams brtson 'grus lnga po ni/ /dam tshig sgra yis brjod pa'o/ /tshig rtsub

brdzun dang ngag 'khyal dang / /chags sdang zhe sdang phrag dog dang / /nga rgyal khro dang de bzhin dbyen/ /'di bcu rnam par bshad pa ni/ /rdo rje can ni bzod bcas 'gyur/ /yang dag lta ba yang dag rtog /yang dag
ngag dang yang dag las/ /yang dag 'tsho dang yang dag rtsol/ /bdag gis mdo ru bsdus nas ni/ /shes rab rnam pa drug du brjod/ /dag pa'i stobs dang dran pa'i stobs/ /ting 'dzin stobs dang shes rab
stobs/ /lus kyi stobs dang ngag gi stobs/ /ye shes stobs dang smon lam stobs/ /brtson 'grus kyi ni stobs rnams te/ /'di rnams stobs ni bcu pa'o/ /ma skyes pa yi dge ba bskyed/ /skyes
pa'i mi dge yang dag spong / /mi dge ma skyes mi bskyed dang / /dge ba skyes pa 'phel ba ste/ /bzhi po thams cad chos rnams kyi/ /dge ba'i chos rnams gsungs pa ni/ /rdzogs par byed pa nyid dag go/ /
smon lam rnam pa gnyis su gnas/ /me long mnyam nyid so sor rtog /bya grub chos dbyings rnam par dag /ye shes rnam pa lnga ru 'gyur/ /'di rnams bcu bzhi po dag ni/ /pha rol phyin pa mdor
bsdus pa/ /bdag gis de nyid brjod pa ste/ /rdor can nyon cig gtan la dbab/ /bcu gnyis mtha' dang dgu yi mtha'/ /mgo nas rkang pa'i mthil bar du/ /de yi dbus su nges 'gyur ba/ /lte
ba'i dbus su rnam par gnas/ /rtag tu shar bar 'gyur ba ste/ /'di ru rdo rje can gyis mthong / /lus ngag sems kyi dbus dag tu/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'bar ba'o/ /steng gi sgo ru rtag gnas pa'o/ /
nyi ma'i 'od zer phreng ba can/ /cung zad lus las mthong ba med/ /'gal me'i 'khor lo'i gzugs can te/ /de nyid rnal 'byor lam gyis ni/ /rtag pa'i dus su rnam par gnas/ /de la dbyar gyi
dus med cing / /dpyid med ston yang yod ma yin/ /dgun med sos kyang med pa ru/ /rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu bsgom/ /sngags pas seng ge bzhin du spyod/ /sngags dang rgyud la ji ltar gnas/ /nya dang
sha ni bza' bar bya/ /chang gi btung ba mchog yin no/ /bcud kyis len gyi cho ga yis/ /sngags ni brjod par mi bya'o/ /mtshon cha'i gnas la dus rtag tu/ /mtshon bya'i mtshan nyid mtshon par bya/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsungs pa la 'khor lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i

kha sbyor zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdzogs s+ho// //dpal oT+yi na nas nges par 'byung ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud chen po stong phrag bcu gnyis pa las 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i

rgyal po chen po dpal in+d+ra b+hU ti'i zhabs kyis bkol cing gsal bar mdzad pa'o/ /bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba la chings yon tan 'bar gyis bsgyur te/ slad kyis de nyid kyi tshe paN+Di ta gnyis la yang gtugs te gtan la
phab pa'o// // //\u0f12//rgya gar skad du/ bid+yA d+ha ra Ni badzra yo gi nI sA d+ha na nA ma/ bod skad du/ rig pa 'dzin pa rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs shes

bya ba/ de nas yang dag par bshad bya ba ste/ 'bum phrag gsum pa las 'byung ba'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba chen mo ral pa gyen du brdzes pa'i rgyud las sgyu ma chen mo zhes bya ba ste/ snying ga nas spros pas rmi lam

lta bu'i lus dang longs spyod dam pa'i bde ba gnyis su med par gyur pa dang / 'dir de'i steng du ma ning gi sa bon blta ste/ sa bon de yongs su gyur pa las dmar mo zhal steng du phyogs shing gyen du gzigs pa/

zhabs g.yon pa la 'khyud pa'i thod pa'i phreng ba dang me tog gi phreng ba bcings pa'i phyag can ma/ me tog gi zhags pa g.yon pa'i phyag na'o/ /zhabs g.yas pa'i rting pa la reg pa'i g.yas pa na rdo rje'i phyag can ma

rgyan thams cad spangs pa mo/ rig pa 'dzin ma'i rig pa'i sbyor ba can ma/ spro zhing kun du bsdud pa'i lus can ma/ mAn+dA ra ba dang / mya ngan med pa dang / yongs su 'du rnams skyes par gyur pa'i rin po che brtsegs

pa'i khang par rab tu 'jug par bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /oM ba~M rdo rje phag mo'o/ /ha~M ya~M sngon mo gshin rje ma'o/ /hriM ma~M rmongs byed ma'o/ /hrIM hrIM kun du bskyod ma'o/ /hU~M hU~M kun du skrag ma'o/ /phaT phaT gtum mo

yan lag thams cad la mtshan ma'o/ /lte ba dang snying ga dang / de bzhin du kha dang / mgo bo dang / spyi bo ste 'di mtshon bya'o/ /rnal 'byor ma lnga po 'di rnams rdo rje sems dpar bshad do/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i go cha

bgos la rang bzhin bskyed pa'i gtor ma sbyin par bya'o/ /oM shrI he ru ka ma hA badzra A kaD+D+ha ya A kaD+D+ha ya/ pra be shA ya pra be shA ya/ to ShA ya/ to ShA ya/ sarba DA ki nI nA~M hra~M da ya hU~M phaT/ oM sarba bud d+ha DA ki nI pra tIts+tshe

ma~M bi la~M hU~M oM/ oM badzra DA ki nI pra tIts+tshe ma~M bi la~M hU~M hU~M/ oM rat+na DA ki nI pra tIts+tshe ma~M ba li hU~M trA~M/ oM pad+ma DA ki nI pra tIts+tshe ma~M ba li hU~M hrIH/ oM bi shwa DA ki nI pra tIts+tshe ma~M ba liM hU~M AH oM sarba yo gi ni pra tIts+tshe ma~M bi la~M hU~M hU~M/

ha ha hi hi badzra dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ oM badzra yo gi ni sa ma ya s+t+wa~M dr-i sh+ya rak+Sha rak+Sha hoH/ rig pa 'dzin ma'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po mkhas pa chen po dzA ya se na'i zhabs dang / lo ts+tsha ba btsun ba d+harma
yon tan gyis bsgyur ba'o// // @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ sa~M pu Ti nA ma ma hA tan tra/ bod skad du/ yang dag par sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di
skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das

kyis rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bye ba phrag brgyad bcu'i nang nas rdo rje snying po la gzigs te 'dzum ba mdzad do/ /'dzum ba mdzad ma thag tu de'i tshe rdo rje snying po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas
nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /ye shes kyi dbang po rgyud thams cad kyi gling gzhi'i gsang ba yang dag par
sbyor ba las byung ba'i mtshan nyid nyan par 'tshal lo/ /e ma'o rdo rje snying po legs so legs so/ /snying rje chen po legs so legs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi phung po
legs so legs so/ /gang zhig rgyud thams cad du gsang ba de thams cad 'dod pas zhus shig /de nas rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po de rnams rab tu 'dzum zhing
mig phye bas phyag 'tshal te/ rang gi the tshom yang dang yang du zhus pa/ rgyud ni thams cad ci zhes brjod/ /gling gzhi yang ni ji ltar lags/ /'di la gsang ba ci zhes gsungs/ /ji ltar yang
dag sbyor byung ming / /de la mtshan nyid ji ltar lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /rgyud dang thams cad de ni rgyud thams cad do/ /rgyud thams cad kyi sgras ni 'dus pa la sogs

pa'o/ /de rnams kyi gling gzhi ni byung bar nges pa zhes bya ba'i don to/ /khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin pa'i

phyir gsang ba'o/ /yang dag par sbyor ba ni thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid can no/ /de las byung ba ni yang dag par sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba'i don to/ /'byung ba ni skye ba ste/ de ltar
gnas pa dang g.yo ba'i dngos po'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid can du gyur pa'o/ /mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni 'dis mtshon par byed pa'o/ /yang na rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi yang dag par sbyor ba
las byung ba zhes bya ba'i sgras ni rdo rje sems dpar gsungs so/ /gsang ba zhes bya ba 'dis ni man ngag can gyi sngags btu ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /
thabs dang dang shes rab bdag nyid rgyud/ /de ni nga yis bshad kyis nyon/ /dang por stong nyid bsams pas ni/ /lus can rnams kyi dri ma bkru/ /gzugs kyi khams ni stong pa yi/ /sgra
la yang ni de yis bya/ /dri yi khams ni stong pa yi/ /ro la de nyid kyis ni bya/ /reg bya'i khams ni stong pa yi/ /yid la de nyid kyis ni bya/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ mig gi rang bzhin
stong pa yi/ /nang du rnam shes ji ltar lags/ /rna ba'i rang bzhin stong pa yi/ /nang du rnam shes ji ltar lags/ /sna yi rang bzhin stong pa yi/ /nang du rnam shes ji ltar lags/ /lce yi rang
bzhin stong pa yi/ /nang du rnam shes ji ltar lags/ /lus kyi rang bzhin stong pa yi/ /nang du rnam shes ji ltar lags/ /yid kyi rang bzhin stong pa yi/ /dbus su rnam shes ji ltar lags/ /
de phyir gzugs med lta ba med/ /sgra med thos pa po yang med/ /dri med snom pa po yang med/ /ro med myong ba po yang med/ /reg med reg pa po yang med/ /sems med sems las
byung ba'ang med/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /gnyis med gnyis ni rnam spangs pa'i/ /de nyid lam ni ji bzhin nyon/ /rtog ge med cing rnam shes med/ /de bzhin rtog ge bsam mi
rtogs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ni/ /nam mkha' lta bur mnyam ba nyid/ /nyan thos rnams kyis mi shes te/ /mi shes pa yi mun pas bsgribs/ /bag chags sad pa'i ye shes gang / /rang rgyal rnams
kyi sprul pa'o/ /gsang ba sangs rgyas spyod yul nyid/ /de rnams kun gyis mi shes so/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i 'jigs pa las/ /rgal bar 'gro ba'i sems kyis ni/ /lus kyi dbus su bskor
ba yi/ /rgal ba mtshon par gsungs pa ste/ /rnam shes ye shes sems kyis ni/ /mtshan nyid mtshan gzhi mtshan par byed/ /ye shes kyis ni shes bya blta/ /shes bya rnams kyis 'gro ba brtag /
'gro ba brtag pa'i sems kyis ni/ /ji ltar rang 'dod la sogs 'gro/ /'gro bar sngon gyi skye ba ni/ /stong phrag du ma dag tu 'gro/ /yo gis sngar gsungs mtshan nyid kyi/ /mtshan nyid stong par bsams
nas ni/ /lus kyi stong pa'i zhing sogs la/ /blo dang ldan pas sa bon gdab/ /rtsa yi mdzes spyi las byung ba/ /de ni rdul bral rab tu grags/ /dag pa'i shel gyi 'od dang mnyam/ /byang chub sems
ni 'od gsal ba/ /ye shes lnga yi dngos de nyid/ /yungs kar gyi ni sbom phra tsam/ /de yi nang du gnas pa'i lha/ /mi gsal gsal ba'i rang bzhin can/ /ma mo phyed pa mchog tu phra/ /thig le'i
gzugs kyi yid kyi dngos/ /snying gi dbus su rtag gnas shing / /'od zer ldan zhing gzi brjid che/ /bcu gnyis mtha' dang dgu yi mthar/ /rkang mthil mgo bo med par ni/ /thag pa gcig ni rnam phyung

nas/ /lte ba'i dbus su rnam par gnas/ /cha ni lnga pa tsam nyid ni/ /klu dbang dbyibs su rgyas pa la/ /de yi cha yang phye nas ni/ /rdo rje'i dbus su rnam phyung ste/ /skye gnas dbus su sa bon gnas/ /
chos dbyings khu bar byas nas ni/ /sgo ni dgu po thams cad du/ /de ni rim pas 'pho bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin me ni tshangs pa'i dngos/ /sa yi sa bon gnyis kyis ni/ /mig la de nyid sbyar bar bya/ /
rlung gi stong sogs sa bon gyi/ /sems kyis sna dang rna ba sogs/ /bdud rtsi chu yi sa bon lce/ /dbang por gtso bo dbang phyug nyid/ /mgrin par gti mug sa bon te/ /lag par nyon mongs de bzhin no/ /
g.yo ba snying gi gnas rnams su/ /phyugs bdag lte ba'i rtsa bar ni/ /yan lag brgyad kyi sa bon gyis/ /yan lag brgyad kyi cho gas 'dzin/ /brtan sogs g.yo bar bcas pa yi/ /'gro kun khyab
par byed pas khyab/ /tshangs sogs lha dang lha min rnams/ /de yi gdan du gyur pa yin/ /gang la gtso bo spyod gyur pa'i/ /khyim ni b+ha ga zhes su gsungs/ /ji srid lus la rnam gnas pa/ /
de yi las dang las min 'gyur/ /dge dang mi dge gang cung zad/ /byas pa'i las ni thams cad byed/ /rnal 'byor mnyam pa nyid du gsungs/ /rab tu sbyor ba bsgom ba yin/ /gang tshe las gyi
lus bcom pa/ /de ltar lha ru 'gyur ba yin/ /gang gis brtan dang g.yo khyab pa/ /des ni de tshe rang gis nus/ /nam mkha' lta bur mnyam nyid ni/ /de yi kha dog shes par bya/ /mya ngan 'das
gnas dpa' bo ni/ /gos pa med cing dri ma spangs/ /ma dang sring mo nyid dang yang / /bu mo de bzhin gnyen mo dang / /bram ze mo dang rgyal rigs dang / /rje'u mo de bzhin dmangs mo dang / /
gar ma tshos ma g.yung mo dang / /de bzhin du ni gdol pa mo/ /thabs dang shes rab cho ga yis/ /de nyid rig pas mchod par bya/ /ji ltar bye bar mi 'gyur bar/ /rab tu 'bad pas bsten par bya/ /ma
gsang sbrul dang chom rkun sogs/ /sa la spyod pas sdug bsngal byed/ /rigs kyi dbye bas phye nas ni/ /phyag rgya rnam pa lngar ni gsungs/ /bram ze skye gnyis rigs skyes ma/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid
du gsungs/ /rgyal rigs ma ni rgyal po'i rus/ /rma bya zla sogs rigs las skyes/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi zhes byar grags/ /rje'u mo ba glang skyong ba ste/ /las kyi rigs las skyes par gsungs/ /
dmangs mo yang ni bran mo ste/ /rnam par snang mdzad chen por gsungs/ /gar ma pad ma'i rigs nyid do/ /tshos ma de bzhin las kyi rigs/ /g.yung mo rdo rje'i rigs su bshad/ /rin chen gdol pa
mor shes bya/ /phyag rgya lngar ni rnam par nges/ /'di rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs/ /mdor bsdus pas ni brjod par bya/ /dpal ldan de bzhin nyid gshegs shing / /de bzhin slar yang
gshegs pa nyid/ /'dis ni shes rab rigs pas ni/ /de bzhin gshegs par mngon par brjod/ /rigs ni rnam pa lnga ru gsungs/ /rigs ni brgya dang mtha' yas dang / /sku gsungs thugs
kyi dbye ba yis/ /phyi nas rnam pa gsum du 'gyur/ /rigs dang 'byung ba lnga rnams dang / /phung po lnga yi rang bzhin gyis/ /rdo rje rin chen pad nor bu/ /'dzin pa'i rim pa'i rigs rnams so/ /
sgom pa po med bsgom bya med/ /sngags med lha yang yod ma yin/ /spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ /sngags dang lhar ni yang dag gnas/ /rnam snang mi bskyod don yod dang / /rin chen dpag med
sems dpa'o/ /tshangs pa khyab 'jug zhi ba dang / /thams cad sangs rgyas de nyid brjod/ /tshangs pa sgrib bral sangs rgyas nyid/ /'jug phyir khyab 'jug brjod par bya/ /zhi ba rtag tu dge ba ste/ /
thams cad kun gyi bdag nyid gnas/ /dam pa'i bde bas de nyid de/ /dga' ba rtogs phyir rnam sangs rgyas/ /gang phyir lus las byung ba nyid/ /lha zhes mngon par brjod par bya/ /'di la b+ha ga mnga'
ba'i phyir/ /bcom ldan 'das zhes brjod par bya/ /b+ha ga rnam pa drug tu brjod/ /dbang phyug la sogs yon tan kun/ /yang na nyon mongs la sogs pa/ /'joms pa'i phyir na bcom ldan 'das/ /
gang phyir skye 'gro bskyed pa'i phyir/ /shes rab ma zhes brjod par bya/ /gang phyir skal ba ston pa'i phyir/ /shes rab de nyid sring mo nyid/ /shes rab tshos mar brjod pa ni/ /sems can thams cad
'tshed pa'i phyir/ /btso blag ma zhes de bzhin brjod/ /yon tan 'jo bar gsungs pa'i phyir/ /shes rab bu mor brjod par bya/ /snying rje chen pos g.yo ba'i phyir/ /shes rab gar mar brjod par
bya/ /gang phyir bcom ldan mi reg pa/ /de phyir g.yung mor brjod par bya/ /A li kI li rab smras pa/ /bzlas pa smra bar yang dag bshad/ /rkang pa'i rjes ni dkyil 'khor yin/ /nyed phyir dkyil
'khor brjod par bya/ /lag pa sgyur ba phyag rgya yin/ /sor mo nyed pa'ang de bzhin no/ /gang phyir rnam sems bsam gtan ni/ /gang sems de ni bsam gtan no/ /pha las bde ba gang thob pa/ /
de yi bad ba rang gis bza'/ /bde ba gang gis 'ching ba 'dir/ /de yi bde ba bsam gtan brjod/ /brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa la sogs pa'i bsgom
pa'i de kho na'i rab tu byed pa ste dang po'o// // de nas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun brjod par bya'o/ /nang gi lus dang / phyi'i lus dang / phyi nang gnyis ka'i lus la

lus kyi rjes su blta zhing gnas pa'i phyir yang dag par rab tu shes te/ ma rig pa la sogs pas yid gnyis su gyur pa'i 'dul ba'i 'jig rten la dran pa dang ldan pa'o/ /nang gi tshor ba dang / phyi'i tshor ba dang /

phyi nang gnyis ka'i tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing gnas pa'i phyir yang dag par rab tu shes te/ ma rig pa la sogs pas yid gnyis su gyur pa'i 'dul ba'i 'jig rten la dran pa dang ldan pa'o/ /nang
gi chos rnams dang / phyi'i chos rnams dang / phyi nang gnyis ka'i chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su blta zhing gnas pa'i phyir yang dag par rab tu shes te/ ma rig pa la sogs pas yid gnyis su gyur pa'i
'dul ba'i 'jig rten la dran pa dang ldan pa'o/ /nang gi sems dang / phyi'i sems dang / phyi nang gnyis ka'i sems la sems kyi rjes su blta zhing gnas pa'i phyir yang dag par rab tu shes te/ ma rig
pa la sogs pas yid gnyis su gyur pa'i 'dul ba'i 'jig rten la dran pa dang ldan pa'o/ /'di rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'o/ /sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i
phyir 'dun pa skyed do/ /'bad do/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems rab tu 'jog go/ /smon lam yang dag par 'debs so/ /sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do/ /'bad
do| brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems rab tu 'jog go/ /smon lam yang dag par 'debs so/ /dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do/ /'bad do/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /
sems rab tu 'jog go/ /smon lam yang dag par 'debs so/ /de ltar dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas par bya ba'i phyir thabs tshad med pas bsgoms pas yongs su gang ba'i phyir yongs su gang
bar gyur pas bsgom pa dam pa 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do/ /'bad do/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems rab tu 'jog go/ /smon lam yang dag par 'debs so/ /'di rnams ni yang dag

par spong ba bzhi'o/ /'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom par bya ste/ bye brag phyed pas nges par 'byung ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral bas nges par 'byung

ba dang / 'gog pas nges par 'byung ba dang / rnam par byang bar gyur pas bdag gi 'dun pa nub par 'gyur zhing shin du rab tu 'jog pa ma yin pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan

pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom par bya ste/ bye brag phyed pas nges par 'byung ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral bas nges par 'byung ba dang / 'gog pas nges par 'byung ba dang / rnam par byang bar gyur

pas bdag gi brtson 'grus nub par 'gyur zhing shin du rab tu 'jog pa ma yin pa'o/ /dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom par bya ste/ bye brag phyed pas
nges par 'byung ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral bas nges par 'byung ba dang / 'gog pas nges par 'byung ba dang / rnam par byang bar gyur pas bdag gi dpyod pa nub par 'gyur zhing shin tu rab tu 'jog
pa ma yin pa'o/ /sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom par bya ste/ bye brag phyed pas nges par 'byung ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral bas
nges par 'byung ba dang / 'gog pas nges par 'byung ba dang / rnam par byang bas nges par 'byung bas bdag gi sems nub par 'gyur zhing shin du rab tu 'jog pa ma yin pa'o/ /'di rnams ni rdzu 'phrul
gyi rkang pa bzhi ste/ 'dod par dpyod pa dang bcas pa'o/ /'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba la dad par byed de/ rang gi las kyi rnam par smin pa la so sor yid ches par gyur pa gang zhig de ltar
las byed par 'gyur ba dge ba'am sdig pa de dang de'i las kyi rnam par smin pa so sor nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i phyir de ni 'tsho ba'i rgyur yang sdig pa'i las mngon 'du mi byed pa'o/ /'di ni dad
pa'i dbang por gsungs so/ /gang zhig chos rnams la dad pa'i dbang pos dad par byed pa'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus kyi dbang pos shes par byed do/ /'di ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang por gsungs
so/ /gang zhig chos rnams la brtson 'grus kyi dbang pos shes pa de'i chos rnams ni dran pa'i dbang pos rab tu 'jig par mi byed pa'o/ /'di ni dran pa'i dbang por gsungs so/ /gang
zhig chos rnams la dran pas rab tu 'jig par mi byed pa de'i chos rnams ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang pos rtse gcig tu byed pa'o/ /'di ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang por gsungs so/ /gang zhig chos
rnams la ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang pos rtse gcig tu byed pa de'i chos rnams ni shes rab kyi dbang pos so sor rig pa ste/ de ni chos de dang de rnams la so sor rtog pa skye bar 'gyur ro/ /'di ni
shes rab kyi dbang por gsungs so/ /dbang po lnga po 'di rnams 'phel ba ni stobs lnga ru 'gyur te/ dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs
dang / shes rab kyi stobs te/ 'di rnams ni stobs lnga'o/ /de la byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa yang
dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin du sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge
'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btung snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/ bye brag phyed pas nges par 'byung ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral bas nges par 'byung ba dang / 'gog
pas nges par 'byung ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i kun nas rnam par byang bar gyur pa dang / chos rab tu 'byed pa ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sogs pa bsgom pa'o/ /de la 'phags
pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang zhe na/ yang dag pa'i lta ba ni gang zhig 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/ bdag tu lta bas kun nas bslang ba ma yin pa dang / sems can med pa dang / 'tsho ba med pa dang /

gso ba med pa dang / skyes bu med pa dang / gang zag med pa dang / shed las skyes med pa dang / shed bu med pa dang / byed pa po med pa dang / tshor ba po med pa'i lta bas kun nas bslang ba chad pa ma yin

pa dang / rtag par lta bas kun bslang ba ma yin pa dang / srid pa dang bral ba'i lta bas kun nas bslang ba dang / rigs su lung bstan pa'i lta ba'i kun nas bslang ba dang / ji srid 'khor ba ma yin zhing mya
ngan las 'das pa'i yang ma yin pa'i lta bas kun nas bslang ba ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i lta bar gsungs so/ /gang zhig yang dag pa'i rtog pa ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti

mug dang / nyon mongs pas kun nas bslang ba'i rtog pa de ni yang dag pa'i rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ /yang dag pa'i rtog pa gang zhig tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang /
rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung pos kun nas slong ba de'i yang dag pa'i rtog pa de ni yang dag pa'i rtog par 'gyur te/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i rtog par gsungs so/ /gang zhig tshig gis

bdag la gdung bar mi bya zhing gzhan la gdung bar mi bya ba dang / bdag la nyon mongs par mi bya zhing gzhan dag la nyon mongs par mi bya ba dang / bdag la mi dpya zhing gzhan dag la yang dpya bar mi bya ba
ste/ de mnyam par gzhag pa dang ldan pas tshig dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / gang gi tshig gis yang dag pa'i 'phags par 'jug par 'gyur ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i ngag ces gsungs so/ /gang zhig
las nag po dang nag pa'i rnam par smin pa de'i las mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang / gang zhig las dkar ba dang dkar po'i rnam par smin pa de'i las mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang / gang zhig las dkar
po dang / nag po'i rnam par smin pa de'i las mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang / gang zhig las dkar po dang / nag po dang / dkar po'i rnam par smin pa dang / nag po zad pa'i bsam pas gnas pa
de'i las mngon par 'du byed de/ dam pa'i las lta bur 'gyur ba ni yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha'o/ gang gi tshe 'phags pa lta bur dul ba dang / yon tan yang dag pa'i chas zhum zhing dul ba dang / kha

gsag med pa dang / mang du smra ba ma yin pa dang / gtam la mi dga' ba dang / rang gi spyod pa'i khrims dang / 'jig rten pha rol gyi dbang phyug dang ldan pa dang / bdag gi rnyed pa kha na ma tho ba med pas bdag chog
par 'dzin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bka'i gnang bas 'tsho ba ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho bar gsungs so/ /rtsol ba ni gang zhig brdzun ba dang / 'phags pas ma gnang ba dang / 'dod chags dang /

zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa rjes su bsten par mi 'dod pa ni rtsol ba ste/ rtsol ba gang zhig yang dag pa'i 'phags pa'i lam gyi bden par 'jug cing mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba dang /
so so'i gnas su skyed par byed pa de ni rtsol bar yang dag par rjes su 'brang ba ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa'i rtsol bar gsungs so/ /gang la nye bar gnas pa de ni rab tu mi g.yo ba dang / lus drang pos
kyog po ma yin pa dang / 'khor ba'i skyon sna tshogs la sogs pa dbang du byed pa ston cing / mya ngan las 'das pa'i gnas 'dod pa'i dran pa ni mi brjed pa ste/ 'di ni 'phags pa'i yang dag
pa'i lam la sbyar ba'o/ /'di ni yang dag pa'i dran par gsungs so/ /yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas nas sems can thams cad rnam par thar bar bya ba'i phyir yang
dag par gnas te/ mya ngan las 'das pa mnan pa'o/ /'dis ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes gsungs so/ /de nyid yang dag bshad pa ni/ /dga' ba la sogs sa rnams te/ /dbang po la sogs rang
bzhin gyi/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas/ /phung po la sogs khyad par gyi/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni gnas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni
mchog tu 'bab/ /byang sems sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis/ /gang tshe 'dir ni gang gyur pa/ /dbang po phung po 'byung ba yi/ /sangs rgyas de yi de ma thag /rang lus nyid la sangs
rgyas nyid/ /gzhan gang du'ang mi gnas so/ /lus las gzhan du sangs rgyas nyid/ /mi shes pa yis bsgribs par brjod/ /ye shes chen po rang lus gnas/ /rtog pa thams cad yang dag spangs/ /
dngos po kun la khyab pa po/ /lus gnas lus la ma skyes pa'o/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ lus la rtsa du lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'khor lo bzhi yi rab dbye
bas/ /brgya phrag gcig dang nyi shu lhag /byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin gyis/ /rtsa rnams sum bcu rtsa gnyis mchog /gsungs pa/ 'di lta ste/ mi phyed ma zhes brjod pa dang / phra gzugs ma dang /

brtse ba ma dang / g.yon pa ma dang / thung ngu ma dang / rus sbal skyes ma dang / bsgom pa ma dang / dbang ma dang / skyon ma dang / 'jug ma dang / ma mo dang / mtshan mo dang bsil sbyin ma dang / tsha ba ma dang /

brkyang ma dang / ro ma dang / kun 'dar ma dang / 'bab ma dang / rangs ma dang / mdog ma dang / gzugs can ma dang / spyi ma dang / rgyu sbyin ma dang / sbyor bral ma dang / sdug gu ma dang / grub ma dang / 'tshed
ma dang / de bzhin du yid bzang ma dang / sum skor ma dang / 'dod ma dang / khyim ma dang / gtum mo dang / bdud 'dral ma'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rtsa 'di dag ji lta bu lags/ srid gsum yongs su
gyur pa ste/ gzung ba dang 'dzin pa thams cad yongs su spangs pa'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang /
stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mthar thug pa la sogs pa'i rnam par 'grel ba byang chub kyi sems 'jug pa zhes bya ba ste rab tu
byed pa gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byas nas phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gsang ba'i ye shes bla med
pa/ /snying po bcom ldan bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas/ rgyud thams cad kyi snying po ye shes mar
me rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rgyud thams cad kyi gsang ba 'di bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa ni/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /
sangs rgyas kun dngos sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog /'di ni bcom ldan rnal 'byor te/ /brtan pa rtag pa mchog tu yang / /yid srub so sor skyes pa nyid/ /rtag
tu rang bzhin mnan dka' ba/ /sna tshogs las kyi rnal 'byor gyis/ /sna tshogs cho ga 'dod pa yi/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin sogs rnams/ /sems can rnams ni 'dul bar brjod/ /
sangs rgyas kun sogs brtan dang g.yo/ /thams cad dngos po srid pa 'di/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom/ /'dis ni sgyu ma'i rnal 'byor
gyis/ /thams cad las ni sna tshogs mchog /sangs rgyas sogs pas 'dul ba'i phyir/ /dngos grub sems can kun don mchog /rang gi ngo bos yongs bsgyur bas/ /bud med
sgyu ma thams cad 'grub/ /sna tshogs sgyu ma'i phyag rgya 'di/ /mkha' 'gro ma zhes kla klo'i skad/ /Dai bai hA ya sar 'gro bar/ /skad dbyings 'di ni rnam par brtag /nam mkha'
kun du spyod 'grub pas/ /mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags/ /kun nas sna tshogs phyag rgya ste/ /kun las sna tshogs sdom pa'o/ /rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid/ /pad ma de bzhin pad ma
'dzin/ /nor bu nor bu 'dzin pa nyid/ /'di rnams kyi ni rigs rnams yin/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa rdul dang bral ba'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di bka' stsal pa/ stong min stong pa min pa'ang min/ /dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur te/ /shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba/ /thabs
ni snying rje'i bdag nyid de/ /de nas mdzes pa'i snying rje thabs/ /shes rab pha rol phyin gsal ba/ /rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams la/ /dngos po med cing bsgom pa'ang med/ /rnam rtog
med pas rtag mos pas/ /brtag pa kun gyis brtag par bya/ /rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams la/ /sems can don ni yongs su brtag /de bzhin gshegs pa kun bdag chos/ /chos
can med cing chos nyid med/ /sgra brnyan lta bur mnyam pa nyid/ /de nas 'di ni chos dag 'byung / /de nas theg pa chen po las byung ba'i bsgom pas yon tan rgyas pa rnams kyis dus gsum gyi
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis yang dag par bstod pa/ rnal 'byor gyi bdag po sems can grol bar mdzad pa la bstod cing phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can
bdag nyid skyes pa gcig par mdzad pa la bstod cing phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i gti mug gcod par mdzad pa la bstod cing phyag 'tshal lo/ /de kho na nyid thams cad kyi ye
shes gcig tu ston par mdzad pa la bstod cing phyag 'tshal te/ bdag rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang mchod pa byas nas phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /chos rnams thams cad
gcig pa'i sku'i/ /snying po bcom ldan bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dbang po gang dang gang lam nyid/ /de dang de yi rang bzhin 'gyur/ /mnyam par ma gzhag
rnal 'byor gyis/ /rtag par shin du mnyam gzhag nyid/ /gang phyir thams cad bdag nyid kyi/ /rnam shes phung por gnas pa ni/ /skyes bu tha mal sems rmongs pa/ /la las so sor rtog mi
nus/ /sems dang sems byung sems kyi dngos/ /ye shes shes bya rang bzhin can/ /'bras bu rnams la byed pa nyid/ /chos dang chos can bsgom pa nyid/ /gang phyir chos ni du mas ni/ /chu
bo'i rgyun ni rgya mtsho ltar/ /thar pa nyid ni gcig pu yin/ /mang po dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar nang du rnam gnas pa/ /bla ma'i zhal las rnyed par 'gyur/ /de kho na nyid mdor bstan pa
ste rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o// // de nas rgyud rnams thams cad du/ /gtan la phab pa rab bshad bya/ /sems can kun la mnyam pa'i phyir/ /gru gsum rgya cha'i
gzugs can nyid/ /tshangs sogs lha dang lha min bcas/ /de rnams kyi ni gnas su 'gyur/ /de nyid shes rab pha rol phyin/ /kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs can ma/ /de nyid yul las rnam par
'das/ /srog chags kun gyi snying la gnas/ /de phyir de rgyas ci zhig bya/ /mdor bsdus pas ni sangs rgyas nyid/ /bskal pa bye ba grangs med pas/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas
gang thob pa/ /gang gis dam pa'i bde bas khyod/ /skye ba 'dir ni thob par 'gyur/ /yang na rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid/ /yang na 'khor los sgyur ba 'am/ /'dis ni dngos grub chen po brgyad/ /
gzhan yang yid la 'dod pa yang / /gti mug chags dang nga rgyal dang / /phrag dog dang ni nyon mongs lngas/ /sems can so sor bcings pa gang / /rang gi yan lag nyid kyis 'joms/ /'dis ni
'gro drug sems can bcings/ /'khor bar 'khor zhing skye ba nyid/ /nyon mongs pas ni rmongs gyur pas/ /sdig pa du ma byed par 'gyur/ /de phyir 'di bcom cing mkhyen nyid/ /sangs rgyas
kyis sprul rigs pas ni/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor lhung ba yi/ /sbyor bral sdug bsngal mthong nas ni/ /thabs dang shes rab sprul pa'i rgyus/ /nyon mongs rnams ni yid ches 'gyur/ /
mtshon pa 'di ni 'bras bur gyur/ /khams gsum du ni dri med snang / /gang dang gang gis gnas gyur pa/ /de ni de yi ngo bo can/ /bud shing bsregs pa'i rigs pas ni/ /dgyes pa'i rgyal ba gar
mkhan mchog /phung po khams dang skye mched rnams/ /'di nyid rnam dag mtshon pa 'di/ /ji ltar dgra bo nus pa la/ /dgra bo nus pas de bsnun pa/ /gti mug dag pas gt-i mug ste/ /
zhe sdang dag pas zhe sdang nyid/ /'dod chags dag pas 'dod chags te/ /nga rgyal rnam dag nga rgyal che/ /phrag dog dag pas phrag dog nyid/ /thams cad rnam dag rdor 'dzin mgon/ /de yi
ngo bo rnam dag pa/ /nyon mongs lnga ni mnyam par 'gyur/ /de ltar rigs ni lnga rnams dang / /ye shes lnga dang sangs rgyas lnga/ /'di las rdo rje snying po dang / /khro bo khams gsum sems can
skye/ /nang gi dbye ba 'di nyid ni/ /bla ma'i zhal las rnyed par 'gyur/ /bla ma dmad pa'i sems can rnams/ /sngags dang phyag rgya rnyed mi 'gyur/ /gang zhig shin du gsal bas ni/ /'dzam gling
de 'dir sangs rgyas bsngags/ /gru gsum dag pa e yi dbyibs/ /dbus su dgyes pa'i e ba~M yin/ /gru gsum dkyil 'khor nyams dga' bar/ /rdo rje ra li rnam par byung / /btsun mo'i
b+ha ga zhes kyang bya/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas zhes byar bshad/ /de yi nang song pad ma ni/ /'dab ma brgyad pa snying por bcas/ /de la A li kA li 'dres/ /sde tshan brgyad ni rnam par gnas/ /
sngags kyi gzugs kyis lus can gyi/ /las kyi tshogs ni byed par 'gyur/ /yi ge rnams ni lnga bcu nyid/ /rig byed rnams la nye bar gnas/ /sngags rnams nyid dang rgyud rnams dang / /phyi rol
tshul gyi bstan bcos kyi/ /rdo rje snying po'i rang bzhin 'di/ /gzhan du a las cung zad med/ /a ka tsa Ta ta pa ya sha /sde tshan dga' ba lnga bcu yang / /mnyam pa dag tu sprul pa rnams/ /rdo rje
ra li pad mar son/ /'dab ma brgyad po phyogs rnams dang / /mtshams rnams su ni 'di rnams rigs/ /de rnams dbus su ze 'bru la/ /dam pa'i dbang phyug ma yod do/ /sde tshan brgyad po rnams
kyis ni/ /yi ge dam pa yongs su bskor/ /a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog /don chen sde tshan gtso bo ni/ /lus can rnams kyi sngags kun ni/ /'di nyid las ni yang dag byung / /gang zhig
ral gri mig smin dang / /rkang byug ri lu rkang 'og dang / /gnod sbyin mo yi yan lag ma/ /'jig rten gsum gyi khongs su rgyu/ /dngul chu'i 'gro bas rjes su 'brang / /gang zhig thams

cad mthu che ba/ /rang gi khyim du lnga bcu 'dod pa dang ldan par 'grub bo/ /de ni sde tshan brgyad nang son/ /dbyangs mchog sde tshan bdag nyid 'byin/ /skye bo rnams kyi tshig rgyas pa/ /gang zhig cung zad
rtogs bya ba/ /de kun sngags kyi gzugs kyis ni/ /de phyir rab tu skye bar 'gyur/ /lus can rnams ni thams cad kyi/ /sgra ni sngags zhes brjod par bya/ /sna tshogs mdud pa'i gnas chen
las/ /chos kyi ra li rnam par 'byung / /dngos grub rdzu 'phrul rnam gnas pa'i/ /sngags dang nges pa gang yang med/ /rang bzhin gyis ni ma skyes pa'i/ /sngags kyi yi 'bru dbang phyug mchog /
yang dag sbyor 'byung mtshan nyid ni/ /de nas mchog tu rab bshad bya/ /e ni sa ru shes par bya/ /las kyi phyag rgya spyan ma nyid/ /snying rje chen mo thabs chen mo/ /rang bzhin sna tshogs spyod yul
ma/ /lte bar sna tshogs 'dam skyes la/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lor rnam par gnas/ /ba~M ni chu ru shes par bya/ /chos kyi phyag rgya mA ma kI/ /byams pa dang ni smon lam tshul/ /lha mo rdo rje'i
rigs gtso ma/ /snying gar chu skyes 'dab brgyad la/ /chos kyi 'khor lor yang dag gnas/ /ma ni me ru brjod pa ste/ /phyag rgya chen mo gos dkar mo/ /dga' dang stobs kyi rnal 'byor gyis/ /
lha mo pad ma'i rigs byung ma/ /lkog mar chu skyes 'dab brgyad gnyis/ /longs spyod 'khor lor yang dag gnas/ /ya ni rlung gi rang bzhin te/ /nyon mongs thams cad rab 'joms byed/ /
dam tshig phyag rgya chen mor nges/ /lha mo las kyi rigs gtso ma/ /btang snyoms ye shes rnal 'byor gyis/ /sgrol ma 'khor ba sgrol ba mo/ /'dam skyes 'dab ma sum bcu gnyis/ /bde chen 'khor
lo chen por gnas/ /e ni shes rab brjod par bya/ /ba~M ni thabs dang ldan pa nyid/ /ba~M gyis rnam par brgyan pa nyid/ /e ni nges par mdzes par 'gyur/ /thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyis/ /
steng dang 'og tu snyoms par 'jug /e nyid dang ni ba~M nyid dag /gnyis gnyis su ni brjod pa nyid/ /'di skad ces bya ba'i tshig gi phrad ni de skad ces gsungs nas zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa'i
rgyud kyi tshogs la bsnyegs so zhes brjod do/ /bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba ni de skad du 'dod chags chen po 'di la rtag tu gnas pa'o/ /shru zhes bya ba ni 'dzag par gsungs so/ /ta zhes bya ba
ni gang yang bde ba chen po'i mgon po'o/ /bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis thos pa'i phyir rna ba'i ye shes kyis thos pa yin gyi/ rtogs pa ni ma yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das mi
rtogs pa'i skyon gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /sdud par byed pa dang 'chad pa po dag dbyer med par 'gyur ro/ /yang na rtogs pa nyid ni gdul bya'i skye bo'i dbang du byas

nas 'chad pa po nyid sdud par byed pa yin te/ 'chad pa po nga chos kyang nga / /rang gi tshogs ldan nyan pa nga / /de dag ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ /gang du bde ba chen po'i mgon po gar mdzad pa'i tshe/
gcig nyid gcig dang du ma'i ro zhes bya ba'i tshig gis rol par mdzad pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das kyis gang cung zad gsungs pa de bdag gis gcig na zhes bya ba ni dus gcig nyid
la'o/ /gcig na zhes bya ba ni skad cig nyid la'o/ /thos pa zhes bya ba ni lhag par son pa ste/ 'dis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnyed do zhes bya bar bsnyegs so/ /dus zhes bya ba ni
dus tshod ces gsungs so/ /dus ni rnam pa gsum du brjod/ /bde ba'i dus dang sdug bsngal dus/ /bsam gyis mi khyab dus nyid do/ /'o ma'i rgyun ltar sna bug tu/ /'ong ba bde ba'i dus su
gsungs/ /me yi gzugs kyis 'gro ba nyid/ /sdug bsngal dus dang de gcig grags/ /gcig ni lhan cig med pa yin/ /dus ni bsam gyis mi khyab 'gyur/ /'dod chags med cing chags
bral med/ /dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /de la 'dod chags nus mtshan nyid/ /'dod chags bral ba 'gog par gsungs/ /'di bral dbu mar mi rtog pas/ /'di gsum dmigs
par mi 'gyur ro/ /'dod chags nyid dang chags bral nyid/ /'dres par gyur pa rnyog pa med/ /de bzhin 'dod chags chags bral las/ /ro mnyam gcig pu'i skad cig ma/ /dngos po kun
gyi ro mnyam pa/ /bsgom pa'i dus ni gcig tu gsungs/ /'di lta ste/ dbang phyug dang / gzugs dang / grags pa dang / dpal dang / ye shes dang / brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa ste/ b+ha ga
drug ces gsungs so/ /de 'di la mnga' ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das so/ /yang na gang zhig mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi chos de rnams bcom pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das so/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rnams dang / de rnams nyid kyi snying po dang / de nyid kyi rdo rje dang / de nyid kyi btsun mo dang / de'i b+ha ga de la bzhugs so/ /kye bcom ldan 'das
bzhugs so zhes bya bas ci gsungs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ro gcig pa thabs sna tshogs kyis 'dul ba'i skye bo'i yid
'phrog pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i don to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi snying po rdo rje'i rang bzhin gang gi chos kyi 'byung gnas la/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan
'das bzhugs pa de'i tshe bdag gis thos pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ shes rab gang gis nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa 'joms pa de'i phyir shes rab b+ha gar gsungs te/ b+ha ga der de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad dang btsun mo lhan cig du bzhugs so/ /e ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /kun mkhyen ye shes bla na med/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bde don gang / /btsun mo nye bar
mdzad pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba'i yig 'bru ni/ chos kyi thog mar rtag tu yang dag par gnas pa ste/ dag pa dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dngos grub
skyed par byed pa'o/ /lag na rdo rje ma bshad pa de ngas khyod la bshad do/ /tshig 'bru 'di rnams kyis sems can rnams 'khor ba las pha rol du shin du ring bar 'gro ba mngon du mtshon par
mdzad pa dang / mngon du ma mdzad pa de nub pa'i sems kyis skye ba 'dir sangs rgyas nyid dam/ rdo rje sems dpa' thob par 'gyur te/ gang dag bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas ma thob
pa de ni bde bar gshegs pa ste sangs rgyas yin no/ /mtshan gzhi mtshon par byed pa ni sems dpar yang dag par gsungs te/ sdang bas bsten pa tsam gyis mnar med par rab tu
ltung bar 'gyur bas na/ kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyi sems kyi ro spang bar bya'o/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyis srid pa'i 'jigs pa las 'das pa'i sgrub pa po dpal dang
ldan pas dag pa'i sems bsgom par byed de/ thabs dang shes rab kyi sbyor ba 'dis ji ltar yang dag par thob pa dag pa'i yang dag par rig pa'i bdag nyid can gyi mtshan gzhi thabs dang
shes rab kyi nus pas nam mkha' dang mnyam zhing gnas gsum du snang ba ste/ de'i mtshan gzhi ni mchog par dka' ba dang / thams cad du son zhing rgyu dang rkyen spangs pas yid bzhin gyi
nor bu lta bur 'jig rten gyi rang dang gzhan gyi don byed de dngos grub thams cad kyi mchog go/ /rgyud thams cad kyi gling gzhi gsang ba dpal yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba'i brtag pa'i
rgyal po ste dang po rdzogs s+ho// // de nas yang dag rab bshad bya/ /sgrub pa po la phan don du/ /gang gis slob ma dbang bskur ba'i/ /cho ga yang ni bshad par bya/ /dang
por lha yi bdag nyid kyi/ /rnal 'byor pas ni nor 'dzin sbyang / /'bad pas hU~M las rdo rje can/ /byas te phyi nas dkyil 'khor bri/ /tshal dang skye bo med gnas dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i

khyim dang yang / /khang stong dang ni khyim nang du/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bzheng bar bya/ /rdul tshon dam pa nyid dang ni/ /yang na 'bring po nyid kyis te/ /rin chen lnga yi bdag nyid phyes/ /yang na 'bras la sogs pas bri/ /

dkyil 'khor khru gsum bya ba dang / /mthe bong gsum ni lhag par bya/ /der ni rigs lnga las byung ba'i/ /rig ma bzang po gzhug par bya/ /sngags kyi lam gyi rjes btsal bas/ /gang tshe mkhas pas dbang bskur ba/ /
sangs rgyas kun gyi mngon sum du/ /dkyil 'khor bde bar gshegs gnas su/ /'jig rten khams ni mtha' yas bdag /blo dang ldan pas de bzhin blang / /rang byin brlab pa'i gnas thob pas/ /dam
tshig nyams pas 'jigs pa yis/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis don dam las/ /sngags kyi lam ni de bzhin gsungs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs lha'i/ /dam tshig rim pa shin du ring / /de phyir don

kun la 'bad pas/ /dbang don rgyal ba'i bdag nyid skyes/ /rdo rje slob dpon yon tan mtsho/ /ji bzhin sbyor bas gsol ba gdab/ /yang na ma dang sring bu mo/ /bu sring mo yi bu mo nyid/ /'di nang gang de ji lta bar/ /

rnyed nas bsgrub pa nyid du gyis/ /yang na mngon du 'di med na/ /kun mkhyen gyis bsngags rig ma ni/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis khyab mdzad pa/ /de ni de phyir gzung bar bya/ /skye ba gnyis kyi bu mo dang / /yang na

btso blag ma dang / yang na gdol pa mo dang / g.yung mo dang / rigs las skyes ma dang / yang na rgyal mo ma dang / gar mkhan gyi bu mo dang / bzo mo dang / yang na ri dgas kyi mig ma dang / rked pa phra ba dang /

ro smad rgyas pa dang / nu ma mtho ba dang / b+ha ga bzang ba dang / dam tshig gi spyod pa la shin du dam pa dang / de kho na la gnas pa dang / sngags dang rgyud shes pa ste/ sgrub pa po'i dbang po la gnas gsum

du che ba'i bu mo 'di dag bshad do/ /rigs kyi rim pa nyid kyis 'di rnams kyis thams cad 'gyur ro/ /ma rnyed ji ltar gang rnyed de/ /de bzhin bcu drug lon pa nyid/ /dang po'i lang tsho phun sum tshogs/ /mig mdzes

phyag brgya rnyed nas ni/ /rig ma de nyid blangs nas ni/ /skyabs su 'gro ba'i rim pas ni/ /sbyangs nas de nyid gsang ba dang / /sngags dang rgyud kyi rim kun bsgrags/ /sgra 'am 'og gi lam du lces/ /de nyid de bzhin
steng du gzhug /kun gyi cha rigs sna tshogs byed/ /rim ba nyid kyi rna cha dang / /ska rags che dang se mo do/ /lag gdub dang ni rkang gdub ldan/ /de ltar dngos grub dam pa ster/ /
