gang zhig sbyangs pa'i rig ma kun/ /nye bar 'tshe ba med gnas su/ /rig pa 'dzin pa 'khor mang po/ /de nas tsan dan gos phreng sogs/ /rnam par brgyan nas dbul bar bya/ /dri dang me tog rim gro yi/ /
'o ma'i mchog sogs rgyas pas ni/ /phyag rgya thabs cig sgrub pa pos/ /gus par 'bad pas yang dag mchod/ /slob mas pus mo'i lha nga ni/ /sa la dad pas gtsugs nas ni/ /thal mo sbyar nas

bstod pa 'dis/ /ston pa la ni zhu ba bya/ /stong pa'i snying po phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rtog pa thams cad yang dag spangs/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tshogs/ /ye shes sku la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'gro ba'i
mi shes cod pan can/ /dag pa'i de nyid don ston mdzad/ /bdag med chos las byung ba yi/ /rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems/ /pha rol phyin pa'i yon tan
rnams/ /mgon po las ni rtag tu byung / /byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /dkon mchog gsum dang theg chen dang / /de bzhin brtan dang 'gro ba dang / /khams gsum po ni 'di dag kun/ /'gro ba'i

dpa' bo phyag 'tshal bstod/ /yid bzhin nor bu ltar gyur pa'i/ /'gro ba'i 'dod pa'i don grub phyir/ /dpal ldan bde gshegs bka' bzhin mdzad/ /sangs rgyas sras po phyag 'tshal bstod/ /de nyid bla med bdag

'tshal bas/ /yon tan mdzod khyod bka' drin las/ /kun mkhyen rdo rje dbang gis ni/ /da lta nyid du bka' drin skyobs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ni/ /ji ltar dpal thugs rdo rje yis/ /rdo rje chos can la gsungs
ba'/ /de bzhin mgon pos bdag la skyobs/ /bcom ldan zhabs pad spangs nas ni/ /gzhan du bdag la 'gro ma mchis/ /'khor ba'i 'gro las nges rgyal bar/ /de phyir mgon pos thugs rje mdzod/ /de nas rdo rje

slob dpon dpal/ /rjes su brtse bcas phan sems kyis/ /slob la snying rje bskyed nas ni/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor dgug pa dang / /'dod yon lnga yis gang ba dang / /bla re bres pas nye bar 'bar/ /rnal 'byor
ma dang sbyor ldan zhing / /dril bu sil sil sgra dang ni/ /me tog bdug dri nyams dga' ba/ /lha yi dri phreng bde ba'i mchog /dpal ldan rdo rje sems sogs lha'i/ /dkyil 'khor mchog tu ngo mtshar bar/ /

slob dpon skal ba bzang po mchog /de nas phyag rgya sbyor byas nas/ /rgyal ba'i bdag skyes byang chub sems/ /pad ma'i snod du gzhug par bya/ /rnga yab g.yob cing gdugs dang ni/ /bkra shis tshigs bcad glu rnams kyis/ /

phyag rgya ldan pas slob ma de/ /'gro ba'i gtso bos dbang bskur bya/ /slob dpon mchog gi dbang phyug gis/ /dbang ni rin chen mchog byin nas/ /bzang po'i rang bzhin legs sbyangs pa'i/ /dam tshig yid 'ong nges par

sbyin/ /khrag chen dang ni ga bur bcas/ /tsan dan dmar pos sbyar ba dang / /rigs kyi bdag po'i chu ldan zhing / /lnga pa sems las yang dag byung / /'di rnams dam tshig yang dag par/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis
nye bar gsungs/ /bzang po rtag tu bskyang bar gyis/ /sdom pa yang ni da ltar nyon/ /srog chags gsad par mi bya zhing / /bud med rin chen yong mi spang / /des na slob dpon spang mi bya/ /sdom pa shin

du 'da' bar dka'/ /gong du gsungs pa'i rig ma 'am/ /yang na bdag gi rnal 'byor ma/ /dag cing sprul pa'i rig ma ni/ /si h+la ga bur bsgos ba ni/ /ji srid khu ba ldan gyur pa/ /de srid phyag rgya bsten par bya/ /
phyag rgya'i gdong yang bcing ba dang / /thabs kyi gdong yang de bzhin te/ /bstan pas yang dag gang byung ba/ /slob ma'i kha ru ltung bar bya/ /ro mnyam slob ma'i spyod yul nyid/ /de nyid la ni
bya bar bshad/ /rang rig ye shes nyid du 'gyur/ /rang gzhan yang dag rig pa spangs/ /mkha' mnyam rdul bral stong pa nyid/ /dngos dang dngos min bdag nyid mchog /thabs dang shes rab rnam par
'dres/ /'dod chags 'dod chags bral bas 'dres/ /de nyid srog chags rnams kyi srog /de nyid yi ge dam pa nyid/ /de nyid 'di ni kun khyab byed/ /de nyid sangs rgyas ye shes can/ /he ru ka dpal zhes byar
brjod/ /gzhan rnams gang rnams de rnams dang / /dngos dang dngos med de las byung / /dga' ba dang po dpa' bo ste/ /mchog tu dga' ba rnal 'byor ma/ /shin du bde dga' thams cad nges/ /de bde thabs las
thams cad rig /dang po dga' ba tsam nyid de/ /mchog tu dga' ba gnyis pa'i grangs/ /gsum pa dga' bral dga' bar bshad/ /bzhi pa lhan cig skyes par brjod/ /de yang dbang ni rnam pa bzhi/ /dang po
la ni bum pa'i dbang / /gnyis pa la ni gsang ba'i dbang / /gsum pa shes rab ye shes te/ /bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no/ /byang chub sems kyi dbang gis ni/ /slob ma sdig pa bral ba yin/ /sangs rgyas

grong khyer mchog sngon du/ /de nas de la gnang ba sbyin/ /byang chub snying po'i bar du ni/ /phyogs kun du ni 'khor lo ni/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med/ /kun du mchog tu rab tu bskor/ /thabs dang shes rab
rang bzhin bdag /yid bzhin nor bu ltar mthong nas/ /sbyor med bral zhing ma zhum pas/ /sems can don ni da ltar gyis/ /dbang dang bka' gnang thob nas ni/ /bya ba byas pas rab 'dzum zhing / /'gro ba

dga' bar byed pa yi/ /shin du snyan pa'i tshig 'di brjod/ /deng bdag skye ba 'bras bur bcas/ /bdag gi 'tsho ba 'bras bur bcas/ /de ring sangs rgyas rigs su skye/ /da ni sangs rgyas rigs su 'gyur/ /bskal pa
rgya mtshor 'jigs chen por/ /mnar med skye ba yang dag 'khrug /nyon mongs 'dam ni brgal dka' las/ /bdag ni mgon po khyod kyis bsgral/ /khyod kyi zhabs kyi bka' drin las/ /theg pa rdzogs pa lta
bur bdag /bag chags thams cad bral bas na/ /bdag la byang chub 'tshal ma mchis/ /rangs shing mig ni phye ba yis/ /zhabs la 'jus nas gus par bya/ /gang dang gang zhig sdug pa'i rdzas/ /re ba med pa'i

sems kyis ni/ /de dang de nyid dbul bar bya/ /bla ma'ang snying rje ldan pas ni/ /slob ma'i zhan pa bzlog pa'i phyir/ /de la phan pa'i bsam pas bzung / /de nas phyag 'tshal mchod nas ni/ /bla ma la ni yon rnams dbul/ /

gser ni stong phrag brgya dang ni/ /rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /gos ni zung 'gyur brgya nyid dang / /glang po rta dang yul 'khor nyid/ /rna cha dang ni rkang gdub dang / /nor bu dang ni sor gdub sogs/ /gser las

byas pa'i mchod phyir thogs/ /rang gi chung ma bu mo dang / /bran pho bran mo sring mo nyid/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni dbul bar bya/ /bdag gi dngos po thams cad kyis/ /blo dang ldan pas bla mar dbul/ /de ring tshun chad
bdag bran du/ /khyod la bdag ni 'bul lags zhes/ /de ltar zhu ba byas gyur pas/ /mngon par 'dod pa'i gnas thob nas/ /da ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /bdag la bka' drin legs par skyobs/ /
ji ltar bla med byang chub de/ /byin gyis brlabs kyis bdag gis bsgrubs/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub gnas/ /kun mchog mchod pa bskyed par bgyi/ /sems can gnas gsum spyod pa rnams/ /de nyid la ni

gzhag par bgyi/ /dbang chog 'dis sbyin par bya zhing slob ma'i lhag par mos pa dang / zab pa dang rgya che ba'i rig pas lhag par mos pa'i yid kyis shes par byas nas tshig nyid kyis dbang rin po che sbyin

par bya'o/ /gang thob dbang rab mchog ni rigs kyi bdag por gzung ba rnyed par dka' zhing mtshungs pa med par gdams/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i zhing gi dpal dag blang bar byas pas byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dbang

bskur ba/ /bka' yi gnang ba rnyed nas 'jig rten gsum gyi dgra bo las rgyal rtsom pa'i go bgos pa yi blos/ /byang chub dag la dgod pa'i sangs rgyas 'dir ni de nyid rnal 'byor pas ni dri ma med par spyod/ /byang chub kyi

sems kyis dbang gnyis pa la rab tu byed pa dang po'o// // de nas thabs dang shes rab don/ /bsgom pa yang dag rab bshad bya/ /pha rol don brtson brtson 'grus kyi/ /sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i
'jigs pa las/ /bsgral dka' gang zhig rnam bsgom pas/ /rnal 'byor pas ni rang don du/ /mya ngan 'das par gnas mi 'gyur/ /gang gis khyad 'phags mthar thug par/ /sangs rgyas dri med ngo mtshar rmad/ /

'grib dang 'phel las rnam par grol/ /byang chub bla med thob par 'gyur/ /phung po lnga sogs chos rnams dang / /theg gsum shin du spang mi bya/ /chos dbyings shin du mnyam pa nyid/ /chu shing lta bur yongs su gzung / /

stong pa bsgom par mi bya ste/ /stong min bsgom par mi bya'o/ /stong pa mi spang rnal 'byor pas/ /stong min yongs su mi spang ngo / /stong dang stong min gzung ba las/ /rtog pa nyung min skye bar 'gyur/ /yongs su spangs

na kun rtog ste/ /de phyir de gnyis yongs su spang / /gnyis kyis gzung ba yongs spangs pa/ /rnam grol gnas dang bral ba ste/ /nga zhes bya ba'i kun rtog 'di/ /de phyir de ni yang dag spang / /rnam pa med cing dogs pa med/ /'dod pa
med cing sdig pa bral/ /thog ma tha ma'i rtog las grol/ /nam mkha' lta bur mkhas pas bsgom/ /snying rje ldan pas sems can la/ /rgyab kyis phyogs par mi bya zhing / /sems can yod dang yod min zhes/ /

de ltar yongs su brtag mi bya/ /spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ /shes rab ces ni rab tu grags/ /yid bzhin nor ltar ma lus pa'i/ /thams cad don byed snying rje nyid/ /dmigs med gnas su shes rab dang / /

dmigs med snying rje chen po nyid/ /blo dang lhan cig gcig gyur pa/ /nam mkhar nam mkha' ji lta ba'o/ /gang la sgom pa po yang med/ /gang yang rnam par sgom pa'ang med/ /bsgom bya nyid kyang yod min pa/ /de yi
de nyid bsgom par brjod/ /gang yang bya ba yod min 'dir/ /bza' bya nyid kyang yod ma yin/ /byed po bza' las rnam par grol/ /don dam rnam par bsgoms pas na/ /'di la sgrub po gang yang med/ /gang yang

bstod par byed pa med/ /dor ba cung zad med par brjod/ /blang ba'ang cung zad yod ma yin/ /dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang / /sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra ba dang / /'phrog pa zla ba'i grong khyer mtshungs/ /rmi lam rtse ba lta bur blta

sgyu ma ji bzhin thams cad du/ /blta ba nyid dang reg par bya/ /'gro ba thams cad gnas pa ni/ /gang yang rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ /sbyor ba'i 'dus par bsam mi khyab/ /rmi lam sad pa lta bu ni/ /ji ltar gzhon
nu'i gzugs kyis ni/ /dbang po gnyis ni 'dus pa yis/ /b+ha gar ling ga gzhag nas ni/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran ba bsgom/ /ye shes ci zhig skye zhe na/ /thog ma dbus mtha' dri ma med/ /rang gis

rig pa'i ye shes de/ /gzhan du smra bar mi nus so/ /gzugs rnams thams cad blta ba dang / /sgra rnams nyid kyang nyan pa dang / /smra ba dang ni rgod pa dang / /sna tshogs re ni za ba dang / /las rnams thams cad byed pa
na/ /gzhan du sems ni mi 'gro bas/ /de nyid rig pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i/ /rnal 'byor rtag tu skye bar 'gyur/ /'di ni gnyis su med par brjod/ /'di ni byang chub sems mchog nyid/ /rdo rje

rdo rje sems dpa' dpal/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub nyid/ /'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin/ /pha rol phyin pa kun gyi dngos/ /mnyam nyid bsam bya nyid du gsungs/ /sangs rgyas kun mchog bsgom bya nyid/ /'gro

ba brtan dang g.yo ba'i bdag /byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas dang / /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang nyan thos sogs/ /de nyid las ni thams cad skyes/ /dngos dang dngos med sbyor dral ba/ /rnal 'byor pas ni de nyid
bsgom/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam grol ba/ /bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /ma lus skyon la sdang ba dang / /kun nas nyon mongs rgyab phyogs des/ /dpal ldan bde gshegs yon tan rnams/ /mtha'
yas de las skye bar 'gyur/ /kun rtog mang po'i mun pas khyab gyur pa'i/ /rab tu 'joms pas smyo zhing glog 'gyu ba/ /chags sogs dgag dka'i dri mas gos gyur pa'i/ /sems ni rdo rje can gyis 'khor bar
gsungs/ /rang bzhin 'od gsal rtog las rnam par grol/ /'dod chags las sogs dri mas gos bral ba'i/ /gzung ba dang ni 'dzin med sems dpa' mchog /de nyid mya ngan 'das pa mchog tu gsungs/ /

sdug bsngal phung po du ma'i mtshan gyur pa/ /'di las gzhan du cung zad yod ma yin/ /bde ba mtha' yas 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur pa/ /de las gzhan du grol ba'ang yod ma yin/ /sdug bsngal ma lus zad par 'dod pa dang / /

rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi bde mchog thob 'dod pas/ /sems ni brtan par byas nas 'bad pas dpyad/ /de yi rang bzhin dngos po med par byed/ /ji srid rtog pa'i mun pa'i yul stug po/ /skye dgu'i yid bsgribs sdug bsngal

mtha' yas la/ /ji srid de nas de ni bral yin te/ /de srid bde ba rgya chen tha dad min/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi mthar thug 'phags dgyes pa'i/ /de yi zad phyir rang gi bya ba yang / /rgyas pa de yi yan lag 'gro ba blta/ /

de ltar de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor pas rnal 'byor gyi nges par byas nas bka'i gnang ba dang / rang gi dam tshig la gnas pas/ sgom par byed na lag pa'i phyag rgya dang / sngags dang sku gzugs kyi nga rgyal bsgom pa dang /

dam tshig gi thun mong gi dngos grub sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes pas ci zhig bya/ sangs rgyas nyid kyis byin gyis brlab pa'i mtshon pa mngon du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor yin te bskyed pa dang / de mtshon pa na gnas gsum

po nam mkha' lta bur 'gyur ro/ /gzhung thams cad spangs nas thob pa'i gnas kyi bsam gtan gyi rnal 'byor de la brtson pas rang rig pa tsam la spro bas nyin dang mtshan du goms par bya'o/ /ri'i rtse mo dang / zhi ba'i gnas dang /

pad ma'i tshal dang / rgyal po'i tshal dang / dben pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas dang / rang gi khyim 'am/ sems la mngon par 'dod pa thams cad mkhyen pas sngags pa 'di'i nang du gang dang gang gi gnas der gnas shing

sngags shes pa spro ba dang ldan pas sgom par byed de/ thabs dang shes rab ma rtogs par sangs rgyas nyid mngon du thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /de'i phyir shes rab ma dngos su yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sbyin par byed pa

bzang mo spang bar mi bya ste/ phyag rgya re re dang ldan pa 'di ma rtog par dngos grub ster bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de phyir ye shes skyed pa ni/ /phyag rgya bzhi ni sbyar bar bya/ /gti mug dam tshig phyag rgya ste/ /zhe sdang phyag rgya chen por brjod/ /

phrag dog las kyi phyag rgya ste/ /'dod chags chos kyi phyag rgya bdag /yo gis phyag rgya sna tshogs 'di/ /bskyed nas rig ma bza' bar bya/ /de la gnyis ka yang lha'i gzugs su mngon du bsams nas gti mug las
zhi ba dang / khro bo las ma rungs pa dang / 'dod chags las chags pas las rnams byed do/ /de'i don du rab tu byed pa lnga po 'di rnams kyis rgyal ba rnams yin no/ /snga dro dang nyi ma'i mtha' dang /

nyi ma phyed dang / /nam phyed kyi dus su yang phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor bya'o/ /mnyam par sbyor ba las gzhan du ni 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /bstan pa la smod pa'i 'jigs pa dang / skye bo gdug pa'i nang du gnas pa'i rnal 'byor

pas rang gi sems 'ba' zhig de bsams pas sems la lhag par mos pa mngon du bya'o/ /gang zhig yang rnal 'byor pa brtson 'grus kyi 'bad pas rnal 'byor 'di bsgrub par bya'o/ /shes rab mngon du ma rnyed na byol song

dag la'ang rtag tu goms par bya'o/ /de ltar gang zhig rnal 'byor pas gal te pad ma 'dzin pa la mngon du nyi ma re re'am/ zla ba so so'am/ lo la reg par mi byed na dam tshig nyams par 'gyur ro/ /dam tshig nyams

pas rnal 'byor pa bag med par skye bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i dam tshig blang bar byas yang mi byed par sdom pa gzung ste/ de'i phyir kun gyis sdom pa dang ldan zhing de kho na la gnas pas phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor bya'o/ /

gsang ba'i nye ba'i rdzas dang sngags dang rgyud kyis 'di skad yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yang dag par sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pa rtag tu nye bar 'dug ste/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas su gnas gsum po

rtse gcig pa'i tshul gyis bsgom par bya'o/ /thabs dang shes rab kyi don bsgom pa zhes bya ba gnyis pa las rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o// // de nas 'khor lo thams cad kyi/ /rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag bshad/ /dpal ldan

rdo rje sems sogs lha'i/ /thams cad las ni sna tshogs byed/ /gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/ /thams cad bdag nyid 'di la bsgrub/ /rnam par bral dang gnas su yang / /rang gi tshal sogs rnams su yang / /

kun las sna tshogs phyag rgya ste/ /kun las sna tshogs sdom pas ni/ /kun las sna tshogs bya ba rnams/ /ji ltar bde bar bsgrub par bya/ /bde gshegs kun gyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /stong pa nyid kyi ye shes nyid/ /khro bo'i

sgrub thabs thams cad dang / /zhi ba rnams kyi lha rnams la/ /ci zhig nga yis bshad par bya/ /bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas gar/ /bsgom pa lha yi rnal 'byor dang / /sngags kyis bzlas pa'i chog rim dang / /

bris sku 'am ni sku gzugs dang / /sems kyi thams cad sprul pa ste/ /sems can rnams la phan 'dod phyir/ /nga yis rgyud du bsgrags pa yin/ /stong nyid gcig las rdo rje can/ /rigs ni rnam pa lnga ru gsungs/ /

rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bskyed pa'i yig 'bru gzugs dang ni/ /phyag rgya dbyibs kyi chog rim dang / /sngags kyi bzlas pa'i cho ga yang / /gang gis sgrub po 'grub 'gyur be/ /gtso bo shin pu dga' chen pos/ /bka' drin gyis

ni bskyab tu gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dang por byams pa bsgom par bya/ /gnyis par snying rje rnam par bsgom/ /gsum par dga' ba bsgom pa dang / /kun gyi tha mar btang snyoms so/ /yang ni stong

pa'i byang chub sems/ /gnyis pa la ni sa bon bsdu/ /gsum pa la ni gzugs brnyan rdzogs/ /bzhi pa la ni yig 'bru dgod/ /re phas nyi ma sngon du rnam bsgoms nas/ /hU~M byung sna tshogs rdo rje ste/ /rdo rje de

nyid kyis ni ra ba dang / /gur yang cho ga bzhin du bsgom par bya/ /dang por ro ni bsgom par bya/ /chos kyi dbyings kyis bdag nyid brjod/ /de steng rnal 'byor pa gnas nas/ /he ru ka nyid rnam par bsgom/ /rang gi snying kar

re pha bsgom/ /de las byung ba'i nyi dkyil 'khor/ /der ni hU~M gi dbyibs nyid ni/ /thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid can/ /kha dog nag po 'jigs chen po/ /hU~M las byung ba'i rdo rje nyid/ /rdo rje lte ba'i dbus gnas par/ /yang ni

hU~M gi de nyid bsgom/ /de nyid yongs su gyur bltas nas/ /zhe sdang bdag nyid rnam par bsgom/ /rdo rje skye ba dpa' bo che/ /'dam skyes sngon po 'dra ba 'am/ /yang na sngo dang nyi ma ltar/ /dad pas nges par

bsgom par bya/ /nam mkhar rje btsun bltas nas ni/ /rdo rje skye ba snying rje che/ /rgyan rnams thams cad 'dzin pa yi/ /lha mo brgyad kyis mchod par bya/ /dkar mo ri dgas mtshan pa 'dzin/ /chom rkun bdud las rgyal

ba'i snod/ /ro langs ma ni chu lag ma/ /g+hasma rI ni sman 'dzin cing / /puk+ka sI ni rdo rje lag /de bzhin ri khrod ma ro 'dzin/ /gdol pa mo ni cang te'u rdung / /g.yung mo sku la 'khyud pa ste/ /mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yis/ /

'di rnams kyis ni gtso bo mchod/ /de nas gnas las rnam grol ba'i/ /chos rnams kun gyi bdag nyid 'gyur/ /A li zla ba kA li nyi/ /sa bon nang du son rig pa/ /de nyid sems dpa' zhes byar brjod/ /mchog tu dga'

ba'i rang bzhin can/ /nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor khyab pa yi/ /rang gi lus mtshungs rnam par spro/ /bsdus nas snying gar dgug pa na/ /yo gi zhe sdang bdag nyid 'gyur/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi nang son par/ /

de nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam/ /hU~M skyes sngo dang nyi ma ltar/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa/ /spyan gsum skra ni gyen du ser/ /sdang mig brgyad gnyis lo yi dbyibs/ /

'jigs byed mnan cing g.yon pa na/ /rdo rje kha T+wA~M ga nyid dang / /thod pa yang ni g.yon pa na/ /g.yas na rdo rje nag po nyid/ /hU~M ni 'don par byed pa'i bdag /lha mo brgyad kyis bskor nas ni/ /dur khrod du ni mgon po rol/ /

de ltar rnal 'byor pas ni bsgom/ /rnal 'byor bdud rtsi sdom pa kun/ /de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /khro bo'i gzugs ni 'dzin gyur pa/ /phyag bzhi yis ni rnam par brgyan/ /bdud

bzhi rnam par dag pa ni/ /dga' ba bzhi yi rang bzhin no/ /sngar gsum dkyil 'khor 'khor lor gnas/ /hU~M gis sa bon las byung ba'i/ /g.yon na thod pa lha dang ni/ /lha min khrag gis bkang ba dang / /g.yas na rdo rje

me lta bus/ /'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs par mdzad/ /gzhan pa yi ni phyag dag gis/ /lus la yang dag 'khyud pa nyid/ /shes rab rdo rje phag mo ni/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs su bsgom/ /dang por stong pa bsgom bya

zhing / /gnyis pa la ni cha bral nyid/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /hU~M ni der ni bsgom par bya/ /de bzhin zhal gsum phyag drug par/ /lha yi gzugs su bsgom par bya/ /dang po'i zhal ni dkar min zhing / /

g.yas pa dkar zhing zhi ba nyid/ /g.yon pa dmar po lta bu ste/ /spyan gsum bzang po'i gzugs can nyid/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis yang dag gang / /thod pa'i gdan la yang dag gnas/ /bshang gci khu ba khrag rnams kyis/ /

thod pa phyag gis bzung ba dang / /gzhu dang mda' ni 'dzin pa nyid/ /de bzhin rdo rje dril bu nyid/ /dang po rdo rje 'bar ba nyid/ /gsum par de bzhin rtse gsum pa/ /dpal ldan shes rab 'khyud pa dang / /ral pa'i cod pan brgyan pa ste/ /

sprin gyi 'od 'bar du ma ni/ /sangs rgyas dam tshig spro bar bya/ /b+ha ga'i dbus su sgrub pa pos/ /der ni bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ /lha mo lhan cig ldan par ni/ /de nas phyag rgya bsgom par bya/ /thod pa'i stan la gnas

par ni/ /'dab mar lha mo bri bar bya/ /sna tshogs gzugs ma yid 'ong ma/ /zhal gcig ma la phyag bzhi ma/ /dang por rig ma bri bar bya/ /gzhu dang mda' ni 'dzin ma mdzes/ /thod pa khu bas gang ba dang / /lcags

kyu lag pas 'dzin pa mo/ /gnyis pa rtse gsum lag pa dang / /khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa dang / /rdo rje de bzhin zhags pa nyid/ /gsum pa lag par ral gri dang / /thod pa chu yis gang ba dang / /de bzhin rdo rje dril bu

nyid/ /bzhi pa kha T+wAM~M ga lag ma/ /g.yon pa'i lag pas thod pa nyid/ /mu sum de dang ba dan gsum/ /lnga pa zhags pa'i lag pa dang / /thod pa lag pas bzung ba dang / /de bzhin ud pal cang te'u nyid/ /

drug pa'i lag pas pad ma dang / /thod pa tshil gyis gang ba dang / /de bzhin me long dgra sta nyid/ /bdun pa 'phang mdung lag pa dang / /dung dang 'khor lo'i mtshon cha 'dzin/ /thod pa khrag gi gang bar ni/ /khru gang tsam du yang dag

bri/ /brgyad pa bum pa'i lag pa dang / /de bzhin rdo rje dril bu nyid/ /thod pa skyes pa'i lpags pa yis/ /bkab pa rdzas kyis gang ba ni/ /ze 'brur bde ba chen po dang / /'dab mar lha mo bri bar bya/ /rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs rnams/ /

gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /lha mo rdo rje lcags kyu dang / /rdo rje zhags pa lcags sgrog dang / /de bzhin rdo rje dril bu nyid/ /sgo yi skyong ba yang dag bri/ /b+ha ga'i dbus su bsgom bya zhing / /phyis ni bzlas pa yang dag brtsam/ /

hU~M ni rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /oM ni dbyangs kyi dbye ba nyid/ /A ni ngag dang yang dag ldan/ /shel ni dag pa lta bu nyid/ /hrIHni de la yang dag sbyar/ /de bzhin du yang swA hA nyid/ /sngags kyis bzlas par yang dag gsungs/ /bsam

gtan yi ge gcig po nyid/ /lha mo rnams kyi hrI nyid ni/ /'dab ma rnams la de nas dgod/ /mchod pa bzhi yi rang bzhin gyis/ /sa bon bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /sgo yi skyong ba thams cad du/ /dang po dbyangs yig

la sogs ldan/ /b+ha ga nyid du sgrub pa pos/ /de nas rdo rje gzhug par bya/ /hrIHyi rnam pa nyid dang yang / /de la hU~M ni brjod par bya/ /zla mtshan dus su khrag bcas pa'i/ /khu ba kha yis bza' bar bya/ /bdag nyid dang

ni b+ha ga la/ /me tog dri yis mchod par bya/ /gal te sgrub po grub 'dod na/ /de nyid la ni bzlas par bya/ /rdo rje drag mo de bzhin gcig /de bzhin rdo rje gzugs brnyan gnyis/ /gsum pa rdo rje 'dod chags ma/ /bzhi pa rdo rje

zhi ba ma/ /lnga pa rdo rje gnod sbyin ma/ /drug pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /bdun pa sgra yi rdo rje ma/ /de bzhin brgyad pa rdo rje sa/ /gnyis pa las rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o// // 'khor lo sgrub pa'i khyad par gyi/ /

rim pa ji bzhin rdo rje nyon/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang ni/ /bsrung dang de bzhin mngon spyod nyid/ /re'u mig dgu sogs 'khor lo yi/ /byi rol mu khyud nyid du bya/ /'khor lo las kyi kha dog sogs/ /mkhas pas rnam

par bsgom par bya/ /oM tA re tuta tA re tu re swA hA/ 'di yis sa bon thams cad kyis/ /phyag 'tshal bsreg blugs tha ma ni/ /dbus su ming ni sbyar bar bya/ /bsrung ba'i tshig kyang rnam par bya/ /mnyam nyid ye shes
stong pas ni/ /bdag gi lus ni bkru bar bya/ /mnyam nyid thams cad rig pa'i gnas/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor lo sbyar bya ba/ /bsrung ba ye shes can gyis bsgom/ /'jigs pa thams cad ring du byed/ /sems
can dngos po med na ni/ /rnal 'byor dngos po bsgom par bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /pad ma'i gdan ni bsam par bya/ /dngos grub thams cad rab ster mar/ /bdag gi lus ni bsgom
par bya/ /oM tA re swA hA/ mgo bo la'o/ /oM tu re swA hA/ mig dag la'o/ /oM tA re swA hA/ sna dag la'o/ /oM tu swA hA/ rna ba dag la'o/ /oM re swA hA/ lce la'o/ /oM tA re ni swA hA/ snying gar ro/ /
yan lag drug ni rnam par gzung / /'phags ma sgrol ma bsam par bya/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil dkrung bcas/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /kun la skyabs sbyin lag pa dang / /g.yon
pa ud pal lta bu mchog /sngags kyi rgyal pos bskul ba yis/ /lha rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /oM ku ru kul+li hrA hrI swA hA/ las thams cad pa'i sngags so/ /dgra dang rgyal pos bcings pa dang / /
'gro ba'i shin du 'jigs pa'i dug /yan lag rims ni sna tshogs dang / /dug sogs dus min 'chi ba yi/ /'jigs pa'i gnas ni gang gang la/ /de dang de la rab sbyar bya/ /shes rab chub ba

blo ldan par/ /bsrung ba bris nas gzung bar bya/ /bsrung ba bzang po 'di nyid ni/ /'jigs pa thams cad du ni spangs/ /bsrung ba'i 'di ni thams cad las/ /rnal 'byor de nyid gong na med/ /'bar ba'i 'od zer lta bu yi/ /

nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams nas ni/ /de yi dbus su hrI nyid ni/ /kha dog dmar po lta bu'i 'od/ /de nas bdag nyid bsgom par bya/ /zhal gcig ma la phyag bzhi ma/ /mda' dang gzhu yi lag pa ma/ /ut+pa la dang
lcags kyu 'dzin/ /'di ni bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni/ /'jig rten gsum po dbang du byed/ /'bum phrag gcig gis rgyal po rnams/ /khri yis 'jig rten phal pa nyid/ /bye bas phyugs dang gnod sbyin sogs/ /'bum
phrag bdun gyis lha ma yin/ /'bum phrag gnyis kyis lha rnams nyid/ /brgya phrag gcig gis sngags pa nyid/ /'khor lo 'dab ma brgyad pa 'di/ /kha dog dkar po shin du mdzes/ /mnyam nyid gzugs su bsams
nas ni/ /khams gsum gyi ni rang bzhin gyis/ /sngar gsungs mtshan nyid yang dag ldan/ /gong du gsungs pas bsgrub par bya/ /shes rab 'bar ba'i las rnams ni/ /'di yi 'khor lo bsgom par bya/ /

oM pradz+nye ma hA pradz+nye hU~M swA hA/ dngos po'i ngo bos bsgom par bya/ /'od zer 'bar ba du ma yi/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /shes rab bdag nyid rnam par sprul/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo

dkrung / /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /kha dog dkar po 'od gsal ma/ /shes rab bdag nyid gzung bar bya/ /'di yi sa bon bzlas nas ni/ /shes rab 'dab ma lta bur 'phel/ /gu ba'am blo ni dman pa yi/ /

shes rab 'phel ba'i rnal 'byor ro/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /yi ge de la dgod par bya/ /thod pa'i gdan gyi dbus gnas par/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /zhi ba'i 'khor lo dril bu 'dzin/ /

thod pa dang ni zhags pa nyid/ /de bzhin 'bar ba'i phreng 'khrugs par/ /kun du rnam par spro bar bya/ /'dir ni rnal 'byor rim pas ni/ /rin chen 'byung gnas bsgom par bya/ /btso ma gser gyi mdog lta bu/ /sku mdog
ser po gzi brjid che/ /thod pa'i gdan gyi dbus bzhugs par/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /dpa' bo rin chen lcags kyu 'dzin/ /thod pa de bzhin zhags pa nyid/ /'dir ni rnal 'byor rim pas ni/ /

pad ma rdo rje 'chang ba bsgom/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /pad ma rA ga lta bu'i 'od/ /dpa' bo mdung dang gzhu 'dzin cing / /thod pa'i gdan la yang dag bzhugs/ /pad ma zhags pa 'dzin pa nyid/ /rgyan rnams

kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /'dis ni rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /don yod phyag na ral gri 'dzin/ /thod pa'i gdan gyi dbus bzhugs par/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa/ /thod pa rdo rje dril bu dang / /lcags kyu dang ni

g.yas pa 'phyar/ /bai dur+yA ltar ljang gu ste/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus son pa/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/ /de yi nang son sa bon ni/ /bru~M las sbyan gyi
dbyibs su ni/ /thod pa'i gdan gyis dbus gnas par/ /phyag ni brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan/ /'khor lo'i lag pa mda' dang gzhu/ /de bzhin rdo rje dril bu nyid/ /zhags pa ral gri thod pa nyid/ /spyan

gsum pa la zhal gcig ma/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis yang dag gang / /do shal dang ni rkang gdub brgyan/ /kha dog dkar mo shin tu mdzes/ /de bzhin thod pa'i dbu rgyan nyid/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus son pa/ /
zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs gang ba/ /de yi nang son bsam par bya/ /hU~M las mA ma kI yi dbyibs/ /thod pa'i gdan gyi dbus gnas par/ /kha dog sngon mo 'bar chen mo/ /spyan gsum ma la

zhal gcig ma/ /thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /mda' dang gzhu ni 'dzin pa nyid/ /lcags kyu dang ni ral gri nyid/ /zhags pa rdo rje de bzhin du/ /dril bu dang ni thod pa'o/ /'khor lo rin chen pad ma dang / /kha T+wA~M ga nyid
bcu gnyis ni/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /b+ha ga'i dbus su yongs gang ba'i/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /der ni hrIHni bsam bya zhing / /gos

dkar zhes bya rnam par bsgom/ /thod pa'i gdan gyi dbus gnas par/ /kha dog dmar mo 'bar chen mo/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis yongs gang ba/ /phyag rgya kyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /gzhu dang mda' ni 'dzin pa dang / /

pad ma'i lag par ral gri dang / /thod pa rdo rje dril bu dang / /zhags pa de bzhin rin chen nyid/ /do shal dang ni rkang gdub sgra/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /rnal 'byor pas ni 'di bsgoms na/ /myur du
sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur/ /nam mkha'i dbus su yongs gang ba'i/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /de yi nang song tA~M nyid ni/ /sgrol ma'i dbyibs su bsam par bya/ /thod pa'i gdan gyi dbus

gnas par/ /phyag ni brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan/ /ral gri phyag na chags bcas ma/ /ud pal de bzhin lcags kyu dang / /thod pa khrag gi gang ba dang / /zhags pa de bzhin 'khor lo dang / /gzhu dang mda' ni

'dzin pa nyid/ /zhal gcig ma ni yang dag bri/ /kha dog ljang gu spyan gsum ma/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /de ltar rnal 'byor pas bsgoms pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam par 'gyur/ /rgyud thams cad

kyi gleng gzhi'i gsang ba dpal yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba las brtag pa'i rgyal po gnyis pa'o// // he ru ka dang bdag med ma'i/ /skyed ba'i sgrub dang de nyid nyon/ /gang gis gdug pa drag po yis/ /
sems can 'dul bar 'gyur ba yi/ /mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro mas mdzad pa'i/ /de dag thams cad khyod la bshad/ /rdo rje sems dpar gyur nas yang / /rdo rje can nyid rdo rjer dbab/ /'bar ba'i phreng 'khrugs

drag po ni/ /kun du rnam par spro bar bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /sa bon phreng ba de nas dgod/ /de nas rdo rje chags chen las/ /rig mar bcas pa khu bar gyur/ /sna tshogs glu yi mchod pa

las/ /de nas rig mas bskul bar bya/ /rje btsun snying rje'i yid bzhengs shig /puk+ka sI ni bdag la skyobs/ /stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spangs la/ /bdag la bde chen sbyor bzhes mdzod/ /khyod med na ni bdag
'gum pas/ /kye yi rdo rje khyod bzhengs shig /stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la/ /ri khrod ma 'bras grub par mdzod/ /dga' gtso 'jig rten mgron gnyer ba/ /stong pa nyid la gzhugs sam ci/ /khyod med
phyogs ni mi 'tshal bas/ /gdol pa mo bdag zhu ba bgyid/ /bdag gis khyod kyis thugs 'tshal gyis/ /mig 'phrul mnga' ba khyod bzhengs shig /g.yung mo bdag yid dran nyams pas/ /snying rje rgyun

chad ma mdzad cig /aM dang hAM las rdo rje che/ /khu ba'i gzugs las bzhengs nas ni/ /zhabs rnams sa la rdegs pa dang / /lha dang lha min bsdigs par mdzad/ /ga~M tsa~M ba~M g+ha~M pa~M sha~M la~M Da~M/ 'di yis
sa bon dbyung bar bya/ /bdag po dga' ma'i sa bon la/ /oM hU~M sngon po 'bar 'jigs pas/ /ma mo'i 'khor lo grong nyams dgar/ /gtso bo 'di ltar bsgom par bya/ /zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi pa/ /phyag
ni bcu drug dag gis brgyan/ /bdud bzhi mnyam par mnan pa nyid/ /'jigs pa'ang ni 'jigs pa po/ /sgeg cing dpa' bo mi sdug pa/ /rgod cing drag shul 'jigs su rung / /snying rje rngam dang zhi

ba yi/ /gar dgu'i ro dang ldan pa nyid/ /mgo yi phreng bas do shal mdzad/ /nyi mar bzhugs shing rol mor bcas/ /kha dog nag po 'jigs pa po/ /sna tshogs rdo rje spyi bor 'dzin/ /nyid kyi zhal nas hU~M spro zhing / /
thal bas sku la byugs pa nyid/ /bdag med lhan cig mnyam sbyor zhing / /dga' ba gnyis gnyis snyoms 'jug pas/ /dba' rlabs med pa'i rang bzhin can/ /rtsa ba'i zhal ni bzhad cing nag /g.yas pa'i zhal ni

kun da mtshungs/ /g.yon pa dmar zhing cher 'jigs pa/ /steng ma'i zhal ni rnam par gtsigs/ /spyan ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi che/ /lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs/ /rdo rje ral gri 'dzin pa dang / /mda' dang de bzhin 'khor lo

nyid/ /de bzhin gshor dang dbyig pa dang / /rtse gsum pa dang lcags kyu nyid/ /g.yon par dril bu pad mar bcas/ /gzhu dang kha T+wA~M ga 'phyar zhing / /thod pa dang ni rin chen nyid/ /bsdigs mdzub zhags pa de bzhin no/ /

sangs rgyas sprin gyi 'od zer ldan/ /kun du rnam par spro bar bya/ /de ltar cho ga sna tshogs kyis/ /dkar mo la sogs de rnams dgod/ /dkar mo kha dog dkar mo ste/ /gzhu dang mda' ni 'gengs pa mchog /thod pa

khrag gis bkang ba dang / /de bzhin rdo rje gri gug nyid/ /chom rkun ma ni kha dog dmar/ /'khor lo lcags kyu 'dzin mar brjod/ /thod pa dang ni cang te'u nyid/ /gsal ba'i gzugs can dgod par bya/ /rmongs byed ma ni sku

mdog nag /de bzhin thod pa dang ni gshor/ /sa la rlog pa nyid dang ni/ /g.yas pa rtse gsum 'phyar ba'o/ /ro langs ma ni dkar ser mtshungs/ /phyag dag na ni chang dang chu/ /ral gri dang ni thod pa nyid/ /mdzes ma'i

gzugs can bsgom par bya/ /puk+ka sI ni kha dog ser/ /dpag bsam shing gi lcug ma dang / /sha yi gang ba'i thod pa dang / /rin chen dang ni mchog sbyin nyid/ /gdol pa mo ni sngo mdog mtshungs/ /de bzhin rlung gi gos 'dzin ma/ /

gzhon pa dag gis thod pa dang / /de bzhin pad ma dkar po nyid/ /g.yung mo sngo dang dkar ba'i mdog /rdo rje dang ni lcags kyu 'dzin/ /g.yon pas thod pa 'dzin pa ste/ /gzhan pas rlung gi gos 'dzin ma/ /g+hasma rI

ni ljang ser mtshungs/ /rdo rje me thab dgra sta'i lag /thod pa tshil bus yongs gang ba'i/ /g.yas pa mi 'jigs sbyin byed ma/ /ri khrod ma ni dkar mdog mtshungs/ /kha T+wA~M ga dang thod pa'i lag /rdo rje de bzhin

zhags pa nyid/ /sna tshogs gzugs can bsgom par bya/ /ro hi ta dang phag nyid dang / /rus sbal de bzhin lto 'phye nyid/ /seng ge de bzhin stag nyid dang / /wa dang dge slong nyid rnams ni/ /de ltar dkar mo la
sogs pa'i/ /thod pa brgyad du cho ga bzhin/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /sgeg pa la sogs ro dang ldan/ /rta yi gzugs dang phag gi gdong / /khyi gdong de bzhin seng ge ma/ /zhal bzhi ma la

phyag bzhi ma/ /sbrul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /gling bu dang ni pi wang dang / /mu kun Ta dang rdza rnga ste/ /phyag gnyis ma la zhal gcig ma/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /nag mo dkar ser lta bu dang / /

de bzhin steng du rta gdong ljang / /ser mo nag mo dkar mtshungs dang / /de bzhin steng du phag gdong dmar/ /dmar zhing nag dang dkar mtshungs shing / /de bzhin steng du khyi gdong ser/ /ljang dang nag dang dkar ba'i

gdong / /steng du 'bar ba'i seng ge gdong / /thams cad skra ni steng du 'bar/ /g.yon brkyang ba yis ro mnan cing / /spyan gsum khro zhing sgeg pa dang / /rgod pa'i bzhin ni bsgom par bya/ /he ru ka bskyid pa gsum
pa las rab tu byed pa dang po'o// // ye shes mkha' 'gro'i sgrub ba ni/ /rdo rje gtso bo rgyal po nyon/ /gnyis med ye shes chos ldan pa'i/ /gnyis kyi dngos po spangs pa yis/ /

rnal 'byor kun sogs dang por ni/ /dag pa gsum ni gdon par bya/ /swa b+hA ba shud d+hAH/ sarba d+harmA swa b+hA ba shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ badzra shud d+hAH/ sarba d+harmA badzra shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ yo ga shud d+hAHsarba d+hArmA yo ga shud d+ho\u0f85ha~M/ de ltar byas nas

rnal 'byor pas/ /yang ni bsam gtan de nyid bya/ /yid dang rjes mthun gnas rnams su/ /de nas bsam gtan brtsam bar bya/ /bla re yang ni bre ba nyid/ /sna tshogs gos ni 'phyang ba dang / /'phan dang rgyal mtshan

bsgreng ba dang / /phyogs bcu'i gnas ni thams cad du/ /dri zhim me tog sna tshogs dang / /de bzhin dri yi dkyil 'khor du/ /skad cig gcig pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /bdag gis lus ni bsam bar bya/ /blo gros ldan

pas sngar mchod nas/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro ma ni gzung / /de ltar cho ga sna tshogs ni/ /nges par bsgom pa nyid du bya/ /ye shes rgya mtsho ri bo'i mgor/ /phyogs sogs kha dog bzhi ni bsam/ /de bzhin gser

gyi rgyan byung dang / /rin chen bdun gyis rnam par spras/ /g.yer ka 'bar ba'i phreng ba ni/ /'dod pas kun du rgyas par ni/ /gnas ni lnga ru seng ge yi/ /gdan ni bsgom pa nyid du bya/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam
nas ni/ /gdugs ni dkar pos rnam par spras/ /bdag gis dbugs kyis phyung nas ni/ /dbus su ye shes mkha' 'gro ma/ /zhal gsum pa la phyag drug nyid/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo dkrung gis gnas/ /

ma bcings skra yis mdzes pa dang / /sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /kha dog sngon mo 'jigs chen mo/ /sbrul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /rgod dang khro ba sgeg ba dang / /spyan gsum gsal ba'i gzugs

can ma/ /sgra cher rgod dang gtsigs pa mo/ /gos ni dmar bos shin du mdzes/ /steng du kha T+wA~M ga nyid dang / /gnyis pa la ni dgra sta nyid/ /gsum pa la ni rdo rje nyid/ /g.yon na de bzhin dril bu'i sgra/ /gnyis pa la
ni lhung bzed nyid/ /gsum par de bzhin ral gri 'dzin/ /'od zer 'bar ba du ma dang / /dbus su mkhas pas sgom par bya/ /ye shes mkha' 'gro'i mdun du ni/ /bdag gis dbugs kyis phyung nas ni/ /kha

dog dkar mo shin du mdzes/ /ma bcings pa yi skra yis brgyan/ /sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / /sgeg pa'i ro dang ldan pa dang / /shin du mdzes pa'i gos kyis brgyan/ /phyag gnyis kyis ni rnam par spras/ /

rnal 'byor lhung bzed kha T+wA~M ga /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bsgom bya/ /ye shes byang gi cha la ni/ /bdag gis dbugs las phyung nas ni/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo dkrung / /gtso ma gser gyi mdog lta bu/ /

rnal 'byor lhung bzed kha T+wA~M ga /ma bcings skra yis rnam par brgyan/ /yan lag sbrul gyis brgyan dang ni/ /shin du mdzes pa'i gos kyis brgyan/ /'jigs pa'i mkha' 'gro zhes bya bsgom/ /ye shes nub kyi cha la ni/ /

yang ni ro langs ma phyung nas/ /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo dkrung / /kha dog sngon mo shin du mdzes/ /rnal 'byor lhung bzed kha T+wA~M ga /ma bcings pa yi skra yis brgyan/ /lus la sbrul gyis brgyan pa dang / /

shin du mdzes pa'i gos kyis brgyan/ /ye shes lho yi cha la ni/ /gdol pa mo ni dmar mo ltar/ /rnal 'byor lhung bzed kha T+wA~M ga /ma bcings pa yi skra yis brgyan/ /phyag gnyis ma la zhal gcig ma/ /sna tshogs
rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /yongs gang gzugs dang gzi brjid ldan/ /'di ni rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom/ /dbang ldan lha mo seng ge ma/ /gdong ni seng ger bsam par bya/ /dkar dang ser ba lta bur ni/ /
klu dbang stan la g.yas brkyang gnas/ /rdo rje lcags kyu sdigs mdzub zhags/ /shin du mdzes pa'i gos kyis brgyan/ /'od zer 'bar ba du mas ni/ /lus ni 'bar bar bsgom par bya/ /

mer ni stag mo zhes bya ba/ /rin chen bdun po mchog gi gdan/ /phyag gnyis sngo dang dkar ba mtshungs/ /gos dang rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / /'bar ba'i rdo rje lcags kyu dang / /de bzhin sdigs mdzub zhags pa
nyid/ /'od zer 'bar ba du mas ni/ /lus ni 'bar bar bsgom par bya/ /bden bral lha mo wa gdong ma/ /sgra cher rgod dang 'jigs pa mo/ /ma he'i gdan dang yang dag ldan/ /dmar zhing nag pa'i kha dog ma/ /

lus la shin tu mdzes gos dang / /phyag gnyis kyis ni rnam par spras/ /lcags kyu zhags pa sdigs mdzub ma/ /sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o/ /rlung du lha mo 'ug pa ma/ /ser dang dmar ba'i kha dog ma/ /klu yi
gdan la gnas pa dang / /de nyid rgyan ni rab tu brtag /phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil dkrung gnas/ /lcags kyu zhags pa sdigs mdzub ma/ /'od zer 'bar ba du ma yis/ /thams cad kyi ni thams cad 'bar/ /

mkha' 'gro ma brgyad dbus su ste/ /phyi rol du ni bzhi po rnams/ /de ltar dgod pa'i rim bltas nas/ /phyi nas gnas ni rab tu brtag /shar du mkha' 'gro rgyal dbang mo/ /phyag gnyis dang ni mdog dkar mo/ /

yi dgas gdan la gnas pa dang / /sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / /skra ni grol zhing drag mo dang / /me ni 'bar ba'i 'od lta bu/ /bar ni lag pa bcug nas ni/ /sgra cher rgod dang de bzhin 'bar/ /byang du mar me rgyal
mo dbang / /kha dog gser mdog drag shul ma/ /'jigs pa'i gzugs can gtsigs pa can/ /shin du mdzes pa'i gos kyis brgyan/ /rab tu song ba'i stan la gnas/ /'bar ba'i me ni lta bu'i 'od/ /thal mo gnyis

gnyis kyis lag pa ni/ /mgo bo'i steng du mar me bzhin/ /nub tu lha mo 'jib byed ma/ /kha dog dmar mo 'jigs pa mo/ /rab tu song ba'i stan la gnas/ /shin du mdzes pa'i gos kyis brgyan/ /khrag gi srad bu lag

pa yi/ /snyim par khrag ni 'thung bar byed/ /me ni 'bar ba'i 'od drag mo/ /lha mo gtso mo 'jib byed ma/ /lho ru g.yo ldan zhes bya ma/ /kha dog nag mo lta bu 'od/ /rab tu song ba'i stan la gnas/ /ma bcings
pa yi skra yis brgyan/ /gos ni dmar po shin du mdzes/ /sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / /sdigs mdzub dang ni gtun shing lag /thams cad sems ni rmongs par byed/ /'bar ba'i me yi 'od drag mo/ /
thams cad rigs pas thams cad bsgom/ /'di rnams gzugs sogs mdun du ni/ /dam tshig de bzhin bstan par bya/ /rlung dang me yis bdun pa'i don/ /rdo rje'i sa bon gyis ni bskul/ /thig
le sgras ni mnan pas ni/ /rgyun gyi char ni zhes byar gsungs/ /gsum pa las rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o// // de nas bdag med sgrub pa ni/ /ci gsungs mdo ru bsdus
nas bshad/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus san par/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/ /'khor lo sngon du ci rigs par/ /lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba nyid/ /'khor lo sa dang chu ni sngon/ /

go rims bzhin du byin za dang / /lha rnams kyi ni rlung chen dang / /ji ltar bsgom pa po 'byung ba'i/ /chos 'byung las skyes 'khor lo ni/ /'phar ma gnyis dag skyon med pa/ /ze 'bru las ni gcig yin te/ /
rdo rje can gyi sku gsum mchog /bcwa lnga'i gdan dang ldan pa yis/ /ro ni nges par bsam par bya/ /de yi steng du zla ba yin/ /zla ba'i steng du sa bon nyid/ /phyi nas bdud las rgyal bas mnan/ /gnyis
'dus pa las bde chen po/ /A li zla ba'i gzugs kyis gnas/ /kA li'i gzugs kyis snang byed do/ /zla ba nyi ma gnyis 'dus pas/ /dkar mo la sogs rab tu grags/ /
zla ba me long ye shes ldan/ /de bzhin mnyam nyid ye shes nyid/ /rang lha'i sa bon phyag mtshan ni/ /so sor rtog par brjod par bya/ /thams cad gcig gyur nan tan nyid/ /gzugs brnyan rdzogs
par dag pa'o/ /mkhas pas cho ga gsungs pa ni/ /rnam pa lnga po bsgom par bya/ /A li kA li mnyam sbyor ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi gdan/ /yi ge las byung gong bu la/ /hU~M phaT rnam pa 'dod
mi bya/ /sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan las byung ba/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po bsgom par bya/ /phyag mtshan zhal sogs gong ma bzhin/ /zla ba chu shel nor bu'i 'od/ /thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las/ /de ltar
thams cad rdzogs pa nyid/ /A li shes rab kA li thabs/ /zla ba nyi ma'i rab dbye ba/ /gang phyir dkar mo la sogs pa/ /kha dog dbye ba so so yin/ /de phyir kun du rab 'bad pas/ /dkyil 'khor ba yang rab

tu brtag /rnal 'byor ma lnga 'di dag ni/ /nang gi 'phar ma yang dag gnas/ /phung po lnga yi rang bzhin gyis/ /rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu bsgom/ /dbang por rdo rje gshin rjer dkar/ /chu bdag chu yi rnal 'byor

ma/ /lus ngan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma/ /dbus su bdag med rnal 'byor ma/ /phyi rol 'phar mar dkar mo dang / /chom rkun de bzhin ro langs ma/ /g+hasma rI dang puk+ka sI/ /ri khrod ma dang gdol ba mo/ /brgyad pa
g.yung mos gang ba'o/ /'og ldan ma dang steng ldan nyid/ /mkha' spyod sa spyod ma zhes brjod/ /srid dang zhi ba'i rang bzhin gyis/ /ngos su gyur ma yang dag gnas/ /lha mo thams cad sna tshogs mdog /
drag chen phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan/ /zhal gcig ma la phyag bzhi ma/ /spyan gsum gsal ba'i gzugs can ma/ /'khor lo rna cha mgul rgyan dang / /lag pa gdu bu ska rags nyid/ /sangs rgyas lnga ni
rnam dag pas/ /'di lnga phyag rgya dag par gsungs/ /ji ltar bdag med rnal 'byor ma/ /de ltar thams cad rnam par bshad/ /g.yon pas rnal 'byor lhung bzed dang / /de bzhin steng du kha T+wA~M ga /g.yas
na rdo rje sngon po dang / /de bzhin du yang gri gug nyid/ /ro la zhon zhing gzi brjid 'bar/ /spyan dmar de bzhin steng skyes ser/ /kha dog sngon mo ches gsal ma/ /stag gi lpags pas rnam dkris
shing / /'jigs pa'i me ni lta bur ni/ /gsal ba'i gzugs can ma de gnas/ /g.yas na dkar dang sngo ba ste/ /g.yon na mar gad sngo dang mtshungs/ /phyag gnyis ma la zhal gcig ma/ /rgyan
rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /lag pa gcig na thod pas brel/ /g.yas na gri gug 'dzin pa ma/ /rgod dang khro dang sgeg pa dang / /de ni mchod pa'i gzugs gnas pas/ /sangs rgyas sprin dang mnyam
pa yi/ /'od zer sna tshogs kun du spro/ /de nyid gsum gyi rang bzhin bdag /mkhas pas dbus su bsgom par bya/ /gsum pa las rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o// // de nas dkyil
'khor chen po mchog /yang dag rab tu bshad par bya/ /rdo rje dbyings dang mnyam pa'i dbyibs/ /rdo rje dbyings zhes bya bar gsungs/ /dkyil 'khor gnas ni sbyangs nas ni/ /phyag rgya chen por yongs su
gzung / /thams cad rnam par bltas nas ni/ /sngags pas 'di ni bsgrub par bya/ /sar pa legs par bkal ba dang / /shin du tshad ma mdzes pas ni/ /srad bus thig gdab shes rab can/ /ji ltar

nus par dkyil 'khor nyid/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs rnams kyis shin tu mdzes/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /gos dang me tog phreng bas brgyan/ /mtshams kyi cha rnams thams cad dang / /

sgo yi khyud kyi grwa rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras/ /dkyil thig bya/ /de yi 'khor lo so so'i skabs/ /nang du yang ni zhugs nas ni/ /rdo rje thig ni yongs bcug cing / /phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/ /ka ba brgyad
kyis nye bar mdzes/ /rdo rje ka ba'i pa/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /da nas dkyil 'khor nang du ni/ /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rnam par dgod/ /gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor cho ga

yang / /sgrub pa'ang khyod la bshad par bya/ /de la dang por lha nyid kyi/ /khyim du sngags pa zhugs nas ni/ /a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /bsams nas de steng rdo rje ni/ /dkar po rtse mo lnga pa nyid/ /
cho gas bsam par byas nas ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun sogs la/ /mchod nas phyag 'tshal 'di skad gsol/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' kun/ /bdag la dgong pa mdzad
du gsol/ /bdag ni che ge mo zhes bgyi/ /dus 'di nas ni bzung nas ni/ /ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar/ /ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i/ /byang chub sems ni bla
med mchog /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang / /sems can don byed tshul khrims dang / /tshul khrims bslab pa rnam pa gsum/ /so sor bdag gis brtan par gzung / /
sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las skyes pa'i/ /sdom pa ding nas brtan por gzung / /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag
rgya yang / /de nyid las ni so sor gzung / /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen rigs kyi rnal 'byor gyis/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyi ma re re drug byas nas/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi
rab tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba/ /pad ma'i rigs mchog dag pa la/ /phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos kyang so sor gzung / /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /
sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /thams cad so sor gzung bar bya/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /byang chub sems ni bla med po/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /sems can
kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /sdom pa ma lus gzung bar bgyi/ /ma bsgral ba dag bsgral bar bgyi/ /ma grol ba dag grol bar bgyi/ /dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing / /sems can mya ngan 'das la gzhag /
de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi rtse mo las byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te tshig 'dis bka' stsal pa/ /de nas bsam gtan
gnas 'dug nas/ /chos rnams thams cad bdag med par/ /yang dag rjes su blta bar bya/ /phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can/ /'di dag thams cad sems kyis brtags/ /
sems las ma gtogs pa nyid ni/ /gzhan du yod pa ma yin no/ /chos kun rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/ /chos kun dang por ma skyes phyir/ /yid kyis a nut+pan+nA brjod/ /
de nas rang sems de nyid 'dis/ /rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba/ /'dod pa'i sngags kyis bzlas pas ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par blta/ /oM tsit+ta pra ti be d+ha~M ka ro mi/ tshogs kyi
dkyil 'khor che dag pa/ /nam mkha' lta bu dri ma med/ /yid gnyis kun las rnam par grol/ /mchog tu rnam par rtog pa 'joms/ /nyon mongs dri ma thams cad dag /
dang po zla ba ltar bltas nas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan 'dir/ /a yi gzugs kyis 'jug par 'gyur/ /a A i I u U ri rI li lI e ai o au a~M aH bcom ldan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
gyi/ /yon tan khyad par ji ltar lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /gru gsum rgya chen rang bzhin can/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan gnas/ /'di ni a sogs
gzugs kyis ni/ /sangs rgyas yon tan 'jug par 'gyur/ /shel dang zla ba lta bur ni/ /de yi steng du 'jug par 'gyur/ /sems ni rang bzhin 'od gsal bas/ /de nyid
dga' bar byed pa'i rgyu/ /sngags pas 'di yi sngags kyis ni/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed par byed/ /oM bo d+hi tsit+ta uta pA da ya mI/ byas pa'i rjes su rim 'byung ba/ /
sems can rjes su 'dzin pa po/ /dge ba'i chos kyis yang dag gang / /nyon mongs thams cad nges par gnon/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /
byang chub zla ba gnyis pa can/ /'dir yang skar ma'i rnam pas ni/ /sangs rgyas yon tan ka sogs kyi/ /gzugs kyis gzugs brnyan lta bu'i / /rnal 'byor
gyis ni 'jug par 'gyur/ /ka kha ga g+ha nga / tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha k+Sha/ 'di yi dkyil 'khor chog
kun/ /rgyud ni gzhan du ma gsungs so/ /de la dbus su rtse lnga pa/ /'od zer dkar po bcas pa nyid/ /kun du bzang po'i sems bskyed pas/ /brtan par byed pa'i rgyu yi phyir/ /bdag nyid rdo rje'i
gzugs brnyan du/ /'di yi sngags kyis bsgom par bya/ /oM tiSh+Tha badzra/ byang chub spyod pa bla na med/ /de yi sa ni rtogs pa 'di/ /ye shes dag pa zag pa med/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus
su ni/ /rdo rje nges par brtag par bya/ /nam mkha'i khams ni thams cad kyis/ /tshad du yang dag gang ba yi/ /rdo rje'i lus kyi bdag nyid du/ /sngags pas bsgom par bya ba'o/ /'dis ni sngags
kyi rnal 'byor gyis/ /spro ba dang ni bsdu bar bya/ /oM badzra At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gang ni/ /snang ba med cing gnas pa med/ /ma skyes ma byas dag pa nyid/ /dngos po med pa la
sogs spangs/ /gcad med dbyer med gzung du med/ /chos kyi sku ni gzugs med pa/ /rdo rje bdag med yang dag gyur/ /rdo rje'i sku ni gong na med/ /de ltar yang de rdo rjes mtshan pa bsgom par bya
ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyon cig /yang ni rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi gzugs brnyan ni/ /'di yi
sngags kyis bsgom par bya/ /oM ya thA sarba ta tha gA tA sta thA ha~M/ sku dang gsang ba de bzhin spyod/ /spyod yul de nyid rtogs pa ni/ /mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag

nyid dge/ /de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rdo rje snying po la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i rdo rje dang / pad ma'i rigs kyi ming ci lags/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa kun la gnas/ /pad ma'i rigs ni lha mo chen mo ldan/ /de yi rdo rje pad ma'i steng du gnas/ /de las de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad don/ /de nas bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad du bskyed nas steng dang 'og du sngags kyi yi ge bkod de/ cho ga bzhin du ri rab dang / gru gsum rgya chen po bskyed par bya ste/
'od zer sna tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa las yang dag par byung ba'i mdzes pa'i gnas bsgoms nas/ der pa~M las byung ba'i sna tshogs pad mar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /rlung dang me'i
dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa ya ra la was brgyan pa'o/ /de nas de'i steng du sngags kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab cing bstod pa rab tu bsngags pa nor bu rin po che chen pos

'od gsal ba dang / kha dog sna tshogs shing dril bu dpyangs pa dang rlung gis bskyod pa'i gos dang / 'phan dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang do shal dang / do shal phyed pa dang / zla bas nye bar mdzes par

rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mor gzhal med khang bsam par bya'o/ /hU~M gi sngags 'dis rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du sngags 'di bkod de gyur pa las rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsgom par bya'o/ /yang sangs

rgyas thams cad spro ba dang / bsdu bar bya zhing rdo rje de nyid yang yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje sems dpa' rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan pa zla ba'i kha dog gi 'od lta bu ste/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
steng na bzhugs shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dpa' bo shes rab dang dga' ba gcig pus mdzes pas rdo rje dang / dril bu dang / ral gri dang / lcags kyu nyid dang / thod pa dang / zhags pa
'dzin pa nyid do/ /g.yas pa ni kha dog nag po'o/ /g.yon pa ni pad ma rA ga'i 'od de/ /zhal gsum pa dang / phyag drug pa nyid dang / spyan gsum pa nyid dang / bzang po'i gzugs can te/ rang gi rig
ma'i pad ma la bzhugs pa/ /dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par dkyil 'khor pa'ang rab tu brtag par bya'o/ /shar du ni rnam par snang mdzad
do/ /lhor ni rin 'byung gnas so/ /nub tu ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o/ /byang du ni gdon mi za bar grub pa'o/ /dbang ldan du ni spyan no/ /mer ni mA ma kI'o/ /bden bral du ni gos dkar mo'o/ /rlung du

ni sgrol ma'o/ /phyi rol gyi 'phar ma la drag shul ma ni kha dog dkar mo'o/ /lho ru ni rdo rje gzugs brnyan ma ni kha dog ser mo'o/ /nub tu ni 'dod chags rdo rje ma kha dog dmar mo'o/ /byang du ni rdo rje zhi

ba mo kha dog ljang gu ma'o/ /dbang ldan du ni rdo rje gnod sbyin mo kha dog dkar ser lta bu'o/ /me ru ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dmar ser lta bu'o/ /bden bral du ni sgra'i rdo rje ma ni sngon dmar lta bu'o/ /

rlung dang sa'i rdo rje ma ni kha dog ljang skya ma lta bu'o/ /phyi rol gyi 'phar ma la dbang ldan du ni gling bu ma'o/ /me ru ni pi ba~M ma'o/ /bden bral du ni mu kun da ma'o/ /gling bu ma la sogs pa
ni phyag gnyis ma la zhal gcig ma'o/ /phyi rol gyi snam bu la me tog ma la sogs pa'i mtshan ma 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor ma de gzhag par bya ste/ de bzhin du phyag gnyis ma'o/ /shar gyi sgo
la lha mo rdo rje lcags kyu ma nam mkha' sngo bsangs ma'i mdog bri bar bya ste/ zhal g.yas pa dang / gzhan pa ni gnag pa dang / dkar po'o/ /phyag g.yas pa'i dang po ni lcags kyu'o/ /gnyis pa la
ni ral gri 'phyar ba'o/ /gsum pa la ni 'khor lo'o/ /g.yon pa na ni zhags pa dang / sdigs mdzub dang / dril bu 'dzin pa ste phyag drug pa bri bar bya'o/ /lho'i sgor lha mo rdo rje zhags
pa ma kha dog dkar ser te/ zhal g.yas pa dang / gzhan pa ni gnag pa dang dmar ba'o/ /g.yas pa na ni zhags pa dang / rdo rje dang / ral gri 'phyar ba'o/ /'khor lo dang / dril bu dang / sdigs
mdzub zhags pa can te phyag drug go/ /nub kyi sgo la ni rdo rje lcags sgrog ma ste/ de bzhin du yang kha dog dmar zhing gzi brjid che ba ste/ zhal g.yas pa dang gzhan pa ni gnag pa dang dkar ba'o/ /

phyag drug na lcags sgrog dang / rdo rje dang / ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / dril bu dang / lcags kyu'o/ /byang gi sgo la ni rdo rje dril bu ma 'jigs par byed pa ste/ zhal gsum ni ljang gu dang / nag
mo dang / dkar mo'o/ /phyag drug na ni dril bu dang / rdo rje dang / lcags kyu dang / 'khor lo dang / ral gri dang / zhags pa'o/ /thams cad kyang skra steng du 'bar ba ste/ sna tshogs pad mar
nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du gzhag par bya'o/ /me'i phyogs nas brtsams te me tog la sogs pa'i mtshan ma 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor ma de gzhag par bya ste phyag gnyis mar gsungs so/ /
shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su ni rnal 'byor ma lcags kyu ma dang / zhags pa ma dang / lcags sgrog ma dang / dril bu ma'i lag pa ste/ sgo srungs ma dang yang dag par ldan pa'o/ /dzaHhU~M

ba~M hoH zhes bya ba 'di rnams kyi snying po bstan pa ste the tshom mi za'o/ /de ltar bkod pa dang byas pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis kyang mtshan ma dang phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i
phyi'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /gong ma lta bu de'i phyed kyis de'i nang du zla ba phyed pa'i dbyibs lta bu'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes pa dang / phyi rol du ri mo bzhis
yongs su bskor ba'o/ /lha mo thams cad kyi gnas su ji skad gsungs pa'i gdan rnams ni dkar mo la sogs pa rab tu brtag par bya'o/ /de la dbus su hi'i yi ge rnam par bsgom

par bya'o/ /de'i shar gyi re'u mig la ni hri'o/ /lho ru ni ho'o/ /nub tu ni gai'o/ /byang du ni dzi'o/ /me ru ni ha~M ngo / /bden bral du ni dza~M ngo / /rlung du ma~M ngo / /dbang ldan du ha~M ngo / /dkyil 'khor
gyi phyi rol du dgod pa ni me'i mtshams su ni a~M ngo / /bden bral du ni u'o/ /rlung du ni e'o/ /dbang ldan du ni ai dgod par bya'o/ /shar gyi sgo la dzaH'o/ /lho ru ni hU~M ngo / /nub tu
ni ba~M mo/ /byang du ni hoHdgod par bya'o/ /phyi rol du dur khrod brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams te/ der dbang ldan la sogs pa'i 'byung po chen po brgyad po
'jigs par byed par dgod par bya'o/ /shar du ha ri pA sa la/ /lha yi tshogs ni yang dag bri/ /lho ru tsU ta'i shing la ni/ /gshin rje'i gtso'i dbang phyug bri/ /nub tu a sho ka gnas su/ /
sprin gyi rgyal po der ni dgod/ /de bzhin byang du byang chub shing / /gnod sbyin sde dpon mnyam par gzhag /de bzhin mer ni ka ran dzar/ /drang srong tshogs kyis yang dag khyab/ /bden
bral la ta dza tar ni/ /srin po la sogs de nas dgod/ /rlung du pAR+thi pa la ni/ /rlung gi bdag po yang dag bri/ /dbang ldan pa Ta s+tha lar ni/ /yi dgas tshogs ni yang dag bri/ /drag bcas
dbang bcas nye dbang bcas/ /zla bcas nyi ma gshin rje'i cha/ /rgyas btab rmongs byas zos byas shing / /thal ba'i dngos tsam 'tsho bar byed/ /thabs dang shes rab rnal 'byor gyis/ /
g.yon par kha T+wA~M brten nas su/ /dril bu sil sil sgra sgrogs shing / /khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa bsnams/ /g.yas su rdo rje 'bar ba ste/ /'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs par mdzad/ /
skyil dkrung phyed pa byas nas ni/ /nyid kyi brlab stengs g.yon pa mnan/ /tshangs pa la sogs mnan pa de/ /grags pa nye bar mi za ste/ /kun du 'od zer sna tshogs kyi/ /sangs rgyas sprin dang
mnyam pa 'dis/ /spro ba yang ni sbyin par bya/ /de ltar rnal 'byor pas bskoms na/ /dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/ /dpal yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba ste brtag pa'i rgyal po
gsum pa'o// // bcom ldan rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma'i/ /ngag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ci/ /gsang ba nyan par 'tshal lags na/ /thub pa chen pos bshad du gsol/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das mkha' 'gro ma rnam par rgyal ba'i stobs shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas mkha' 'gro ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bka' stsal pa/ kol+la i riT+Thi

a bol+la/ mum+mu Ni re kak+ko la/ g+ha Na ki piT+Ta ho bAdz+dza i/ kA ru Ne ki a i Na ro lA/ ta hiM b+ha lA khAdz+dza i/ g+ha T+heM ma a NA pidz+dza i/ ha le kA liny+dza ra pa Ni a i/ du d+hu ra badz+dza a i/ tsa u sa

ma kAs+thu ri si h+la/ kap+pu ru lA i a i/ ma la in+d+ha Na~M shA li a/ ta hiM b+ha ru khA dza i a i/ kha Na kheT+Ta ka ran+te/ shud+d+ha a shud+d+ha Na mu Ni a i/ Ni ra~M shu ang ga tsa DA bi a ta hiM dza

sa rA ba pa Ni a i/ ma la a dze~M kun du ru bAT+Ta i/ DiM Di ma ta hiN+Na badz+dza a i/ mu khe g+ho g+hu gu g+hu/ mu g+hu lu g+hu/ draSh+Tu/ 'di rnams bltas nas rnal 'byor pas mtshan ma gsungs pa zhes bya ba

la spro bar bya'o/ /DA/ DI/ bu/ su/ mA/ yo/ b+hi/ d+hI/ lu/ s+t+rI/ sa/ pe/ phA+e da b+ha/ b+hu/ pI/ b+hu/ hi/ ga /tri/ ku/ hA/ dzA/ ke/ b+ha/ swA/ pu/ dzA/ o/ A/ go/ rA/ de/ mA/ kA/ o/ tri/ ko/ ka / la/ kA/

hi/ pre/ gr-i/ sau/ su/ na/ shi/ ma/ ku/ de nas ngag gi ts+tsho ma yi/ /cho ga'i rim pa bshad par bya/ /gang gis spun dang sring mor yang / /the tshom med par shes bya ba/ /po ta~M gI dang / pra ti po ta~M

gI dang / ga mu dang / lu ma ba dang / ni ga ra dang / tsa ru ka~M dang / hr-i da ya dang / kau ra ba dang / kaR+N+Ni kA dang / a li ka ra Na dang / ba rA ha dang / shra ma Na dang / ma n+thA na dang / na raHdang / tA li kA dang / na ra

kA dang / a mu ka~M dang / kA khi lA dang / swa sa Na~M dang / pa ri d+hiHdang / bi ra d+hi dang / kru raHdang / an+taHdang / a li kaHdang / b+ha gi ni dang / mu ta ka~M dang / gr-i hA na dang / mu drA dang / dan ta spaR+sha dzi hwa

dang / gan+d+ha ba hi Ni dang / a ga ma na~M dang / s+thA na ta dang / ki ra no dang / go ma dang / nA dA dang / lam po da ra dang / dan+taHdang / ni ro d+ha dang / bi dz+nya p+ti dang / d+hu t+ya dang / d+hU mra pri ya dang / sA nu dang / sa ri

to dang / a~M gu l+yA dang / ba da nA~M dang / rA dzi kA dang / a da nA dang / pa~M ka ti dang / ts+tshan d+ho ha dang / tsa lo dang / mr-i ka pa ti dang / maN Da la~M dang / sA mA dang / phal gu shaM dang / ma hA k+Sha ra dang / ts+tshAnA go

dang / ma dang / b+hi dang / ha dang / a pya kA dang / s+tha dang / dan+ta spaR+sha na dang / mu kha spaR+sha ni dang / ho dang / hrI ka dang / shU n+ya spaR+sha ne dang / u ru spaR+sha ne dang / steng dang / 'og tu yod pa ni phyag rgya dang phyag
rgya'i lan du gsungs so/ /yi ge dang ngag gi ts+tsho ma ste bzhi pa las rab tu byed pa dang po'o// // rdo rje snying po snying rje che/ /yid ni gcig tu gyur pas nyon/ /gzugs
can ma dang 'o byed ma/ /lA mA yongs gyur byis bcas mo/ /mi ldog mo dang 'dod pa mo/ /'di dag mkha' 'khro bdun du gsungs/ /mngon par zhen pas blta ba dang / /smin ma yon por gang
byed cing / /sngon gyi gzugs ni sdud pa dang / /phyis ni 'jigs par byed pa yang / /de ni gzugs can mar shes bya/ /dpa' bos gnyis med bstan pa'o/ /sdug pa'am gal te mi sdug pa'i/ /
byis pa lta zhing 'o byed ma/ /de ni 'o byed mar shes bya/ /mkha' 'gro mchog kyang de nyid yin/ /byol song lta stangs khro gnyer gdong / /'di ni smin sgyur bsdigs par byed/ /gzhan du dbugs
kyi 'jigs byed ma/ /de ni lA mAr rnam par bstan/ /phag dang lce spyang byi la dang / /rta rnams thams cad 'jigs byed pa/ /de ni yongs gyur ma ru gsungs/ /rab tu dga' zhing gsal bar
dgod/ /song bar gyur nas mi ldog ma/ /de ni byis bcas mo ru gsungs/ /gang zhig skyo byas lag pa 'am/ /bong ba 'am ni rkang pas sam/ /gos mtha'am yang na shing gis ni/ /des
reg pa ni 'tsho mi 'gyur/ /de ni mi ldog mar shes bya/ /rgod dang smra dang ngu ba dang / /glo bur du ni khro 'gyur ba/ /de ni 'dod pa mar shes bya/ /mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma mor gsungs/ /
thod pa dgra sta mche ba dang / /chu srin rgyal mtshan ral gri dang / /'phang mdung dung ni bdun du gsungs/ /yang dag sbyor ba'i cho ga 'di/ /rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu mchod/ /lus
srul mo'i mtshan ma dang phyag rgya ste bzhi pa las rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o// // de nas lA mA'i mtshan nyid ni/ /yang dag rab tu bshad par bya/ /dmar zhing dkar ba'i bud med gang / /
pad ma'i 'dab ma lta bu'i 'od/ /dkar po'i gos la rtag dga' zhing / /tsan dan ser po'i dri dang ldan/ /bde gshegs 'dus pa nyid la dga'/ /chags shing mthong na rjes 'gro ma/ /khyim du pad
ma 'bri byed pa/ /pad ma gar dbang rigs las byung / /smin ma'i dbus su rtse gsum son/ /lus ni sngo bsangs skya ba dang / /uta pal sngon po'i dri dang mtshungs/ /khyim du rdo rje bris nas ni/ /
rtag tu mchod pa byed pa ni/ /he ru ka dpal rigs byung ba/ /de ni mkha' 'gro mar shes bya/ /mig dmar dkar dang dmar ba dang / /de bzhin rkang pa lag pa dmar/ /ra skyes khyim bya dag gis kyang / /
rtag tu dga' bar gyur pa dang / /de yi khyim du rdo rje ni/ /bris nas rtag tu mchod byed pa/ /he ru ka dpal rigs byung ba/ /mkha' 'gror 'di la the tshom med/ /'khor lo gang gi dpral ba 'am/ /
lag par yang ni mthong gyur pa'i/ /ser zhing sngo bsangs bud med gang / /rtag tu gos ser dga' ba nyid/ /me tog dkar po'i dri chen dang / /skal bzang phun sum tshogs ma de/ /khyim du
'khor lo 'bri bar byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rjes 'gro/ /gnag cing sngo bsangs bud med gang / /so ni dkar zhing mtho ba dang / /rtag tu gdug pa'i g.yon pa ni/ /skra ni rtag tu
grol ba yin/ /rtag tu khrus la dga' ba dang / /spyod cing mang du smra ba dang / /rdo rje khyim du bris nas ni/ /rtag tu mchod pa byed pa ni/ /rdo rje phag mo'i rigs las byung / /dkar zhing gser dang
mtshungs pa dang / /'bar ba'i mig dang ba spu gang / /rdo rje gang gi dpral ba 'am/ /lag par yang ni mthong gyur pa/ /rtag tu rgyal srid dga' ba dang / /snyems shing bden par smra ba dang / /
ma li ka yi dri dang ldan/ /khyim du rdo rje bris nas ni/ /rtag tu mchod pa byed pa ni/ /dum skyes ma yi rigs las byung / /rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen mo mchog /sha la dga' ba'i bud med gang / /mig
sman nag po lta bu'i 'od/ /dpral bar mdung rtse'i rnam pa nyid/ /drag shul las la dga' ba gang / /rtag tu dur khrod 'gro gang dang / /'jigs med skyug bro med pa dang / /gang gi dpral bar bsdus nas
ni/ /khyim du thod pa 'dri byed cing / /rtag tu mchod pa byed pa ni/ /he ru ka yi rigs las byung / /char sprin mdog 'dra'i bud med gang / /so ni mi mnyam par gnas shing / /rtag tu drag shul las rnams

dang / /g.yon pa'i mche ba byung ba ni/ /khyim du dgra sta 'bri byed cing / /rtag tu mchod pa byed pa ni/ /rnam par 'dren pa'i rigs byung ba/ /de ni mkha' 'gror the tshom med/ /gang gi skra ni li ba dang / /bzhin

ni yongs su zlum pa dang / /rtag tu kha la sma ra dang / /smin ma ring zhing ba spu dang / /gos dkar gtsang zhing zhi ba dang / /mi bskyod bden par smra ba dang / /rtag tu dam pa'i chos dga' ba/ /dpa' bo'i

sring mor de shes bya/ /pad ma'i phyag rgya sbyin par bya/ /yang na rus sbal phyag rgya bya/ /ril ba spyi blugs mchod byed pa/ /phyag rgya'i lan du brjod par bya/ /de ni tshes bcu'i res dag la/ /khyim

du pad ma 'dri bar byed/ /ma mchu 'phyang zhing mig yangs ma/ /mig ni dmar zhing ser ba dang / /che zhing skal bzang nor dang ldan/ /ser zhing tsam pa lta bu nyid/ /ring zhing lag pa ring ba dang / /sna
tshogs gos la dga' ba dang / /ri mo gsum ni dpral ba 'am/ /steng gi mtshams su nges par gnas/ /rgod pa dang ni dga' ba nyid/ /lam gyi rnam pa gnon cing gnas/ /g.yul du shi ba rnams kyi ni/ /gtam la

rtag tu dga' ba nyid/ /de 'dra'i rab myos mthong nas ni/ /mdung rtse'i phyag rgya rab bstan bya/ /rkang pa g.yon pa bskums pa yi/ /gar nyid kyang ni rab bstan bya/ /g.yon gyi yongs su bskor ba ni/ /phyag

rgya'i lan du brjod par bya/ /bcu bzhi pa dang brgyad pa la/ /khyim du mdung rtse bris shing mchod/ /'jig rten dbang phyug mtshan nyid yin/ /dmar zhing dkar ba'i bud med gang / /mig ni ljang zhing ser ba
dang / /de bzhin skra ni 'khyil ba dang / /dar dpyangs bcings par snang ba nyid/ /ri mo gcig par rab tu gnas/ /de bzhin steng du ring ba dang / /rtag tu gos dmar la dga' zhing / /rtag tu rgod cing
glu len dang / /blo bur du ni khro ba dang / /khyad par du ni sems g.yo dang / /rtsod pa rtag tu dga' ba nyid/ /de 'dra'i rab myos mthong nas ni/ /'phang mdung phyag rgya rab bstan bya/ /gnyis pa yis
kyang 'bad pa yis/ /dril bu'i phyag rgya rab tu sbyin/ /g.yon gyis yongs su bskor ba ni/ /phyag rgya'i lan du brjod par bya/ /thung zhing byin pa sbom pa dang / /rtag tu gos ser dga' ba dang / /
mgrin pa nas ni gos 'phyang ba/ /de 'dra'i rab myos mthong nas ni/ /'khor lo'i phyag rgya rab bstan bya/ /gnyis pa'ang rab tu 'bad pas ni/ /dung gi phyag rgya sbyin par bya/ /de bzhin yongs su
bskor ba nyid/ /de yi dus ni bcu bzhi la/ /khyim du rdo rje 'dri bar byed/ /yan lag kun la ba spur bcas/ /mig ni nag cing ser ba dang / /gtsigs shing rnam 'gyur 'jigs pa dang / /bzhin
sbom kha ni sbom pa dang / /ma mchu 'phyang zhing khung mig dang / /sna ni nyams par gyur pa dang / /rtag tu dri za 'dod pa dang / /sprin gyi kha dog lto che ba/ /de 'dra'i rab myos mthong nas ni/ /
klu yi phyag rgya rab sbyin bya/ /gnyis pa yang ni 'bad pa yis/ /'phang mdung phyag rgya sbyin par bya/ /yongs su bskor ba gong ma bzhin/ /de ni bcu gcig tshes la ni/ /mche ba 'bri zhing rtag tu
mchod/ /mtshan ma'i phyag rgya ste bzhi pa las rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o// // de nas yan lag phyag rgya yi/ /mtshan nyid yang dag rab bshad bya/ /bud med gang zhig spyi gtsug reg /
spyi bo de la rab bstan bya/ /gang zhig dpral ba ston pa la/ /mkhur tshos de la rab bstan bya/ /gang zhig so ni ston pa la/ /lce ni de la rab bstan bya/ /gang zhig ma mchu ston pa la/ /kos go de la
rab bstan bya/ /gang zhig mgrin pa reg pa la/ /lto ba de la rab bstan bya/ /gang zhig lto ba ston pa la/ /lte ba de la rab bstan bya/ /gang zhig mjug ma ston pa la/ /sa ni de la rab bstan bya/ /
gang zhig gsang ba ston pa la/ /ling ga de la rab bstan bya/ /gang zhig pus mo ston pa la/ /byin pa de la rab bstan bya/ /gang zhig lag pa ston pa la/ /dpung pa de la rab bstan bya/ /gang zhig
rkang pa ston pa la/ /rkang mthil de la rab bstan bya/ /gang zhig sor mo ston pa la/ /sen mo de la rab bstan bya/ /gang zhig sa ni ston pa la/ /nam mkha' de la rab bstan bya/ /gang zhig nam
mkha' ston pa la/ /nyi ma de la rab bstan bya/ /gang zhig chu bo ston pa la/ /rgya mtsho de la rab bstan bya/ /gang zhig sor mo gcig ston pa/ /legs par 'ongs zhes brjod pa yin/ /gang zhig
sor mo gnyis ston pa/ /shin tu legs 'ongs brjod pa yin/ /g.yas pa'i smin ma sgyur tshul dang / /g.yon pa'i smin sgyur tshul ston pa/ /slob dpon gnyis dang 'du ba ston/ /rgyud thams cad kyi gsang
ba yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i brda ste brtag pa'i rgyal po bzhi pa'o// // de nas skye ba dam pa kun/ /'du ba yang dag rab bshad bya/ /de la zas gcig bza' bar
bya/ /snod gnyis su yang ma lus brtson/ /kyai bcom ldan 'du ba'i gnas gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang ni/ /zhing dang de bzhin nye ba'i zhing / /

ts+tshan do nye ba'i ts+tshan do ha/ /'du ba de bzhin nye 'du ba/ /dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod dang / /'thung gcod nye ba'i 'thung gcod nyid/ /'di rnams sa ni bcu gnyis te/ /sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po nyid/ /'di ni
gzhan gyis brjod mi bya/ /kyai bcom ldan 'das gnas la sogs pa gang lags/ de bzhin du sa bcu gnyis po rnams rgya chen po las 'byung ba bka' drin gyis bskyab tu gsol/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /gnas ni dzA lan d+ha rar gsungs/ /de bzhin du ni oD+yA Ni nyid/ /gnas ni kol+la gi ri dang / /de bzhin ar bu da nyid do/ /nye gnas go dA ba ri nyid/ /de bzhin dga'

ba'i dbang phyug dang / /de bzhin de bi ko Tar bshad/ /de bzhin mA lA we nyid dang / /de bzhin kA ma rU par gsungs/ /o dre zhing ni nyid du gsungs/ /nye zhing tri sha ku ni dang / /de bzhin ko sha la nyid dang / /

ka liM kar ni ci gsungs pa'o/ /de bzhin lam bA ka nyid dang / /kAny+tsi kha ba'i gnas nyid ni/ /ts+tshan dor yang dag gsungs pa dang / /nye ba yi yang ts+tshan do'o/ /pre ta a hi bA si gsungs/ /de bzhin khyim gyi

lha nyid dang / /sau rASh+Ta dang gser gling nyid/ /'du ba de bzhin nye 'du ba/ /nA ga ra dang sin d+hU ni/ /dur khrod nyid du brjod pa dang / /ma ru dang ni ku lu tA/ /nye ba yi ni dur khrod nyid/ /snying rje de

bzhin las kyi brang / /ha ri ke la nyid dang ni/ /lan tsha rgya mtsho'i nang song dang / /bin+d+ha gzhon nu'i grong khyer nyid/ /'thung gcod nye ba'i 'thung gcod do/ /de dang nye ba dur khrod nyid/ /rab song dge 'dun rgya mtsho'i
'gram/ /skyed mos tshal dang rdzing bu'i 'gram/ /nye ba'i dur khrod brjod par bya/ /de nas gnas la lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/ rdul bral gnas su tsU ta gnas/ /kong ka nar ni
zla ba'i gling / /karanya dzAr gnas tsA ri tra/ /aT+Ta ha sar ka dam pa/ /lha mo'i mkhar du ba Ta gnas/ /ha ri ka lar hi ra gnas/ /oD+yAn a sho ka ni gnas/ /dzA lan+d+ha rar gser shing gnas/ /gnas

ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa/ /de bzhin nye gnas dri ma med/ /zhing ni 'od byed shes par bya/ /nye ba'i zhing ni 'od 'phro can/ /ts+tshan do mngon du gyur par nges/ /nye ba'i ts+tshan do sbyang dka' ba/ /'du ba ring du song ba
ste/ /nye ba'i 'du ba mi g.yo ba/ /dur khrod legs pa'i blo gros nyid/ /nye ba'i dur khrod chos kyi sprin/ /pha rol phyin bcu'i sa rnams la/ /rnal 'byor ma yi kla klo'i skad/ /pU la sogs pa ci gsungs
pa/ /phyi dang nang du bsam par bya/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams legs 'du ba'i/ /nyin par nyid kyang legs bshad bya/ /yi dgas zla phyed bcu bzhi dang / /brgyad pa la yang khyad par du/ /rgyal mtshan
dang ni mtshon bsnun nyid/ /skye ba bdun pa khyad par du/ /'bad pas snying rje bskyed nas ni/ /mkhas pas gsad par bya ba nyid/ /snying rje med na mi 'grub pas/ /de phyir snying rje yang dag bshad/ /
ji ltar bdag bzhin sems can nyid/ /ji ltar sems can de bzhin bdag /'di ltar sems pa'i rnal 'byor bdag /dngos grub myur du 'thob par 'gyur/ /'du ba'i gnas te lnga pa las rab tu byed
pa dang po'o// // gsang ba'i pad ma'i mtshan nyid ni/ /ye shes dbang po nyan par 'tshal/ /ye shes sems dang 'dres pa yi/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim pa ci/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ /gnas bzhi mnyam par gnas nas ni/ /rdzogs byang rim pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /mnyam nyid sems ni bskyed nas ni/ /'dod chags la sogs ring du spangs/ /yid dang mthun pa'i gnas

su ni/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/ /brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po kun/ /snying rje phan pa'i bsam bar bya/ /spyi bo med pa'i spyi bo dang / /sgra mtha'i de bzhin gsang pad ma/ /cha ni sna tshogs yig
'bru rnams/ /de bzhin du yang stan rnams nyid/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rnam par byed/ /bsdus nas gong bu'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /rdo rje sems dpar rang nyid 'gyur/ /chu
yi khams dang me yi khams/ /ro gcig mchog gi gnas su ni/ /thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid sbyar/ /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan dbang po drug /bstan bcos tshad ma slob dpon dang / /lung gi rjes
'brangs de nyid shes/ /gsang don de nyid dngos po yang / /de nyid las gcig cig las gcig /sngar gyi mtshan nyid thams cad kyis/ /stong sogs de nyid mtshan nyid kyis/ /lus kyi dri ma bkrus nas ni/ /
rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim par sbyar/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ /ye shes sems dpa' bsam par bya/ /mdog dkar kun da zla ba yi/ /'od zer rnam par spro ba ni/ /phyag gnyis
sems dpa'i skyil mo krung / /pad ma'i gnas la yang dag bzhugs/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /phyag rgya chen po phyag gnyis kyis/ /
snying gi gnas su gzir bar mdzad/ /gzugs dang gzi brjid yongs gang ba/ /ye shes sems dpar bsgom pa nyid/ /chu shing me tog lta bur ni/ /lte ba ru ni yang dag gnas/ /langs nas snying gar
kun du gnas/ /sngar gyi mtshan nyid yongs gang ba/ /bton nas dang po'i pad ma ni/ /'dab ma brgyad pa shin du mdzes/ /ze ba dang ni ze 'brur bcas/ /yi ge rnam dgod dgod par bya/ /dkyil 'khor
dbus su gnas pa yi/ /phyag gnyis zhal gcig dkar po ni/ /bzang po dri med dbus su bsam/ /de yi dbus su rnam shes dang / /ye shes de nyid sbyar bar bya/ /dang po shar gyi 'dab ma la/ /byams
par ldan pa'i mi bskyod pa/ /lho yi sgor ni snying rje nyid/ /rin chen de nyid sa bon las/ /nub kyi sgo yi 'dab ma la/ /'od dpag med pa'i sa bon dgod/ /byang gi sgo yi gnas su ni/ /sems kyi don
yod gtso bo nyid/ /dang po'i dbyangs sogs sa bon gyi/ /zla ba'i thig le ji bzhin rim/ /zla ba'i 'od zer dkar brgyan pa'i/ /yi ge bzhi ni dgod par bya/ /mtshams rnams su ni ma ning nyid/ /rnam pa
bzhi po sngar gsungs pa/ /de yi dbus su de yi sems/ /yi ge yis ni sbyar bar bya/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ sems la the tshom 'khrungs lags pa/ /bcom ldan bdag la bshad du
gsol/ /stong pa mtshon du med pa la/ /yi ge'i rnal 'byor la sogs ci/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /de nyid ji ltar rdo rje nyon/ /mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid/ /snying po med
pa'i chu shing las/ /snying po bdud rtsi 'bras 'byung ltar/ /'bras bu rnam shes ye shes ni/ /gzugs med pa la ye shes gzugs/ /ye shes sku ni skyon med pa/ /mtshan nyid mtshon du med pa nyid/ /
dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol/ /yig 'bru med las yig 'bru'i gzugs/ /de dbus ngo bo stong pa nyid/ /de nyid rnal 'byor pa yis gzung / /ji ltar mtshan nyid shes kyang ni/ /mnyam nyid ye
shes sems kyis ni/ /de yi rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam/ /myur ba nyid du mthong bar 'gyur/ /bla ma'i man ngag lam gyis ni/ /ye shes rnam shes ngo bo las/ /mtshan nyid bstan bcos mdor
bsdus pa/ /de nyid dpa' bo ston pa po/ /'di yi bsgom pa thams cad kyi/ /'od zer dkar pos rnam par brgyan/ /lcags sgrog lnga po mchod rten gyi/ /bdud rtsi'i sa bon bsams nas ni/ /kha dog dkar
po 'od gsal ba/ /bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni 'dzag par 'gyur/ /snying gi sa bon pad dbus su/ /mthe bong yongs kyis dkyil 'khor 'di/ /de yi dbus su sa bon ni/ /A li kA li yongs btus pa/ /kha dog
dkar po shin du mdzes/ /zla ba'i 'od zer 'phro ba ni/ /de yi dbus su sgo rnams kyi/ /thig le bsam par rab tu grags/ /skra yi rtse mo brgya stong char/ /phra rab gzugs su yang dag gnas/ /
rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin las/ /ye shes can gyi mtshan nyid mtshon/ /go 'phang gnas kyi thig le ltos/ /sems kyi mtshan nyid thams cad shes/ /snying la tshangs pa'i sgo yi ni/ /thig le sgo
yi lam las ni/ /bla ma'i man ngag brtson pa yis/ /rnam shes ye shes kyi yang blang / /lam gyi phyi rol bstan bcos kyang / /ma yin ring bar gyur pa min/ /bstan bcos rnams ni rnyed sla yang / /
sbyor ba de la rnyed par dka'/ /rnal 'byor pa yi thabs kyis ni/ /bla ma gsol ba 'debs la brtson/ /bla ma'i man ngag lam gyis ni/ /rnam par mkhas pas mthong bar 'gyur/ /mnyam
bzhag dngos po 'i rang bzhin gyis/ /g.yo ba med cing 'tshe ba med/ /yid ni chos rnams sngon du 'gro/ /yid ni dag cing yid ltar mgyogs/ /yid kyi rgyal po'i bka' drin gyis/ /smra ba dang ni
byed par 'gyur/ /de phyir yid kyi bdag nyid kun/ /yid la byung bar blo ldan pas/ /snying gar sems bsgom sdom pa ni/ /gal te 'dod na yo gis bzlas/ /rgyu ru gyur pa'i sa bon te/ /de nyid
dpyad pas ma yin no/ /'bras bu rgyu yi sa bon te/ /de nyid mthong ba ma yin no/ /gzugs sogs srid pa'i longs spyod kyis/ /dmigs pa'i sa bon rnam pa lnga/ /spyi bo spyi med yang dag gnas/ /
kun nas kun tu 'bab par 'gyur/ /rtag tu rtsa ba'i sa bon gyi/ /ye shes rnam shes sa bon las/ /thig le sgra dang yang dag ldan/ /'khor ba'i longs spyod 'dod pa yis/ /yid kyi bzlas pa yang dag
ldan/ /yi ge dag ni rnam par spangs/ /nges par rtag tu go 'phang gnas/ /rtag pa dang ni chos kyi dbyings/ /rtag tu phra zhing skyon med pa/ /ye shes la ni rnam shes nub/ /ye shes dngos pos rnam

shes kyi/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim mthong 'gyur/ /dang por mtshan ma thams cad kyi/ /mar me'i rnam pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /gnyis pa mtshan mo me khyer gyi/ /rnam pa'i rdul ni mtshon par byed/ /rdul dkar tsan dan
ka dbyibs su/ /phyogs bcur de bzhin mthong bar 'gyur/ /gsum par nyon mongs bcom pa ni/ /rnal 'byor pa yis rnam par brtag /lha yi longs spyod 'dod pa yang / /bzhi par yang ni bstan pa'o/ /
lha yi gzugs ni thams cad kyang / /lnga par sems kyis brtag par bya/ /drug pa gzugs ni med pa'i cha/ /bdun pa chos kyi dbyings nyid de/ /brgyad par rang 'dod rnal 'byor pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi

'bras bu'i don/ /rdo rje sems dpa' snying rje che/ /yid ni gcig tu gyur pas nyon/ /nges par dngos po thams cad kyi/ /dag pa de bzhin nyid du brjod/ /phyis ni re rer dbye ba yis/ /lha rnams kyi ni brjod

par bya/ /lus can rnams kyi phung po dang / /khams rnams dang ni skye mched rnams/ /rang bzhin gyis ni rnam par dag /nyon mongs mi shes sgrib sbyang bya/ /rang rig bdag nyid dag pa nyid/ /dag pa gzhan
gyis rnam grol min/ /yul gyi dngos po dag pa'i phyir/ /rang gis rig pa'i bde ba mchog /gzugs la sogs pa'i yul gang dang / /gzhan yang rnal 'byor pa snang ba/ /de kun rang bzhin dag pa ste/ /de
phyir sangs rgyas sna tshogs dngos/ /kye bcom ldan 'das rnam par ma dag pa gang lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs la sogs pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gzung ba dang 'dzin
pa'i phyir ro/ /gsol pa/ gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mig gis gzugs ni gzung bar bya/ /sgra ni rna bas mnyan par bya/ /dri ni sna yis tshor bar bya/ /lce
yis ro ni rig par bya/ /lus kyis dngos po rig par bya/ /yid kyis bde sogs thob pa ni/ /dag pas dug med byas nas ni/ /bstan bya 'di dag bsten par bya/ /gzugs ni sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad/ /

tshor ba rdo rje nyi ma ste/ /'du shes pad ma gar dbang phyug /de bzhin 'du byed rdo rje rgyal/ /rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa' nyid/ /kun gyi ngo bo he ru ka /mig la gti mug rdo rje bshad/ /zhe sdang rdo rje mngon thos pa/ /
phrag dog rdo rje de bzhin sna/ /kha ni 'dod chags rdo rjer bshad/ /reg la ser sna rdo rje ma/ /khams dang skye mched thams cad ni/ /dam pa'i dbang phyug he ru ka /sa yi khams ni ltung byed ma/ /
chu khams gsod par byed mar brjod/ /me yi khams ni 'gugs byed ma/ /de bzhin rlung ni gar dbang phyug /nam mkha'i khams su brjod pa ni/ /pad ma 'bar ba 'khyil pa nyid/ /'di ltar lus can
rnams kyis lus/ /phung po la sogs lha bdag nyid/ /bde dang sdug bsngal de bzhin las/ /nyon mongs la sogs des bskyed pa'i/ /bskyed pa'i cha la legs gnas pas/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das pa
thob/ /phung po dang skye mched rnam par dag pa ste lnga pa las rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o// // de nas spyod pas rtog pa rnams/ /'jig par byed pa bshad par byed/ /chos rnams kun la mnyam

byung ba/ /de nyid spyod pa gong na med/ /sangs rgyas sras la phan pa'i phyir/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam gnas pa/ /gang zhig yang ni de nyid las/ /rdo rje yan lag med pa yi/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog /

skye ba'i rgya mtsho 'jigs chen por/ /rga ba'i rlabs kyis 'khrugs pa las/ /sems can thams cad sgrol bar byed/ /tshong pa dge bar 'gro ba dang / /myur du dngos grub gsal byed cing / /snying po'i yon tan
kun gyi gnas/ /sems kyi rin chen las byung ba/ /'dod don rab tu sgrub par byed/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas rab bsngags pa'i/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i yon tan kun/ /lus 'byung 'di las ma gtogs
par/ /dga' ba'i dngos grub 'byung mi 'gyur/ /mkhas mchog spyod pa mtshungs med 'di/ /grol bar 'dod pas spyad par gyis/ /lha'i dgra dang brgya byin dang / /grong khyer sum brtsegs dgra bo dang / /nor
sbyin tshangs pa la sogs pas/ /zhabs kyi 'dam skyes mchod pa yis/ /sdig pa 'jig byed 'di la spyod/ /myur du de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /gnas kyi mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sems
dpas ni/ /gang zhig 'gro la phan par ni/ /kun 'dar gyi ni spyod pa gsung / /de ltar mchog tu bsam pas gnas/ /shin tu gsung ba yo gis bsgom/ /rtog pa thams cad bral bar ni/ /dam tshig la ni spyad par
bya/ /rgyu mthun 'bras bu rang bzhin las/ /dang po'i rtsom pa yo gi gnas/ /de nas bsgoms pas dub pa na/ /bsdus nas byis pa'i rtse bar bya/ /sna tshogs gdul bya'i 'jig rten la/ /'jam pa'i gzugs
can rang nyid bsgom/ /grub par grags pa ma lus pa/ /ci gsungs rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i/ /spyod pas bla na med pa yi/ /kun bzang mtshungs pa med 'grub pas/ /spyod pa nges rig rdo rje can/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal to/ /dpal ldan slob dpon rdo rje can/ /kun gyi mgon la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gsang ba'i spyod pas gnas nas ni/ /blo gros chen po bya ba byas/ /de nas rang gi 'dod sgyur bas/ /
sbyor ba kun la kha phyir bltas/ /kun du seng ge lta bur ni/ /de nyid ldan pas bdag gis spyad/ /ji ltar byung don yang dag r-ig /'gro ba 'don ba'i bsam pa yis/ /yang dag lta ba rab sgyur bdag /brtan
pa'i sems ni gnas pas/ /phung po khams sogs mtshan nyid ni/ /thams cad rmi lam sgyu ma ltar/ /khams gsum 'di dag thams cad ni/ /mdor bsdus nas ni 'dir shes bya/ /sgrib pa kun las
rnam par grol/ /'tsho bar dbang phyug 'du ba dang / /de bzhin 'jig rten chos brgyad ni/ /thams cad shin tu ring du spangs/ /rtag tu rtog pa med gyur pas/ /gnyis su med par nges byas nas/ /pha rol
phyin drug rnal 'byor gyis/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub rab grub phyir/ /sems can don la legs nus kyang / /sems can yongs su brtag mi bya/ /byang chub la ni sems bzhag nas/ /
